Data is limited on what amount of tumor by volume or minimum number of FNA passes are needed to yield sufficient material for running NGS. We sought to identify the amount of tumor for running the PCDx NGS platform.

新一代测序测试（NGS）通常在相对较小的核心活组织检查或细针抽吸（FNA）样本上进行。数据受限于肿瘤体积的数量或最小数量的FNA通道是否需要足够的材料来运行NGS。我们试图确定运行PCDx NGS平台的肿瘤数量。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29702695 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Morris S, Subrama...
37. A remark on copy number variation detection methods.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Copy number variations (CNVs) are gain and loss of DNA sequence of a genome. High throughput platforms such as microarrays and next generation sequencing technologies (NGS) have been applied for genome wide copy number losses. Although progress has been made in both approaches, the accuracy and consistency of CNV calling from the two platforms remain in dispute. In this study, we perform a deep analysis on copy number losses on 254 human DNA samples, which have both SNP microarray data and NGS data publicly available from Hapmap Project and 1000 Genomes Project respectively. We show that the copy number losses reported from Hapmap Project and 1000 Genome Project only have < 30% overlap, while these reports are required to have cross-platform (e.g. PCR, microarray and high-throughput sequencing) experimental supporting by their corresponding projects, even though state-of-art calling methods were employed. On the other hand, copy number losses are found directly from HapMap microarray data by an accurate algorithm, i.e. CNVhac, almost all of which have lower read mapping depth in NGS data; furthermore, 88% of which can be supported by the sequences with breakpoint in NGS data. Our results suggest the ability of microarray calling CNVs and the possible introduction of false negatives from the unessential requirement of the additional cross-platform supporting. The inconsistency of CNV reports from Hapmap Project and 1000 Genomes Project might result from the inadequate information containing in microarray data, the inconsistent detection criteria, or the filtration effect of cross-platform supporting. The statistical test on CNVs called from CNVhac show that the microarray data can offer reliable CNV reports, and majority of CNV candidates can be confirmed by raw sequences. Therefore, the CNV candidates given by a good caller could be highly reliable without cross-platform supporting, so additional experimental information should be applied in need instead of necessarily.

拷贝数变异（CNV）是基因组DNA序列的获得和丧失。高通量平台如微阵列和下一代测序技术（NGS）已应用于全基因组拷贝数丢失。虽然两种方法都取得了进展，但两个平台的CNV呼叫的准确性和一致性仍然存在争议。在这项研究中，我们对254份人类DNA样本的拷贝数损失进行了深入分析，这些样本既包含SNP芯片数据，也包含分别从Hapmap Project和1000 Genomes Project公布的NGS数据。我们发现从Hapmap Project和1000 Genome Project报道的拷贝数损失仅有<30％的重叠，而这些报告需要通过其相应的项目进行跨平台（如PCR，微阵列和高通量测序）实验支持，尽管采用了最先进的呼叫方法。另一方面，通过精确算法（即CNVhac）直接从HapMap微阵列数据中找到拷贝数量损失，其几乎全部在NGS数据中具有较低的读取映射深度;此外，其中88％可以通过NGS数据中具有断点的序列来支持。我们的研究结果表明微阵列调用CNV的能力以及从额外跨平台支持的基本要求中引入假阴性的可能性。 Hapmap项目和1000基因组项目的CNV报告不一致可能源于微阵列数据中包含的信息不足，检测标准不一致或跨平台支持的过滤效应。从CNVhac调用的CNV的统计测试显示，微阵列数据可以提供可靠的CNV报告，并且大部分CNV候选者可以通过原始序列确认。因此，如果没有跨平台的支持，优秀呼叫者提供的CNV候选人可能具有高度的可靠性，因此需要应用更多的实验信息而不是必要的。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29702671 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Li S, Dou X, Gao ...
38. Comprehensive Molecular Characterization of Young Chinese Patients with Lung Adenocarcinoma Identified a Distinctive Genetic Profile.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Occurrence at a younger age has been demonstrated to be associated with a distinct biology in non-small cell lung cancer. However, genomics and clinical characteristics among younger patients with lung adenocarcinoma remain to be determined. Here we studied the potentially targetable genetic alterations by next-generation sequencing (NGS) assay in young Chinese patients with lung adenocarcinoma.

已经证实，年轻时发生的事件与非小细胞肺癌中的独特生物学有关。然而，年轻肺腺癌患者的基因组学和临床特征仍有待确定。在这里，我们研究了新一代测序法（NGS）在年轻中国肺腺癌患者中的潜在靶向基因改变。

Journal: Oncologist [IF=4.962] PMID: 29700208 PubDate: 2018-Apr-26 Authors: Hou H, Zhu H, Zha...
39. Ioncopy: an R Shiny app to call copy number alterations in targeted NGS data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Somatic copy number alterations (CNAs) contribute to the clinically targetable aberrations in the tumor genome. For both routine diagnostics and biomarkers research, CNA analysis in a single assay together with somatic mutations is highly desirable.

体细胞拷贝数改变（CNA）有助于肿瘤基因组中的临床可靶向异常。对于常规诊断和生物标志物研究，单次测定中的CNA分析以及体细胞突变是非常需要的。

Journal: BMC Bioinformatics [IF=2.448] PMID: 29699497 PubDate: 2018-Apr-24 Authors: Budczies J, Pfarr... PMC5921540
40. A meta-barcoding approach to assess and compare the storage temperature-dependent bacterial diversity of gilt-head sea bream (Sparus aurata) originating from fish farms from two geographically distinct areas of Greece.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Bacterial diversity of whole gilt-head sea bream (Sparus aurata L. 1758) originating from Ionian and Aegean Sea aquaculture farms and stored at 0 (ice), 4 and 8 °C was determined by 16S rRNA gene amplicon sequencing method using the Illumina's MiSeq platform. The composition of Aerobic Plate Counts (APC) was also monitored by 16S rRNA gene sequencing. The rejection time point of sea bream from either area, as determined by sensory evaluation, was about 14, 6 and 3 days at 0, 4 and 8 °C, respectively. APC was approximately 4.5 log cfu/g at day 0 and ranged from 7.5 to 8.5 log cfu/g at sensory rejection. Culture-depended analysis showed that Pseudomonas and Shewanella were the most abundant microorganisms grown on plates for both seas. Moreover, culture-independent analysis of DNA extracted directly from fish flesh showed that sea bream originating from different geographical areas exhibited different bacterial diversity. Pseudomonas and Psychrobacter were the dominant microorganisms of chill-stored fish from Ionian (apart from 8 °C, where Carnobacterium dominated) and Aegean Sea, respectively. In addition, small changes of storage temperature greatly affected bacterial microbiota of stored fish. Various bacterial species, not detected by conventional microbiological methods, were also revealed through 16S amplicon sequencing. In conclusion, the use of NGS approach is a promising methodology for assessing bacterial diversity of sea bream originating from different geographical areas and stored at various temperatures.

使用Illumina的MiSeq通过16S rRNA基因扩增子测序方法测定来自爱奥尼亚海和爱琴海水产养殖场且储存在0（冰），4和8℃下的整头金头鲷（Sparus aurata L. 1758）的细菌多样性平台。通过16S rRNA基因测序也监测好氧板计数（APC）的组成。通过感官评估确定的来自任一区域的鲷鱼的排斥时间点分别在0℃，4℃和8℃约14,6和3d天。 APC在第0天约为4.5logcfu / g，在感官排斥时为7.5至8.5logcfu / g。依赖于培养的分析表明，假单胞菌和希瓦氏菌是在海洋上生长在板上的最丰富的微生物。此外，直接从鱼肉中提取的DNA的不依赖于培养物的分析表明，源自不同地理区域的鲷鱼表现出不同的细菌多样性。假单胞菌和嗜碱杆菌是爱奥尼亚冷藏鱼的主要微生物（除8℃以外，肉鸡占优势）和爱琴海。另外，存储温度的小变化极大地影响了存储的鱼的细菌微生物群。通过16S扩增子测序也揭示了通过常规微生物学方法未检测到的各种细菌种类。总之，使用NGS方法是评估来自不同地理区域并储存在不同温度的海鲷的细菌多样性的有前景的方法。

Journal: Int. J. Food Microbiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29698856 PubDate: 2018-Apr-19 Authors: Parlapani FF, Mic...
41. System for Informatics in the Molecular Pathology Laboratory (SIMPL): An Open-Source End-to-End Solution for Next-Generation Sequencing Clinical Data Management.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) diagnostic assays are increasingly becoming the standard of care in oncology practice. As the scale of an NGS laboratory grows, management of these assays requires organizing large amounts of information, including patient data, laboratory processes, genomic data, as well as variant interpretation and reporting. Although several Laboratory Information Systems (LIS) and/or Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS) are commercially available, they may not meet all of the needs of a given laboratory, in addition to being frequently cost prohibitive. Herein, we present System for Informatics in the Molecular Pathology Laboratory (SIMPL), a free and open-source LIS/LIMS system for academic and nonprofit molecular pathology NGS laboratories, developed at the Genomic and Molecular Pathology division at the University of Chicago Medicine (UCM-GMP). SIMPL was designed as a modular end-to-end information system to handle all stages of the NGS laboratory workload from test order to reporting. We describe its features, clinical validation of the system at UCM-GMP, its installation and testing within a different academic center laboratory (University of Colorado), and propose a platform for future community co-development and interlaboratory data sharing.

新一代测序（NGS）诊断分析正日益成为肿瘤学实践中的护理标准。随着NGS实验室规模的扩大，这些检测的管理需要组织大量的信息，包括患者数据，实验室流程，基因组数据以及不同的解释和报告。尽管多个实验室信息系统（LIS）和/或实验室信息管理系统（LIMS）可以在市场上买到，但它们可能无法满足给定实验室的所有需求，除此之外，这些系统往往成本过高。在此，我们介绍了分子病理学实验室（SIMPL）中的信息系统，SIMPL是芝加哥大学医学院基因组和分子病理学部门开发的一个免费和开源的LIS / LIMS系统，用于学术和非营利性分子病理学NGS实验室。 UCM-GMP）。 SIMPL被设计为一个模块化的端到端信息系统，用于处理从测试订单到报告的NGS实验室工作负载的所有阶段。我们描述其功能，UCM-GMP系统的临床验证，在不同学术中心实验室（科罗拉多大学）内的安装和测试，并为未来社区共同开发和实验室间数据共享提供平台。

Journal: J Mol Diagn [IF=4.526] PMID: 29698836 PubDate: 2018-Apr-23 Authors: Kang W, Kadri S, ...
42. Exact association test for small size sequencing data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Recent statistical methods for next generation sequencing (NGS) data have been successfully applied to identifying rare genetic variants associated with certain diseases. However, most commonly used methods (e.g., burden tests and variance-component tests) rely on large sample sizes. Notwithstanding, due to its-still high cost, NGS data is generally restricted to small sample sizes, that cannot be analyzed by most existing methods.

近期的下一代测序（NGS）数据统计方法已成功应用于鉴定与某些疾病相关的罕见遗传变异。然而，最常用的方法（例如负荷测试和方差分量测试）依赖于大样本量。尽管如此，由于其成本仍然很高，NGS数据通常仅限于小样本量，大多数现有方法无法对其进行分析。

Journal: BMC Med Genomics [IF=2.848] PMID: 29697368 PubDate: 2018-Apr-20 Authors: Lee J, Lee S, Jan... PMC5918458
43. An integrated clinical and genomic information system for cancer precision medicine.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Increasing affordability of next-generation sequencing (NGS) has created an opportunity for realizing genomically-informed personalized cancer therapy as a path to precision oncology. However, the complex nature of genomic information presents a huge challenge for clinicians in interpreting the patient's genomic alterations and selecting the optimum approved or investigational therapy. An elaborate and practical information system is urgently needed to support clinical decision as well as to test clinical hypotheses quickly.

越来越多的下一代测序（NGS）的可负担性已经为实现基因组化的个性化癌症治疗作为精准肿瘤学的途径创造了机会。然而，基因组信息的复杂性质给临床医生解释患者基因组改变和选择最佳批准或研究治疗带来巨大挑战。迫切需要精心设计的实用信息系统来支持临床决策并快速测试临床假设。

Journal: BMC Med Genomics [IF=2.848] PMID: 29697362 PubDate: 2018-Apr-20 Authors: Jang Y, Choi T, K... PMC5918454
44. NGS testing for cardiomyopathy: Utility of adding RASopathy-associated genes.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

RASopathies include a group of syndromes caused by pathogenic germline variants in RAS-MAPK pathway genes and typically present with facial dysmorphology, cardiovascular disease, and musculoskeletal anomalies. Recently, variants in RASopathy-associated genes have been reported in individuals with apparently non-syndromic cardiomyopathy, suggesting that subtle features may be overlooked. To determine the utility and burden of adding RASopathy-associated genes to cardiomyopathy panels, we tested 11 RASopathy-associated genes by next generation sequencing (NGS), including NGS-based copy number variant assessment, in 1,111 individuals referred for genetic testing for hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) or dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM). Disease-causing variants were identified in 0.6% (4/692) of individuals with HCM, including three missense variants in the PTPN11, SOS1, and BRAF genes. Overall, 36 variants of uncertain significance (VUSs) were identified, averaging ∼3VUSs/100 cases. This study demonstrates that adding a subset of the RASopathy-associated genes to cardiomyopathy panels will increase clinical diagnoses without significantly increasing the number of VUSs/case. This article is protected by copyright. All rights reserved.

RAS病变包括由RAS-MAPK途径基因中致病性种系变异体引起的一组综合征，并且典型地伴有面部畸形，心血管疾病和肌肉骨骼异常。最近，RAS病相关基因的变异已在有明显非综合征性心肌病的个体中报道，表明可能忽略了细微的特征。为了确定将RAS病相关基因添加到心肌病组中的效用和负担，我们通过下一代测序（NGS）测试了11个RAS病相关基因，包括基于NGS的拷贝数变异评估，共纳入1,111位参与肥厚型心肌病基因检测的个体（HCM）或扩张型心肌病（DCM）。 0.6％（4/692）的HCM患者发现了致病变异株，包括PTPN11，SOS1和BRAF基因中的3种错义突变。总体而言，确定了36个不确定意义变体（VUSs），平均值为〜3VUSs / 100例。这项研究表明，将一部分RAS病相关基因添加到心肌病组将增加临床诊断，但不会显着增加VUS /病例的数量。本文受版权保护。版权所有。

Journal: Hum. Mutat. [IF=.] PMID: 29696744 PubDate: 2018-Apr-25 Authors: Ceyhan-Birsoy O, ...
45. Searching for new biomarkers in ovarian cancer patients: Rationale and design of a retrospective study under the Mermaid III project.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Ovarian cancer is a silent killer and, due to late diagnosis, the primary cause of death amongst gynecological cancers, killing approximately 376 women annually in Denmark. The discovery of a specific and sensitive biomarker for ovarian cancer could improve early diagnosis, but also treatment, by predicting which patients will benefit from specific treatment strategies. The Mermaid III project is consisting of 3 parts including "Early detection, screening and long-term survival," "Biomarkers and/or prognostic markers" and "The infection theory." The present paper gives an overview of the part regarding biomarkers and/or prognostic markers, with a focus on rationale and design. The study described has 3 major branches: microRNAs, epigenetics and Next Generation Sequencing. Tissue and blood from ovarian cancer patients, already enrolled in the prospective ongoing pelvic mass cohort, will be examined. Relevant microRNAs and DNA methylation patterns will be investigated using array technology. Patient exomes will be fully sequenced, and identified genetic variations will be validated with Next Generation Sequencing. In all cases, data will be correlated with clinical information on the patient, in order to identify possible biomarkers. A thorough investigation of biomarkers in ovarian cancer, including large numbers of different markers, has never been done before. Besides from improving diagnosis and treatment, other outcomes could be markers for screening, knowledge of the molecular aspects of cancer and the discovery of new drugs. Moreover, biomarkers are a prerequisite for the development of precision medicine. This study will attack the ovarian cancer problem from several angles, thereby increasing the chance of successfully contributing to saving lives.

卵巢癌是一种无声的杀手，由于延误诊断，是妇科癌症死亡的主要原因，每年在丹麦造成约376名妇女死亡。通过预测哪些患者将从特定治疗策略中受益，卵巢癌的特异性和敏感性生物标志物的发现可以改善早期诊断，还可以改善治疗。美人鱼III项目由3部分组成，包括“早期发现，筛选和长期存活”，“生物标记和/或预后标记”和“感染理论”。本文件概述了关于生物标记和/或预后标记的部分，重点在于理论和设计。这项研究描述了3个主要分支：microRNAs，表观遗传学和下一代测序。将检查已经登记在未来的正在进行的盆腔肿块群中的卵巢癌患者的组织和血液。使用阵列技术将研究相关的microRNA和DNA甲基化模式。患者外显子组将被完全测序，并且鉴定出的遗传变异将通过下一代测序进行验证。在所有情况下，数据将与患者的临床信息相关联，以识别可能的生物标志物。卵巢癌中的生物标志物的彻底调查，包括大量不同的标志物，以前从未做过。除了改善诊断和治疗外，其他结果可能成为筛查的标记，癌症分子方面的知识和新药的发现。而且，生物标志物是精密医学发展的先决条件。这项研究将从多个角度攻击卵巢癌问题，从而增加挽救生命的成功机会。

Journal: Contemp Clin Trials Commun [IF=.] PMID: 29696206 PubDate: 2017-Dec Authors: Hentze JL, Høgdal... PMC5898550
46. Deletion at the 5'-end of Estonian ASFV strains associated with an attenuated phenotype.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

African swine fever (ASF) was introduced into the Eastern European Union in 2014 and led to considerable mortality among wild boar. In contrast, unexpected high antibody prevalence was reported in hunted wild boar in north-eastern Estonia. One of the causative virus strains was recently characterized. While it still showed rather high virulence in the majority of experimentally infected animals, one animal survived and recovered completely. Here, we report on the follow-up characterization of the isolate obtained from the survivor in the acute phase of infection. As a first step, three in vivo experiments were performed with different types of pigs: twelve minipigs (trial A), five domestic pigs (trial B), and five wild boar (trial C) were inoculated. 75% of the minipigs and all domestic pigs recovered after an acute course of disease. However, all wild boar succumbed to infection within 17 days. Representative samples were sequenced using NGS-technologies, and whole-genomes were compared to ASFV "Georgia 2007/1". The alignments indicated a deletion of 14560 base pairs at the 5' end, and genome reorganization by duplication. The characteristic deletion was confirmed in all trial samples and local field samples. In conclusion, an ASFV variant was found in Estonia that showed reduced virulence.

非洲猪瘟（ASF）于2014年引入东欧联盟，导致野猪死亡率相当高。相比之下，爱沙尼亚东北部发现野猪的意外高流行率。最近表征了致病性病毒株之一。虽然它在大多数实验感染的动物中仍然表现出相当高的毒力，但一只动物存活并完全恢复。在这里，我们报道了在感染急性期从幸存者获得的分离株的后续表征。作为第一步，用不同类型的猪进行三项体内实验：接种12只小型猪（试验A），5只家猪（试验B）和5只野猪（试验C）。 75％的小型猪和所有家猪在急性病程后康复。然而，所有野猪在17天内都感染了感染。使用NGS技术对代表性样品进行测序，并将全基因组与ASFV“Georgia 2007/1”进行比较。比对表明在5'末端删除了14560个碱基对，并通过重复进行基因组重组。所有试验样品和当地现场样品都证实了特征性缺失。总之，在爱沙尼亚发现了一种ASFV变体，其毒力降低。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29695831 PubDate: 2018-Apr-25 Authors: Zani L, Forth JH,... PMC5916933
47. Molecular Profile of Advanced Thyroid Carcinomas by Next-Generation Sequencing: Characterizing tumors beyond diagnosis for targeted therapy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next generation sequencing (NGS) for molecular diagnostics allows simultaneous testing of activating oncogenes and tumor suppressor mutations in multiple signal pathways. Extended mutational profiling of advanced thyroid cancers may enhance considerations for targeted therapies. We analyzed clinically derived molecular profiling of 216 patients with advanced thyroid carcinoma using NGS (Ion Torrent Personal Genome Machine) from 4/2012-2/2014. We examined substitutions and small indels in 46/50 cancer-related genes using Ampliseq Cancer Hotspot panel in respect to tumor diagnosis and clinical correlations. Mutations were common in advanced thyroid carcinomas 154 (71%) predominately in targetable MAPK pathway (146/216, 68%), and several PI3K/AKT pathway (8, 4%; 6 as co-mutations). BRAF V600E mutation associated with papillary (94/139, 68%), poorly differentiated (4/39, 10%) and anaplastic (3/12, 25%) carcinomas. NRAS mutations occurred in follicular (5/12, 40%) and poorly differentiated thyroid carcinoma (12/39, 31%). Tumor suppressor mutations (16, 7%) occurred predominantly in TP53 in Hurthle cell (2/5, 40%, the only mutation), in anaplastic (3/12, 25%), and poorly differentiated thyroid carcinoma (4/39, 10%) some co-mutations and in papillary thyroid carcinoma (5/139, 4%) always a co-mutation. Kaplan-Meier analysis showed patients with poorly differentiated thyroid carcinoma containing activating mutations who received targeted therapeutics showed improved survival compared to similarly treated patients without mutations in targetable pathways (p=0.02). In conclusion, MAPK pathway is the predominant target for therapy in advance thyroid carcinomas; adding NGS enables the identification of co-mutations associated with resistance (PI3K/AKT). Within poorly differentiated thyroid carcinoma, the molecular profile may hold prognostic value in the era of targeted therapy.

用于分子诊断的新一代测序（NGS）允许同时检测多种信号通路中的活化癌基因和肿瘤抑制基因突变。晚期甲状腺癌的扩展突变分析可能会增强对靶向治疗的考虑。我们使用NGS（Ion Torrent Personal Genome Machine）从2012年4月4日至2014年4月分析了216例晚期甲状腺癌患者的临床衍生分子谱。我们使用Ampliseq Cancer Hotspot panel在肿瘤诊断和临床相关性方面研究了46/50癌症相关基因中的替换和小插入缺失。突变在晚期甲状腺癌中很常见154（71％）主要在可靶向的MAPK途径中（146/216,68％）和几种PI3K / AKT途径（8,4％; 6作为共同突变）。 BRAF V600E突变与乳头状癌（94 / 139,68％），低分化癌（4/39,10％）和间变性癌（3/12,25％）有关。 NRAS突变发生于滤泡型（5/12，40％）和低分化型甲状腺癌（12 / 39,31％）。肿瘤抑制基因突变（16,7％）主要发生在Hurthle细胞TP53中（2/5，仅有40％，唯一的突变），间变性（3/12,25％）和低分化甲状腺癌（4/39， 10％）一些共同突变和甲状腺乳头状癌（5/139,4％）总是共同突变。 Kaplan-Meier分析显示，与未接受可靶向途径突变的类似治疗患者相比，接受靶向治疗的含有活化突变的低分化甲状腺癌患者的生存率显着提高（p = 0.02）。总之，MAPK通路是预先甲状腺癌治疗的主要靶点;添加NGS可以鉴定与抗性相关的共同突变（PI3K / AKT）。在低分化甲状腺癌中，分子特征可能在靶向治疗时代具有预后价值。

Journal: Mol. Cancer Ther. [IF=.] PMID: 29695638 PubDate: 2018-Apr-25 Authors: Chen H, Luthra R,...
48. Evaluation of Targeted Next Generation Sequencing for Detection of Bovine Pathogens in Clinical Samples.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The laboratory diagnosis of infectious diseases, especially those caused by mixed infections, is challenging. Routinely, this requires submission of multiple samples to separate laboratories. Advances in next-generation sequencing (NGS) have provided the opportunity for development of a comprehensive method to identify infectious agents. This study describes the use of target-specific primers for PCR-mediated amplification with the NGS technology, in which pathogen genomic regions of interest are enriched and selectively sequenced from clinical samples. In the study, 198 primers were designed to target 43 common bovine and small ruminant bacterial, fungal, viral, and parasitic pathogens and a bioinformatics tool was specifically constructed for the detection of targeted pathogens. The primers were confirmed to detect the intended pathogens by testing reference strains and isolates. The method was then validated using 60 clinical samples (including tissues, feces and milk) that were also tested with other routine diagnostic techniques. Detection limits of the targeted NGS method were evaluated using 10 representative pathogens that were also tested by qPCR and the NGS method was able to detect the organisms from samples with qPCR Ct values in the 30s. The method was successful for the detection of multiple pathogens in the clinical samples, including some additional pathogens missed by the routine techniques because the specific tests needed for these particular organisms were not performed. These results demonstrate the feasibility of the approach and indicate that it is possible to incorporate NGS as a diagnostic tool in a cost effective manner into a veterinary diagnostic laboratory.

传染病的实验室诊断，特别是由混合感染引起的传染病，具有挑战性。通常，这需要将多个样品提交给不同的实验室。新一代测序（NGS）的进展为开发鉴定传染因子的综合方法提供了机会。这项研究描述了用NGS技术进行PCR介导扩增的目标特异性引物的使用，其中感兴趣的病原体基因组区域被富集并且从临床样品中选择性地测序。在该研究中，设计了198个引物，用于靶向43种常见的牛和小反刍动物的细菌，真菌，病毒和寄生虫病原体，并且特异性构建了用于检测靶向病原体的生物信息学工具。通过检测参考菌株和分离株确认引物检测预期的病原体。然后使用60种临床样品（包括组织，粪便和牛奶）验证该方法，这些样品也用其他常规诊断技术进行了测试。使用10种代表性病原体评估了目标NGS方法的检测限，这些代表性病原体也通过qPCR进行了测试，并且NGS方法能够在30s内检测到具有qPCR Ct值的样品中的生物体。该方法成功地用于检测临床样品中的多种病原体，包括常规技术漏检的一些其他病原体，因为这些特定生物体所需的特定测试未被执行。这些结果证明了该方法的可行性，并表明可以将NGS作为诊断工具以具有成本效益的方式纳入兽医诊断实验室。

Journal: J. Clin. Microbiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29695524 PubDate: 2018-Apr-25 Authors: Anis E, Hawkins I...
49. Targeted next-generation sequencing reveals that a compound heterozygous mutation in phosphodiesterase 6a gene leads to retinitis pigmentosa in a Chinese family.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Retinitis pigmentosa (RP) is a genetically heterogeneous disease with over 70 causative genes identified to date. However, approximately 40% of RP cases remain genetically unsolved, suggesting that many novel disease-causing mutations are yet to be identified. The purpose of this study is to identify the causative mutations of a Chinese RP family.

色素性视网膜炎（RP）是一种遗传异质性疾病，迄今已鉴定出70多种致病基因。然而，大约40％的RP病例遗传性尚未解决，这表明许多新的致病性突变尚未确定。本研究的目的是鉴别中国RP家族的致病突变。

Journal: Ophthalmic Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29693493 PubDate: 2018-Apr-25 Authors: Zhang S, Li J, Li...
50. Whole genome shotgun sequence of Bacillus paralicheniformis strain KMS 80, a rhizobacterial endophyte isolated from rice (Oryza sativa L.).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Bacillus paralicheniformis strain KMS 80 (MTCC No. 12704) is an isolate from the root tissues of rice (Oryza sativa L.) that displays biological nitrogen fixation and plant growth promoting abilities. Here, we report the complete genome sequence of this strain, which contains 4,566,040 bp, 4424 protein-coding genes, 8692 promoter sequences, 67 tRNAs, 20 rRNA genes with six copies of 5S rRNAs along with a single copy of 16S-23S rRNA and genome average GC-content of 45.50%. Twenty one genes involved in nitrogen metabolism pathway and two main transcriptional factor genes, glnR and tnrA responsible for regulation of nitrogen fixation in Bacillus sp. were predicted from the whole genome of strain KMS 80. Analysis of the ~ 4.57 Mb genome sequence will give support to understand the genetic determinants of host range, endophytic colonization behaviour as well as to enhance endophytic nitrogen fixation and other plant beneficial role of B. paralicheniformis in rice.

Bacillus paralicheniformis菌株KMS 80（MTCC编号12704）是显示生物固氮和植物生长促进能力的水稻（Oryza sativa L.）根组织的分离物。在这里，我们报告了该菌株的全基因组序列，其包含4,566,040bp，4424个蛋白质编码基因，8692个启动子序列，67个tRNA，20个rRNA基因和6个5S rRNAs拷贝以及16S-23S rRNA的单个拷贝，以及基因组平均GC含量为45.50％。二十一个参与氮代谢途径的基因和两个主要转录因子基因glnR和tnrA负责调控芽孢杆菌固氮。是从菌株KMS 80的全基因组预测的。对〜4.57 Mb基因组序列的分析将有助于理解宿主范围，内生菌定殖行为的遗传决定因素以及增强内生固氮和其他植物对B的有益作用。稻瘟病菌。

53. Landscape of Actionable Genetic Alterations Profiled from 1,071 Tumor Samples in Korean Cancer Patients.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

With the emergence of next-generation sequencing (NGS) technology, profiling a wide range of genomic alterations has become a possibility resulting in improved implementation of targeted cancer therapy. In Asian populations, the prevalence and spectrum of clinically actionable genetic alterations has not yet been determined because of a lack of studies examining high-throughput cancer genomic data.

随着新一代测序（NGS）技术的出现，分析广泛的基因组改变已成为改善靶向癌症治疗实施的可能性。在亚洲人群中，由于缺乏研究高通量癌症基因组数据的研究，尚未确定临床可行的基因改变的流行性和范围。

54. [Clinical experience and next-generation sequencing analysis of encephalitis caused by pseudorabies virus].
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Objective: To detect potential pathogens including pseudorabies virus in patients with encephalitis of unknown etiology in China and describe novel encephalitic entities. Methods: Patients with clinically suspected infectious encephalitis were enrolled in a multicenter study to identify the pathogens in PUMCH Encephalitis Program.Next-generation sequencing(NGS) of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) was used in patients with encephalitis of unknown etiology enrolled from 2016 to 2017.The patients diagnosed as PRV encephalitis were studied to describe this novel entity. Results: The four patients(3 male, 1 male, 38-54 years old) had occupational exposure to raw park when working in the production or marketing of pork and at least one got injured during pork-cutting.Two of them were confirmed with NGS of CSF, and anti-PRV antibodies were positive in 3 patients whose serum was available for serological analysis.They all presented with an acute onset of fever, convulsion, loss of consciousness and respiratory failure within 1 to 4 days and rapidly deteriorated even on extensive treatment.All the patients needed ICU admission and 3 needed mechanical ventilation.Two patients also had bilateral retinitis.Neuroimaging revealed symmetric gray matter lesions including limbic system, basal ganglia and midbrain without obvious hemorrhage.Lumbar puncture revealed elevated intracranial pressure and lymphocytic pleocytosis [(6-64)×10(6)/L] of CSF.The patients failed to response to the treatment of acyclovir combined with intravenous immunoglobulin and steroids.Modified Rankin Score was 3, 5, 5 and 6 (died) for the 4 patients respectively on last follow-up. Conclusions: PRV could be a cause of severe encephalitis.The patients with suspected pseudorabies encephalitis (PRE) need to be tested for PRV DNA timely.Severe encephalitis with bilateral involvement of limbic system, basal ganglion, thalamus and midbrain in patient with occupational exposure indicate this emerging infectious encephalitis.

目的：检测中国病因不明的脑炎病毒包括伪狂犬病病毒，并描述新的脑炎病例。方法：将临床疑似感染性脑炎患者纳入多中心研究，以确定PUMCH脑炎计划中的病原体。脑脊液（CSF）的下一代测序（NGS）用于2016 - 2017年登记的病因不明的脑炎患者。被诊断为PRV脑炎的患者被研究以描述这种新型实体。结果：4名患者（男性3名，男性1名，男性38-54岁）在猪肉生产或销售工作期间曾接触过原始园区，至少有一人在切猪时受伤。其中两人3例血清可用于血清学分析的CSF患者和抗PRV抗体阳性，均在1〜4天内出现急性发热，惊厥，意识丧失和呼吸衰竭，甚至在1〜4天内迅速恶化所有患者均需ICU入院，3例需机械通气。2例患者也有双侧视网膜炎。神经影像学显示对称性灰质病变包括边缘系统，基底节和中脑，无明显出血。腰椎穿刺显示颅内压升高和淋巴细胞增多[ （6-64）×10（6）/ L]。患者对阿昔洛韦联合静脉注射免疫球蛋白和类固醇治疗无效。在最后的随访中，4名患者分别为3,5,5和6名（死亡）。结论：PRV可能是导致严重脑炎的原因。疑似伪狂犬病病毒（PRE）患者需及时检测PRV DNA。职业暴露患者中存在边缘系统，基底节，丘脑和中脑双侧累及的严重脑炎这种新兴的传染性脑炎。

Journal: Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi [IF=.] PMID: 29690727 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Zhao WL, Wu YH, L...
55. Prostate Cancer Genomics: Recent Advances and the Prevailing Underrepresentation from Racial and Ethnic Minorities.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Prostate cancer (CaP) is the most commonly diagnosed non-cutaneous cancer and the second leading cause of male cancer deaths in the United States. Among African American (AA) men, CaP is the most prevalent malignancy, with disproportionately higher incidence and mortality rates. Even after discounting the influence of socioeconomic factors, the effect of molecular and genetic factors on racial disparity of CaP is evident. Earlier studies on the molecular basis for CaP disparity have focused on the influence of heritable mutations and single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs). Most CaP susceptibility alleles identified based on genome-wide association studies (GWAS) were common, low-penetrance variants. Germline CaP-associated mutations that are highly penetrant, such as those found in HOXB13 and BRCA2, are usually rare. More recently, genomic studies enabled by Next-Gen Sequencing (NGS) technologies have focused on the identification of somatic mutations that contribute to CaP tumorigenesis. These studies confirmed the high prevalence of ERG gene fusions and PTEN deletions among Caucasian Americans and identified novel somatic alterations in SPOP and FOXA1 genes in early stages of CaP. Individuals with African ancestry and other minorities are often underrepresented in these large-scale genomic studies, which are performed primarily using tumors from men of European ancestry. The insufficient number of specimens from AA men and other minority populations, together with the heterogeneity in the molecular etiology of CaP across populations, challenge the generalizability of findings from these projects. Efforts to close this gap by sequencing larger numbers of tumor specimens from more diverse populations, although still at an early stage, have discovered distinct genomic alterations. These research findings can have a direct impact on the diagnosis of CaP, the stratification of patients for treatment, and can help to address the disparity in incidence and mortality of CaP. This review examines the progress of understanding in CaP genetics and genomics and highlight the need to increase the representation from minority populations.

前列腺癌（CaP）是美国最常诊断的非皮肤癌，也是男性癌症死亡的第二大原因。在非洲裔美国人（AA）男性中，CaP是最普遍的恶性肿瘤，其发病率和死亡率高得不成比例。即使扣除社会经济因素的影响，分子和遗传因素对CaP种族差异的影响也是显而易见的。早期关于CaP差异分子基础的研究集中在可遗传突变和单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）的影响上。基于全基因组关联研究（GWAS）鉴定的大多数CaP易感性等位基因是常见的低外显率变体。具有高渗透性的种系CaP相关突变（例如HOXB13和BRCA2中发现的突变）通常很少见。最近，由下一代测序（NGS）技术启用的基因组研究集中在识别有助于CaP肿瘤发生的体细胞突变。这些研究证实了高加索人美国人ERG基因融合和PTEN缺失的高发病率，并且在CaP早期阶段发现了SPOP和FOXA1基因的新型体细胞改变。在这些大规模的基因组研究中，具有非洲血统和其他少数民族的个体往往代表不足，主要使用欧洲血统男性的肿瘤。来自AA男性和其他少数民族的标本数量不足，以及人群中CaP分子病因学的异质性，挑战了这些项目发现的普遍性。尽管仍处于早期阶段，但通过对来自更多不同人群的大量肿瘤标本进行测序来弥补这一差距，但仍发现了不同的基因组改变。这些研究结果可以直接影响CaP的诊断，治疗患者的分层，并有助于解决CaP发病率和死亡率的差异。这篇综述考察了CaP遗传学和基因组学理解的进展，并强调需要增加少数族群的代表性。

Journal: Int J Mol Sci [IF=3.226] PMID: 29690565 PubDate: 2018-Apr-22 Authors: Tan SH, Petrovics...
56. Metagenomics Analysis of Bacterial Population of Tympanosclerotic Plaques and Cholesteatomas.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Objective Chronic otitis media can cause cholesteatomas or tympanosclerosis; however, the pathophysiology of such conditions is not completely known. The aim was to identify a bacterial genome that might be present in tympanosclerotic plaques and cholesteatomas using sequence analysis of the gene responsible for the transcription of 16 ribosomal RNA (rRNA). Study Design Metagenomics analysis of the samples. Setting Samples were collected and evaluated at tertiary care centers. Subjects and Methods Sixty-five tympanosclerotic plaques and 37 cholesteatomas were evaluated. The polymerase chain reaction (PCR) was performed using primers designed for the amplification of the gene responsible for the transcription of bacterial 16 rRNA. The PCR-positive samples were sequenced via Sanger method, and 46 selected samples were analyzed with next-generation sequencing (NGS). Results Sanger sequencing revealed the presence of bacterial genomes in a total of 18 of the 102 samples tested. Sequencing of these genomes indicated the presence of Alloiococcus otitis, Staphylococcus aureus, Achromobacter xylosoxidans, Escherichia coli, Staphylococcus sciuri, Staphylococcus caprae, Parvimonas spp., and Bacillus sp. in the tested samples. The NGS showed 1 or more different bacterial genomes in 44 (95.7%) of the 46 samples tested. Predominately, genome of Clostridiales (27 samples), Staphylococcaceae (24 samples), Peptoniphilaceae (12 samples), and Turicella otitidis (9 samples) were identified. Conclusion The middle ear is inhabited by a diverse microbial community than that previously known. With the use of molecular biology, it has become easier to identify the bacterial genomes and improve our understanding of the role of middle ear microbiota in the pathogenesis of chronic inflammatory ear diseases.

目的慢性中耳炎可引起胆脂瘤或鼓室硬化症;然而，这种病症的病理生理学尚不完全清楚。其目的是使用负责16核糖体RNA（rRNA）转录的基因的序列分析来鉴定可能存在于鼓室硬化斑块和胆脂瘤中的细菌基因组。研究设计样本的宏基因组学分析。设置样本在三级护理中心收集和评估。受试者和方法评估65个鼓室硬化斑块和37个胆脂瘤。使用设计用于扩增负责细菌16rRNA转录的基因的引物进行聚合酶链式反应（PCR）。通过Sanger方法对PCR阳性样品进行测序，并用新一代测序（NGS）分析46个选择的样品。结果Sanger测序显示在所测试的102个样品中的总共18个中存在细菌基因组。对这些基因组进行测序表明存在Alloriococcus中耳炎，金黄色葡萄球菌，木糖氧化无色杆菌，大肠杆菌，金黄色葡萄球菌，金黄色葡萄球菌，Parvimonas spp。和芽孢杆菌属。在测试样品中。 NGS在46个样本中有44个（95.7％）显示1个或多个不同的细菌基因组。主要检测了梭状芽孢杆菌（27个样品），葡萄球菌科（24个样品），Pe ae科（12个样品）和水痘螈（9个样品）的基因组。结论中耳居住的微生物群落多于先前已知的微生物群落。随着分子生物学的应用，识别细菌基因组和提高我们对中耳微生物在慢性炎症性耳病发病机制中作用的理解变得更加容易。

Journal: Otolaryngol Head Neck Surg [IF=.] PMID: 29688828 PubDate: 2018-Apr-01 Authors: Kalcioglu MT, Gul...
57. Comparing Rock-inhabiting Microbial Communities in Different Rock Types from a High Arctic Polar Desert.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Although rocks are habitable places for microbes in extreme environments, microbial diversity in these lithic environments is still poorly understood. The diversity and abundance of rock-inhabiting microbial communities in different types of rock in Svalbard, Norwegian High Arctic were examined using NGS sequencing of bacterial 16S rRNA genes and fungal 28S rRNA genes. Compositions of both bacterial and fungal communities varied across different rock types: sandstone, limestone, basalt, granite, and travertine. Bacterial communities were dominated by Actinobacteria, Proteobacteria, Chloroflexi, Bacteroidetes, and Acidobacteria. Fungal communities consisted of Eurotiomycetes, Lecanoromycetes, Dothideomycetes, and Leotiomycetes. Both bacterial and fungal community compositions were significantly correlated with the geochemical characteristics of rocks. Bacterial communities were considerably correlated with the rock elements such as Mg and Ca. Fungal communities were considerably correlated with Fe. Interestingly, many dominant bacterial and fungal operational taxonomic units (OTUs) in the investigated rocks from the study area were closely affiliated to those found in other cold regions such as Alpine area, Arctic and Antarctica, suggesting that environmental constraints such as cold temperature may lead to convergence in microbial community composition. These results confirm that rocks in cold environments act as reservoirs of diverse bacteria and fungi, which may improve our understanding of lithic microbial ecology in the cold desert.

尽管在极端环境中岩石是适合微生物居住的地方，但在这些岩石环境中的微生物多样性仍然知之甚少。利用细菌16S rRNA基因和真菌28S rRNA基因的NGS测序，检测了挪威北极斯瓦尔巴群岛不同类型岩石中岩石栖息微生物群落的多样性和丰度。细菌和真菌群落的成分在不同的岩石类型中有所不同：砂岩，石灰石，玄武岩，花岗岩和石灰华。细菌群落以放线菌，变形菌，Chloroflexi，拟杆菌和酸杆菌为主。真菌群落由Eurotiomycetes，Lecanoromycetes，Dothideomycetes和Leotiomycetes组成。细菌和真菌群落组成与岩石的地球化学特征显着相关。细菌群落与镁和钙等岩石元素显着相关。真菌群落与Fe显着相关。有趣的是，研究区岩石中的许多优势细菌和真菌操作分类单元（OTU）与其他寒冷地区如阿尔卑斯地区，北极和南极等发现的那些密切相关，表明环境约束如低温可能导致微生物群落组成的趋同。这些结果证实，寒冷环境中的岩石充当了各种细菌和真菌的储层，这可以提高我们对寒冷沙漠岩石微生物生态学的理解。

Journal: FEMS Microbiol. Ecol. [IF=.] PMID: 29688499 PubDate: 2018-Apr-21 Authors: Choe YH, Kim M, W...
58. Dynamic Variation and Reversion in the Signature Amino Acids of H7N9 Virus During Human Infection.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Signature amino acids of H7N9 influenza virus play critical roles in human adaption and pathogenesis, but their dynamic variation is unknown during disease development.

60. Impact of substrate stiffness on dermal papilla aggregates in microgels.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Interaction between cells and the extracellular environment plays a vital role in cellular development. The mechanical property of a 3-dimensional (3D) culture can be modified to mimic in vivo conditions. Dermal papilla (DP) cells are shown to gradually lose their inductivity in hair cycle development in a 2-dimensional culture. They are shown to partially restore their inductivity when transferred into a 3D microenvironment. In this study, a microarray fabricated from three different concentrations of poly-ethylene-glycol-diacrylate 3500, namely 5%, 10% and 15% w/v, yielded increasing substrate stiffness. The impact of varying substrate stiffness was tested for DP cell viability, attachment, and selected hair inductive markers. DP aggregates were shown to be viable and exhibited greater spreading with increasing substrate stiffness. Moreover, DP aggregates cultured on a softer substrate showed a greater fold change of gene and protein expressions than those cultured on a harder substrate.

细胞与细胞外环境之间的相互作用在细胞发育中起着至关重要的作用。可以修改三维（3D）培养物的机械性质以模拟体内条件。显示真皮乳头（DP）细胞在二维培养中逐渐失去它们在毛发周期发育中的诱导性。当它们转移到3D微环境中时，它们显示出部分恢复其诱导性。在这项研究中，由三种不同浓度的聚乙二醇二丙烯酸酯3500（即5％，10％和15％w / v）制成的微阵列产生了增加的基质硬度。测试了不同基质硬度对DP细胞活力，附着和选定的头发诱导标记物的影响。 DP聚集体被证明是可行的，并且随着基质硬度的增加展现出更大的扩散。此外，在较软底物上培养的DP聚集体显示出比在较硬底物上培养的那些更大的基因和蛋白质表达的倍数变化。

Journal: Biomater Sci [IF=4.210] PMID: 29687797 PubDate: 2018-Apr-24 Authors: Tan JJY, Tee JK, ...
61. Ultradeep single-molecule real-time sequencing of HIV envelope reveals complete compartmentalization of highly macrophage-tropic R5 proviral variants in brain and CXCR4-using variants in immune and peripheral tissues.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Despite combined antiretroviral therapy (cART), HIV+ patients still develop neurological disorders, which may be due to persistent HIV infection and selective evolution in brain tissues. Single-molecule real-time (SMRT) sequencing technology offers an improved opportunity to study the relationship among HIV isolates in the brain and lymphoid tissues because it is capable of generating thousands of long sequence reads in a single run. Here, we used SMRT sequencing to generate ~ 50,000 high-quality full-length HIV envelope sequences (> 2200 bp) from seven autopsy tissues from an HIV+/cART+ subject, including three brain and four non-brain sites. Sanger sequencing was used for comparison with SMRT data and to clone functional pseudoviruses for in vitro tropism assays. Phylogenetic analysis demonstrated that brain-derived HIV was compartmentalized from HIV outside the brain and that the variants from each of the three brain tissues grouped independently. Variants from all peripheral tissues were intermixed on the tree but independent of the brain clades. Due to the large number of sequences, a clustering analysis at three similarity thresholds (99, 99.5, and 99.9%) was also performed. All brain sequences clustered exclusive of any non-brain sequences at all thresholds; however, frontal lobe sequences clustered independently of occipital and parietal lobes. Translated sequences revealed potentially functional differences between brain and non-brain sequences in the location of putative N-linked glycosylation sites (N-sites), V1 length, V3 charge, and the number of V4 N-sites. All brain sequences were predicted to use the CCR5 co-receptor, while most non-brain sequences were predicted to use CXCR4 co-receptor. Tropism results were confirmed by in vitro infection assays. The study is the first to use a SMRT sequencing approach to study HIV compartmentalization in tissues and supports other reports of limited trafficking between brain and non-brain sequences during cART. Due to the long sequence length, we could observe changes along the entire envelope gene, likely caused by differential selective pressure in the brain that may contribute to neurological disease.

尽管联合使用了抗逆转录病毒疗法（cART），艾滋病病毒+患者仍然患有神经系统疾病，这可能是由于持续的艾滋病毒感染和脑组织中的选择性进化。单分子实时（SMRT）测序技术为研究HIV分离物在大脑和淋巴组织中的关系提供了更好的机会，因为它能够在单次运行中产生数千个长序列读数。在这里，我们使用SMRT测序从HIV + / cART +受试者的七个尸检组织中产生约50,000个高质量的全长HIV包膜序列（> 2200bp），包括三个脑和四个非脑部位。 Sanger测序用于与SMRT数据进行比较并克隆用于体外嗜性测定的功能性假病毒。系统发育分析表明，大脑派生的艾滋病毒从大脑外的艾滋病病毒中分离出来，并且三种脑组织中的每一种的变体都是独立分组的。来自所有外围组织的变体在树上混合，但独立于脑进化枝。由于大量的序列，在三个相似性阈值（99,99.5和99.9％）下也进行了聚类分析。所有脑部序列都聚集在任何阈值以外的任何非脑部序列中;然而，额叶序列聚集独立于枕叶和顶叶。翻译序列揭示了假定的N-连接糖基化位点（N位点），V1长度，V3电荷和V4N位点的数目在脑和非脑序列之间的潜在功能差异。预测所有脑部序列使用CCR5共同受体，而大多数非脑部序列预测使用CXCR4共同受体。取向性结果通过体外感染测定来确认。这项研究是第一个使用SMRT测序方法研究组织中的HIV区室化的方法，并支持其他有关cART期间脑和非脑序列之间有限运输的报告。由于序列长度很长，我们可以观察整个包膜基因的变化，这可能是由大脑中可能导致神经疾病的差异选择性压力引起的。

Journal: J. Neurovirol. [IF=.] PMID: 29687407 PubDate: 2018-Apr-23 Authors: Brese RL, Gonzale...
62. Complete sequence and diversity of a maize-associated Polerovirus in East Africa.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Since 2011-2012, Maize lethal necrosis (MLN) has emerged in East Africa, causing massive yield loss and propelling research to identify viruses and virus populations present in maize. As expected, next generation sequencing (NGS) has revealed diverse and abundant viruses from the family Potyviridae, primarily sugarcane mosaic virus (SCMV), and maize chlorotic mottle virus (MCMV) (Tombusviridae), which are known to cause MLN by synergistic co-infection. In addition to these expected viruses, we identified a virus in the genus Polerovirus (family Luteoviridae) in 104/172 samples selected for MLN or other potential virus symptoms from Kenya, Uganda, Rwanda, and Tanzania. This polerovirus (MF974579) nucleotide sequence is 97% identical to maize-associated viruses recently reported in China, termed 'maize yellow mosaic virus' (MaYMV) and maize yellow dwarf virus (MaYMV; KU291101, KU291107, MYDV-RMV2; KT992824); and 99% identical to MaYMV (KY684356) infecting sugarcane and itch grass in Nigeria; 83% identical to a barley-associated polerovirus recently identified in Korea (BVG; KT962089); and 79% identical to the U.S. maize-infecting polerovirus maize yellow dwarf virus (MYDV-RMV; KT992824). Nucleotide sequences from ORF0 of 20 individual East African isolates collected from Kenya, Uganda, Rwanda, and Tanzania shared 98% or higher identity, and were detected in 104/172 (60.5%) of samples collected for virus-like symptoms, indicating extensive prevalence but limited diversity of this virus in East Africa. We refer to this virus as "MYDV-like polerovirus" until symptoms of the virus in maize are known.

自2011年至2012年以来，东非出现了玉米致死性坏死（MLN），造成巨大的产量损失，推动了玉米中存在病毒和病毒种群的研究。正如预期的那样，下一代测序（NGS）已经揭示了来自家庭Potyviridae的主要是甘蔗花叶病毒（SCMV）和玉米褪绿斑驳病毒（MCMV）（Tombusviridae）的多种和丰富的病毒，其已知通过协同协同作用导致MLN，感染。除了这些预期的病毒之外，我们在来自肯尼亚，乌干达，卢旺达和坦桑尼亚的104/172个样品中鉴定了Polerovirus（Luteoviridae家族）病毒，选择MLN或其他潜在病毒症状。这种极柱病毒（MF974579）核苷酸序列与中国最近报道的称为“玉米黄花叶病毒”（MaYMV）和玉米黄矮病毒（MaYMV; KU291101，KU291107，MYDV-RMV2; KT992824）的玉米相关病毒有97％相同;和MaYMV（KY684356）在尼日利亚感染甘蔗和痒草的99％相同;最近在韩国发现的与大麦相关的杆状病毒有83％相同（BVG; KT962089）;和79％与美国玉米感染极性病毒玉米黄矮病毒（MYDV-RMV; KT992824）相同。来自肯尼亚，乌干达，卢旺达和坦桑尼亚的20个单独东非分离株的ORF0核苷酸序列的同一性为98％或更高，104/172（60.5％）个样本中检测到病毒样症状，表明广泛流行但这种病毒在东非的多样性有限。我们称这种病毒为“MYDV-like polerovirus”，直到玉米病毒的症状已知。

Journal: Virus Genes [IF=1.431] PMID: 29687187 PubDate: 2018-Apr-23 Authors: Massawe DP, Stewa...
63. Computational Methods for Assessing Chromatin Hierarchy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The hierarchical organization of chromatin is known to associate with diverse cellular functions; however, the precise mechanisms and the 3D structure remain to be determined. With recent advances in high-throughput next generation sequencing (NGS) techniques, genome-wide profiling of chromatin structures is made possible. Here, we provide a comprehensive overview of NGS-based methods for profiling "higher-order" and "primary-order" chromatin structures from both experimental and computational aspects. Experimental requirements and considerations specific for each method were highlighted. For computational analysis, we summarized a common analysis strategy for both levels of chromatin assessment, focusing on the characteristic computing steps and the tools. The recently developed single-cell level techniques based on Hi-C and ATAC-seq present great potential to reveal cell-to-cell variability in chromosome architecture. A brief discussion on these methods in terms of experimental and data analysis features is included. We also touch upon the biological relevance of chromatin organization and how the combination with other techniques uncovers the underlying mechanisms. We conclude with a summary and our prospects on necessary improvements of currently available methods in order to advance understanding of chromatin hierarchy. Our review brings together the analyses of both higher- and primary-order chromatin structures, and serves as a roadmap when choosing appropriate experimental and computational methods for assessing chromatin hierarchy.

已知染色质的等级组织与不同的细胞功能有关;然而，精确的机制和3D结构仍有待确定。随着近期高通量下一代测序（NGS）技术的进步，染色质结构的全基因组谱分析成为可能。在这里，我们全面概述了基于NGS的方法，用于从实验和计算两个方面分析“高阶”和“初级”染色质结构。强调了每种方法的特定实验要求和注意事项。对于计算分析，我们总结了两种染色质评估水平的通用分析策略，重点关注特征计算步骤和工具。最近开发的基于Hi-C和ATAC-seq的单细胞水平技术在揭示染色体结构中细胞间变异方面具有巨大的潜力。包括对这些方法在实验和数据分析功能方面的简要讨论。我们还涉及染色质组织的生物学相关性以及与其他技术的结合如何揭示基础机制。我们总结总结以及我们对当前可用方法的必要改进的前景，以加深对染色质层次的理解。我们的综述汇集了高阶和初级染色质结构的分析，并且在选择适当的实验和计算方法评估染色质层级时作为路线图。

Journal: Comput Struct Biotechnol J [IF=.] PMID: 29686798 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Chang P, Gohain M... PMC5910504
64. Can genomics deliver climate-change ready crops?
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Development of climate resilient crops with accelerating genetic gains in crops will require integration of different disciplines/technologies, to see the impact in the farmer's field. In this review, we summarize how we are utilizing our germplasm collections to identify superior alleles/haplotypes through NGS based sequencing approaches and how genomics-enabled technologies together with precise phenotyping are being used in crop breeding. Pre-breeding and genomics-assisted breeding approaches are contributing to the more efficient development of climate-resilient crops. It is anticipated that the integration of several disciplines/technologies will result in the delivery of climate change ready crops in less time.

开发具有加速的作物遗传增益的气候适应性作物需要整合不同的学科/技术，才能看到农民田间的影响。在这篇综述中，我们总结了我们如何利用我们的种质资源库，通过基于NGS的测序方法来鉴定优良的等位基因/单倍型，以及基因组技术和精确表型如何用于作物育种。预育和基因组辅助育种方法有助于提高气候适应性作物的发育效率。预计若干学科/技术的整合将导致在较短时间内提供适应气候变化的作物。

Journal: Curr. Opin. Plant Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29685733 PubDate: 2018-Apr-20 Authors: Varshney RK, Sing...
65. Deep NPM1 Sequencing Following Allogeneic Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Improves Risk Assessment in Adults with NPM1-Mutated AML.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Relapse is the major cause of death in patients with acute myeloid leukemia (AML) after allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplant (HCT). Measurable residual disease (MRD) detected by multiparameter flow cytometry (MFC) before and after HCT is a strong, independent risk factor for relapse. As next generation sequencing (NGS) is increasingly applied in AML MRD detection, it remains to be determined if NGS can improve prediction of post-HCT relapse. Herein, we investigated pre-HCT MRD detected by MFC and NGS in 59 adult patients with NPM1-mutated AML in morphologic remission; 45 of the 59 had post-HCT MRD determined by MFC and NGS around day 28. Before HCT, MRD detected by MFC was the most significant risk factor for relapse (HR=4.63, p<0.001), whereas MRD detected only by NGS was not. After HCT, MRD detected by either MFC or NGS was significant risk factor for relapse (HR= 4.96, p=0.004 and HR= 4.36, p=0.002, respectively). Combining pre- and post-HCT MRD provided the best prediction for relapse (HR=5.25, p<0.001), with a sensitivity at 83%. We conclude that NGS testing of mutated NPM1 post-HCT improves the risk assessment for relapse, whereas pre-HCT MFC testing identifies a subset of high-risk patients in whom additional therapy should be tested.

在异基因造血细胞移植（HCT）后，复发是急性髓性白血病（AML）患者死亡的主要原因。 HCT前后多参数流式细胞仪（MFC）检测到的可测量残留病（MRD）是复发的强大独立危险因素。随着下一代测序（NGS）在AML MRD检测中的应用越来越多，NGS是否能够改善HCT后复发的预测仍有待确定。在此，我们调查了59例用NPM1突变的AML形态学缓解的成年患者中MFC和NGS检测到的前HCT MRD;在HCT之前，MFC检测到的MRD是复发的最重要危险因素（HR = 4.63，p <0.001），而仅由NGS检测到的MRD为不。 HCT后，MFC或NGS检测到的MRD是复发的显着危险因素（HR分别为4.96，p = 0.004和HR = 4.36，p = 0.002）。 HCT前后的MRD提供了复发的最佳预测（HR = 5.25，p <0.001），敏感性为83％。我们得出结论：HCT后突变NPM1的NGS检测改善了复发的风险评估，而HCT前的MFC检测确定了一部分高风险患者，其中应进行额外的治疗。

Journal: Biol. Blood Marrow Transplant. [IF=.] PMID: 29684564 PubDate: 2018-Apr-20 Authors: Zhou Y, Othus M, ...
66. In vivo insertion pool sequencing identifies virulence factors in a complex fungal-host interaction.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Large-scale insertional mutagenesis screens can be powerful genome-wide tools if they are streamlined with efficient downstream analysis, which is a serious bottleneck in complex biological systems. A major impediment to the success of next-generation sequencing (NGS)-based screens for virulence factors is that the genetic material of pathogens is often underrepresented within the eukaryotic host, making detection extremely challenging. We therefore established insertion Pool-Sequencing (iPool-Seq) on maize infected with the biotrophic fungus U. maydis. iPool-Seq features tagmentation, unique molecular barcodes, and affinity purification of pathogen insertion mutant DNA from in vivo-infected tissues. In a proof of concept using iPool-Seq, we identified 28 virulence factors, including 23 that were previously uncharacterized, from an initial pool of 195 candidate effector mutants. Because of its sensitivity and quantitative nature, iPool-Seq can be applied to any insertional mutagenesis library and is especially suitable for genetically complex setups like pooled infections of eukaryotic hosts.

大规模的插入诱变筛选如果通过有效的下游分析进行简化，可能是功能强大的全基因组工具，这是复杂生物系统中的严重瓶颈。基于新一代测序（NGS）的毒力因子筛选成功的一个主要障碍是病原体的遗传物质常常在真核宿主内代表性不足，使得检测极具挑战性。因此，我们在感染了营养型真菌U. maydis的玉米上建立了插入池测序（iPool-Seq）。 iPool-Seq具有标记，独特的分子条形码，以及来自体内感染组织的病原体插入突变体DNA的亲和纯化。在使用iPool-Seq的概念验证中，我们从195个候选效应突变体的初始库中鉴定了28个毒力因子，其中包括23个以前未表征的毒力因子。由于其灵敏度和定量性，iPool-Seq可以应用于任何插入诱变文库，尤其适用于基因复杂的设置，如真核宿主的混合感染。

Journal: PLoS Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29684023 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Uhse S, Pflug FG,...
67. Immunohistochemical Detection and Molecular Characterization of IDH-mutant Sinonasal Undifferentiated Carcinomas.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Recent studies have identified recurrent isocitrate dehydrogenase 2 (IDH2) mutations in a subset of sinonasal undifferentiated carcinomas (SNUCs); however, the true frequency of IDH mutations in SNUC is unknown. We evaluated the utility of mutation-specific IDH1/2 immunohistochemistry (IHC) in a large multi-institutional cohort of SNUC and morphologic mimics. IHC using a multispecific antibody for IDH1/2 (R132/R172) mutant protein was performed on 193 sinonasal tumors including: 53 SNUCs, 8 poorly differentiated carcinomas (PDCARs) and 132 histologic mimics. Mutant IDH1/2 IHC was positive in 26/53 SNUCs (49%; 20 strongly positive and 6 weak) and 3/8 PDCARs (37.5%; 2 strong; 1 weak) but was absent in all other tumor types (0/132). Targeted next-generation sequencing (NGS) on a subset of SNUC/PDCAR (6 strong and 3 weak positive for IDH1/2 IHC; 7 negative) showed frequent IDH2 R172X mutations (10/16) and a single IDH1 R132C mutation. All 6 cases with strong positive mutant IDH1/2 staining and NGS had IDH2 R172S/G mutations. The 3 IHC-weak cases all had IDH2 R172T mutations. Among the 7 tested cases that were negative for mutant IDH1/2 IHC, NGS detected 1 case each with IDH2 R172T and IDH1 R132C mutation. IDH-mutant carcinomas also had frequent mutations in TP53 (55%) and activating mutations in KIT (45%) or the PI3K pathway (36%). Mutation-specific IDH1/2 IHC identifies IDH mutations in SNUC, however, it lacks sensitivity for the full range of IDH mutations. These findings suggest that IDH-mutant sinonasal carcinoma may represent a distinct pathobiological entity with therapeutic implications that can be identified by a combined approach of multispecific IDH1/2 IHC and sequencing.

最近的研究已经确定了鼻窦未分化癌（SNUCs）子集中的异常柠檬酸脱氢酶2（IDH2）突变;然而，SNUC中IDH突变的真实频率是未知的。我们评估突变特异性IDH1 / 2免疫组织化学（IHC）在SNUC和形态学模拟物的大型多机构队列中的效用。对193例鼻窦肿瘤包括：53例SNUCs，8例低分化癌（PDCARs）和132例组织学模拟物进行了使用多特异性抗体用于IDH1 / 2（R132 / R172）突变蛋白的IHC。突变IDH1 / 2 IHC在26/53 SNUC中为阳性（49％; 20强阳性和6弱）和3/8 PDCAR（37.5％; 2强; 1弱），但在所有其他肿瘤类型（0/132 ）。针对SNUC / PDCAR亚组（6个强和3个IDH1 / 2 IHC弱阳性; 7个阴性）的靶向下一代测序（NGS）显示频繁的IDH2 R172X突变（10/16）和单个IDH1 R132C突变。所有6例强阳性突变IDH1 / 2染色和NGS均有IDH2 R172S / G突变。 3例IHC弱病例均有IDH2 R172T突变。在突变IDH1 / 2 IHC阴性的7个测试病例中，NGS检测到1例各自具有IDH2 R172T和IDH1 R132C突变。 IDH突变型癌在TP53（55％）中也有频繁突变，并且在KIT（45％）或PI3K途径（36％）中激活突变。突变特异性IDH1 / 2 IHC识别SNUC中的IDH突变，然而，它缺乏对全部IDH突变的敏感性。这些发现表明，IDH突变型鼻腔鼻窦癌可能是一种独特的病理生物学实体，具有治疗意义，可通过多特异性IDH1 / 2 IHC和测序的组合方法进行鉴定。

Journal: Am. J. Surg. Pathol. [IF=.] PMID: 29683816 PubDate: 2018-Apr-20 Authors: Mito JK, Bishop J...
68. Targeted Next-generation Sequencing and Bioinformatics Pipeline to Evaluate Genetic Determinants of Constitutional Disease.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) is quickly revolutionizing how research into the genetic determinants of constitutional disease is performed. The technique is highly efficient with millions of sequencing reads being produced in a short time span and at relatively low cost. Specifically, targeted NGS is able to focus investigations to genomic regions of particular interest based on the disease of study. Not only does this further reduce costs and increase the speed of the process, but it lessens the computational burden that often accompanies NGS. Although targeted NGS is restricted to certain regions of the genome, preventing identification of potential novel loci of interest, it can be an excellent technique when faced with a phenotypically and genetically heterogeneous disease, for which there are previously known genetic associations. Because of the complex nature of the sequencing technique, it is important to closely adhere to protocols and methodologies in order to achieve sequencing reads of high coverage and quality. Further, once sequencing reads are obtained, a sophisticated bioinformatics workflow is utilized to accurately map reads to a reference genome, to call variants, and to ensure the variants pass quality metrics. Variants must also be annotated and curated based on their clinical significance, which can be standardized by applying the American College of Medical Genetics and Genomics Pathogenicity Guidelines. The methods presented herein will display the steps involved in generating and analyzing NGS data from a targeted sequencing panel, using the ONDRISeq neurodegenerative disease panel as a model, to identify variants that may be of clinical significance.

新一代测序（NGS）正在迅速革新如何研究构成性疾病的遗传决定因素。该技术非常高效，数百万次测序读数在短时间内以相对较低的成本生产。具体来说，有针对性的NGS能够根据研究疾病将调查集中在特别感兴趣的基因组区域。这不仅进一步降低了成本并提高了流程速度，而且减轻了NGS常常伴随的计算负担。虽然有针对性的NGS仅限于基因组的某些区域，从而阻止了潜在的新兴感兴趣基因座的识别，但当面对表型和遗传异质性疾病时，它可能是一种很好的技术，对此之前已知有遗传相关性。由于测序技术的复杂性，为了实现高覆盖率和高质量的测序读数，密切遵守方案和方法非常重要。此外，一旦获得测序读数，就使用复杂的生物信息学工作流程来精确地将读数映射到参考基因组，以调用变体，并确保变体通过质量度量。变异体还必须根据它们的临床意义进行注释和策划，这可以通过应用美国医学遗传学和基因组学致病性指南来标准化。本文介绍的方法将显示使用ONDRISeq神经变性疾病小组作为模型生成和分析来自靶向测序小组的NGS数据所涉及的步骤，以鉴定可能具有临床意义的变体。

Journal: J Vis Exp [IF=.] PMID: 29683450 PubDate: 2018-Apr-04 Authors: Dilliott AA, Farh...
69. Clinical experience with multigene carrier panels in the reproductive setting.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Expanded carrier testing is acknowledged as an acceptable strategy for carrier testing by the American College of Obstetrics and Gynecology. Limited studies have investigated positivity rates of expanded carrier panels. We describe our experience with three commercial laboratory panels varying in size from 3 to 218 disorders.

扩大的运营商测试被美国妇产科学院承认为运营商测试的可接受策略。有限的研究调查了扩展载体板的阳性率。我们描述了我们的经验与三个商业实验室面板大小从3到218混乱。

Journal: Prenat. Diagn. [IF=.] PMID: 29683194 PubDate: 2018-Apr-23 Authors: Terhaar C, Teed N...
70. Improving the detection of patients with inherited predispositions to hematologic malignancies using next-generation sequencing-based leukemia prognostication panels.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Recognizing and referring patients with possible inherited cancer predisposition syndromes for appropriate genetic evaluation and testing provides insights into optimal patient treatment approaches and also can provide education and testing opportunities for family members. Next-generation sequencing (NGS)-based, targeted genotyping for somatic mutations is increasingly used in the diagnosis, prognostication, and treatment selection for patients with hematologic malignancies. However, certain mutations that may be somatically acquired can also be present as germline mutations in some individuals and families. Whether the results of NGS-based leukemia panels can be used to inform decisions and subsequent evaluation of patients with possible inherited cancer predispositions has not been described previously. Because a normal control often is not available when using NGS panels in patients with hematologic malignancies, NGS panel results offer both an opportunity and a challenge to determine the origin and pathogenicity of identified mutations. In the absence of a matched germline control, variant allele frequency (VAF) estimation and data from publically available data sets provide important clues to the possible germline origin of a variant. Careful annotation and review of NGS panels in patients with hematologic malignancies can provide a useful screening tool to systematically improve upon the detection of potentially pathogenic germline variants. Cancer 2018. © 2018 American Cancer Society.

认识并转诊可能遗传的癌症易感性综合征患者进行适当的遗传评估和测试，可以为最佳患者治疗方法提供见解，并且可以为家庭成员提供教育和检测机会。基于新一代测序（NGS）的体细胞突变靶向基因分型越来越多地用于血液恶性肿瘤患者的诊断，预后和治疗选择。然而，某些个体和家族中也可能存在某些可能是体细胞获得的突变，作为种系突变。先前没有描述基于NGS的白血病专家组的结果是否可用于通知决定并随后评估可能遗传的癌症易感性患者。由于在恶性血液病患者中使用NGS评分时通常无法获得正常的对照，因此NGS专家组结果为确定已确定突变的起源和致病性提供了机会和挑战。在缺乏匹配的种系对照的情况下，变异等位基因频率（VAF）估计和来自公开可用数据集的数据提供了变体可能的种系起源的重要线索。对血液恶性肿瘤患者的NGS评估小组进行仔细的注释和评估可以提供有用的筛查工具，系统地改善潜在致病性种系变异的检测。癌症2018.©2018年美国癌症协会。

Journal: Cancer [IF=6.072] PMID: 29682723 PubDate: 2018-Apr-06 Authors: DiNardo CD, Routb...
71. Myelodysplastic Syndrome/Acute Myeloid Leukemia Arising in Idiopathic Erythrocytosis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The term "idiopathic erythrocytosis (IE)" is applied to those cases where a causal clinical or pathological event cannot be elucidated and likely reflects a spectrum of underlying medical and molecular abnormalities. The clinical course of a patient with IE is described manifesting as a persistent erythrocytosis with a low serum erythropoietin level, mild eosinophilia, and with evidence of a thrombotic event. The patient subsequently developed a myelodysplasic syndrome (MDS) and acute myeloid leukemia (AML), an event not observed in erythrocytosis patients other than those with polycythemia vera (PV). Application of a next-generation sequencing (NGS) approach targeted for myeloid malignancies confirmed wild-type JAK2 exons 12-15 and identified a common SH2B3 W262R single-nucleotide polymorphism associated with the development of hematological features of myeloproliferative neoplasms (MPNs). Further NGS analysis detected a CBL L380P mutated clone expanding in parallel with the development of MDS and subsequent AML. Despite the absence of JAK2, MPL exon 10, or CALR exon 9 mutations, a similarity with the disease course of PV/MPN was evident. A clonal link between the erythrocytosis and AML could be neither confirmed nor excluded. Future molecular identification of the mechanisms underlying IE is likely to provide a more refined therapeutic approach.

术语“特发性红细胞增多症（IE）”适用于那些不能阐明因果临床或病理事件并可能反映潜在医学和分子异常谱的病例。具有IE的患者的临床过程被描述为表现为持续性红细胞增多症，血清促红细胞生成素水平低，嗜酸性粒细胞增多轻，并且有血栓事件的证据。该患者随后发展出骨髓增生异常综合征（MDS）和急性髓性白血病（AML），这是红细胞增多症患者（真性红细胞增多症患者除外）未观察到的事件。应用针对骨髓恶性肿瘤的新一代测序（NGS）方法证实了野生型JAK2外显子12-15，并鉴定了与骨髓增殖性肿瘤（MPN）的血液学特征的发展相关的常见SH2B3 W262R单核苷酸多态性。进一步的NGS分析检测到CBL L380P突变克隆与MDS和随后的AML的发展并行地扩大。尽管缺乏JAK2，MPL外显子10或CALR外显子9突变，但与PV / MPN疾病过程的相似性是明显的。红细胞增多症和AML之间的克隆联系既不能被确认也不能被排除。未来对IE基础机制的分子鉴定可能提供更精确的治疗方法。

Journal: Case Rep Hematol [IF=.] PMID: 29682367 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Langabeer SE, Con... PMC5842720
72. Recent progress in whole genome sequencing, high-density linkage maps, and genomic databases of ornamental plants.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Genome information is useful for functional analysis of genes, comparative genomic analysis, breeding of new varieties by marker-assisted selection, and map-based gene isolation. Genome-related research in ornamentals plants has been relatively slow to develop because of their heterozygosity or polyploidy. Advances in analytical instruments, such as next-generation sequencers and information processing technologies have revolutionized biology, and have been applied in a large number and variety of species, including ornamental plants. Recently, high-quality whole genome sequences have been reported in plant genetics and physiology studies of model ornamentals, such as those in genus Petunia and Japanese morning glory (Ipomoea nil). In this review, whole genome sequencing and construction of high-density genetic linkage maps based on SNP markers of ornamentals will be discussed. The databases that store this information for ornamentals are also described.

基因组信息对于基因功能分析，比较基因组分析，通过标记辅助选择育种新品种以及基于图谱的基因分离是有用的。观赏植物中的基因组相关研究由于其杂合性或多倍性而相对较慢地发展。诸如下一代测序仪和信息处理技术等分析仪器的进步已经使生物学发生了革命性的变化，并且已经应用​​于大量多种物种，包括观赏植物。最近，在模式观赏植物的植物遗传学和生理学研究中已经报道了高质量的全基因组序列，例如矮牵牛属和日本牵牛花属（Ipomoea nil）。在此综述中，将讨论基于SNP标记的全基因组测序和高密度遗传连锁图的构建。还描述了存储用于装饰物的这些信息的数据库。

Journal: Breed. Sci. [IF=.] PMID: 29681748 PubDate: 2018-Jan Authors: Yagi M PMC5903975
73. Prevalence and Spectrum of BRCA1/2 Germline Mutations in Women with Breast Cancer in China Based on Next-Generation Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

BACKGROUND BRCA1 and BRCA2 (BRCA1/2) play important roles in the development of breast cancer, but information regarding BRCA1/2 mutations in Chinese females remains limited. The aim of this study was to investigate the prevalence and spectrum of BRCA1/2 mutations in China. MATERIAL AND METHODS In total, 595 breast cancer patients in China were screened with an amplicon-based panel for the detection of BRCA1/2 mutations in coding regions using next-generation sequencing (NGS) with a Personal Genome Machine. Every pathogenic mutation detected was confirmed by Sanger sequencing. The disease-causing potential of variants of uncertain significance (VUS) was predicted using PolyPhen-2, SIFT, PhyloP, and Grantham. RESULTS The prevalence of BRCA1/2 mutations was 8.07% in the Chinese population. Forty-two pathogenic mutations were identified in 48 cases (17 BRCA1 cases and 31 BRCA2 cases), including 19 novel mutations. Nine VUS were predicted to be deleterious by PolyPhen-2 and SIFT and subsequently predicted by PhyloP and Grantham for the evolutionary conservation. CONCLUSIONS These results suggest that NGS is useful as a rapid, high-throughput, and cost-effective screening tool for the analysis of BRCA1/2 mutations. Based on this panel, we found that BRCA1/2 germline mutations in China exhibit distinct characteristics compared to those in Western populations.

背景BRCA1和BRCA2（BRCA1 / 2）在乳腺癌的发展中发挥重要作用，但有关中国女性BRCA1 / 2突变的信息仍然有限。本研究的目的是调查中国BRCA1 / 2突变的发病率和频谱。材料与方法总共有595名中国乳腺癌患者使用基于扩增子的小组进行筛查，该小组使用个人基因组测序仪检测编码区BRCA1 / 2突变，并使用下一代测序（NGS）。 Sanger测序证实所有检测到的致病突变。使用PolyPhen-2，SIFT，PhyloP和Grantham预测了不确定意义变体（VUS）的致病潜力。结果中国人BRCA1 / 2突变的患病率为8.07％。在48例（17例BRCA1例和31例BRCA2例）中共鉴定出42种致病性突变，其中包括19种新型突变。预测9种VUS会对PolyPhen-2和SIFT有害，并随后由PhyloP和Grantham预测进化保守性。结论这些结果表明，NGS可用作BRCA1 / 2突变分析的快速，高通量和高成本效益的筛查工具。基于这个小组，我们发现中国的BRCA1 / 2种系突变与西方种群相比具有明显的特征。

Journal: Med. Sci. Monit. [IF=.] PMID: 29681614 PubDate: 2018-Apr-23 Authors: Liang Y, Yang X, ...
74. Characterizing the ecology of Vibrio in the Neuse River Estuary, North Carolina using heat shock protein 60 (hsp60) next-generation amplicon sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Of marine eubacteria, the genus Vibrio is intriguing because member species are relevant to both marine ecology and human health. Many have touted the relationships of Vibrio to environmental factors, especially temperature and salinity, to predict total Vibrio abundance, but these studies lacked the taxonomic resolution to identify relationships among species and key drivers of Vibrio dynamics. In order to improve NGS surveys of Vibrio, we have conducted both 16S small subunit ribosomal RNA (rRNA) and heat shock protein 60 (hsp60) amplicon sequencing of water samples collected at two well-studied locations in the Neuse River Estuary, NC. Samples were collected between May and December 2016 with enhanced sampling efforts in response to two named storms. Using hsp60 sequences, 21 Vibrio species were identified, including the potential human pathogens V. cholerae, V. parahaemolyticus, and V. vulnificus. Changes in the Vibrio community mirrored seasonal and storm-related changes in the water column, especially in response to an influx of nutrient-rich freshwater to the estuary after Hurricane Matthew which initiated dramatic changes in the overall Vibrio community. Individual species dynamics were wide-ranging, indicating that individual Vibrio taxa have unique ecologies and that total Vibrio predictors are insufficient for risk assessments of potentially pathogenic species. Positive relationships between Vibrio, dinoflagellates, and Cyanobacteria were identified, as were intra-species associations which further illuminated the interactions of co-occurring Vibrio taxa along environmental gradients.IMPORTANCE The objective of this research was to utilize a novel approach to improve sequence-based surveys of Vibrio communities and to demonstrate the usefulness of this approach by presenting an analysis of Vibrio dynamics in context of environmental conditions, with a particular focus on species which cause disease in humans and storm effects. The methods presented here allowed for the analysis of Vibrio dynamics with excellent taxonomic resolution, and could be incorporated into future ecological studies and risk prediction strategies for potentially pathogenic species. Next-generation sequencing of hsp60 and other innovative sequence-based approaches are valuable tools and show great promise for studying Vibrio ecology and associated public health risks.

在海洋真细菌中，弧菌属很吸引人，因为成员物种与海洋生态和人类健康都有关系。许多人已经吹捧了弧菌与环境因素（特别是温度和盐度）之间的关系，以预测总弧菌丰度，但是这些研究缺乏分类学的方法来鉴定物种之间的关系以及弧菌动力学的关键驱动因素。为了改善对弧菌的NGS调查，我们对位于北卡罗来纳州Neuse河河口两个研究区域的水样进行了16S小亚基核糖体RNA（rRNA）和热休克蛋白60（hsp60）扩增测序。 2016年5月至12月期间收集了样本，并针对两次指定的风暴加强了抽样工作。使用hsp60序列，鉴定了21种弧菌，包括潜在的人类病原体霍乱弧菌，副溶血性弧菌和创伤弧菌。弧菌群的变化反映了水体中季节性和风暴相关的变化，特别是在飓风Matthew飓风引发整个弧菌群发生剧烈变化后，营养丰富的淡水涌入河口的反应。个体物种动态范围广泛，表明单个弧菌分类群具有独特的生态学特征，并且总的弧菌预测因子不足以用于潜在致病物种的风险评估。确定了弧菌，双鞭毛藻和蓝藻之间的正相关关系，以及进一步阐明了共生弧菌分类群沿环境梯度的相互作用的种内关联。研究目标本研究的目的是利用一种新方法来改进基于序列的通过对环境条件下的弧菌动态进行分析，特别关注引起人类疾病和风暴影响的物种，从而证明这种方法的有效性。这里介绍的方法允许以极好的分类学分辨率分析弧菌动态，并且可以将其纳入未来的生态学研究和潜在致病物种的风险预测策略中。 hsp60的新一代测序和其他创新的基于序列的方法是有价值的工具，并且对研究弧菌生态学和相关的公共健康风险显示出巨大的希望。

Journal: Appl. Environ. Microbiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29678912 PubDate: 2018-Apr-20 Authors: Jesser KJ, Noble RT
75. Determinants of Health-Related Quality of Life 1 Year after Pulmonary Thromboendarterectomy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Pulmonary thromboendarterectomy (PTE) is a recognized treatment for patients with chronic thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension (CTEPH), with good long-term haemodynamic results. The aim of this study was to test the hypothesis that the dynamics of health-related quality of life (QoL), 1 year after PTE, depends both on the clinical determinants associated with the underlying disease and the adverse events occurring in the early postoperative period.

肺血栓内膜剥脱术（PTE）是慢性血栓栓塞性肺动脉高压（CTEPH）患者的公认治疗方法，具有良好的长期血流动力学结果。这项研究的目的是为了检验这样的假设，即PTE后1年的健康相关生活质量（QoL）的动态取决于与潜在疾病相关的临床决定因素和术后早期发生的不良事件。

Journal: Ann Vasc Surg [IF=1.145] PMID: 29678648 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Kamenskaya O, Kli...
76. What Does This Mutation Mean? The Tools and Pitfalls of Variant Interpretation in Lymphoid Malignancies.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

High throughput sequencing (HTS) is increasingly important in determining cancer diagnoses, with subsequent prognostic and therapeutic implications. The biology of cancer is becoming increasingly deciphered and it is clear that therapy needs to be individually tailored. Whilst translational research plays an important role in lymphoid malignancies, few guidelines exist to guide biologists and routine laboratories through this constantly evolving field. In this article, we review the challenges of interpreting HTS in lymphoid malignancies and provide a toolkit to interpret single nucleotide variants obtained from HTS. We define the pre-analytical issues such as sequencing DNA obtained from formalin-fixed and paraffin-embedded tissue (FFPE), the acquisition of germline DNA, or the bioinformatic pitfalls, the analytical issues encountered and how to manage them. We describe the main constitutional and cancer databases, their characteristics and limitations, with an emphasis on variant interpretation in lymphoid malignancies. Finally, we discuss the challenges of predictions that one can make using in silico or in vitro modelling, pharmacogenomic screening, and the limits of those prediction tools. This description of the current status in genomic interpretation highlights the need for new large databases and international collaboration in the lymphoma field.

高通量测序（HTS）在确定癌症诊断方面越来越重要，随后的预后和治疗影响。癌症的生物学正在变得越来越破译，很明显，治疗需要单独定制。虽然平移研究在淋巴恶性肿瘤中发挥重要作用，但是通过这个不断发展的领域，很少有指导指导生物学家和常规实验室。在本文中，我们回顾了在淋巴恶性肿瘤中解释HTS的挑战，并提供了解释从HTS获得的单核苷酸变体的工具包。我们定义了预分析问题，例如从福尔马林固定和石蜡包埋组织（FFPE）获得的DNA测序，获取生殖细胞DNA或生物信息缺陷，遇到的分析问题以及如何管理它们。我们描述了主要的宪法和癌症数据库及其特点和局限性，重点介绍了淋巴恶性肿瘤中的变异解读。最后，我们讨论人们可以用硅片或体外模型，药物基因组筛查以及这些预测工具的局限性进行预测的挑战。对基因组解读当前状况的这种描述突出了在淋巴瘤领域需要新的大型数据库和国际合作。

Journal: Int J Mol Sci [IF=3.226] PMID: 29677173 PubDate: 2018-Apr-20 Authors: Yann G, Jonathan ...
77. Interest of next-generation sequencing in BCG-treated high-risk bladder cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

There are only few predictive factors for response of non-musculo-invasive bladder cancer (NMIBC) to Bacillus Calmette-Guérin (BCG) therapy. Our study analyzed the results of the sequencing of new generation (NGS) targeted on 50 genes of oncological interest obtained on bladder resection parts in high-risk NMIBC patients treated with BCG, to describe this population from a molecular point of view and try to correlate these results in patients who present or not recurrence after BCG.

非肌层浸润性膀胱癌（NMIBC）对卡介苗（BCG）治疗的反应仅有少数预测因素。我们的研究分析了以BCG治疗的高危NMIBC患者的膀胱切除部位获得的50个肿瘤感兴趣基因为目标的新一代（NGS）测序结果，以从分子角度描述该群体并试图关联这些结果表明在BCG后存在或不存在复发的患者。
