78. A study on fast calling variants from next-generation sequencing data using decision tree.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The rapid development of next-generation sequencing (NGS) technology has continuously been refreshing the throughput of sequencing data. However, due to the lack of a smart tool that is both fast and accurate, the analysis task for NGS data, especially those with low-coverage, remains challenging.

下一代测序（NGS）技术的快速发展不断刷新测序数据的吞吐量。然而，由于缺乏快速准确的智能工具，NGS数据的分析任务，尤其是低覆盖率的数据仍然具有挑战性。

Journal: BMC Bioinformatics [IF=2.448] PMID: 29673316 PubDate: 2018-Apr-19 Authors: Li Z, Wang Y, Wang F PMC5907718
79. A MinION-based pipeline for fast and cost-effective DNA barcoding.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

DNA barcodes are useful for species discovery and species identification, but obtaining barcodes currently requires a well-equipped molecular laboratory, is time-consuming, and/or expensive. We here address these issues by developing a barcoding pipeline for Oxford Nanopore MinION™ and demonstrate that one flowcell can generate barcodes for ~500 specimens despite the high base-call error rates of MinION™ reads. The pipeline overcomes these errors by first summarizing all reads for the same tagged amplicon as a consensus barcode. Consensus barcodes are overall mismatch-free but retain indel errors that are concentrated in homopolymeric regions. They are addressed with an optional error correction pipeline that are corrected based on conserved amino-acid motifs from publicly available barcodes. The effectiveness of this pipeline is documented by analysing reads from three MinION™ runs that represent three different stages of MinION™ development. They generated data for (1) 511 specimens of a mixed Diptera sample, (2) 575 specimens of ants, and (3) 50 specimens of Chironomidae. The run based on the latest chemistry yielded MinION barcodes for 490 of the 511 specimens which were assessed against reference Sanger barcodes (N=471). Overall, the MinION barcodes have an accuracy of 99.3%-100% with the number of ambiguous bases after correction ranging from <0.01-1.5% depending on which correction pipeline is used. We demonstrate that it requires ~2 hours of sequencing to gather all information needed for obtaining reliable barcodes for most specimens (>90%). We estimate that up to 1000 barcodes can be generated in one flowcell and that the cost per barcode can be <USD 2. This article is protected by copyright. All rights reserved.

DNA条形码可用于物种发现和物种鉴定，但目前获取条形码需要设备良好的分子实验室，费时且/或昂贵。我们在这里通过为Oxford Nanopore MinION™开发条形码流水线来解决这些问题，并证明尽管MinION™读数的碱基错误率很高，但一个流动池可以生成约500个样品的条形码。该流水线通过首先将同一标记的扩增子的所有读数总结为共识条形码来克服这些错误。共有条形码总体上不具有错配，但保留集中在均聚区域的indel错误。它们通过可选的纠错管道进行处理，这些管道根据公开可用条形码的保守氨基酸基序进行校正。通过分析代表MinION™开发的三个不同阶段的三个MinION™运行的读取，可以记录此管道的有效性。他们为（1）混合双翅目样本的511个样本，（2）575个蚂蚁样本，和（3）50个摇蚊科样本产生了数据。根据最新的化学分析得出的Minion条形码为511份标本中的490份进行了评估，参考Sanger条形码（N = 471）。总的来说，MinION条形码的精确度为99.3％-100％，修正后的歧义基数为<0.01-1.5％，具体取决于使用的校正流水线。我们证明它需要约2小时的测序来收集获得大多数标本（> 90％）可靠条形码所需的全部信息。我们估计在一个流通池中可以生成多达1000个条码，并且每个条码的成本可能<2美元。本文受版权保护。版权所有。

Journal: Mol Ecol Resour [IF=7.332] PMID: 29673082 PubDate: 2018-Apr-19 Authors: Srivathsan A, Bal...
80. TRUmiCount: Correctly counting absolute numbers of molecules using unique molecular identifiers.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Counting molecules using next-generation sequencing (NGS) suffers from PCR amplification bias, which reduces the accuracy of many quantitative NGS-based experimental methods such as RNASeq. This is true even if molecules are made distinguishable using unique molecular identifiers (UMIs) before PCR amplification, and distinct UMIs are counted instead of reads: Molecules that are lost entirely during the sequencing process will still cause underestimation of the molecule count, and amplification artifacts like PCR chimeras create phantom UMIs and thus cause over-estimation.

使用新一代测序（NGS）计数分子会受到PCR扩增偏倚的影响，这会降低许多基于定量NGS的实验方法（如RNASeq）的准确性。即使在PCR扩增之前使用独特的分子标识符（UMI）使得分子可区分，并且不同的UMI被计数而不是读数：即使在测序过程中完全丢失的分子仍然会导致分子计数低估，并且放大假象像PCR嵌合体创建幻影UMIs，从而导致高估。

Journal: Bioinformatics [IF=7.307] PMID: 29672674 PubDate: 2018-Apr-16 Authors: Pflug FG, von Hae...
81. Rucaparib: a new treatment option for ovarian cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Approximately 50% of high-grade serous ovarian cancers present a deficiency in the pathways involved in homologous recombination (HR). PARP inhibitors prevent single-strand DNA damage repair and determine a progression of the defect towards double-strand breaks, which results in a process known as 'synthetic lethality'. Areas covered: In this review, the authors discuss the efficacy and toxicity of rucaparib either as a single agent or as a maintenance treatment for ovarian cancer. This includes the NGS Foundation Medicine evaluation of the role of this drug in the treatment algorithm of ovarian cancer. Moreover, perspectives on the future development of this drug are presented. Expert opinion: The FDA has approved this drug for the treatment of recurrent BRCA-mutated ovarian cancers, which were previously treated with at least two chemotherapies and has accepted the supplemental new drug application for maintenance use in patients who respond to platinum-based chemotherapy via the Prescription Drug User Fee Act (PDUFA) on 6 April 2018. European Medicines Agency (EMA) approval in the same setting is awaited. The possibility of using PARP inhibitors as a maintenance therapy, as a front-line therapy to combat recurrence, and in combination with anti-angiogenic agents and immune-therapies appears to be of particular interest.

大约50％的高级浆液性卵巢癌在涉及同源重组（HR）的途径中存在缺陷。 PARP抑制剂阻止单链DNA损伤修复并确定缺陷向双链断裂的进展，这导致称为“合成致死性”的过程。覆盖范围：在这篇综述中，作者讨论了rucaparib作为单一药物或作为卵巢癌的维持治疗的功效和毒性。这包括NGS基金会医学评估这种药物在卵巢癌治疗算法中的作用。此外，还介绍了这种药物未来发展的观点。专家意见：FDA已批准用于治疗复发性BRCA突变卵巢癌的药物，这种药物以前曾接受过至少两种化疗药物治疗，并接受了补充性新药申请，用于对通过铂类化疗作出反应的患者的维持治疗2018年4月6日的“处方药使用者费用法”（PDUFA）。欧洲药品管理局（EMA）在同一环境下的批准正在等待中。使用PARP抑制剂作为维持治疗的可能性，作为抗复发的一线疗法，以及与抗血管生成剂和免疫疗法的组合似乎特别令人感兴趣。

Journal: Expert Opin Pharmacother [IF=.] PMID: 29672168 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Sabatucci I, Malt...
82. Identification of a cold-tolerant locus in rice (Oryza sativa L.) using bulked segregant analysis with a next-generation sequencing strategy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Cold stress can cause serious abiotic damage that limits the growth, development and yield of rice. Cold tolerance during the booting stage of rice is a key factor that can guarantee a high and stable yield under cold stress. The cold tolerance of rice is controlled by quantitative trait loci (QTLs). Based on the complex genetic basis of cold tolerance in rice, additional efforts are needed to detect reliable QTLs and identify candidate genes. In this study, recombinant inbred lines (RILs) derived from a cross between a cold sensitive variety, Dongnong422, and strongly cold-tolerant variety, Kongyu131, were used to screen for cold-tolerant loci at the booting stage of rice.

冷胁迫会导致严重的非生物损害，限制水稻的生长，发育和产量。水稻孕穗期耐冷性是保证冷胁迫下高产稳产的关键因素。水稻的耐冷性由数量性状基因座（QTL）控制。基于水稻耐冷性的复杂遗传基础，需要做更多的工作来检测可靠的QTL并鉴定候选基因。在本研究中，利用冷敏感品种东农422和抗冷性强的品种Kongyu131杂交获得的重组自交系RILs在水稻孕穗期进行抗寒基因筛选。

Journal: Rice (N Y) [IF=.] PMID: 29671148 PubDate: 2018-Apr-18 Authors: Sun J, Yang L, Wa... PMC5906412
83. Aneuploid CTC and CEC.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Conventional circulating tumor cell (CTC) detection technologies are restricted to large tumor cells (> white blood cells (WBCs)), or those unique carcinoma cells with double positive expression of surface epithelial cell adhesion molecule (EpCAM) for isolation, and intracellular structural protein cytokeratins (CKs) for identification. With respect to detecting the full spectrum of highly heterogeneous circulating rare cells (CRCs), including CTCs and circulating endothelial cells (CECs), it is imperative to develop a strategy systematically coordinating all tri-elements of nucleic acids, biomarker proteins, and cellular morphology, to effectively enrich and comprehensively identify CRCs. Accordingly, a novel strategy integrating subtraction enrichment and immunostaining-fluorescence in situ hybridization (SE-iFISH), independent of cell size variation and free of hypotonic damage as well as anti-EpCAM perturbing, has been demonstrated to enable in situ phenotyping multi-protein expression, karyotyping chromosome aneuploidy, and detecting cytogenetic rearrangements of the ALK gene in non-hematologic CRCs. Symbolic non-synonymous single nucleotide variants (SNVs) of both the TP53 gene (P33R) in each single aneuploid CTCs, and the cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitor 2A (CDKN2A) tumor suppressor gene in each examined aneuploid CECs, were identified for the first time across patients with diverse carcinomas. Comprehensive co-detecting observable aneuploid CTCs and CECs by SE-iFISH, along with applicable genomic and/or proteomic single cell molecular profiling, are anticipated to facilitate elucidating how those disparate categories of aneuploid CTCs and CECs cross-talk and functionally interplay with tumor angiogenesis, therapeutic drug resistance, tumor progression, and cancer metastasis.

传统的循环肿瘤细胞（CTC）检测技术仅限于大肿瘤细胞（>白细胞（WBC）），或具有表达上皮细胞粘附分子（EpCAM）的双重阳性表达的独特癌细胞用于分离，而细胞内结构蛋白细胞角蛋白（CK）进行鉴定。关于检测包括CTC和循环内皮细胞（CEC）在内的高度异质性循环稀有细胞（CRC）的全谱图，必须制定一个系统地协调核酸，生物标志物蛋白质和细胞形态学中所有三元素的策略，有效地丰富和全面识别社保资金。因此，已经证明了一种集消减富集和免疫染色 - 荧光原位杂交（SE-iFISH）于一体的独立于细胞大小变化且无低渗损伤以及抗EpCAM干扰的新策略能够实现原位表型多蛋白表达，核型分析染色体非整倍体，以及检测ALK基因在非血液学CRC中的细胞遗传学重排。首次鉴定了每个单倍体非整倍体CTC中TP53基因（P33R）和每个检测到的非整倍体CEC中的细胞周期蛋白依赖性激酶抑制剂2A（CDKN2A）肿瘤抑制基因的符号非同义单核苷酸变体（SNV）跨越不同癌症的患者。预计通过SE-iFISH全面共检测可观察到的非整倍体CTC和CEC以及适用的基因组和/或蛋白质组单细胞分子谱，有助于阐明这些不同类别的非整倍性CTC和CEC串扰并与肿瘤血管生成功能性相互作用，治疗性药物抗性，肿瘤进展和癌症转移。

Journal: Diagnostics (Basel) [IF=.] PMID: 29670052 PubDate: 2018-Apr-18 Authors: Lin PP
84. GARFIELD-NGS: Genomic vARiants FIltering by dEep Learning moDels in NGS.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Exome sequencing approach is extensively used in research and diagnostic laboratories to discover pathological variants and study genetic architecture of human diseases. However, a significant proportion of identified genetic variants are actually false positive calls, and this pose serious challenges for variants interpretation. Here, we propose a new tool named GARFIELD-NGS (Genomic vARiants FIltering by dEep Learning moDels in NGS), which rely on deep learning models to dissect false and true variants in exome sequencing experiments performed with Illumina or ION platforms. GARFIELD-NGS showed strong performances for both SNP and INDEL variants (AUC 0.71 - 0.98) and outperformed established hard filters. The method is robust also at low coverage down to 30X and can be applied on data generated with the recent Illumina two-colour chemistry. GARFIELD-NGS processes standard VCF file and produces a regular VCF output. Thus, it can be easily integrated in existing analysis pipeline, allowing application of different thresholds based on desired level of sensitivity and specificity.

外显子组测序方法广泛用于研究和诊断实验室以发现病理变体并研究人类疾病的遗传结构。然而，确定的遗传变异体中有相当一部分实际上是假阳性，这对变异体解释提出了严峻的挑战。在这里，我们提出了一个名为GARFIELD-NGS（基因组变异在NGS中通过dEep学习模式筛选）的新工具，它依靠深度学习模型来分析Illumina或ION平台进行的外显子组测序实验中的假和真变体。 GARFIELD-NGS在SNP和INDEL变体（AUC 0.71 - 0.98）方面表现出强劲的表现，并且超越了既定的硬性过滤器。该方法在低至30X的低覆盖范围内也可靠，可应用于最近采用Illumina双色化学技术生成的数据。 GARFIELD-NGS处理标准VCF文件并生成常规VCF输出。因此，它可以很容易地集成到现有的分析流程中，允许根据所需的灵敏度和特异性水平应用不同的阈值。

Journal: Bioinformatics [IF=7.307] PMID: 29668842 PubDate: 2018-Apr-14 Authors: Ravasio V, Ritell...
85. The 6th Rare Disease South Eastern Europe (See) Meeting, Skopje, Macedonia (November 11th, 2017).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The sixth SEE meeting on rare diseases (RDs) was held in MASA the November 10th, 2017. A block of lectures on rare renal diseases started the meeting: nephrotic syndrome, Alport syndrome, atypical HUS, hypophosphatemic rickets, CAKUT were presented in all complexities. Their molecular and genetic mechanisms were discussed. The discovery of a dozen of newly genes in CAKUT, congenital overgrowth, spodilocostal dysplasia, precocious puberty has been done with collaboration of Macedonian and foreign researchers. NGS and other molecular methods in diagnosis of RDs have been presented by several presenters. The mitochondrial diseases, the novelties and importance of early discovery were comprehensively presented and discussed. The genetics and treatment of persistent neonatal hypoglcaemia were of special interest. Dysmorphic syndromes (Klippel Feil) were also presented. A session of oral electronic posters was reach and inspiring. Several lectures dealt with mucopolisaccaridoses, glycogen storage diseases and the possibilities for their diagnosis and treatment. Enzyme replacement treatement (ERT), its availability, effects (or the lack of it on the brain), intratecal ERT administration and further prospects of eventual gene treatment were comprehensively exposed and discussed. The main purposes of this traditional meeting are hopefully fulfilled: increased number of patients with RDs treated and cutting edge presentations got.

第六届SEE罕见疾病会议于2017年11月10日在MASA举行。关于罕见肾脏疾病的一系列讲座开始了会议：肾病综合征，Alport综合征，非典型HUS，低磷血症性r，病，CAKUT在所有复杂性。他们的分子和遗传机制进行了讨论。马其顿和外国研究人员合作完成了CAKUT中十几种新基因，先天性过度生长，spodilocostal发育不良，性早熟的发现。几位主持人已经提出了诊断RD的NGS和其他分子方法。全面介绍和讨论了线粒体疾病，早期发现的新颖性和重要性。持续性新生儿低血糖的遗传学和治疗特别令人感兴趣。还提出了畸形综合征（Klippel Feil）。一个口头电子海报的会议是达到和鼓舞人心的。有几次讲座涉及粘多糖病，糖原贮积症以及诊断和治疗的可能性。酶替代治疗（ERT），其可用性，影响（或大脑缺乏），肠内ERT施用和最终基因治疗的进一步前景全面暴露和讨论。这次传统会议的主要目的有望实现：获得治疗的RD患者数量和尖端的演讲得到了增加。

Journal: Pril (Makedon Akad Nauk Umet Odd Med Nauki) [IF=.] PMID: 29668480 PubDate: 2017-Dec-01 Authors: Gucev Z, Tasic V,...
86. Large Enhancement of 2D Electron Gases Mobility Induced by Interfacial Localized Electron Screening Effect.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The interactions between delocalized and localized charges play important roles in correlated electron systems. Here, using a combination of transport measurements, spectroscopic ellipsometry (SE), and X-ray absorption spectroscopy (XAS) supported by theoretical calculations, we reveal the important role of interfacial localized charges and their screening effects in determining the mobility of (La0.3 Sr0.7 )(Al0.65 Ta0.35 )O3 /SrTiO3 (LSAT/SrTiO3 ) interfaces. When the LSAT layer thickness reaches the critical value of 5 uc, the insulating interface abruptly becomes conducting, accompanied by the appearance of a new midgap state. This midgap state emerges at ≈1 eV below the Ti t2g band and shows a strong character of Ti 3dxy - O 2p hybridization. Increasing the LSAT layer from 5 to 18 uc, the number of localized charges increases, resulting in an enhanced screening effect and higher mobile electron mobility. This observation contradicts the traditional semiconductor interface where the localized charges always suppress the carrier mobility. These results demonstrate a new strategy to probe localized charges and mobile electrons in correlated electronic systems and highlight the important role of screening effects from localized charges in improving the mobile electron mobility at complex oxide interfaces.

离域化和局域化电荷之间的相互作用在相关电子系统中起着重要作用。在这里，使用传输测量，光谱椭偏仪（SE）和X射线吸收光谱（XAS）的理论计算支持的组合，我们揭示了界面局部电荷的重要作用和它们在确定（La0。 3 Sr0.7）（Al0.65 Ta0.35）O3 / SrTiO3（LSAT / SrTiO3）界面。当LSAT层厚度达到5 uc的临界值时，绝缘界面突然变为导电状态，伴随着新的中间隙状态的出现。这种中间态出现在Ti t2g带下约≈1eV，并表现出Ti 3dxy - O 2p杂交的强烈特性。将LSAT层从5增加到18 uc，局域电荷的数量增加，导致增强的屏蔽效应和更高的移动电子迁移率。这种观察与传统的半导体接口相矛盾，在这种接口中局部电荷总是抑制载流子迁移率。这些结果展示了一种探测相关电子系统中的局域电荷和移动电子的新策略，并且突出了局部电荷的屏蔽效应在改善复杂氧化物界面处的移动电子迁移率中的重要作用。

Journal: Adv. Mater. Weinheim [IF=.] PMID: 29667241 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Chi X, Huang Z, A...
87. SNP-based pool genotyping and haplotype analysis accelerate fine-mapping of the wheat genomic region containing stripe rust resistance gene Yr26.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

NGS-assisted super pooling emerging as powerful tool to accelerate gene mapping and haplotype association analysis within target region uncovering specific linkage SNPs or alleles for marker-assisted gene pyramiding. Conventional gene mapping methods to identify genes associated with important agronomic traits require significant amounts of financial support and time. Here, a single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP)-based mapping approach, RNA-Seq and SNP array assisted super pooling analysis, was used for rapid mining of a candidate genomic region for stripe rust resistance gene Yr26 that has been widely used in wheat breeding programs in China. Large DNA and RNA super-pools were genotyped by Wheat SNP Array and sequenced by Illumina HiSeq, respectively. Hundreds of thousands of SNPs were identified and then filtered by multiple filtering criteria. Among selected SNPs, over 900 were found within an overlapping interval of less than 30 Mb as the Yr26 candidate genomic region in the centromeric region of chromosome arm 1BL. The 235 chromosome-specific SNPs were converted into KASP assays to validate the Yr26 interval in different genetic populations. Using a high-resolution mapping population (> 30,000 gametes), we confined Yr26 to a 0.003-cM interval. The Yr26 target region was anchored to the common wheat IWGSC RefSeq v1.0 and wild emmer WEWSeq v.1.0 sequences, from which 488 and 454 kb fragments were obtained. Several candidate genes were identified in the target genomic region, but there was no typical resistance gene in either genome region. Haplotype analysis identified specific SNPs linked to Yr26 and developed robust and breeder-friendly KASP markers. This integration strategy can be applied to accelerate generating many markers closely linked to target genes/QTL for a trait of interest in wheat and other polyploid species.

NGS辅助的超级池技术正成为加速目标区域内基因定位和单体型关联分析的有力工具，揭示了标记辅助基因聚合的特定连锁SNPs或等位基因。鉴定与重要农艺性状相关的基因的常规基因定位方法需要大量的财政支持和时间。在此，使用基于单核苷酸多态性（SNP）的定位方法，RNA-Seq和SNP阵列辅助的超级汇集分析，快速挖掘已广泛用于小麦育种程序的条锈病抗性基因Yr26的候选基因组区域在中国。通过小麦SNP阵列对大DNA和RNA超级库进行基因分型，并通过Illumina HiSeq分别进行测序。数十万个SNP被鉴定出来，然后通过多个过滤标准进行过滤。在所选的SNP中，在小于30Mb的重叠区间内发现超过900个，作为染色体臂1BL的着丝粒区域中的Yr26候选基因组区域。将235个染色体特异性SNP转化为KASP分析以验证不同遗传群体中的Yr26区间。使用高分辨率的作图群体（> 30,000配子），我们将Yr26限制在0.003cM的范围内。将Yr26靶标区域锚定到普通小麦IWGSC RefSeq v1.0和野生二粒小麦WEWSeq v.1.0序列，从中获得488和454kb片段。在目标基因组区域鉴定了几个候选基因，但是在任一基因组区域都没有典型的抗性基因。单体型分析鉴定出与Yr26相关的特定SNP，并开发出健壮且易于培育的KASP标记。这种整合策略可以应用于加速产生与目标基因/ QTL紧密连锁的许多标记，以获得小麦和其他多倍体物种感兴趣的性状。

Journal: Theor. Appl. Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29666883 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Wu J, Zeng Q, Wan...
88. Using biology to guide the treatment of sarcomas and aggressive connective-tissue tumours.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Sarcomas are a heterogeneous group of malignancies that arise from cells of a mesenchymal origin. Surgery forms the mainstay of the treatment of most patients with localized sarcoma and might be followed or preceded by chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy. In the metastatic setting, systemic treatments tend to improve survival and control symptoms. However, the adverse events and sometimes disappointing outcomes associated with these empirical approaches to treatment indicate a need for new approaches. The advent of next-generation sequencing (NGS) has enabled more targeted treatment of many malignancies based on the presence of specific alterations. NGS analyses of sarcomas have revealed the presence of many alterations that can be targeted using therapies that are already used in patients with other forms of cancer. In this Review, we describe the genomic alterations considered to define specific nosological subgroups of sarcoma and whose contribution to oncogenesis provides a biological rationale for the use of a specific targeted therapy. We also report several less successful examples that should guide researchers and clinicians to better define the extent to which the identification of driver molecular alterations should influence the development of novel treatments.

肉瘤是由间充质来源的细胞产生的异质性恶性肿瘤组。手术是大多数局限性肉瘤患者治疗的主要手段，并可能接受或先于化疗和/或放疗。在转移性环境中，全身治疗倾向于改善生存和控制症状。然而，与这些经验治疗方法相关的不良事件和有时令人失望的结果表明需要新的方法。新一代测序（NGS）的出现使得基于特定改变的存在能够更有针对性地治疗许多恶性肿瘤。肉瘤的NGS分析揭示了许多改变的存在，可以使用已经用于其他形式的癌症的患者的治疗来靶向。在这篇综述中，我们描述了被认为定义了肉瘤的特定鼻内亚群的基因组改变，并且其对肿瘤发生的贡献提供了使用特定靶向治疗的生物学原理。我们还报告了一些不太成功的例子，应该指导研究人员和临床医生更好地确定驱动分子改变的识别应该影响新疗法发展的程度。

Journal: Nat Rev Clin Oncol [IF=20.693] PMID: 29666441 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Dufresne A, Brahm...
89. Novel insights into the pathogenesis of T-cell lymphomas.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

T-cell lymphomas are a heterogeneous group of rare malignancies with overlapping clinical, immunologic and histologic features. Recent advances in our understanding of T-cell differentiation based on gene expression profiling, next-generation sequencing (NGS) and transgenic mouse modeling studies have better elucidated the pathogenetic mechanisms underlying the diverse biology of T-cell lymphomas. These studies show that while genetic alterations in epigenetic modifiers are implicated in all subtypes of T-cell lymphomas, specific subtypes demonstrate enrichment for particular recurrent alterations targeting specific genes. In this regard, RHOA and TET2 alterations are prevalent in nodal T-cell lymphomas particularly angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphomas (AITL), peripheral T-cell lymphomas, not otherwise specified (PTCL, NOS), and nodal peripheral T-cell lymphoma with T-follicular helper phenotype (PTCL, TFH). JAK-STAT signaling pathways are mutationally activated in many extranodal T-cell lymphomas such as NK/T-cell and hepatosplenic T-cell lymphomas (HSTCL). The functional significance of many of these genetic alterations are becoming better understood. Altogether these advances will continue to refine diagnostic criteria, improve prognostication and identify novel therapeutic targets resulting in improved outcomes for patient with T-cell lymphomas.

T细胞淋巴瘤是罕见恶性肿瘤的异质组，具有重叠的临床，免疫和组织学特征。基于基因表达谱，新一代测序（NGS）和转基因小鼠模型研究，我们了解T细胞分化的最新进展更好地阐明了T细胞淋巴瘤多样生物学的发病机制。这些研究表明，尽管表观遗传修饰物中的遗传改变涉及T细胞淋巴瘤的所有亚型，但特定的亚型表现出富集针对特定基因的特定复发性改变。在这方面，RHOA和TET2改变在节点性T细胞淋巴瘤特别是血管免疫母细胞性T细胞淋巴瘤（AITL），外周T细胞淋巴瘤（未另外指定）（PTCL，NOS）和淋巴结周T细胞淋巴瘤中普遍存在 - 毛囊辅助表型（PTCL，TFH）。 JAK-STAT信号通路在许多结外T细胞淋巴瘤如NK / T细胞和肝脾T细胞淋巴瘤（HSTCL）中被突变激活。许多这些基因改变的功能意义正在变得更好理解。总之，这些进展将继续完善诊断标准，改善预后并确定新的治疗靶点，从而改善T细胞淋巴瘤患者的预后。

Journal: Blood [IF=13.164] PMID: 29666117 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Van Arnam JS, Lim...
90. Microsatellite instability in prostate cancer by PCR or next-generation sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Microsatellite instability (MSI) is now being used as a sole biomarker to guide immunotherapy treatment for men with advanced prostate cancer. Yet current molecular diagnostic tests for MSI have not been evaluated for use in prostate cancer.

微卫星不稳定性（MSI）现在被用作指导晚期前列腺癌男性免疫疗法治疗的唯一生物标志物。然而目前针对MSI的分子诊断测试尚未被评估用于前列腺癌。

Journal: J Immunother Cancer [IF=.] PMID: 29665853 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Hempelmann JA, Lo... PMC5904988
91. A machine learning model to determine the accuracy of variant calls in capture-based next generation sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next generation sequencing (NGS) has become a common technology for clinical genetic tests. The quality of NGS calls varies widely and is influenced by features like reference sequence characteristics, read depth, and mapping accuracy. With recent advances in NGS technology and software tools, the majority of variants called using NGS alone are in fact accurate and reliable. However, a small subset of difficult-to-call variants that still do require orthogonal confirmation exist. For this reason, many clinical laboratories confirm NGS results using orthogonal technologies such as Sanger sequencing. Here, we report the development of a deterministic machine-learning-based model to differentiate between these two types of variant calls: those that do not require confirmation using an orthogonal technology (high confidence), and those that require additional quality testing (low confidence). This approach allows reliable NGS-based calling in a clinical setting by identifying the few important variant calls that require orthogonal confirmation.

新一代测序（NGS）已成为临床基因检测的常用技术。 NGS呼叫的质量变化很大，并受参考序列特征，读取深度和映射精度等特征的影响。随着NGS技术和软件工具的最新进展，单独称为NGS的大多数变体事实上准确可靠。然而，仍然需要正交确认的一小部分难以通话的变体存在。为此，许多临床实验室使用正交技术如Sanger测序确认NGS结果。在这里，我们报告了确定性基于机器学习的模型的发展，以区分这两种类型的变异调用：那些不需要使用正交技术进行确认（高置信度），以及那些需要额外质量测试（低置信度）。这种方法通过识别需要正交确认的少数重要变体呼叫，可以在临床环境中实现可靠的基于NGS的呼叫。

Journal: BMC Genomics [IF=3.729] PMID: 29665779 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: van den Akker J, ... PMC5904977
92. Distinctiveness and Similarities Between Extended-Spectrum β-Lactamase-Producing Escherichia coli Isolated from Cattle and the Community in Israel.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The goal of this study was to compare the molecular features of bovine- and human community-acquired extended-spectrum β-lactamase (ESBL)-producing Escherichia coli in Israel. Bovine ESBL-producing E. coli were isolated during a point-prevalence study from the main farming locations throughout Israel. Human ESBL-producing E. coli isolates were collected from community-acquired urinary tract infection cases. Molecular typing was done initially by repetitive extragenic palindromic-PCR. Representative isolates were subjected to next-generation sequencing (NGS) and analyzed for multilocus sequence typing (MLST), core genome MLST (cgMLST), blaCTX-M gene allele, and mobile genetic elements (MGEs) surrounding it. Out of the 287 bovine- and 104 community-derived ESBL-producing E. coli isolates, 44 and 26 isolates were subjected to NGS, respectively. Both populations exhibited a diverse but distinct clonal structure with predominance of several sequence types (STs); two clones, ST-10/167 (n = 13) and ST-38 (n = 8), were present. cgMLST analysis of these clones revealed that the majority of isolates exhibited phylogenetic distance (PD) of >178 gene difference from their closest isolate, with the exception of five isolates that exhibited PD of <24 gene difference, including two bovine- to three community-derived isolates. Hence, clonal transmission of ESBL-producing E. coli between cattle and the community, although uncommon, is likely to have occurred. The blaCTX-M-15 gene was identified in 52/70 (74%) isolates from both cattle and the community and was surrounded by MGEs that were composed mostly of either the Tn3 or IS1380 families. Thus, MGEs are likely to play an important role in the exchange of resistance genes.

这项研究的目的是比较以色列牛和人类社区获得的超广谱β-内酰胺酶（ESBL）生产大肠埃希氏菌的分子特征。在整个以色列主要农业地点的流行病点研究中，分离出产ESBL的大肠杆菌。从社区获得性尿路感染病例中收集产ESBL的大肠杆菌分离株。分子分型最初由重复的基因外回文PCR完成。对代表性分离株进行下一代测序（NGS）并分析多位点序列分型（MLST），核心基因组MLST（cgMLST），blaCTX-M基因等位基因和围绕其的移动遗传元件（MGE）。在来自287株牛和104株社区产ESBL的大肠杆菌分离株中，分别有44株和26株分离物经历了NGS。这两个群体表现出多样但独特的克隆结构，其中多种序列类型（ST）占优势;存在两个克隆ST-10/167（n = 13）和ST-38（n = 8）。对这些克隆的cgMLST分析显示大多数分离株表现出与其最接近的分离株有> 178个基因差异的系统发生距离（PD），除了表现出<24个基因差异的PD的五个分离株（包括两个牛至三个群落 - 衍生的分离物。因此，牛和社区之间产ESBL的大肠杆菌的克隆传播虽然不常见，但很可能已经发生。 blaCTX-M-15基因在来自牛和社区的52/70（74％）分离株中鉴定，并被主要由Tn3或IS1380家族组成的MGE包围。因此，MGE可能在抗性基因交换中发挥重要作用。

Journal: Microb. Drug Resist. [IF=.] PMID: 29664687 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Lifshitz Z, Sturl...
93. Unifying cancer and normal RNA sequencing data from different sources.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Driven by the recent advances of next generation sequencing (NGS) technologies and an urgent need to decode complex human diseases, a multitude of large-scale studies were conducted recently that have resulted in an unprecedented volume of whole transcriptome sequencing (RNA-seq) data, such as the Genotype Tissue Expression project (GTEx) and The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA). While these data offer new opportunities to identify the mechanisms underlying disease, the comparison of data from different sources remains challenging, due to differences in sample and data processing. Here, we developed a pipeline that processes and unifies RNA-seq data from different studies, which includes uniform realignment, gene expression quantification, and batch effect removal. We find that uniform alignment and quantification is not sufficient when combining RNA-seq data from different sources and that the removal of other batch effects is essential to facilitate data comparison. We have processed data from GTEx and TCGA and successfully corrected for study-specific biases, enabling comparative analysis between TCGA and GTEx. The normalized datasets are available for download on figshare.

在下一代测序（NGS）技术的最新进展以及迫切需要解码复杂的人类疾病的驱动下，最近进行了大量大规模研究，这些研究导致了前所未有的大量全转录组测序（RNA-seq）数据例如基因型组织表达项目（GTEx）和癌症基因组图谱（TCGA）。虽然这些数据为识别疾病的机制提供了新的机会，但由于样本和数据处理的差异，来自不同来源的数据的比较仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们开发了一个流水线，用于处理和统一来自不同研究的RNA-seq数据，其中包括统一重新对齐，基因表达量化和批次效应去除。我们发现当组合不同来源的RNA-seq数据时，统一的比对和定量是不够的，并且为了便于数据比较，去除其他批次效应是必不可少的。我们处理了来自GTEx和TCGA的数据，并成功纠正了针对特定研究的偏差，从而可以对TCGA和GTEx进行比较分析。规范化的数据集可以在figshare上下载。

Journal: Sci Data [IF=4.836] PMID: 29664468 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Wang Q, Armenia J... PMC5903355
94. Equine Encephalosis Virus in India, 2008.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

A virus isolated from a sick horse from India in 2008 was confirmed by next-generation sequencing analysis to be equine encephalosis virus (EEV). EEV in India is concerning because several species of Culicoides midge, which play a major role in EEV natural maintenance and transmission, are present in this country.

新一代测序分析证实，2008年从印度病马中分离出的病毒为马脑病病毒（EEV）。 EEV在印度是有关的，因为在这个国家出现了几种在EEV自然维护和传播中起主要作用的Culicoides mid蚊。

Journal: Emerging Infect. Dis. [IF=.] PMID: 29664366 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Yadav PD, Albariñ...
95. Overlap at the molecular and immunohistochemical levels between angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphoma and a subgroup of peripheral T-cell lymphomas without specific morphological features.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The overlap of morphology and immunophenotype between angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphoma (AITL) and other nodal peripheral T-cell lymphomas (n-PTCLs) is a matter of current interest whose clinical relevance and pathogenic background have not been fully established. We studied a series of 98 n-PTCL samples (comprising 57 AITL and 41 PTCL-NOS) with five TFH antibodies (CD10, BCL-6, PD-1, CXCL13, ICOS), looked for mutations in five of the genes most frequently mutated in AITL (TET2, DNMT3A, IDH2, RHOA and PLCG1) using the Next-Generation-Sequencing Ion Torrent platform, and measured the correlations of these characteristics with morphology and clinical features. The percentage of mutations in the RHOA and TET2 genes was similar (23.5% of cases). PLCG1 was mutated in 14.3%, IDH2 in 11.2% and DNMT3A in 7.1% of cases, respectively. In the complete series, mutations in RHOA gene were associated with the presence of mutations in IDH2, TET2 and DNMT3A (p < 0.001, p = 0.043, and p = 0.029, respectively). Fourteen cases featured RHOA mutations without TET2 mutations. A close relationship was found between the presence of these mutations and a TFH-phenotype in AITL and PTCL-NOS patients. Interestingly, BCL-6 expression was the only TFH marker differentially expressed between AITL and PTCL-NOS cases. There were many fewer mutated cases than there were cases with a TFH phenotype. Overall, these data suggest alternative ways by which neoplastic T-cells overexpress these proteins. On the other hand, no clinical or survival differences were found between any of the recognized subgroups of patients with respect to their immunohistochemistry or mutational profile.

血管免疫母细胞性T细胞淋巴瘤（AITL）与其他淋巴结外周T细胞淋巴瘤（n-PTCL）之间的形态学和免疫表型的重叠是目前感兴趣的问题，其临床相关性和致病背景尚未完全确立。我们用五种TFH抗体（CD10，BCL-6，PD-1，CXCL13，ICOS）研究了一系列98个n-PTCL样品（包含57个AITL和41个PTCL-NOS），最频繁地寻找5个基因中的突变使用Next-Generation-Sequencing Ion Torrent平台在AITL（TET2，DNMT3A，IDH2，RHOA和PLCG1）中进行突变，并测量这些特征与形态学和临床特征的相关性。 RHOA和TET2基因突变的百分比相似（23.5％的病例）。 PLCG1突变为14.3％，IDH2分别为11.2％和DNMT3A分别为7.1％。在完整系列中，RHOA基因突变与IDH2，TET2和DNMT3A突变的存在相关（分别为p <0.001，p = 0.043和p = 0.029）。有14例病例表现为无TET2突变的RHOA突变。 AITL和PTCL-NOS患者中存在这些突变和TFH表型之间存在密切关系。有趣的是，BCL-6表达是AITL和PTCL-NOS病例之间差异表达的唯一TFH标记。发生突变的病例比具有TFH表型的病例少得多。总体而言，这些数据表明肿瘤性T细胞过度表达这些蛋白质的替代方式。另一方面，任何公认的亚组患者在免疫组化或突变方面均未发现临床或生存差异。

Journal: Oncotarget [IF=5.168] PMID: 29662631 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Manso R, González... PMC5882322
96. Are we ready for routine precision medicine? Highlights from the Milan Summit on Precision Medicine, Milan, Italy, 8-9 February 2018.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

On 8 and 9 February 2018, the IFOM-IEO campus in Milan hosted the Milan summit on Precision Medicine, which gathered clinical and translational research experts from academia, industry and regulatory bodies to discuss the state of the art of precision medicine in Europe. The meeting was pervaded by a generalised feeling of excitement for a field that is perceived to be technologically mature for the transition into clinical routine but still hampered by numerous obstacles of a methodological, ethical, regulatory and possibly cultural nature. Through lively discussions, the attendees tried to identify realistic ways to implement a technology-rich precision approach to cancer patients.

2018年2月8日和9日，米兰IFOM-IEO校园举办了精准医学米兰峰会，聚集了来自学术界，工业界和监管机构的临床和转化研究专家，讨论欧洲精准医学的最新发展状况。这次会议弥漫着一种普遍的兴奋感，这种场被认为对于过渡到临床常规而言在技术上已经成熟，但仍然受到方法论，伦理，监管和可能文化性质的无数障碍的阻碍。通过热烈的讨论，与会者试图找出切实可行的方法，为癌症患者实施技术丰富的精确方法。

Journal: Ecancermedicalscience [IF=.] PMID: 29662530 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Mazzarella L PMC5880225
97. Parent-of-origin effect of hypomorphic pathogenic variants and somatic mosaicism impact on phenotypic expression of retinoblastoma.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Retinoblastoma is the most common eye cancer in children. Numerous families have been described displaying reduced penetrance and expressivity. An extensive molecular characterization of seven families led us to characterize the two main mechanisms impacting on phenotypic expression, as follows: (i) mosaicism of amorphic pathogenic variants; and (ii) parent-of-origin-effect of hypomorphic pathogenic variants. Somatic mosaicism for RB1 splicing variants (c.1960+5G>C and c.2106+2T>C), leading to a complete loss of function was demonstrated by high-depth NGS in two families. In both cases, the healthy carrier parent (one with retinoma) showed a variant frequency lower than that expected for a heterozygous individual, indicating a 56-60% mosaicism level. Previous evidences of a ~3-fold excess of RB1 maternal canonical transcript led us to hypothesize that this differential allelic expression could influence phenotypic outcome in families at risk for RB onset. Accordingly, in five families, we identified a higher tumor risk associated with paternally inherited hypomorphic pathogenic variants, namely a deletion resulting in the loss of 37 amino acids at the N-terminus (c.608-16_608del), an exonic substitution with a "leaky" splicing effect (c.1331A>G), a partially deleterious substitution (c.1981C>T) and a truncating C-terminal variant (c.2663+2T>C). The identification of these mechanisms changes the genetic/prenatal counseling and the clinical management of families, indicating a higher recurrence risk when the hypomorphic pathogenic variant is inherited from the father, and suggesting the need for second tumor surveillance in unaffected carriers at risk of developing adult-onset cancer such as osteosarcoma or leiomyosarcoma.

视网膜母细胞瘤是儿童中最常见的眼癌。已经描述了许多家族显示出降低的外显率和表达性。 7个家族的广泛分子特征使我们能够表征影响表型表达的两种主要机制，如下所述：（i）无定形致病变体的镶嵌性;和（ii）hypomorphic致病变异体的父母起源效应。 RB1剪接变体（c.1960 + 5G> C和c.2106 + 2T> C）的体细胞嵌合体导致功能的完全丧失，这表现为两个家族的高深度NGS。在这两种情况下，健康的载体母体（一个患有视网膜瘤）显示变异频率低于杂合子个体的预期频率，表明56-60％镶嵌性水平。以前的证据表明，RB1母体经典转录本的过度〜3倍过量导致我们推测这种差异性等位基因表达可能影响存在RB发病风险的家族的表型结果。因此，在五个家族中，我们发现与父系遗传的hypomorphic致病变异体相关的更高的肿瘤风险，即导致N-末端37个氨基酸缺失的缺失（c.608-16_608del），用“泄漏“剪接效应（c.1331A> G），部分有害替代（c.1981C> T）和截短C-末端变体（c.2663 + 2T> C）。这些机制的鉴定改变了遗传/产前咨询和家属的临床管理，表明当遗传来自父亲的hypomorphic致病性变体时具有更高的复发风险，并且表明需要对处于发育成人风险的未受影响的携带者进行第二次肿瘤监测引发癌症，如骨肉瘤或平滑肌肉瘤。

Journal: Eur. J. Hum. Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29662154 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Imperatore V, Pin...
98. Characterization of extensively- or pandrug-resistant ST147 and ST101 OXA-48-producing Klebsiella pneumoniae isolates causing bloodstream infections in ICU patients.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Carbapenem-resistant Klebsiella pneumoniae cause important healthcare-associated infections worldwide. An outbreak of ST11 OXA-48-producing K. pneumoniae isolates (OXA-48-Kp) occurred in Tzaneio Hospital in 2012 and was contained until 2014, when OXA-48-Kp reemerged. The present study involved 19 bloodstream infection (BSI) OXA-48-Kp recovered from 19 ICU patients hospitalized between August 2014 and July 2016. MICs were determined by broth microdilution. β-lactamase genes were detected by PCR. All isolates were typed by PFGE/MLST and 10 representative isolates by next generation sequencing (NGS). Of the 19 study patients, nine had previous hospitalizations and 10 carried OXA-48-Kp prior to BSI isolations; median time from ICU admission to BSI was 29 days. Four OXA-48-Kp belonged to PFGE profile A (ST147) and were pandrug-resistant (PDR), while 15 isolates exhibited PFGE profile B (ST101) and were extensively drug-resistant. NGS resistome analysis detected genes justifying resistances, except for tigecycline and fosfomycin. Insertional inactivation of mgrB (distinct per clone) conferred colistin resistance in all 19 isolates. NGS SNPs analysis validated the clonal relatedness of the ST147 and ST101 strains and revealed possible presence of two index ST147 strains and microevolution of ST101 strains. Distinct, but highly related, IncL OXA-48-encoding plasmid lineages were identified; plasmids of the ST147 strains were identical with that of ST11 OXA-48-Kp causing the 2012 outbreak. In conclusion, biclonal circulation of OXA-48-Kp and, alarmingly, emergence of a PDR clone are reported. These observations, along with the challenging phenotypic detection of OXA-48 producers and the high reported transmissibility of blaOXA-48, necessitate intensive efforts to prevent their further spread.

碳青霉烯抗性肺炎克雷伯菌引起全球重要的医疗相关感染。 2012年在Tzaneio医院发生ST11 OXA-48产肺炎克雷伯菌分离株（OXA-48-Kp），直到2014年OXA-48-Kp再次出现。本研究涉及从2014年8月至2016年7月期间住院的19例ICU患者中回收的19例血流感染（BSI）OXA-48-Kp。通过微量肉汤稀释法测定MIC。通过PCR检测β-内酰胺酶基因。通过下一代测序（NGS），PFGE / MLST和10个代表性分离株分型。在19名研究患者中，有9名曾接受过住院治疗，10名患者在BSI分离之前携带了OXA-48-Kp;从ICU入学到BSI的中位时间为29天。 4个OXA-48-Kp属于PFGE图谱A（ST147）并且是耐药性的（PDR），而15个分离株显示PFGE图谱B（ST101）并且是广泛耐药的。除替加环素和磷霉素外，NGS抗氧化剂分析检测到证明耐药性的基因。 mgrB的插入灭活（不同的每个克隆）在所有19个分离株中赋予粘菌素抗性。 NGS SNPs分析验证了ST147和ST101菌株的克隆相关性，并揭示了可能存在两种指标ST147菌株和ST101菌株的微进化。不同但高度相关的IncL OXA-48编码质粒谱系被鉴定; ST147菌株的质粒与ST11 OXA-48-Kp的质粒相同，导致2012年爆发。总之，报道了OXA-48-Kp的双克隆循环以及令人震惊的PDR克隆的出现。这些观察结果，以及OXA-48生产者具有挑战性的表型检测和blaOXA-48高报道的传播性，需要进行大量努力以防止其进一步传播。

Journal: Antimicrob. Agents Chemother. [IF=.] PMID: 29661874 PubDate: 2018-Apr-16 Authors: Avgoulea K, Di Pi...
99. Cell-Free Plasma DNA for Disease Stratification and Prognosis in Head and Neck Cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Clinicians face many challenges in disease stratification and outcome prediction in head and neck squamous cancer cell (HNSCC) patients. Given the limitations of currently used clinical scoring, repetitive biopsies, and imaging techniques, liquid biopsy approaches may provide valuable additional diagnostic and prognostic information.

临床医生在头颈部鳞状细胞癌（HNSCC）患者的疾病分层和预后预测中面临着许多挑战。鉴于目前使用的临床评分，重复活检和成像技术的局限性，液体活检方法可提供有价值的额外诊断和预后信息。

Journal: Clin. Chem. [IF=.] PMID: 29661793 PubDate: 2018-Apr-16 Authors: Schirmer MA, Beck...
100. The first mitochondrial genome of the model echinoid Lytechinus variegatus and insights into Odontophoran phylogenetics.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Assembly of publically available next-generation sequence data facilitated the generation of three camarodont echinoid mitogenomes: two for the Green Urchin (Lytechinus variegatus) and one for the Red Urchin (Mesocentrotus franciscanus). The data generated are exploited in a phylogenomic analysis of the superfamily Odontophora, originally proposed for echinoids with tooth supports on the epiphyses of the jaw. The analysis highly supports this taxon and its current subdivision into three families: the Echinometridae, Toxopneustidae, and Strongylocentrotidae. The analysis furthermore implies that historical taxonomic issues between two members of the genus Strongylocentrotus (S. pallidus and S. droebachiensis) may have a genetic basis. The novel mitogenomes for the model species L. variegatus complements the draft genome available for this taxon, one of only three genome-enabled echinoid species. The assembly method applied herein, follows a divide-and-conquer approach that provides for reduced computational requirements and facilitates resolving assembly problems when processing ultra-high coverage next-generation sequence data.

大会公开提供的下一代序列数据促进了三个camarodont echinoid mitogenomes的产生：绿海胆（Lytechinus variegatus）两个，红海胆（Mesocentrotus franciscanus）一个。所产生的数据在Odontophora超家族的系统发育分析中被利用，最初被提出用于在颌骨骨骺上具有牙齿支持的echinoids。该分析极大地支持了该分类单元，并将其分为三个科：Echinometridae，Toxopneustidae和Strongylocentrotidae。分析还意味着Strongylocentrotus（S. pallidus和S. droebachiensis）两个成员之间的历史分类学问题可能具有遗传基础。模式物种L. variegatus的新型mitogenome补充了该分类群的可用基因组草图，这是仅有的三种基因组启用的echinoid物种之一。这里应用的组装方法遵循分而治之的方法，该方法提供了降低的计算要求并有助于在处理超高覆盖率的下一代序列数据时解决组装问题。

Journal: Genomics [IF=2.801] PMID: 29660476 PubDate: 2018-Apr-13 Authors: Bronstein O, Kroh A
101. Feasibility study of cancer genome alterations identified by next generation sequencing: ABC study.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

To confirm the feasibility and explore the clinical applicability of amplicon sequencing by next generation sequencing (NGS) of biopsy samples from patients with advanced solid tumors, we conducted a prospective study.

为证实可行性，并探索下一代测序（NGS）对来自晚期实体瘤患者的活检样本的扩增子测序的临床适用性，我们进行了前瞻性研究。

Journal: Jpn. J. Clin. Oncol. [IF=.] PMID: 29659903 PubDate: 2018-Apr-12 Authors: Naito Y, Takahash...
102. Tracking the NGS revolution: managing life science research on shared high-performance computing clusters.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) has transformed the life sciences, and many research groups are newly dependent upon computer clusters to store and analyze large datasets. This creates challenges for e-infrastructures accustomed to hosting computationally mature research in other sciences. Using data gathered from our own clusters at UPPMAX computing center at Uppsala University, Sweden, where core hour usage of ∼800 NGS and ∼200 non-NGS projects is now similar, we compare and contrast the growth, administrative burden, and cluster usage of NGS projects with projects from other sciences.

新一代测序（NGS）已经改变了生命科学，许多研究小组新近依赖计算机集群来存储和分析大型数据集。这对习惯于在其他科学领域进行计算机成熟研究的电子基础设施构成挑战。在瑞典乌普萨拉大学的UPPMAX计算中心使用我们自己的集群采集的数据，我们的核心小时使用约800个NGS和约200个非NGS项目现在类似，我们比较和比较了增长，管理负担和集群使用NGS项目来自其他科学项目。

Journal: Gigascience [IF=6.871] PMID: 29659792 PubDate: 2018-May-01 Authors: Dahlö M, Scofield...
103. Reconstruction of a 10-mm-long median nerve gap in an ischemic environment using autologous conduits with different patterns of blood supply: A comparative study in the rat.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The aim of this study was to evaluate in the Wistar rat the efficacy of various autologous nerve conduits with various forms of blood supply in reconstructing a 10-mm-long gap in the median nerve (MN) under conditions of local ischemia. A 10-mm-long median nerve defect was created in the right arm. A loose silicone tube was placed around the nerve gap zone, in order to simulate a local ischemic environment. Rats were divided in the following experimental groups (each with 20 rats): the nerve Graft (NG) group, in which the excised MN segment was reattached; the conventional nerve flap (CNF) and the arterialized neurovenous flap (ANVF) groups in which the gap was bridged with homonymous median nerve flaps; the prefabricated nerve flap (PNF) group in which the gap was reconstructed with a fabricated flap created by leaving an arteriovenous fistula in contact with the sciatic nerve for 5 weeks; and the two control groups, Sham and Excision groups. In the latter group, the proximal stump of the MN nerve was ligated and no repair was performed. The rats were followed for 100 days. During this time, they did physiotherapy. Functional, electroneuromyographic and histological studies were performed. The CNF and ANVF groups presented better results than the NG group in the following assessments: grasping test, nociception, motor stimulation threshold, muscle weight, and histomorphometric evaluation. Radial deviation of the operated forepaw was more common in rats that presented worse results in the other outcome variables. Overall, CNFs and ANVFs produced a faster and more complete recovery than NGs in the reconstruction of a 10-mm-long median nerve gap in an ischemic environment in the Wistar rat. Although, results obtained with CNFs were in most cases were better than ANVFs, these differences were not statistically significant for most of the outcome variables.

本研究的目的是在Wistar大鼠中评估各种自体神经导管与各种形式的血液供应在重建局部缺血条件下的正中神经（MN）中10mm长的间隙中的功效。右臂产生10毫米长的正中神经缺损。将松散的硅胶管放置在神经间隙区域周围，以模拟局部缺血环境。将大鼠分成以下实验组（每组20只大鼠）：神经移植物（NG）组，其中切除的MN节段被重新连接;常规神经瓣（CNF）和动脉化神经静脉瓣（ANVF）组，其中间隙与同义正中神经瓣桥接;预制的神经瓣（PNF）组，其中间隙用通过使动静脉内瘘与坐骨神经接触5周而制造的制造皮瓣重建;和两个对照组Sham和Excision组。在后一组中，MN神经的近端残端结扎并且不进行修复。跟踪大鼠100天。在此期间，他们做了物理治疗。进行功能性，电神经营养和组织学研究。 CNF和ANVF组在下列评估中表现出比NG组更好的结果：抓握测试，伤害感受，运动刺激阈值，肌肉重量和组织形态学评估。操作前爪的径向偏差在大鼠中更常见，其在其他结果变量中表现出更差的结果。总体而言，CNS和ANVF在Wistar大鼠的缺血环境中重建10mm长的正中神经间隙比NGs产生更快且更完全的恢复。尽管用CNF获得的结果多数情况下优于ANVF，但这些差异在大多数结果变量中并不具有统计学意义。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29659600 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Casal D, Mota-Sil...
104. Targeted next generation sequencing identifies functionally deleterious germline mutations in novel genes in early-onset/familial prostate cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Considering that mutations in known prostate cancer (PrCa) predisposition genes, including those responsible for hereditary breast/ovarian cancer and Lynch syndromes, explain less than 5% of early-onset/familial PrCa, we have sequenced 94 genes associated with cancer predisposition using next generation sequencing (NGS) in a series of 121 PrCa patients. We found monoallelic truncating/functionally deleterious mutations in seven genes, including ATM and CHEK2, which have previously been associated with PrCa predisposition, and five new candidate PrCa associated genes involved in cancer predisposing recessive disorders, namely RAD51C, FANCD2, FANCI, CEP57 and RECQL4. Furthermore, using in silico pathogenicity prediction of missense variants among 18 genes associated with breast/ovarian cancer and/or Lynch syndrome, followed by KASP genotyping in 710 healthy controls, we identified "likely pathogenic" missense variants in ATM, BRIP1, CHEK2 and TP53. In conclusion, this study has identified putative PrCa predisposing germline mutations in 14.9% of early-onset/familial PrCa patients. Further data will be necessary to confirm the genetic heterogeneity of inherited PrCa predisposition hinted in this study.

考虑到已知的前列腺癌（PrCa）易感基因（包括遗传性乳房/卵巢癌和Lynch综合征的那些）的突变解释了早发性/家族性PrCa的少于5％，我们使用下一个序列测序了94个与癌易感性相关的基因（NGS）在一系列121名PrCa患者中的表达。我们发现7个基因中的单等位基因截短/功能有害突变，包括先前已与PrCa易感性相关的ATM和CHEK2，以及与诱发隐性病症的癌症有关的五个新的候选PrCa相关基因，即RAD51C，FANCD2，FANCI，CEP57和RECQL4 。此外，我们在710名健康对照中使用硅胶致病性预测18个与乳腺癌/卵巢癌和/或Lynch综合征相关的基因中的错义突变，然后在710名健康对照中进行KASP基因分型，我们鉴定了ATM，BRIP1，CHEK2和TP53中“可能的致病性”错义变体。总之，这项研究已经确定了14.9％的早发性/家族性PrCa患者中假定的PrCa诱发性生殖细胞突变。进一步的数据将是必要的，以确认在这项研究中暗示的遗传PrCa易感性的遗传异质性。

Journal: PLoS Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29659569 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Paulo P, Maia S, ...
105. Examining the Genetic Background of Porcine Muscle Growth and Development Based on Transcriptome and miRNAome Data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Recently, selection in pigs has been focused on improving the lean meat content in carcasses; this focus has been most evident in breeds constituting a paternal component in breeding. Such sire-breeds are used to improve the meat quantity of cross-breed pig lines. However, even in one breed, a significant variation in the meatiness level can be observed. In the present study, the comprehensive analysis of genes and microRNA expression profiles in porcine muscle tissue was applied to identify the genetic background of meat content. The comparison was performed between whole gene expression and miRNA profiles of muscle tissue collected from two sire-line pig breeds (Pietrain, Hampshire). The RNA-seq approach allowed the identification of 627 and 416 differentially expressed genes (DEGs) between pig groups differing in terms of loin weight between Pietrain and Hampshire breeds, respectively. The comparison of miRNA profiles showed differential expression of 57 microRNAs for Hampshire and 34 miRNAs for Pietrain pigs. Next, 43 genes and 18 miRNAs were selected as differentially expressed in both breeds and potentially related to muscle development. According to Gene Ontology analysis, identified DEGs and microRNAs were involved in the regulation of the cell cycle, fatty acid biosynthesis and regulation of the actin cytoskeleton. The most deregulated pathways dependent on muscle mass were the Hippo signalling pathway connected with the TGF-β signalling pathway and controlling organ size via the regulation of ubiquitin-mediated proteolysis, cell proliferation and apoptosis. The identified target genes were also involved in pathways such as the FoxO signalling pathway, signalling pathways regulating pluripotency of stem cells and the PI3K-Akt signalling pathway. The obtained results indicate molecular mechanisms controlling porcine muscle growth and development. Identified genes (SOX2, SIRT1, KLF4, PAX6 and genes belonging to the transforming growth factor beta superfamily) could be considered candidate genes for determining muscle mass in pigs.

最近，猪的选择一直集中在改善屠体中的瘦肉含量;这种关注在育种中构成父本组成的品种中最为明显。这种陛下品种被用于改善杂交猪生产线的肉量。然而，即使在一个品种中，也可以观察到肉质水平的显着变化。在本研究中，应用猪肌肉组织中基因和microRNA表达谱的综合分析来鉴定肉类的遗传背景。比较在两个公猪系（Pietrain，Hampshire）收集的肌肉组织的全基因表达和miRNA谱之间进行比较。 RNA-seq方法可以分别鉴定Pietrain品种和Hampshire品种之间在腰围方面不同的猪组之间差异表达的基因（DEGs）的差异表达基因（DEGs）。 miRNA谱的比较显示了Hampshire的57个微RNA和皮特兰猪的34个miRNA的差异表达。接下来，选择43个基因和18个miRNA作为在两个品种中差异表达并可能与肌肉发育相关的基因。根据Gene Ontology分析，鉴定的DEGs和microRNA参与细胞周期调控，脂肪酸生物合成和肌动蛋白细胞骨架的调节。依赖于肌肉质量的最不受控制的途径是与TGF-β信号传导途径相关的Hippo信号传导途径，并通过调节泛素介导的蛋白水解，细胞增殖和凋亡来控制器官大小。已鉴定的靶基因也参与途径，如FoxO信号通路，调节干细胞多能性的信号通路和PI3K-Akt信号通路。获得的结果表明控制猪肌肉生长和发育的分子机制。已鉴定的基因（SOX2，SIRT1，KLF4，PAX6和属于转化生长因子β超家族的基因）可被视为确定猪肌肉质量的候选基因。

Journal: Int J Mol Sci [IF=3.226] PMID: 29659518 PubDate: 2018-Apr-16 Authors: Ropka-Molik K, Pa...
106. ShRangeSim: Simulation of Single Nucleotide Polymorphism Clusters in Next-Generation Sequencing Data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Genomic variations are in the focus of research to uncover mechanisms of host-pathogen interactions and diseases such as cancer. Nowadays, next-generation sequencing (NGS) data are analyzed through dedicated pipelines to detect them. Surrogate NGS data in conjunction with genomic variations help to evaluate pipelines and validate their outcomes, fostering selection of proper tools for a given scientific question. I describe how existing approaches for simulating NGS data in conjunction with genomic variations fail to model local enrichments of single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs), so called SNP clusters. Two distributions for count data are applied to publicly available collections of genomic variations. The results suggest modeling of SNP cluster sizes by overdispersion-aware distributions.

基因组变异是研究的重点，以揭示宿主 - 病原体相互作用和癌症等疾病的机制。如今，通过专用管线分析下一代测序（NGS）数据以检测它们。将NGS数据与基因组变异联系起来有助于评估管道并验证其结果，从而促进为特定科学问题选择合适的工具。我描述了如何结合基因组变异模拟NGS数据的现有方法未能模拟局部富集单核苷酸多态性（SNPs），即所谓的SNP簇。计数数据的两个分布适用于公开可用的基因组变异集合。结果表明SNP簇大小由过分散感知分布建模。

Journal: J. Comput. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29658778 PubDate: 2018-Apr-16 Authors: Boenn M
107. Expression of Bcl-2 Family Proteins in the Ovarian Follicular Apparatus in the Acute Period after Experimental Hyperthermia.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The expression of apoptosis regulators (proapoptotic protein Bad and anti-apoptotic protein Bcl-2) was analyzed and Bcl-2/Bad ratio in the follicular apparatus of the rat ovary was determined on day 3 after hyperthermia (rectal temperature 43.5°C). Hyperthermia in the catabolic phase leads to different degrees of activation of the molecular "switches" of apoptosis in cells of ovarian follicular epithelium. This was seen from increased intensity of immunohistochemical staining for Bad protein against the background of more pronounced expression of Bcl-2 protein. On day 3 after exposure to hyperthermia, Bcl-2/Bad ratio increased, which reflects antiapoptotic protection of cells and conditions for blockade of mitochondrial pathway of apoptosis in the follicular apparatus of the ovaries during the acute period after hyperthermia.

分析凋亡调节因子（促凋亡蛋白Bad和抗凋亡蛋白Bcl-2）的表达，并在高温（直肠温度43.5℃）后第3天测定大鼠卵巢滤泡器中的Bcl-2 / Bad比率。分解代谢阶段中的热疗导致卵巢滤泡上皮细胞中凋亡的分子“开关”的不同程度的活化。这可以从免疫组织化学染色Bad蛋白的强度更强的Bcl-2蛋白表达更明显的背景中看出。热疗后第3天Bcl-2 / Bad比值升高，这反映了热疗后急性期卵巢滤泡器中细胞的抗凋亡保护作用和细胞凋亡线粒体途径的阻断条件。

Journal: Bull. Exp. Biol. Med. [IF=.] PMID: 29658076 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Michurina SV, Kol...
108. The role of Next-Generation Sequencing in tumoral radiosensitivity prediction.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Technological advances have led to more precise radiation delivery, which has resulted in significant clinical gains. A better understanding of tumoral radiosensitivity is still needed to develop strategies and further personalize radiation treatments. Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) and system biology have significantly transformed the field of oncology in the last two decades, but have only a few clinical applications in radiation oncology. This review describes the technical aspects and evolutions of NGS and discusses the latest clinical applications of genomics to predict tumoral radiosensitivity.

技术进步已经导致了更精确的辐射传输，从而带来了显着的临床获益。仍然需要更好地了解肿瘤放射敏感性，以制定策略并进一步个性化放疗。新一代测序（NGS）和系统生物学在过去的二十年中已经显着改变了肿瘤学领域，但在放射肿瘤学领域仅有少数临床应用。这篇综述描述了NGS的技术方面和发展，并讨论了基因组学预测肿瘤放射敏感性的最新临床应用。

Journal: Clin Transl Radiat Oncol [IF=.] PMID: 29658008 PubDate: 2017-Apr Authors: Bibault JE, Tinho... PMC5893518
109. Characteristics of the gut microbiota in adult patients with type 1 and 2 diabetes based on the analysis of a fragment of 16S rRNA gene using next-generation sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

INTRODUCTION    Scientific data indicate  a possible influence of the gastrointestinal tract microbiota on the development of type 1 (T1DM) and 2 (T2DM) diabetes. Sequence analysis of 16S rRNA identified several hundred bacterial species of the intestinal ecosystem, most of which cannot be cultured. OBJECTIVES    We aimed at evaluating the composition of the gut microbiota in adult patients with T1DM and T2DM and establishing a link between data obtained from microbiological testing and the patients' clinical data. PATIENTS AND METHODS    We examined DNA isolated from fecal samples within three groups: healthy volunteers (n=23), T1DM (n=22) and T2DM (n=23). The next-generation sequencing method (NGS) was performed on the MiSeq platform.  RESULTS    At the phylum level, in all groups, Firmicutes bacteria (>77%) definitely prevail. At the taxonomic levels L2 (phylum) and L6 (genus), statistically significant differences were demonstrated in bacterial profiles, particularly in T2DM group. A correlation has been established between: 1) several genera of bacteria and the percentage of hemoglobin A1c  in T2DM group (negative correlation) and 2) bacteria belonging to the genus Bifidobacterium and high density lipoprotein cholesterol level in both T1DM and T2DM groups (positive correlation). CONCLUSIONS    Our results are a good reason to expand research in this field in order to develop future individualized therapy for patients with diabetes based on modifying the intestinal microbiota composition, as a new method for controlling glycemia. The NGS method allows rapid identification of the DNA of all bacteria present in the sample and their taxonomic classification.

引言科学数据表明胃肠道微生物菌群可能影响1型（T1DM）和2型（T2DM）糖尿病的发展。 16S rRNA的序列分析鉴定出几百种肠道生态系统的细菌种类，其中大部分细菌无法培养。目标我们旨在评估成人T1DM和T2DM患者肠道微生物群的组成，并建立微生物检测数据与患者临床资料之间的联系。患者和方法我们检测了三组健康志愿者（n = 23），T1DM（n = 22）和T2DM（n = 23）三组粪便样本中分离的DNA。新一代测序方法（NGS）在MiSeq平台上进行。结果在门的水平，在所有组中，厚壁菌（> 77％）肯定占上风。在分类水平L2（门）和L6（属）中，在细菌谱中显示出统计学显着性差异，特别是在T2DM组中。在T1DM和T2DM组中，1）T2DM组中细菌的几个属和血红蛋白A1c的百分比（负相关）和2）属于双歧杆菌属的细菌和高密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平（正相关）。结论我们的研究结果是扩大该领域研究的一个很好的理由，旨在开发基于修改肠道微生物群组成的糖尿病患者未来的个体化治疗，作为一种控制血糖的新方法。 NGS方法可以快速鉴定样本中存在的所有细菌的DNA及其分类分类。

Journal: . [IF=.] PMID: 29657308 PubDate: 2018-Apr-15 Authors: Salamon D, Sroka-...
110. HLA-DRB1 Shared Epitope Alleles and Disease Activity Are Correlated with Reduced T Cell Receptor Repertoire Diversity in CD4+ T Cells in Rheumatoid Arthritis.

  • Abstract_Chinese

Shared epitope (SE) alleles are the most significant genetic susceptibility locus in rheumatoid arthritis (RA); however, their target populations in CD4+ T cells are not well elucidated. We analyzed the association between SE alleles and the T cell receptor (TCR) repertoire diversity of naive and memory CD4+ T cells using next-generation sequencing (NGS).

共享表位（SE）等位基因是类风湿性关节炎（RA）中最重要的遗传易感性位点;然而，它们在CD4 + T细胞中的目标群体没有被很好地阐明。我们使用新一代测序（NGS）分析了SE等位基因与幼稚和记忆CD4 + T细胞的T细胞受体（TCR）库多样性之间的关联。

Journal: J. Rheumatol. [IF=.] PMID: 29657145 PubDate: 2018-Apr-15 Authors: Sakurai K, Ishiga...
111. Feasibility of endobronchial ultrasound transbronchial needle aspiration for massively parallel next-generation sequencing in thoracic cancer patients.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) allows for the identification of a growing number of therapeutic and prognostic molecular targets. However, NGS typically requires greater quantities of DNA than traditional molecular testing does. Endobronchial ultrasound transbronchial needle aspiration (EBUS-TBNA) is a minimally invasive procedure used to sample central thoracic lesions, but it is not well established whether this technique provides sufficient material for NGS.

新一代测序（NGS）可以识别越来越多的治疗和预后分子靶点。然而，与传统分子检测相比，NGS通常需要更多的DNA。支气管内超声经支气管针吸活检（EBUS-TBNA）是一种微创手术，用于对中央胸部病变进行取样，但尚不能确定该技术是否为NGS提供足够的材料。

  • Abstract_Chinese

我们评估了> 8500个连续的未经选择的患有癫痫和神经发育障碍的患者，这些患者接受多基因小组测试以确定分子诊断的平均年龄和70个基因的诊断产量。

113. Three-dimensional printed PLA scaffold and human gingival stem cell-derived extracellular vesicles: a new tool for bone defect repair.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The role of bone tissue engineering in the field of regenerative medicine has been a main research topic over the past few years. There has been much interest in the use of three-dimensional (3D) engineered scaffolds (PLA) complexed with human gingival mesenchymal stem cells (hGMSCs) as a new therapeutic strategy to improve bone tissue regeneration. These devices can mimic a more favorable endogenous microenvironment for cells in vivo by providing 3D substrates which are able to support cell survival, proliferation and differentiation. The present study evaluated the in vitro and in vivo capability of bone defect regeneration of 3D PLA, hGMSCs, extracellular vesicles (EVs), or polyethyleneimine (PEI)-engineered EVs (PEI-EVs) in the following experimental groups: 3D-PLA, 3D-PLA + hGMSCs, 3D-PLA + EVs, 3D-PLA + EVs + hGMSCs, 3D-PLA + PEI-EVs, 3D-PLA + PEI-EVs + hGMSCs.

骨组织工程在再生医学领域的作用一直是过去几年的主要研究课题。人们对使用与人类牙龈间充质干细胞（hGMSC）复合的三维（3D）工程支架（PLA）作为改善骨组织再生的新治疗策略一直备受关注。通过提供能够支持细胞存活，增殖和分化的3D底物，这些装置可以模拟体内细胞的更有利的内源性微环境。本研究评估了3D PLA，hGMSCs，细胞外囊泡（EVs）或聚乙烯亚胺（PEI）工程电动车（PEI-EVs）在以下实验组中的骨缺损再生的体外和体内能力：3D-PLA， 3D-PLA + hGMSC，3D-PLA + EV，3D-PLA + EV + hGMSC，3D-PLA + PEI-EV，3D-PLA + PEI-EV + hGMSC。

Journal: Stem Cell Res Ther [IF=4.211] PMID: 29653587 PubDate: 2018-Apr-13 Authors: Diomede F, Guglia... PMC5899396
114. Genetic analysis of Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease in Denmark and the implementation of a next generation sequencing platform.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease (CMT) is a heterogeneous group of hereditary polyneuropathies. Variants in more than 80 different genes have been associated with the disorder. In recent years, the introduction of next generation sequencing (NGS) techniques have completely changed the genetic diagnostic approach from the analysis of a handful of genes to the analysis of all genes associated with CMT in a single run. In this study we describe the CMT diagnostics in Denmark in 1992-2012, prior to the implementation of NGS, by combining laboratory- and national registry data. We investigate the effect of implementing a targeted NGS approach of 63 genes associated with CMT in the diagnostic laboratory setting. This was performed by analyzing a cohort of 195 samples from patients previously analyzed by Sanger sequencing and quantitative analysis for the common causes of CMT without reaching a molecular diagnosis. A total of 1442 CMT analyses were performed in Denmark in the period 1992-2012; a disease-causing variant was detected in 21.6% of the cases. Interestingly, the diagnosis was genetically confirmed in significantly more women than men; 25.9% compared to18.5%. In our study cohort, we found a 5.6% increase in the diagnostic yield with the introduction of a targeted NGS approach.

Charcot-Marie-Tooth疾病（CMT）是遗传性多发性神经病的异质性群体。超过80种不同基因的变异与疾病有关。近年来，下一代测序（NGS）技术的引入已经彻底改变了从少数基因分析到在一次运行中分析与CMT相关的所有基因的基因诊断方法。在这项研究中，我们描述了在实施NGS之前，1992 - 2012年在丹麦的CMT诊断，通过结合实验室和国家登记数据。我们调查在诊断实验室环境中实施与CMT相关的63个基因的靶向NGS方法的效果。这是通过分析来自患者的195个样品的队列进行的，所述患者以前通过Sanger测序和CMT的常见原因的定量分析进行分析，而没有达到分子诊断。 1992 - 2012年期间在丹麦进行了1442次CMT分析;在21.6％的病例中检测到致病变体。有趣的是，这一诊断在女性明显多于男性中得到了遗传学证实; 25.9％，而18.5％。在我们的研究队列中，我们发现通过引入有针对性的NGS方法，诊断率提高了5.6％。

Journal: Eur J Med Genet [IF=2.137] PMID: 29653220 PubDate: 2018-Apr-11 Authors: Vaeth S, Christen...
