117. [Ataxia with oculomotor apraxia type 4 detected by next-generation sequencing].
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Ataxias with oculomotor apraxia (AOA) belong to autosomal recessive ataxias. Their common feature is oculomotor apraxia: inability to coordinate eye movements not due to muscle weakness. Next-generation sequencing (NGS) gives unique opportunities of rare disorders diagnostics and discovering of new forms, including AOA. In 2015, AOA type 4 produced by PNKP mutations was delineated in a group of Portuguese patients. We diagnosed AOA4 in a 9-year-old boy from Byelorussian family. He presented with ataxia since 2 years and deterioration in 8 years, oculomotor apraxia, dystonic hyperkinesia, dysarthria, polyneuropathy, borderline/mildly impaired intelligence, cerebellar atrophy on MRI and moderate hypercholesterolemia. Panel NGS detected two PNKP mutations: c.1123G>T (p.Gly375Trp) common in Portuguese patients, and novel c.1270_1283dupACAAACCCAGACGC (p.Ala429fs). This is one of a few world AOA4 cases and first non-Portuguese case with 'Portuguese' common mutation. The case illustrates NGS diagnostic value, particularly in rare heterogeneous disorders like AOA.

伴有动眼神经失用症（AOA）的Ataxias属于常染色体隐性遗传性共济失调。它们的共同特征是动眼神经失用：无法协调眼肌运动，而不是由于肌肉无力。新一代测序（NGS）为罕见疾病诊断和发现新形式（包括AOA）提供了独特的机会。 2015年，由PNKP突变产生的AOA4型在一组葡萄牙患者中划定。我们从一个来自白俄罗斯家庭的9岁男孩中诊断出AOA4。 2年后出现共济失调，8年内恶化，动眼神经失用，肌张力过度运动障碍，构音障碍，多发性神经病，智力交界性/轻度智力障碍，MRI小脑萎缩和中度高胆固醇血症。 Panel NGS检测到两种PNKP突变：在葡萄牙患者中常见的c.1123G> T（p.Gly375Trp）和新的c.1270_1283dupACAAACCCAGACGC（p.Ala429fs）。这是几起世界AOA4案件之一，也是第一起非葡萄牙案件，有'葡萄牙'常见突变。该案例说明了NGS的诊断价值，特别是在罕见的异质性疾病如AOA中。

Journal: Zh Nevrol Psikhiatr Im S S Korsakova [IF=.] PMID: 29652299 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Rudenskaya GE, Su...
118. Testosterone Deficiency, Weakness, and Multimorbidity in Men.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The purposes of this study were to evaluate the association between total testosterone (TT) deficiency and weakness on multimorbidity in men. Analyses were performed to examine the prevalence of multimobidity among young, middle-aged, and older men, with and without testosterone deficiency. Multivariate logistic models were also used to determine the association between age-specific TT tertiles and multimorbidity, adjusting for key sociodemographic variables, as well as a secondary analysis adjusted for grip strength. Multimorbidity was more prevalent among men with testosterone deficiency, compared to normal TT in the entire group (36.6% vs 55.2%; p < 0.001); however, differences were only seen within young (testosterone deficiency: 36.4%; normal TT: 13.5%; p < 0.001) and older men (testosterone deficiency: 75.0%; normal TT: 61.5%; p < 0.001). Robust associations were found between the age-specific low-TT (OR: 2.87; 95%CI: 2.14-3.83) and moderate-TT (OR: 1.67; 95%CI: 1.27-2.20) tertiles (reference high-TT) and multimorbidity. Secondary analysis demonstrated that both low TT (OR: 1.82; 95%CI: 1.29-2.55) and moderate-TT (OR: 1.31; 95%CI: 1.01-1.69) were associated with multimorbidity, even after adjusting for obesity (OR: 1.75; 95%CI: 1.07-2.87) and NGS (OR: 1.21 per 0.05 unit lower NGS). Low TT and weakness in men were independently associated with multimorbidity at all ages; however, multimorbidity was more prevalent among young and older men with testosterone deficiency.

这项研究的目的是评估总睾酮（TT）缺乏与男性多发性软弱症之间的关系。进行分析以检查年轻人，中年人和老年人多动症的患病率，有无睾酮缺乏症。多变量logistic模型也用于确定年龄特异性TT三分位数与多发病率之间的关联，调整关键社会人口统计学变量，以及调整握力强度的二次分析。睾丸激素缺乏男性患者多发病率更高，与整个组中正常TT相比（36.6％vs 55.2％; p <0.001）;然而，只有年轻人（睾酮缺乏症：36.4％;正常TT：13.5％; p <0.001）和年长男性（睾酮缺乏症：75.0％;正常TT：61.5％; p <0.001）中观察到差异。年龄特异性低TT（OR：2.87; 95％CI：2.14-3.83）和中等TT（OR：1.67; 95％CI：1.27-2.20）三分位数（参考高TT）和multimorbidity。二级分析显示即使调整肥胖（OR：1.82; 95％CI：1.29-2.55）和中度TT（OR：1.31; 95％CI：1.01-1.69）也与多发性相关1.75; 95％CI：1.07-2.87）和NGS（OR：每降低0.05单位NGS为1.21）。男性低TT和无力与所有年龄段的多发病独立相关;然而，睾丸激素缺乏的青年和老年男性多发病率更高。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29651127 PubDate: 2018-Apr-12 Authors: Peterson MD, Bela... PMC5897450
119. Impact of sequencing depth on the characterization of the microbiome and resistome.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Developments in high-throughput next generation sequencing (NGS) technology have rapidly advanced the understanding of overall microbial ecology as well as occurrence and diversity of specific genes within diverse environments. In the present study, we compared the ability of varying sequencing depths to generate meaningful information about the taxonomic structure and prevalence of antimicrobial resistance genes (ARGs) in the bovine fecal microbial community. Metagenomic sequencing was conducted on eight composite fecal samples originating from four beef cattle feedlots. Metagenomic DNA was sequenced to various depths, D1, D0.5 and D0.25, with average sample read counts of 117, 59 and 26 million, respectively. A comparative analysis of the relative abundance of reads aligning to different phyla and antimicrobial classes indicated that the relative proportions of read assignments remained fairly constant regardless of depth. However, the number of reads being assigned to ARGs as well as to microbial taxa increased significantly with increasing depth. We found a depth of D0.5 was suitable to describe the microbiome and resistome of cattle fecal samples. This study helps define a balance between cost and required sequencing depth to acquire meaningful results.

高通量下一代测序（NGS）技术的发展已经迅速提高了对整体微生物生态学的理解以及不同环境中特定基因的发生和多样性。在本研究中，我们比较了不同测序深度的能力，以产生关于牛粪便微生物群落中的抗生素抗性基因（ARG）的分类结构和普遍性的有意义的信息。宏基因组测序是在来自四个肉牛饲养场的八个复合粪便样品上进行的。将宏基因组DNA测序至各种深度D1，D0.5和D0.25，平均样品读数分别为117,59和2600万。对齐不同门类和抗菌类的读数相对丰度的比较分析表明，无论深度如何，阅读任务的相对比例保持相当恒定。然而，随着深度的增加，分配给ARG以及微生物分类单元的读数显着增加。我们发现D0.5的深度适合描述牛粪便样品的微生物组和抗生物组织。这项研究有助于定义成本与所需测序深度之间的平衡，以获得有意义的结果。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29651035 PubDate: 2018-Apr-12 Authors: Zaheer R, Noyes N... PMC5897366
120. [Towards Development of Innovative Cancer Therapies - Trans-OMICS Approach].
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Comprehensive genomic and transcriptome analyses using next-generation sequencing(NGS)analysis has lead a discovery of a variety of novel driver gene mutations and new therapeutic targets for cancer patients, and has remarkably improved outcome of the patients through the development novel molecular targeting drugs. Even so, in so-called intractable or refractory cancers, those "druggable"alterations common to the diseases are rarely found due to the high diversity of the tumor. Furthermore, most of molecular target therapy is known to acquire the resistance to the drug by means of multiple factors such as up-regulation of the partially inhibited pathway, mutation of the target, activation of alternative pathways, histological translocation, and oncogene de-addiction. Understanding of intra-tumoral heterogeneity and tumor-stromal crosstalk in tumor microenvironment with consequence of biological network re-construction are also of key importance to overcome the resistance. These suggest the limitation of mono-layer OMIC approach focusing on genome and/or cancer cell alone to identify truly effective therapeutic target and biomarker. Under these circumstances,"Trans-OMICS" concept has emerged as a novel approach to clarify a global biochemical network across multiple omics layers(eg genome, transcriptome, proteome, and metabolome)directly correct with a variable phenotype by use of both multi-omic measurements and computational data integration. This approach has great potential for drug discovery and clinical implementation of omics-based cancer medicine. We introduce here the outline of technologies and analysis for Trans-OMICS approach, and review for the recent studies in oncology research with showing our recent attempt.

使用新一代测序（NGS）分析的全面基因组和转录组分析已经导致发现各种新的驱动基因突变和癌症患者的新治疗靶标，并且通过开发新的分子靶向药物显着改善了患者的结果。即使如此，在所谓的难治性或难治性癌症中，由于肿瘤的高度多样性，很少发现这些疾病常见的“可药代”改变。此外，已知大多数分子靶向疗法通过多种因素获得对药物的抗性，所述多种因素例如上调部分抑制的途径，靶标的突变，替代途径的激活，组织学易位和癌基因去沉积。了解肿瘤微环境中的肿瘤内异质性和肿瘤 - 基质串扰以及生物网络重建的结果对于克服耐药性也是至关重要的。这些表明单层OMIC方法的局限性集中在仅基因组和/或癌细胞上以确定真正有效的治疗靶标和生物标志物。在这些情况下，“跨OMICS”的概念已经出现，作为一种新颖的方法来阐明跨多个组学层（如基因组，转录组，蛋白质组和代谢组）的全球生物化学网络，通过使用多元组学测量和计算数据集成。这种方法在基于组学的癌症药物的药物发现和临床实施方面具有巨大的潜力。我们在这里介绍Trans-OMICS方法的技术和分析概要，并回顾最近在肿瘤研究方面的研究，并展示我们最近的尝试。

Journal: Gan To Kagaku Ryoho [IF=.] PMID: 29650893 PubDate: 2018-Mar Authors: Kawabata-Iwakawa ...
121. Next-Generation Sequencing of the Complete Mitochondrial Genome of the Endangered Species Black Lion Tamarin Leontopithecus chrysopygus (Primates) and Mitogenomic Phylogeny Focusing on the Callitrichidae Family.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

We describe the complete mitochondrial genome sequence of the Black Lion Tamarin, an endangered primate species endemic to the Atlantic Rainforest of Brazil. We assembled the Leontopithecuschrysopygus mitogenome, through analysis of 523M base pairs (bp) of short reads produced by next-generation sequencing (NGS) on the Illumina Platform, and investigated the presence of nuclear mitochondrial pseudogenes and heteroplasmic sites. Additionally, we conducted phylogenetic analyses using all complete mitogenomes available for primates until June 2017. The single circular mitogenome of BLT showed organization and arrangement that are typical for other vertebrate species, with a total of 16618 bp, containing 13 protein-coding genes, 22 transfer RNA genes, 2 ribosomal RNA genes, and 1 non-coding region (D-loop region). Our full phylogenetic tree is based on the most comprehensive mitogenomic dataset for Callitrichidae species to date, adding new data for the Leontopithecus genus, and discussing previous studies performed on primates. Moreover, the mitochondrial genome reported here consists of a robust mitogenome with 3000X coverage, which certainly will be useful for further phylogenetic and evolutionary analyses of Callitrichidae and higher taxa.

我们描述了黑狮蜥蜴的完整线粒体基因组序列，这是巴西大西洋热带雨林特有的濒危灵长类物种。我们通过分析在Illumina平台上由下一代测序（NGS）产生的短读数的523M碱基对（bp），并且研究核线粒体假基因和异质性位点的存在来组装Leontopithecuschrysopygus有丝分裂原。此外，我们使用灵长类动物所有完整的有丝分裂基因进行系统发育分析，直到2017年6月.BLT的单环状有丝分裂组织显示出其他脊椎动物物种典型的组织和排列，总共16618bp，含有13种蛋白质编码基因，22种转移RNA基因，2个核糖体RNA基因和1个非编码区（D环区）。我们的完整系统发育树是基于迄今为止Callitrichidae物种的最全面的有丝分裂数据集，增加了Leontopithecus属的新数据，并讨论了以前对灵长类动物进行的研究。此外，这里报道的线粒体基因组由一个3000X覆盖率的强有力的有丝分裂原组成，这对于进一步对胼rich体科和更高级的分类群进行系统发育和进化分析当然是有用的。

Journal: G3 (Bethesda) [IF=.] PMID: 29650540 PubDate: 2018-Apr-12 Authors: de Freitas PD, Me...
122. Preimplantation High Resolution HLA Sequencing Using Next Generation Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation (HSCT) is the only therapeutic option in a number of heritable hematologic disorders as well as hematologic cancers. Many parents and families fail to find an HLA-identical donor for their affected family member. In such cases, conceiving for a savior baby remains the only option especially in countries without access to national registries. By means of Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) techniques, in a single experiment on single cell products of IVF, a healthy HLA-identical embryo can be implanted in the uterus of a concerned mother. The patient can therefore benefit from cord blood stem cell transplantation along with confirming that the fetuses are not suffering from the heritable disorder. This study is an attempt to study the feasibility of Preimplantation HLA Sequencing (PHS) on single blastomeres using Next Generation Sequencing. Two couples previously undergone preimplantation genetic diagnosis (PGD) of Beta Thalassemia and their overall 10 embryos are studied and their 5 HLA loci are typed in high resolution through multiple displacement amplification (MDA) and NGS of single cells. For 88.9% of the 90 HLA alleles, conclusive HLA typing in 4 digit sets was made. HLA alleles were typed; one ambiguity in allelic group and 4 ambiguities in protein level were observed which were then unraveled by haplotype analysis. Amplification efficiency was 93.3% with an allele drop-out (ADO) rate of 22.2% (6 alleles dropped from a maximum of 27 possible ADOs). In this study, the feasibility of a new method of Preimplantation HLA Sequencing (PHS) via combining the state-of-the-art techniques used in single-cell whole genome amplification, preimplantation genetic diagnosis, and high-resolution HLA typing by Next-Generation Sequencing has been shown. This method can make preimplantation HLA sequencing a practicable technique in families desperate for a HLA-matched donor.

造血干细胞移植（HSCT）是许多遗传性血液病和血液癌的唯一治疗选择。许多父母和家人未能找到与其受感染家庭成员HLA相同的捐赠者。在这种情况下，特别是在没有国家注册机构的国家，构想拯救婴儿仍然是唯一的选择。通过下一代测序（NGS）技术，在一次关于IVF单细胞产物的实验中，可将健康的HLA相同的胚胎植入有关母亲的子宫内。因此，患者可以从脐血干细胞移植中受益，同时确认胎儿没有患遗传性疾病。本研究旨在研究使用下一代测序技术对单个卵裂球进行Preimplantation HLA测序（PHS）的可行性。研究了两对以前接受β地中海贫血植入前基因诊断（PGD）及其总共10个胚胎的研究对象，并通过多重置换扩增（MDA）和单细胞NGS以高分辨率分型了5个HLA基因座。对于90个HLA等位基因中的88.9％，在4位数组中确定了HLA分型。 HLA等位基因分型;观察等位基因组中的一个模糊性和蛋白质水平的4个模糊性，然后通过单体型分析解开这些模糊性。扩增效率为93.3％，等位基因剔除率（ADO）为22.2％（最多27个可能的ADO中有6个等位基因下降）。在这项研究中，通过结合单细胞全基因组扩增，植入前遗传学诊断和高分辨率HLA分型的先进技术，通过Next-Cell技术结合了植入前HLA测序（PHS）的新方法的可行性，生成测序已被显示。这种方法可以使植入前的HLA测序成为绝望于HLA匹配供体的家族的一种可行技术。

Journal: Biol. Blood Marrow Transplant. [IF=.] PMID: 29649618 PubDate: 2018-Apr-09 Authors: Rafati M, Akhondi...
123. Validation of CZECANCA (CZEch CAncer paNel for Clinical Application) for targeted NGS-based analysis of hereditary cancer syndromes.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Carriers of mutations in hereditary cancer predisposition genes represent a small but clinically important subgroup of oncology patients. The identification of causal germline mutations determines follow-up management, treatment options and genetic counselling in patients' families. Targeted next-generation sequencing-based analyses using cancer-specific panels in high-risk individuals have been rapidly adopted by diagnostic laboratories. While the use of diagnosis-specific panels is straightforward in typical cases, individuals with unusual phenotypes from families with overlapping criteria require multiple panel testing. Moreover, narrow gene panels are limited by our currently incomplete knowledge about possible genetic dispositions.

遗传性癌症易感基因突变的携带者代表肿瘤患者的小但临床上重要的亚群。因果种系突变的鉴定决定了患者家属的随访管理，治疗选择和遗传咨询。诊断实验室已经迅速采用了针对高风险人群使用癌症特异性组的快速有针对性的下一代基于测序的分析。虽然在典型情况下使用诊断特异性小组很简单，但具有重叠标准的家族中具有不同表型的个体需要多次小组检测。此外，由于我们目前关于可能遗传倾向的不完整知识，狭义基因小组受到限制。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29649263 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Soukupova J, Zema...
124. Simultaneous VENTANA IHC and RT-PCR testing of ALK status in Chinese non-small cell lung cancer patients and response to crizotinib.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

ALK rearrangement-advanced NSCLC patients respond to crizotinib. ALK rearrangement is currently determined with RT-PCR. VENTANA IHC is a standard method to identify ALK protein overexpression in NSCLC; however, VENTANA IHC has rarely been used to determine the response to crizotinib in Chinese patients with NSCLC and ALK overexpression. To better clarify the clinical implication of VENTANA IHC to detect ALK rearrangements, we conducted this study to analyze VENTANA IHC and RT-PCR in a large cohort of Chinese patients with NSCLC undergoing screening for ALK rearrangements.

ALK重排 - 晚期NSCLC患者对克唑替尼有反应。 ALK重排目前通过RT-PCR来确定。 VENTANA IHC是鉴定NSCLC中ALK蛋白过表达的标准方法;然而，VENTANA IHC很少用于确定中国NSCLC和ALK过表达患者对克唑替尼的反应。为了更好地阐明VENTANA IHC检测ALK重排的临床意义，我们开展了这项研究，以分析VENTANA IHC和RT-PCR在中国患有NSCLC的大型队列中进行ALK重排筛查。

Journal: J Transl Med [IF=3.786] PMID: 29642919 PubDate: 2018-Apr-11 Authors: Xu CW, Wang WX, C... PMC5896026
125. Genomic Profiling on an Unselected Solid Tumor Population Reveals a Highly Mutated Wnt/β-Catenin Pathway Associated with Oncogenic EGFR Mutations.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Oncogenic epidermal growth factor receptors (EGFRs) can recruit key effectors in diverse cellular processes to propagate oncogenic signals. Targeted and combinational therapeutic strategies have been successfully applied for treating EGFR-driven cancers. However, a main challenge in EGFR therapies is drug resistance due to mutations, oncogenic shift, alternative signaling, and other potential mechanisms. To further understand the genetic alterations associated with oncogenic EGFRs and to provide further insight into optimal and personalized therapeutic strategies, we applied a proprietary comprehensive next-generation sequencing (NGS)-based assay of 435 genes to systematically study the genomic profiles of 1565 unselected solid cancer patient samples. We found that activating EGFR mutations were predominantly detected in lung cancer, particularly in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). The mutational landscape of EGFR-driven tumors covered most key signaling pathways and biological processes. Strikingly, the Wnt/β-catenin pathway was highly mutated (48 variants detected in 46% of the EGFR-driven tumors), and its variant number topped that in the TP53/apoptosis and PI3K-AKT-mTOR pathways. Furthermore, an analysis of mutation distribution revealed a differential association pattern of gene mutations between EGFR exon 19del and EGFR L858R. Our results confirm the aggressive nature of the oncogenic EGFR-driven tumors and reassure that a combinational strategy should have advantages over an EGFR-targeted monotherapy and holds great promise for overcoming drug resistance.

致癌性表皮生长因子受体（EGFR）可以在不同的细胞过程中募集关键效应物以传播致癌信号。目标和组合治疗策略已成功应用于治疗EGFR驱动的癌症。然而，EGFR疗法中的主要挑战是由于突变，致癌转变，替代信号传导和其他潜在机制引起的耐药性。为了进一步了解与致癌EGFRs相关的基因改变，并为最佳和个性化的治疗策略提供进一步的见解，我们应用了专有的基于新一代测序（NGS）的435个基因检测系统研究了1565个未选择的固体癌症患者样品。我们发现激活EGFR突变主要在肺癌中检测到，特别是在非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）中。 EGFR驱动的肿瘤的突变景观覆盖了大多数关键的信号传导途径和生物学过程。引人注目的是，Wnt /β-连环蛋白途径高度突变（在46％的EGFR驱动的肿瘤中检测到48个变体），其变体数在TP53 /细胞凋亡和PI3K-AKT-mTOR途径中突出。此外，突变分布分析揭示了EGFR外显子19del和EGFR L858R之间基因突变的差异性关联模式。我们的研究结果证实了致癌性EGFR驱动的肿瘤的侵袭性，并确保组合策略应该比EGFR靶向的单一疗法具有优势，并且具有克服抗药性的巨大前景。

Journal: J Pers Med [IF=.] PMID: 29642553 PubDate: 2018-Apr-09 Authors: Jiang J, Protopop...
126. Monitoring of the Apple Fruit Moth: Detection of Genetic Variation and Structure Applying a Novel Multiplex Set of 19 STR Markers.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The apple fruit moth Argyresthia conjugella (Lepidoptera, Yponomeutidae) is a seed predator of rowan (Sorbus aucuparia) and is distributed in Europe and Asia. In Fennoscandia (Finland, Norway and Sweden), rowan fruit production is low every 2-4 years, and apple (Malus domestica) functions as an alternative host, resulting in economic loss in apple crops in inter-mast years. We have used Illumina MiSeq sequencing to identify a set of 19 novel tetra-nucleotide short tandem repeats (STRs) in Argyresthia conjugella. Such motifs are recommended for genetic monitoring, which may help to determine the eco-evolutionary processes acting on this pest insect. The 19 STRs were optimized and amplified into five multiplex PCR reactions. We tested individuals collected from Norway and Sweden (n = 64), and detected very high genetic variation (average 13.6 alleles, He = 0.75) compared to most other Lepidoptera species studied so far. Spatial genetic differentiation was low and gene flow was high in the test populations, although two non-spatial clusters could be detected. We conclude that this set of genetic markers may be a useful resource for population genetic monitoring of this economical important insect species.

苹果果蛾Argyresthia conjugella（鳞翅目，Yponomeutidae）是花楸（欧洲花楸）的种子捕食者，分布于欧洲和亚洲。在芬诺斯堪的亚（芬兰，挪威和瑞典），花楸果实产量每2 - 4年就会降低，而苹果（苹果）会作为替代寄主，导致蚜虫年间苹果作物的经济损失。我们使用Illumina MiSeq测序鉴定了Argyresthia conjugella中的一组19个新型四核苷酸短串联重复序列（STRs）。这种图案被推荐用于遗传监测，这可能有助于确定作用于这种害虫的生态进化过程。 19个STR被优化并扩增成5个多重PCR反应。我们测试了从挪威和瑞典（n = 64）收集的个体，并且与迄今研究的大多数其他鳞翅目物种相比，检测到非常高的遗传变异（平均13.6个等位基因，He = 0.75）。尽管可以检测到两个非空间簇，但空间遗传分化低并且测试群体中的基因流动高。我们得出这样的结论：这组遗传标记可能是这种经济重要昆虫种群的遗传监测的有用资源。

Journal: Molecules [IF=2.861] PMID: 29642498 PubDate: 2018-Apr-08 Authors: Elameen A, Eiken ...
127. New Challenges in Targeting Signaling Pathways in Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia by NGS Approaches: An Update.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The identification and study of genetic alterations involved in various signaling pathways associated with the pathogenesis of acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) and the application of recent next-generation sequencing (NGS) in the identification of these lesions not only broaden our understanding of the involvement of various genetic alterations in the pathogenesis of the disease but also identify new therapeutic targets for future clinical trials. The present review describes the main deletions, amplifications, sequence mutations, epigenetic lesions, and new structural DNA rearrangements detected by NGS in B-ALL and T-ALL and their clinical importance for therapeutic procedures. We reviewed the molecular basis of pathways including transcriptional regulation, lymphoid differentiation and development, TP53 and the cell cycle, RAS signaling, JAK/STAT, NOTCH, PI3K/AKT/mTOR, Wnt/β-catenin signaling, chromatin structure modifiers, and epigenetic regulators. The implementation of NGS strategies has enabled important mutated genes in each pathway, their associations with the genetic subtypes of ALL, and their outcomes, which will be described further. We also discuss classic and new cryptic DNA rearrangements in ALL identified by mRNA-seq strategies. Novel cooperative abnormalities in ALL could be key prognostic and/or predictive biomarkers for selecting the best frontline treatment and for developing therapies after the first relapse or refractory disease.

涉及与急性淋巴细胞白血病（ALL）的发病机理相关的各种信号传导途径的基因改变的鉴定和研究以及最近的下一代测序（NGS）在识别这些病变中的应用不仅扩大了我们对疾病发病机制中的各种遗传改变，但也为未来的临床试验确定新的治疗靶点。本综述介绍了NGS在B-ALL和T-ALL中检测到的主要缺失，扩增，序列突变，表观遗传损伤和新的结构DNA重排及其对治疗过程的临床意义。我们回顾了包括转录调控，淋巴样分化和发育，TP53和细胞周期，RAS信号，JAK / STAT，NOTCH，PI3K / AKT / mTOR，Wnt /β-连环蛋白信号传导，染色质结构修饰和表观遗传的途径的分子基础监管机构。 NGS策略的实施使每条途径中的重要突变基因，它们与ALL的遗传亚型的关联及其结果，将进一步描述。我们还讨论了通过mRNA-seq策略识别的ALL中经典和新的隐性DNA重排。 ALL中的新型协同异常可能是选择最佳前线治疗和在第一次复发或难治性疾病后开发治疗的关键预后和/或预测性生物标志物。

Journal: Cancers (Basel) [IF=.] PMID: 29642462 PubDate: 2018-Apr-07 Authors: Montaño A, Forero...
128. Pre-clinical validation of a next generation sequencing testing panel.

Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) has become a useful tool for gene mutation testing which is required for targeted therapies. The aim of this study was to validate the GeneRead QIAact Actionable Insights Tumor Panel (Qiagen) on the GeneReader System in a diagnostic laboratory setting.

129. Systematic evaluation of a targeted gene capture sequencing panel for molecular diagnosis of retinitis pigmentosa.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Inherited eye diseases are major causes of vision loss in both children and adults. Inherited eye diseases are characterized by clinical variability and pronounced genetic heterogeneity. Genetic testing may provide an accurate diagnosis for ophthalmic genetic disorders and allow gene therapy for specific diseases.

继承的眼病是儿童和成年人视力丧失的主要原因。遗传性眼病的特征是临床变异性和显着的遗传异质性。基因检测可以为眼科遗传疾病提供准确的诊断，并为特定疾病提供基因治疗。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29641573 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Huang H, Chen Y, ... PMC5894961
130. Acquired resistance to AZD9291 as an upfront treatment is dependent on ERK signaling in a preclinical model.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

AZD9291 (osimertinib) is approved for standard care in patients with EGFR T790M-positive non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) after prior EGFR TKI progression. Furthermore, AZD9291 is now being evaluated as a first-line treatment for NSCLC patients with activation EGFR mutations. Based on previous experiments, resistance to AZD9291 as a first-line treatment may also emerge. Thus, identification and understanding of resistance mechanisms to AZD9291 as a first-line treatment can help direct development of future therapies. AZD9291-resistant cells (PC9/AZDR) were established using EGFR inhibitor-naïve PC9 cells. Resistance mechanisms were analyzed using next-generation sequencing (NGS) and a proteome profiler array. Resistance to AZD9291 developed through aberrant activation of ERK signaling by an EGFR-independent mechanism. The combination of a MEK inhibitor with AZD9291 restored the sensitivity of PC9/AZDR cells in vitro and in vivo. PC9/AZDR cells also showed increased MET expression and an HRAS G13R mutation. In addition, maspin expression was higher after AZD9291 treatment in PC9/AZDR cells. Sustained ERK activation confers resistance to AZD9291 as a first-line therapy. Thus, co-targeting EGFR and MEK may be an effective strategy to overcome resistance to AZD9291.

AZD9291（osimertinib）被批准用于标准护理患EGFR T790M阳性非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）的患者，此前EGFR TKI进展。此外，AZD9291目前正被评估为EGFR突变激活的非小细胞肺癌患者的一线治疗。基于之前的实验，也可能出现对AZD9291作为一线治疗的耐药性。因此，识别和理解AZD9291作为一线治疗的耐药机制有助于直接开发未来的治疗方法。 AZD9291耐药细胞（PC9 / AZDR）建立使用EGFR抑制剂幼稚PC9细胞。使用下一代测序（NGS）和蛋白质组分析仪阵列分析抗性机制。通过EGFR非依赖性机制异常激活ERK信号而产生对AZD9291的抗性。 MEK抑制剂与AZD9291的组合在体外和体内恢复了PC9 / AZDR细胞的敏感性。 PC9 / AZDR细胞也显示MET表达增加和HRAS G13R突变。另外，在PC9 / AZDR细胞中AZD9291处理后maspin表达较高。持续的ERK激活赋予AZD9291作为一线治疗的耐药性。因此，共同定位EGFR和MEK可能是克服AZD9291耐药性的有效策略。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29641535 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Ku BM, Choi MK, S...
131. Delivery of Proapoptotic Agents in Glioma Cell Lines by TSPO Ligand-Dextran Nanogels.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Translocator protein 18-kDa (TSPO) is a versatile mitochondrial target for molecular imaging and therapy. Moreover, selective TSPO ligands have been widely investigated for diagnostic purposes and explored to target drug delivery systems directed to cancer cells overexpressing TSPO. Indeed, poly(d,l-lactic-co-glycolic acid (PLGA) polymers and nanocarriers decorated with TSPO ligands are capable of transporting TSPO ligands inside cancer cells, inducing survival inhibition in cancer cells and producing mitochondrial morphology modification. The aim of this work was to prepare nanogels (NGs) made with TSPO ligand dextran conjugates (TSPO-Dex) that are useful as potential delivery systems of two TSPO ligands as apoptotic agents. Synthesis and complete characterization of TSPO-dextran conjugates, an average molecular weights analysis, TSPO ligand release profiles, thermal behaviour and swelling studies were achieved. NG preparation, characterization and in vitro biological studies were also performed. The release of TSPO ligands released from dextran conjugates at 37 °C occurred in human serum at a faster rate than that detected in phosphate buffer. Cytotoxicity studies demonstrated that NGs produced from TSPO ligand-dextran conjugates induce survival inhibition in rat C6 glioma cell lines. Cellular uptake was also proven by fluorescence microscopy.

易位蛋白18-kDa（TSPO）是用于分子成像和治疗的多功能线粒体靶标。此外，选择性TSPO配体已经被广泛研究用于诊断目的并且探索靶向针对过表达TSPO的癌细胞的药物递送系统。实际上，用TSPO配体修饰的聚（d，l-乳酸 - 共 - 乙醇酸（PLGA）聚合物和纳米载体能够在癌细胞内运输TSPO配体，诱导癌细胞的存活抑制和产生线粒体形态修饰。工作是制备用TSPO配体葡聚糖偶联物（TSPO-Dex）制备的纳米凝胶（NGs），其可用作两种TSPO配体的潜在递送系统作为凋亡剂.TSPO-葡聚糖偶联物的合成和完整表征，平均分子量分析， TSPO配体释放曲线，热行为和肿胀的研究实现了NG的制备，表征和体外生物学研究，在37°C释放的葡聚糖缀合物释放的TSPO配体在人血清中发生的速度比检测到的更快在细胞毒性研究中证明由TSPO配体 - 葡聚糖偶联物产生的NG在r中诱导存活抑制在C6胶质瘤细胞系。荧光显微镜也证实了细胞摄取。

Journal: Int J Mol Sci [IF=3.226] PMID: 29641449 PubDate: 2018-Apr-11 Authors: Lopalco A, Cutrig...
132. Low prevalence of transmitted HIV-1 drug resistance detected by a dried blood spot (DBS)-based next-generation sequencing (NGS) method in newly diagnosed individuals in Cameroon in the years 2015-16.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

To determine the most recent prevalence, transmission patterns and risk factors of transmitted drug-resistance mutations (TDRMs) in Cameroon, we initiated a multicentre study monitoring HIV-1 drug resistance in newly HIV-1-diagnosed individuals using a novel next-generation sequencing (NGS) assay applicable to fingerprick dried blood spot (DBS) samples.

为了确定喀麦隆最近传播的耐药突变（TDRMs）的流行情况，传播模式和风险因素，我们启动了一项多中心研究，使用新一代新一代测序技术监测HIV-1新诊断个体中的HIV-1耐药性（NGS）分析适用于fingerprick干血斑（DBS）样品。

133. Clinical pharmacogenomics testing in the era of next generation sequencing: challenges and opportunities for precision medicine.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The rapid development and dramatic decrease in cost of sequencing techniques have ushered the implementation of genomic testing in patient care. Next generation DNA sequencing (NGS) techniques have been used increasingly in clinical laboratories to scan the whole or part of the human genome in order to facilitate diagnosis and/or prognostics of genetic disease. Despite many hurdles and debates, pharmacogenomics (PGx) is believed to be an area of genomic medicine where precision medicine could have immediate impact in the near future. Areas covered: This review focuses on lessons learned through early attempts of clinically implementing PGx testing; the challenges and opportunities that PGx testing brings to precision medicine in the era of NGS. Expert commentary: Replacing targeted analysis approach with NGS for PGx testing is neither technically feasible nor necessary currently due to several technical limitations and uncertainty involved in interpreting variants of uncertain significance for PGx variants. However, reporting PGx variants out of clinical whole exome or whole genome sequencing (WES/WGS) might represent additional benefits for patients who are tested by WES/WGS.

测序技术的快速发展和成本的显着降低已经引发了患者护理中基因组测试的实施。新一代DNA测序（NGS）技术越来越多地应用于临床实验室，以扫描整个或部分人类基因组以便于遗传疾病的诊断和/或预后。尽管存在许多障碍和争议，药物基因组学（PGx）被认为是精准医学在不久的将来可能产生直接影响的基因组医学领域。涵盖的领域：本评论重点在于通过临床实施PGx测试的早期尝试获得的经验教训;在NGS时代，PGx测试给精准医学带来的挑战和机遇。专家评论：使用NGS代替PGx测试的目标分析方法在技术上既不现实也不必要，因为解释PGx变体的不确定重要变体的几个技术限制和不确定性。然而，从临床整体外显子组或全基因组测序（WES / WGS）报告PGx变异体可能对WES / WGS检测的患者具有额外的益处。

Journal: Expert Rev. Mol. Diagn. [IF=.] PMID: 29634383 PubDate: 2018-Apr-23 Authors: Ji Y, Si Y, McMil...
134. Identification of A Novel Compound Heterozygous Mutation in BBS12 in An Iranian Family with Bardet-Biedl Syndrome Using Targeted Next Generation Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Bardet-Biedl syndrome (BBS) is a pleiotropic and multisystemic disorder characterized by rod-cone dystrophy, polydactyly, learning difficulties, renal abnormalities, obesity and hypogonadism. This disorder is genetically heterogeneous. Until now, a total of nineteen genes have been identified for BBS whose mutations explain more than 80% of diagnosed cases. Recently, the development of next generation sequencing (NGS) technology has accelerated mutation screening of target genes, resulting in lower cost and less time consumption. Here, we screened the most common BBS genes (BBS1-BBS13) using NGS in an Iranian family of a proposita displaying symptoms of BBS. Among the 18 mutations identified in the proposita, one (BBS12 c.56T>G and BBS12 c.1156C>T) was novel. This compound heterozygosity was confirmed by Sanger sequencing in the proposita and her parents. Although our data were presented as a case report, however, we suggest a new probable genetic mechanism other than the conventional autosomal recessive inheritance of BBS. Additionally, given that in some Iranian provinces, like Khuzestan, consanguineous marriages are common, designing mutational panels for genetic diseases is strongly recommended, especially for those with an autosomal recessive inheritance pattern.

Bardet-Biedl综合征（BBS）是一种多向性和多系统性疾病，其特征为棒状营养不良，多指，学习困难，肾脏异常，肥胖和性腺机能减退。这种疾病是遗传异质性的。到目前为止，已经鉴定了19种基因，其中BBS的突变解释了超过80％的诊断病例​​。最近，下一代测序（NGS）技术的发展加速了目标基因的突变筛选，从而降低了成本，减少了时间消耗。在这里，我们在显示BBS症状的伊朗家庭中使用NGS筛选了最常见的BBS基因（BBS1-BBS13）。在提案中发现的18个突变中，一个（BBS12 c.56T> G和BBS12 c.1156C> T）是新的。这种复合杂合性在提索塔及其父母中通过Sanger测序证实。尽管我们的数据是作为病例报告呈现的，但是，我们提出了一种新的可能的遗传机制，而不是传统的常染色体隐性遗传BBS。此外，鉴于在伊朗一些省份（如胡齐斯坦省），血缘婚姻很常见，所以强烈建议设计遗传疾病突变小组，特别是那些常染色体隐性遗传模式的人。

Journal: Cell J [IF=1.636] PMID: 29633607 PubDate: 2018-Jul Authors: Nikkhah E, Safara... PMC5893301
135. Simple and efficient germline copy number variant visualization method for the Ion AmpliSeq™ custom panel.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Recent advances in molecular genetic analysis using next-generation sequencing (NGS) have drastically accelerated the identification of disease-causing gene mutations. Most next-generation sequencing analyses of inherited diseases have mainly focused on single-nucleotide variants and short indels, although, recently, structure variations including copy number variations have come to be considered an important cause of many different diseases. However, only a limited number of tools are available for multiplex PCR-based target genome enrichment.

使用新一代测序（NGS）进行分子遗传分析的最新进展大大加速了致病基因突变的鉴定。大多数遗传疾病的新一代测序分析主要集中在单核苷酸变异和短插入缺失，尽管最近包括拷贝数变异在内的结构变异已被认为是许多不同疾病的重要原因。然而，只有有限数量的工具可用于基于多重PCR的目标基因组富集。

Journal: Mol Genet Genomic Med [IF=.] PMID: 29633566 PubDate: 2018-Apr-06 Authors: Nishio SY, Moteki...
136. Inferring the effect of genomic variation in the new era of genomics.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Accurate and detailed understanding of the effects of variants in the coding and noncoding regions of the genome is the next big challenge in the new genomic era of personalized medicine, especially to tackle newer findings of genetic and phenotypic heterogeneity of diseases. This is necessary to resolve the gene-variant-disease relationship, the pathogenic variant spectrum of genes, pathogenic variants with variable clinical consequences, and multiloci diseases. In turn, this will facilitate patient recruitment for relevant clinical trials. In this review, we describe the trends in research at the intersection of basic and clinical genomics aiming to (a) overcome molecular diagnostic challenges and increase the clinical utility of next-generation sequencing (NGS) platforms, (b) elucidate variants associated with disease, (c) determine overall genomic complexity including epistasis, complex inheritance patterns such as "synergistic heterozygosity," digenic/multigenic inheritance, modifier effect, and rare variant load. We describe the newly emerging field of integrated functional genomics, in vivo or in vitro large-scale functional approaches, statistical bioinformatics algorithms that support NGS genomics data to interpret variants for timely clinical diagnostics and disease management. Thus, facilitating the discovery of new therapeutic or biomarker options, and their roles in the future of personalized medicine.

准确和详细地了解变异体在基因组编码和非编码区域中的作用是个体化医学新基因组时代的下一个重大挑战，特别是解决遗传和表型异质性疾病的新发现。这对于解决基因 - 变异 - 疾病关系，基因的致病变异谱，具有可变临床后果的致病变体和多重病害疾病是必需的。反过来，这将有助于患者招募相关的临床试验。在这篇综述中，我们描述了旨在（a）克服分子诊断挑战并提高下一代测序（NGS）平台的临床实用性的基础和临床基因组学交叉研究的趋势，（b）阐明与疾病相关的变体，（c）确定整体基因组复杂性，包括上位性，诸如“协同杂合性”，双基因/多基因遗传，修饰物效应和稀有变异负荷的复杂遗传模式。我们描述新兴领域的综合功能基因组学，体内或体外大规模功能方法，统计生物信息学算法，支持NGS基因组学数据来解释变体，以便及时进行临床诊断和疾病管理。因此，促进发现新的治疗或生物标志物选择，以及它们在个性化医学的未来中的角色。

Journal: Hum. Mutat. [IF=.] PMID: 29633501 PubDate: 2018-Apr-06 Authors: Chakravorty S, He...
137. [Effective management of an outbreak with multiresistent Klebsiella pneumoniae in a neurorehabilitation unit].

  • Abstract_Chinese
