除了急症医院外，康复中心也越来越多地面临多重耐药病原体。长时间的停留和强化治疗带来了特殊的卫生挑战。

Journal: Bundesgesundheitsblatt Gesundheitsforschung Gesundheitsschutz [IF=.] PMID: 29633038 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Dohle C, Korr G, ...
138. ERASE-Seq: Leveraging replicate measurements to enhance ultralow frequency variant detection in NGS data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The accurate detection of ultralow allele frequency variants in DNA samples is of interest in both research and medical settings, particularly in liquid biopsies where cancer mutational status is monitored from circulating DNA. Next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies employing molecular barcoding have shown promise but significant sensitivity and specificity improvements are still needed to detect mutations in a majority of patients before the metastatic stage. To address this we present analytical validation data for ERASE-Seq (Elimination of Recurrent Artifacts and Stochastic Errors), a method for accurate and sensitive detection of ultralow frequency DNA variants in NGS data. ERASE-Seq differs from previous methods by creating a robust statistical framework to utilize technical replicates in conjunction with background error modeling, providing a 10 to 100-fold reduction in false positive rates compared to published molecular barcoding methods. ERASE-Seq was tested using spiked human DNA mixtures with clinically realistic DNA input quantities to detect SNVs and indels between 0.05% and 1% allele frequency, the range commonly found in liquid biopsy samples. Variants were detected with greater than 90% sensitivity and a false positive rate below 0.1 calls per 10,000 possible variants. The approach represents a significant performance improvement compared to molecular barcoding methods and does not require changing molecular reagents.

DNA样本中超低等位基因频率变异的准确检测在研究和医学环境中都很有意义，特别是在液体活检中，其中从循环DNA监测癌症突变状态。采用分子条形码技术的新一代测序（NGS）技术已显示出前景，但在转移阶段之前仍需要对大多数患者的突变进行显着的敏感性和特异性改进。为了解决这个问题，我们提供了ERASE-Seq（消除复发性伪影和随机错误）的分析验证数据，这是一种准确和灵敏地检测NGS数据中超低频DNA变体的方法。 ERASE-Seq与以前的方法有所不同，创建了一个强大的统计框架，利用技术重复和背景误差建模，与公布的分子条形码方法相比，假阳性率降低了10到100倍。使用具有临床现实DNA输入量的加标的人DNA混合物检测ERASE-Seq以检测SNV和插入缺失等位基因频率的0.05％至1％，这是液体活检样品中常见的范围。检测到变异的灵敏度高于90％，假阳性率低于每10,000个可能变体0.1个调用。与分子条形码方法相比，该方法表现出显着的性能改进，并且不需要改变分子试剂。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29630678 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Kamps-Hughes N, M... PMC5890993
139. Ultrasound-guided lumbar puncture with a needle-guidance system: A prospective and controlled study to evaluate the learnability and feasibility of a newly developed approach.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

To evaluate the learnability and feasibility of a new technique comprising a needle-guidance-system (NGS) for ultrasound-assisted lumbar puncture.

评估包括用于超声辅助腰椎穿刺的针引导系统（NGS）的新技术的可学性和可行性。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29630646 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Backhaus T, von C... PMC5891015
140. Multiplex PCR Targeted Amplicon Sequencing (MTA-Seq): Simple, Flexible, and Versatile SNP Genotyping by Highly Multiplexed PCR Amplicon Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies have enabled genome re-sequencing for exploring genome-wide polymorphisms among individuals, as well as targeted re-sequencing for the rapid and simultaneous detection of polymorphisms in genes associated with various biological functions. Therefore, a simple and robust method for targeted re-sequencing should facilitate genotyping in a wide range of biological fields. In this study, we developed a simple, custom, targeted re-sequencing method, designated "multiplex PCR targeted amplicon sequencing (MTA-seq)," and applied it to the genotyping of the model grass Brachypodium distachyon. To assess the practical usability of MTA-seq, we applied it to the genotyping of genome-wide single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) identified in natural accessions (Bd1-1, Bd3-1, Bd21-3, Bd30-1, Koz-1, Koz-3, and Koz-4) by comparing the re-sequencing data with that of reference accession Bd21. Examination of SNP-genotyping accuracy in 443 amplicons from eight parental accessions and an F1 progeny derived by crossing of Bd21 and Bd3-1 revealed that ~95% of the SNPs were correctly called. The assessment suggested that the method provided an efficient framework for accurate and robust SNP genotyping. The method described here enables easy design of custom target SNP-marker panels in various organisms, facilitating a wide range of high-throughput genetic applications, such as genetic mapping, population analysis, molecular breeding, and genomic diagnostics.

新一代测序（NGS）技术已经实现了基因组重测序，以探索个体间的全基因组多态性，以及有针对性的重测序，以快速同时检测与各种生物功能相关基因的多态性。因此，一种简单而强大的靶向重测序方法应该有助于在广泛的生物学领域进行基因分型。在本研究中，我们开发了一种简单的，定制的，有针对性的重测序方法，命名为“多重PCR靶向扩增测序（MTA-seq）”，并将其应用于模型草Brachypodium distachyon的基因分型。为了评估MTA-seq的实际可用性，我们将其应用于在天然种质（Bd1-1，Bd3-1，Bd21-3，Bd30-1，Koz-1）中鉴定的全基因组单核苷酸多态性（SNP） 1，Koz-3和Koz-4）通过比较重排序数据与参考登录号Bd21。从8个亲本材料和通过Bd21和Bd3-1杂交衍生的F1后代的443个扩增子中检测SNP基因分型准确性揭示约95％的SNP被正确称为。评估表明，该方法为准确和强大的SNP基因分型提供了一个有效的框架。此处描述的方法可以轻松设计各种生物体中的定制目标SNP标记板，从而促进各种高通量遗传应用，例如遗传作图，群体分析，分子育种和基因组诊断。

Journal: Front Plant Sci [IF=4.298] PMID: 29628929 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Onda Y, Takahagi ... PMC5876661
141. Targeted therapy according to next generation sequencing-based panel sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Targeted therapy against actionable gene mutations shows a significantly higher response rate as well as longer survival compared to conventional chemotherapy, and has become a standard therapy for many cancers. Recent progress in next-generation sequencing (NGS) has enabled to identify huge number of genetic aberrations. Based on sequencing results, patients recommend to undergo targeted therapy or immunotherapy. In cases where there are no available approved drugs for the genetic mutations detected in the patients, it is recommended to be facilitate the registration for the clinical trials. For that purpose, a NGS-based sequencing panel that can simultaneously target multiple genes in a single investigation has been used in daily clinical practice. To date, various types of sequencing panels have been developed to investigate genetic aberrations with tumor somatic genome variants (gain-of-function or loss-of-function mutations, high-level copy number alterations, and gene fusions) through comprehensive bioinformatics. Because sequencing panels are efficient and cost-effective, they are quickly being adopted outside the lab, in hospitals and clinics, in order to identify personal targeted therapy for individual cancer patients.

与常规化疗相比，针对可行性基因突变的靶向治疗显示出显着更高的应答率以及更长的存活率，并已成为许多癌症的标准疗法。新一代测序（NGS）方面的最新进展使得能够识别大量的遗传畸变。根据测序结果，患者推荐进行靶向治疗或免疫治疗。如果没有可用的批准药物用于检测患者的基因突变，建议为临床试验注册提供便利。为此目的，在日常临床实践中已经使用了基于NGS的测序小组，其可以在单个研究中同时靶向多个基因。迄今为止，已经开发了各种类型的测序板以通过全面的生物信息学研究与肿瘤体细胞基因组变体（功能获得或功能缺失突变，高水平拷贝数改变和基因融合）的遗传畸变。由于测序板是高效且具有成本效益的，因此它们很快在医院和诊所的实验室外被采用，以便为个体癌症患者确定个人靶向治疗。

Journal: Fukushima J Med Sci [IF=.] PMID: 29628467 PubDate: 2018-Apr-17 Authors: Saito M, Momma T,...
142. New chimeric RNAs in acute myeloid leukemia.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Background: High-throughput next generation sequencing (NGS) technologies enable the detection of biomarkers used for tumor classification, disease monitoring and cancer therapy. Whole-transcriptome analysis using RNA-seq is important, not only as a means of understanding the mechanisms responsible for complex diseases but also to efficiently identify novel genes/exons, splice isoforms, RNA editing, allele-specific mutations, differential gene expression and fusion-transcripts or chimeric RNA (chRNA). Methods: We used Crac, a tool that uses genomic locations and local coverage to classify biological events and directly infer splice and chimeric junctions within a single read. Crac's algorithm extracts transcriptional chimeric events irrespective of annotation with a high sensitivity, and CracTools was used to aggregate, annotate and filter the chRNA reads. The selected chRNA candidates were validated by real time PCR and sequencing.  In order to check the tumor specific expression of chRNA, we analyzed a publicly available dataset using a new tag search approach. Results:  We present data related to acute myeloid leukemia (AML) RNA-seq analysis. We highlight novel biological cases of chRNA, in addition to previously well characterized leukemia chRNA. We have identified and validated 17 chRNAs among 3 AML patients: 10 from an AML patient with a translocation between chromosomes 15 and 17 (AML-t(15;17), 4  from patient with normal karyotype (AML-NK) 3 from a patient with chromosomal 16 inversion (AML-inv16). The new fusion transcripts can be classified into four groups according to the exon organization. Conclusions:  All groups suggest complex but distinct synthesis mechanisms involving either collinear exons of different genes, non-collinear exons, or exons of different chromosomes. Finally, we check tumor-specific expression in a larger RNA-seq AML cohort and identify new AML biomarkers that could improve diagnosis and prognosis of AML.

背景：高通量下一代测序（NGS）技术能够检测用于肿瘤分类，疾病监测和癌症治疗的生物标志物。使用RNA-seq进行全转录组分析非常重要，不仅可作为理解导致复杂疾病的机制的手段，还可有效鉴定新基因/外显子，剪接异构体，RNA编辑，等位基因特异性突变，差异基因表达和融合 - 转录物或嵌合RNA（chRNA）。方法：我们使用Crac，一种使用基因组位置和局部覆盖的工具来分类生物事件，并在单次读取中直接推断剪接和嵌合连接。 Crac的算法提取转录嵌合事件，而不考虑高灵敏度的注释，并且CracTools用于聚集，注释和过滤chRNA读数。选择的chRNA候选物通过实时PCR和测序进行验证。为了检查chRNA的肿瘤特异性表达，我们使用新的标签搜索方法分析了公开可用的数据集。结果：我们提供有关急性髓细胞性白血病（AML）RNA-seq分析的数据。我们突出了chRNA的新型生物学病例，以及以前很好表征的白血病chRNA。我们在3名AML患者中鉴定和验证了17种chRNA：10名来自患有正常核型（AML-NK）3患者的染色体15和17之间易位的AML患者（AML-t（15; 17），4 （AML-inv16），根据外显子组织可将新融合转录物分为四组。结论：所有组均提示了复杂而独特的合成机制，涉及不同基因的共线外显子，非共线外显子，或最后，我们检查了更大的RNA-seq AML队列中的肿瘤特异性表达，并鉴定了能够改善AML的诊断和预后的新的AML生物标志物。

Journal: F1000Res [IF=.] PMID: 29623188 PubDate: 2017 Authors: Rufflé F, Audoux ... PMC5861515.2
143. NGS combined with phylogenetic analysis to detect HIV-1 dual infection in Romanian people who inject drugs.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Dual HIV infections are possible and likely in people who inject drugs (PWID). Thirty-eight newly diagnosed patients, 19 PWID and 19 heterosexually HIV infected were analyzed. V2V3 loop of HIV-1 env gene was sequenced on the NGS platform 454 GSJunior (Roche). HIV-1 dual/multiple infections were identified in five PWID. For three of these patients, the reconstructed variants belonged to pure F1 subtype and CRF14_BG strains according to phylogenetic analysis. New recombinant forms between these parental strains were identified in two PWID samples. NGS data can provide, with the help of phylogenetic analysis, important insights about the intra-host sub-population structure.

艾滋病毒双重感染是可能的，可能是注射吸毒者（PWID）。分析了38名新诊断的患者，19名PWID和19名异性HIV感染者。 HIV-1 env基因的V2V3环在NGS平台454 GSJunior（Roche）上测序。在五个PWID中确定了HIV-1双重/多重感染。根据系统发育分析，对于这些患者中的三名，重建的变体属于纯F1亚型和CRF14_BG菌株。在两个PWID样品中鉴定了这些亲本菌株之间的新重组形式。在系统发育分析的帮助下，NGS数据可以提供有关宿主内亚群结构的重要见解。

Journal: Microbes Infect. [IF=.] PMID: 29626632 PubDate: 2018-Apr-04 Authors: Popescu B, Banica...
144. The viral structure of the Cuatro Ciénegas Basin, a unique oasis in Northern Mexico, reveals a highly diverse population at a small geographic scale.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The Cuatro Ciénegas Basin (CCB) is located in the Chihuahuan desert, in the Mexican state of Coahuila; it has been characterized as a site with a biological high diversity despite its extreme oligotrophic conditions. It has the greatest number of endemic species in North America, containing abundant living microbialites (including stromatolites and microbial mats), and diverse microbial communities. With the hypothesis that this large biodiversity and the geographic structure should be reflected in the virome, the viral communities in 11 different locations of three drainage systems: Churince, La Becerra, and Pozas Rojas and in the intestinal content of 3 different fish species were analyzed, looking for both eukaryotic and prokaryotic RNA and DNA viruses, using NGS methods. dsDNA virus families were the most abundant (72.5% of reads), followed by ssDNA viruses (2.9%), and ssRNA and dsRNA virus families (0.5%). Thirteen families had dsDNA genomes, five ssDNA, three dsRNA, and sixteen had ssRNA. A highly diverse viral community was found, with an ample range of hosts and a strong geographical structure with very even distributions and signals of endemicity in the phylogenetic trees from several different virus families. The majority of viruses found were bacteriophages, but eukaryotic viruses were also frequent, and the large diversity of viruses related to algae were a surprise, since algae are not evident in the previously analyzed aquatic systems of this ecosystem. Animal viruses were also frequently found, showing the large diversity of aquatic animals in this oasis, where plants, protozoa and archaea are rare.IMPORTANCE In this study, we tested whether the large biodiversity and geographic structure of CCB is reflected in its virome. CCB is an extraordinarily biodiverse oasis in the Chihuahuan desert, where a previous virome study suggested that viruses had followed the marine ancestry of the marine bacteria and as a result of their long isolation, became endemic to the site. In this study, which includes a larger sequencing coverage and water samples from other sites within the valley, we confirmed the virus large biodiversity and uniqueness, as well as the strong biogeographical diversification of the CCB. In addition, we also analyzed fish intestinal contents, finding that each fish species eat different preys and, as a result, they present different viral compositions even if they coexist in the same pond. These facts highlight the high and novel virus diversity of CCB and its "lost world" status.

CuatroCiénegasBasin（CCB）位于墨西哥Coahuila州的Chihuahuan沙漠;尽管其具有极端的营养缺陷条件，但其已被定性为具有生物高度多样性的地点。它在北美拥有最多的特有物种，含有丰富的活微生物（包括叠层石和微生物垫）以及不同的微生物群落。在假设这种大型生物多样性和地理结构应该反映在六流域中的情况下，分析了三种排水系统的11个不同位置的病毒群落：Churince，La Becerra和Pozas Rojas以及3种不同鱼类的肠内容物使用NGS方法寻找真核和原核RNA和DNA病毒。双链DNA病毒科是最丰富的（占72.5％），其次是ssDNA病毒（2.9％），ssRNA和dsRNA病毒科（0.5％）。 13个家庭有dsDNA基因组，5个ssDNA，3个dsRNA，16个有ssRNA。发现了一个高度多样化的病毒群落，具有多种宿主和强大的地理结构，在来自几个不同病毒科的系统发生树中具有非常均匀的分布和流行信号。发现的大多数病毒都是噬菌体，但真核病毒也很常见，与藻类有关的大量病毒令人惊讶，因为在先前分析的这个生态系统的水生系统中，藻类并不明显。动物病毒也经常被发现，显示这个绿洲中的水生动物种类繁多，植物，原生动物和古生物很少。在这项研究中，我们测试了CCB的大生物多样性和地理结构是否反映在它的三维图中。 CCB是Chihuahuan沙漠中一个非常具有生物多样性的绿洲，在此之前的一项研究表明，病毒已经跟随海洋细菌的海洋血统，并且由于长时间的隔离而成为该地的特有种。在这项包括更大测序覆盖率和来自谷内其他地点的水样的研究中，我们证实了该病毒具有很大的生物多样性和独特性，以及建设银行强大的生物地理多样性。此外，我们还分析了鱼的肠内容，发现每种鱼类都吃不同的猎物，因此，即使它们共存于同一个池塘中，它们也呈现出不同的病毒组成。这些事实凸显了建行的高新病毒多样性及其“失落的世界”地位。

Journal: Appl. Environ. Microbiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29625974 PubDate: 2018-Apr-06 Authors: Taboada B, Isa P,...
145. NGS-based likelihood ratio for identifying contributors in two- and three-person DNA mixtures.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

DNA fingerprinting, also known as DNA profiling, serves as a standard procedure in forensics to identify a person by the short tandem repeat (STR) loci in their DNA. By comparing the STR loci between DNA samples, practitioners can calculate a probability of match to identity the contributors of a DNA mixture. Most existing methods are based on 13 core STR loci which were identified by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI). Analyses based on these loci of DNA mixture for forensic purposes are highly variable in procedures, and suffer from subjectivity as well as bias in complex mixture interpretation. With the emergence of next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies, the sequencing of billions of DNA molecules can be parallelized, thus greatly increasing throughput and reducing the associated costs. This allows the creation of new techniques that incorporate more loci to enable complex mixture interpretation. In this paper, we propose a computation for likelihood ratio that uses NGS (next generation sequencing) data for DNA testing on mixed samples. We have applied the method to 4480 simulated DNA mixtures, which consist of various mixture proportions of 8 unrelated whole-genome sequencing data. The results confirm the feasibility of utilizing NGS data in DNA mixture interpretations. We observed an average likelihood ratio as high as 285,978 for two-person mixtures. Using our method, all 224 identity tests for two-person mixtures and three-person mixtures were correctly identified.

DNA指纹分析，也称为DNA分析，作为法医学的标准程序，通过其DNA中的短串联重复序列（STR）位点识别人。通过比较DNA样本之间的STR位点，从业人员可以计算匹配概率以鉴定DNA混合物的贡献者。现有的大多数方法都是基于联邦调查局（FBI）确定的13个核心STR基因座。基于这些DNA混合物位点的分析以用于法医目的在程序中是高度可变的，并且在复杂的混合物解释中存在主观性和偏见。随着新一代测序（NGS）技术的出现，数十亿DNA分子的测序可以并行进行，从而大大提高吞吐量并降低相关成本。这允许创建包含更多基因座的新技术以实现复杂的混合物解释。在本文中，我们提出了使用NGS（下一代测序）数据对混合样本进行DNA测试的似然比计算。我们已将该方法应用于4480个模拟DNA混合物，其由8个不相关的全基因组测序数据的各种混合比例组成。结果证实了在DNA混合物解释中利用NGS数据的可行性。我们观察到两人混合物的平均似然比高达285,978。使用我们的方法，对双人混合物和三人混合物的所有224个身份测试都被正确识别。

Journal: Comput Biol Chem [IF=1.331] PMID: 29625871 PubDate: 2018-Mar-28 Authors: Chan Mun Wei J, Z...
146. Targeted next generation sequencing with an extended gene panel does not impact variant detection in mitochondrial diseases.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Since the advent of next generation sequencing (NGS), several studies have tried to evaluate the relevance of targeted gene panel sequencing and whole exome sequencing for molecular diagnosis of mitochondrial diseases. The comparison between these different strategies is extremely difficult. A recent study analysed a cohort of patients affected by a mitochondrial disease using a NGS approach based on a targeted gene panel including 132 genes. This strategy led to identify the causative mutations in 15.2% of cases. The number of novel genes responsible for respiratory chain deficiency increases very rapidly.

自从下一代测序（NGS）出现以来，一些研究试图评估靶向基因组测序和整个外显子组测序在分子诊断线粒体疾病中的相关性。这些不同策略之间的比较是非常困难的。最近的一项研究使用基于包括132个基因的靶向基因组的NGS方法分析了受线粒体疾病影响的一组患者。这一策略导致在15.2％的病例中找出致病突变。负责呼吸链缺陷的新基因数量增长非常迅速。

Journal: BMC Med. Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29625556 PubDate: 2018-Apr-07 Authors: Plutino M, Chauss... PMC5889585
147. Retrospective genome-wide comparisons of Salmonella enterica serovar Enteritidis from suspected outbreaks in Singapore.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The number of salmonellosis cases in Singapore has increased over the years. Salmonella enterica serovar Enteritidis has always been the most predominant serovar in the last five years. The National Public Health Laboratory assisted outbreak investigations by performing multilocus variable number tandem repeat analysis (MLVA) on isolates that were collected at the time of the investigations. Isolates were defined as belonging to a particular cluster if they had identical MLVA patterns. Whilst MLVA has been instrumental in outbreak investigations, it may not be useful when outbreaks are caused by an endemic MLVA type. In this study, we analysed 67 isolates from 12 suspected outbreaks with known epidemiological links to explore the use of next-generation sequencing (NGS) for defining outbreaks. We found that NGS can confidently group isolates into their respective outbreaks. The isolates from each suspected outbreak were closely related and differed by a maximum of 3 single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs). They were also clearly separated from isolates that belonged to different suspected outbreaks. This study provides an important insight and further evidence on the value of NGS for routine surveillance and outbreak detection of S. Enteritidis.

多年来，新加坡的沙门氏菌病病例数量有所增加。沙门氏菌肠炎血清型肠炎沙门氏菌始终是过去五年中最主要的血清型。国家公共卫生实验室通过对调查时收集的分离物进行多位点可变数量串联重复分析（MLVA）来协助疫情调查。如果分离物具有相同的MLVA模式，则将其定义为属于特定的聚类。虽然MLVA在爆发调查中起到了重要作用，但当爆发是由地方性MLVA类型引起时可能没有用处。在这项研究中，我们分析了来自12个怀疑爆发的67个分离株，并与已知的流行病学联系，以探索使用下一代测序（NGS）来确定爆发。我们发现NGS可以自信地将分离物分组到各自的暴发中。来自每个怀疑爆发的分离物密切相关，并且最多与3个单核苷酸多态性（SNP）不同。它们也清楚地与属于不同疑似爆发的分离株分开。本研究为NGS对肠炎沙门氏菌的常规监测和暴发检测提供了重要的见解和进一步的证据。

Journal: Infect. Genet. Evol. [IF=.] PMID: 29625239 PubDate: 2018-Apr-04 Authors: Octavia S, Ang ML...
148. Phylogeny, evolution and mitochondrial gene order rearrangement in scale worms (Aphroditiformia, Annelida).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) has become a powerful tool in phylogenetic and evolutionary studies. Here we applied NGS to recover two ribosomal RNA genes (18S and 28S) from 16 species and 15 mitochondrial genomes from 16 species of scale worms representing six families in the suborder Aphroditiformia (Phyllodocida, Annelida), a complex group of polychaetes characterized by the presence of dorsal elytra or scales. The phylogenetic relationship of the several groups of scale worms remains unresolved due to insufficient taxon sampling and low resolution of individual gene markers. Phylogenetic tree topology based on mitochondrial genomes is comparable with that based on concatenated sequences from two mitochondrial genes (cox1 and 16S) and two ribosomal genes (18S and 28S) genes, but has higher statistical support for several clades. Our analyses show that Aphroditiformia is monophyletic, indicating the presence of elytra is an apomorphic trait. Eulepethidae and Aphroditidae together form the sister group to all other families in this suborder, whereas Acoetidae is sister to Iphionidae. Polynoidae is monophyletic, but within this family the deep-sea subfamilies Branchinotogluminae and Macellicephalinae are paraphyletic. Mitochondrial genomes in most scale-worm families have a conserved gene order, but within Polynoidae there are two novel arrangement patterns in the deep-sea clade. Mitochondrial protein-coding genes in polynoids as a whole have evolved under strong purifying selection, but substitution rates in deep-sea species are much higher than those in shallow-water species, indicating that purifying selection is relaxed in deep-sea polynoids. There are positive selected amino acids for some mitochondrial genes of the deep-sea clade, indicating they may involve in the adaption of deep-sea polynoids. Overall, our study (1) provided more evidence for reconstruction of the phylogeny of Aphroditiformia, (2) provided evidence to refute the assumption that mitochondrial gene order in Errantia is conserved, and (3) indicated that the deep-sea extreme environment may have affected the mitochondrial genome evolution rate and gene order arrangement in Polynoidae.

新一代测序（NGS）已成为系统发育和进化研究中的一个强大工具。在这里，我们应用NGS从16个物种中恢复了两个核糖体RNA基因（18S和28S），并从16个物种代表了6个家庭的15种线粒体基因组，这些物种代表了亚纲Aphroditiformia（Phyllodocida，Annelida），一个复杂的多毛类群，背e或鳞片。由于分类单元采样不足以及单个基因标记的分辨率低，几组尺度蠕虫的系统发育关系仍未解决。基于线粒体基因组的系统发生树拓扑结构与基于来自两个线粒体基因（cox1和16S）和两个核糖体基因（18S和28S）基因的连接序列的系统发育树拓扑结构相当，但对几个进化枝具有更高的统计学支持。我们的分析表明，Aphroditiformia是单系的，表明elytra的存在是一种无融合的特征。 Eulepethidae和Aphroditidae一起构成了这个亚目的所有其他家庭的姐妹群，而Acoetidae是Iphionidae的姐妹。 Polynoidae属单系，但在这个家族内，深海亚科Branchinotogluminae和Macellicephalinae属于同系类。大多数蚯蚓家系的线粒体基因组具有保守的基因顺序，但在Polynoidae中，深海进化枝中有两种新颖的排列模式。整个多角体中的线粒体蛋白质编码基因已经在强大的纯化选择下发展，但是深海物种的替代率远高于浅水物种，这表明在深海多角体中净化选择是放松的。对于深海进化枝的一些线粒体基因，存在正选择的氨基酸，表明它们可能涉及深海多角体的适应。总体而言，我们的研究（1）为重建Aphroditiformia的系统发育提供了更多证据，（2）提供了证据来驳斥Errantia线粒体基因顺序保守的假设，并且（3）表明深海极端环境可能具有影响了Polynoidae中线粒体基因组的进化速率和基因排列顺序。

Journal: Mol. Phylogenet. Evol. [IF=.] PMID: 29625228 PubDate: 2018-Apr-03 Authors: Zhang Y, Sun J, R...
149. Characteristics of advanced methods used for typing bacterial isolates from mastitis with particular reference to Staphylococci.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Staphylococci are very common human and animal pathogens. A variety of staphylococcal virulence determinates leads to vast range of infections. One of them is mastitis which is a common disease of the mammary glands. The incidence of this disease is widespread all over the world and depends on bacterial virulence and on prevention programs. The influence of mastitis on human health is not globally evaluated, however, in veterinary fields loses in milk production caused by bovine mastitis are a constant economic problem. One of the most important parts of the mastitis control programs is accurate diagnosis of the inflammation and characterization of the etiological factors which leads to reduction of mastitis spread. Recent reports show that staphylococci are common bacterial etiological factors of mastitis, and this paper is an overview of the diagnostic typing methods used for characterization of staphylococcal isolates. A number of different techniques available to applicate is described. Phenotypic methods to identify and to differentiate isolates or discriminate virulence factors are still in use, however, some advanced genetic methods offering higher discriminatory power are reported as more accurate. In fact, nowadays the most powerful tool on that field is next generation sequencing (NGS) of the whole genome, but its high cost and requirement of special laboratory equipment makes it hard to use for routine diagnostics. That is why standard PCR techniques-based methods, and the sequencing of particular genes, are mostly used for typing bacterial isolates. Most of these techniques are characterized by a high discriminatory power, big epidemiological concordance, and repeatable results. The presented report describes the techniques used most frequent in mastitis diagnostics related to staphylococci typing and shows their advantages and disadvantages.

葡萄球菌是非常常见的人和动物病原体。各种葡萄球菌毒力决定因素导致广泛的感染。其中之一是乳腺炎，这是乳腺常见的疾病。这种疾病的发病率在全世界范围内广泛存在，并取决于细菌毒力和预防方案。乳腺炎对人类健康的影响尚未得到全球评估，但是，在兽医领域，由牛乳腺炎引起的牛奶产量损失是一个经常性的问题。乳腺炎控制项目最重要的部分之一是准确诊断导致乳腺炎扩散减少的病因因素的炎症和表征。最近的报道显示葡萄球菌是乳腺炎的常见细菌病因，本文概述了用于葡萄球菌分离物鉴定的诊断分型方法。描述了申请人可用的许多不同技术。鉴定和区分分离株或鉴别毒力因子的表型方法仍在使用中，然而，一些提供更高辨别力的先进遗传方法被报道为更准确。事实上，如今在该领域最强大的工具是全基因组的下一代测序（NGS），但其高成本和特殊实验室设备的要求使其难以用于常规诊断。这就是为什么基于标准PCR技术的方法和特定基因的测序主要用于分型细菌分离株的原因。大多数这些技术的特点是具有高度的歧视能力，流行病学的一致性和可重复的结果。本报告描述了与葡萄球菌分型相关的乳腺炎诊断中使用最频繁的技术，并展示了它们的优点和缺点。

Journal: Pol J Vet Sci [IF=0.697] PMID: 29624017 PubDate: 2018-Mar Authors: Lisowska-Łysiak K...
150. TrawlerWeb: an online de novo motif discovery tool for next-generation sequencing datasets.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

A strong focus of the post-genomic era is mining of the non-coding regulatory genome in order to unravel the function of regulatory elements that coordinate gene expression (Nat 489:57-74, 2012; Nat 507:462-70, 2014; Nat 507:455-61, 2014; Nat 518:317-30, 2015). Whole-genome approaches based on next-generation sequencing (NGS) have provided insight into the genomic location of regulatory elements throughout different cell types, organs and organisms. These technologies are now widespread and commonly used in laboratories from various fields of research. This highlights the need for fast and user-friendly software tools dedicated to extracting cis-regulatory information contained in these regulatory regions; for instance transcription factor binding site (TFBS) composition. Ideally, such tools should not require prior programming knowledge to ensure they are accessible for all users.

后基因组时代的一个重点是挖掘非编码调控基因组，以便揭示协调基因表达的调节元件的功能（Nat 489：57-74，2012; Nat 507：462-70,2014; Nat 507：455-61,2014; Nat 518：317-30,2015）。基于新一代测序（NGS）的全基因组方法已经提供了对不同细胞类型，器官和生物体中调节元件的基因组位置的了解。这些技术现在已广泛应用于各个研究领域的实验室。这突出表明需要快速和用户友好的软件工具来提取这些监管区域中包含的顺式规则信息;例如转录因子结合位点（TFBS）组成。理想情况下，这些工具不需要事先编程知识来确保它们可供所有用户访问。

Journal: BMC Genomics [IF=3.729] PMID: 29621972 PubDate: 2018-Apr-05 Authors: Dang LT, Tondl M,... PMC5887194
151. Identifying Associations between Somatic Mutations and Clinicopathologic Findings in Lung Cancer Pathology Reports.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

We aim to build an informatics methodology capable of identifying statistically significant associations between the clinical findings of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) recorded in patient pathology reports and the various clinically actionable genetic mutations identified from next-generation sequencing (NGS) of patient tumor samples.

我们的目标是构建一种信息学方法，能够识别患者病理报告中记录的非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）的临床表现与患者下一代测序（NGS）中鉴定的各种临床可行的基因突变之间的统计学显着关联肿瘤样品。

Journal: Methods Inf Med [IF=.] PMID: 29621832 PubDate: 2018-02 Authors: Kumar N, Tafe LJ,...
152. Performance comparison of three DNA extraction kits on human whole-exome data from formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded normal and tumor samples.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) studies are becoming routinely used for the detection of novel and clinically actionable DNA variants at a pangenomic scale. Such analyses are now used in the clinical practice to enable precision medicine. Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissues are still one of the most abundant source of cancer clinical specimen, unfortunately this method of preparation is known to degrade DNA and therefore compromise subsequent analysis. Some studies have reported that variant detection can be performed on FFPE samples sequenced with NGS techniques, but few or none have done an in-depth coverage analysis and compared the influence of different state-of-the-art FFPE DNA extraction kits on the quality of the variant calling. Here, we generated 42 human whole-exome sequencing data sets from fresh-frozen (FF) and FFPE samples. These samples include normal and tumor tissues from two different organs (liver and colon), that we extracted with three different FFPE extraction kits (QIAamp DNA FFPE Tissue kit and GeneRead DNA FFPE kit from Qiagen, Maxwell™ RSC DNA FFPE Kit from Promega). We determined the rate of concordance of called variants between matched FF and FFPE samples on all common variants (representing at least 86% of the total number of variants for SNVs). The concordance rate is very high between all matched FF / FFPE pairs, with equivalent values for the three kits we analyzed. On the other hand, when looking at the difference between the total number of variants in FF and FFPE, we find a significant variation for the three different FFPE DNA extraction kits. Coverage analysis shows that FFPE samples have less good indicators than FF samples, yet the coverage quality remains above accepted thresholds. We detect limited but statistically significant variations in coverage indicator values between the three FFPE extraction kits. Globally, the GeneRead and QIAamp kits have better variant calling and coverage indicators than the Maxwell kit on the samples used in this study, although this kit performs better on some indicators and has advantages in terms of practical usage. Taken together, our results confirm the potential of FFPE samples analysis for clinical genomic studies, but also indicate that the choice of a FFPE DNA extraction kit should be done with careful testing and analysis beforehand in order to maximize the accuracy of the results.

新一代测序（NGS）研究正在成为常规用于在pangenomic规模检测新型和临床可行的DNA变体。现在这种分析在临床实践中用于精确医学。福尔马林固定的石蜡包埋（FFPE）组织仍然是癌症临床标本中最丰富的来源之一，不幸的是，这种制备方法已知会降解DNA并因此影响随后的分析。一些研究报道可以在用NGS技术测序的FFPE样品上进行变异检测，但很少或没有做过深入的覆盖分析，并比较了不同的最先进的FFPE DNA提取试剂盒对质量的影响的变体调用。在这里，我们从新鲜冷冻（FF）和FFPE样品中产生了42个人类全外显子组测序数据集。这些样品包括来自两种不同器官（肝脏和结肠）的正常组织和肿瘤组织，我们用三种不同的FFPE提取试剂盒（来自Qiagen的QIAamp DNA FFPE组织试剂盒和GeneRead DNA FFPE试剂盒，来自Promega的Maxwell TM RSC DNA FFPE试剂盒）提取。我们确定了所有常见变体（相对于SNV变体总数的至少86％）匹配的FF和FFPE样本之间所称变体的一致性率。所有匹配的FF / FFPE对之间的一致率非常高，我们分析的三种试剂盒的等同值相同。另一方面，当查看FF和FFPE变体总数的差异时，我们发现三种不同的FFPE DNA提取试剂盒存在显着差异。覆盖率分析表明，FFPE样本的指标好于FF样本，但覆盖质量仍然高于公认的阈值。我们检测到三种FFPE提取试剂盒之间的覆盖率指标值存在有限但统计上显着的变化。在全球范围内，GeneRead和QIAamp试剂盒比本研究中使用的Maxwell试剂盒具有更好的变异检测和覆盖率指标，尽管此试剂盒在某些指标上表现更好，并且在实际使用方面具有优势。综上所述，我们的研究结果证实了FFPE样品分析用于临床基因组研究的潜力，但也表明FFPE DNA提取试剂盒的选择应事先进行仔细的检测和分析，以最大限度地提高结果的准确性。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29621323 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Bonnet E, Moutet ... PMC5886566
153. iCopyDAV: Integrated platform for copy number variations-Detection, annotation and visualization.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Discovery of copy number variations (CNVs), a major category of structural variations, have dramatically changed our understanding of differences between individuals and provide an alternate paradigm for the genetic basis of human diseases. CNVs include both copy gain and copy loss events and their detection genome-wide is now possible using high-throughput, low-cost next generation sequencing (NGS) methods. However, accurate detection of CNVs from NGS data is not straightforward due to non-uniform coverage of reads resulting from various systemic biases. We have developed an integrated platform, iCopyDAV, to handle some of these issues in CNV detection in whole genome NGS data. It has a modular framework comprising five major modules: data pre-treatment, segmentation, variant calling, annotation and visualization. An important feature of iCopyDAV is the functional annotation module that enables the user to identify and prioritize CNVs encompassing various functional elements, genomic features and disease-associations. Parallelization of the segmentation algorithms makes the iCopyDAV platform even accessible on a desktop. Here we show the effect of sequencing coverage, read length, bin size, data pre-treatment and segmentation approaches on accurate detection of the complete spectrum of CNVs. Performance of iCopyDAV is evaluated on both simulated data and real data for different sequencing depths. It is an open-source integrated pipeline available at https://github.com/vogetihrsh/icopydav and as Docker's image at http://bioinf.iiit.ac.in/icopydav/.

发现拷贝数变异（CNV）是结构变异的一个主要类别，已经极大地改变了我们对个体间差异的理解，并为人类疾病的遗传基础提供了另一种范式。 CNV包括拷贝增益和拷贝丢失事件，并且它们的全基因组检测现在可以使用高通量，低成本的下一代测序（NGS）方法。然而，由于各种系统性偏倚引起的阅读不均匀覆盖，从NGS数据准确检测CNV并非易事。我们已经开发了一个集成平台iCopyDAV来处理全基因组NGS数据中CNV检测中的一些问题。它有一个由五个主要模块组成的模块化框架：数据预处理，分割，变体调用，注释和可视化。 iCopyDAV的一个重要功能是功能注释模块，它使用户能够识别和区分包含各种功能元素，基因组特征和疾病关联的CNV。分割算法的并行化使得iCopyDAV平台甚至可以在桌面上访问。在这里，我们将展示测序覆盖率，阅读长度，分子大小，数据预处理和分割方法对准确检测CNV完整谱的影响。 iCopyDAV的性能在模拟数据和实际数据上针对不同的测序深度进行评估。它是一个开源的集成管道，可以在https://github.com/vogetihrsh/icopydav和Docker的图片http://bioinf.iiit.ac.in/icopydav/上找到。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29621297 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Dharanipragada P,... PMC5886540
154. Comparison of an in vitro Diagnostic Next-Generation Sequencing Assay with Sanger Sequencing for HIV-1 Genotypic Resistance Testing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The ability of next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies to detect low frequency HIV-1 drug resistance mutations (DRMs) not detected by dideoxynucleotide Sanger sequencing has potential advantages for improved patient outcomes. We compared the performance of an in vitro diagnostic (IVD) NGS assay, the Sentosa® SQ HIV Genotyping Assay for HIV-1 genotypic resistance testing, with Sanger sequencing on 138 protease/reverse transcriptase (RT) and 39 integrase sequences. The NGS assay used a five percent threshold for reporting low-frequency variants. The level of complete plus partial nucleotide concordance between Sanger and NGS was 99.9%. Among the 138 protease/RT sequences, a mean of 6.4 DRMs were identified by both Sanger and NGS, 0.5 DRMs were detected by NGS alone, and 0.1 were detected by Sanger alone. Among the 39 integrase sequences, a mean of 1.6 DRMs were detected by both Sanger and NGS and 0.15 were detected by NGS alone. Compared with Sanger sequencing, NGS estimated higher levels of drug resistance to one or more antiretroviral drugs for 18.2% of protease/RT sequences and 5.1% of integrase sequences. There was little evidence for technical artifact in the NGS sequences but G-to-A hypermutation was detected in three samples. In conclusion, the IVD NGS assay evaluated in this study was highly concordant with Sanger sequencing. At the five percent threshold for reporting minority variants, NGS appeared to attain a modest increased sensitivity for detecting low-frequency DRMs without compromising sequence accuracy.

新一代测序（NGS）技术检测未被双脱氧核苷酸Sanger测序检测到的低频HIV-1耐药突变（DRM）的能力对于改善患者结果具有潜在优势。我们比较了体外诊断（IVD）NGS检测，用于HIV-1基因型耐药性检测的Sentosa®SQ HIV基因分型检测，以及138个蛋白酶/逆转录酶（RT）和39个整合酶序列上的Sanger测序的性能。 NGS分析使用5％的阈值报告低频变异。 Sanger和NGS之间完全加上部分核苷酸一致性的水平为99.9％。在138个蛋白酶/ RT序列中，Sanger和NGS均确定了6.4个DRMs的平均值，单独NGS检测到0.5个DRMs，仅Sanger检测到0.1个DRMs。在39个整合酶序列中，Sanger和NGS均检测到平均1.6个DRM，单独NGS检测到0.15个DRM。与Sanger测序相比，NGS估计18.2％的蛋白酶/ RT序列和5.1％的整合酶序列对一种或多种抗逆转录病毒药物具有较高的耐药性水平。在NGS序列中几乎没有证据表明技术伪影，但在三个样品中检测到G到A超突变。总之，本研究中评估的IVD NGS测定与Sanger测序高度一致。在报告少数变体的百分之五阈值时，NGS似乎在不影响序列准确性的情况下检测低频DRM的敏感度略有提高。

Journal: J. Clin. Microbiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29618499 PubDate: 2018-Apr-04 Authors: Tzou PL, Ariyarat...
155. Genetic analysis of Wnt/PCP genes in neural tube defects.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Mouse homozygous mutants in Wnt/planar cell polarity (PCP) pathway genes have been shown to cause neural tube defects (NTDs) through the disruption of normal morphogenetic processes critical to neural tube closure (NTC). Knockout mice that are heterozygotes of single PCP genes likely fail to produce NTD phenotypes, yet damaging variants detected in human NTDs are almost always heterozygous, suggesting that other deleterious interacting variants are likely to be present. Nonetheless, the Wnt/PCP pathway remains a genetic hotspot. Addressing these issues is essential for understanding the genetic etiology of human NTDs.

已经显示Wnt /平面细胞极性（PCP）途径基因中的小鼠纯合突变体通过破坏对神经管闭合（NTC）关键的正常形态发生过程而导致神经管缺陷（NTD）。单基因PCP基因杂合子的敲除小鼠可能不能产生NTD表型，但在人NTD中检测到的破坏性变体几乎总是杂合的，这表明其他有害的相互作用变体可能存在。尽管如此，Wnt / PCP途径仍然是一个遗传热点。解决这些问题对于理解人类NTDs的遗传病因至关重要。

Journal: BMC Med Genomics [IF=2.848] PMID: 29618362 PubDate: 2018-Apr-04 Authors: Chen Z, Lei Y, Ca... PMC5885375
156. nQuire: a statistical framework for ploidy estimation using next generation sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Intraspecific variation in ploidy occurs in a wide range of species including pathogenic and nonpathogenic eukaryotes such as yeasts and oomycetes. Ploidy can be inferred indirectly - without measuring DNA content - from experiments using next-generation sequencing (NGS). We present nQuire, a statistical framework that distinguishes between diploids, triploids and tetraploids using NGS. The command-line tool models the distribution of base frequencies at variable sites using a Gaussian Mixture Model, and uses maximum likelihood to select the most plausible ploidy model. nQuire handles large genomes at high coverage efficiently and uses standard input file formats.

倍性的种内变异发生在各种物种中，包括致病性和非致病性真核生物如酵母和卵菌。通过使用下一代测序（NGS）的实验，可以间接推断倍性（无需测量DNA含量）。我们介绍nQuire，一种统计框架，使用NGS区分二倍体，三倍体和四倍体。命令行工具使用高斯混合模型模拟可变点处基频的分布，并使用最大似然来选择最可能的倍性模型。 nQuire能够高效处理高覆盖率的大型基因组，并使用标准输入文件格式。

Journal: BMC Bioinformatics [IF=2.448] PMID: 29618319 PubDate: 2018-Apr-04 Authors: Weiß CL, Pais M, ... PMC5885312
157. Estimation of the Genetic Substitution Rate of Hanwoo and Holstein Cattle Using Whole Genome Sequencing Data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Despite the importance of mutation rate, some difficulties exist in estimating it. Next-generation sequencing (NGS) data yields large numbers of single-nucleotide polymorphisms, which can make it feasible to estimate substitution rates. The genetic substitution rates of Hanwoo and Holstein cattle were estimated using NGS data. Our main findings was to calculate the gene's substitution rates. Through estimation of genetic substitution rates, we found: diving region of altered substitution density exists. This region may indicate a boundary between protected and unprotected genes. The protected region is mainly associated with the gene ontology terms of regulatory genes. The genes that distinguish Hanwoo from Holstein in terms of substitution rate predominantly have gene ontology terms related to blood and circulatory system. This might imply that Hanwoo and Holstein evolved with dissimilar mutation rates and processes after domestication. The difference in meat quality between Hanwoo and Holstein could originate from differential evolution of the genes related to these blood and circulatory system ontology terms.

尽管突变率的重要性，估计它存在一些困难。新一代测序（NGS）数据产生大量单核苷酸多态性，这可以使估计替代率成为可能。用NGS数据估算了韩窝和荷斯坦牛的遗传替代率。我们的主要研究结果是计算基因的替代率。通过遗传替代率的估计，我们发现存在改变替代密度的潜水区域。该区域可能表示受保护和未受保护基因之间的界限。受保护的区域主要与调控基因的基因本体术语有关。根据替代率区分Hanwoo和Holstein的基因主要有与血液和循环系统相关的基因本体术语。这可能意味着Hanwoo和Holstein在驯化后发生了不同的突变率和过程。 Hanwoo和Holstein之间的肉品质差异可能源于与这些血液和循环系统本体术语有关的基因的差异进化。

Journal: Genomics Inform [IF=.] PMID: 29618185 PubDate: 2018-Mar Authors: Lee YS, Shin D PMC5903062
158. AGORA : Organellar genome annotation from the amino acid and nucleotide references.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies have led to the accumulation of highthroughput sequence data from various organisms in biology. To apply gene annotation of organellar genomes for various organisms, more optimized tools for functional gene annotation are required. Almost all gene annotation tools are mainly focused on the chloroplast genome of land plants or the mitochondrial genome of animals.We have developed a web application AGORA for the fast, user-friendly, and improved annotations of organellar genomes. AGORA annotates genes based on a BLAST-based homology search and clustering with selected reference sequences from the NCBI database or user-defined uploaded data. AGORA can annotate the functional genes in almost all mitochondrion and plastid genomes of eukaryotes. The gene annotation of a genome with an exon-intron structure within a gene or inverted repeat region is also available. It provides information of start and end positions of each gene, BLAST results compared with the reference sequence, and visualization of gene map by OGDRAW.

新一代测序（NGS）技术已经导致来自生物体中各种生物体的高通量序列数据的积累。为了将细胞器基因组的基因注释应用于各种生物体，需要用于功能基因注释的更优化的工具。几乎所有的基因注释工具都主要集中在陆地植物的叶绿体基因组或动物的线粒体基因组。我们开发了一个网络应用程序AGORA，用于快速，方便用户和改进的细胞器基因组注释。 AGORA基于基于BLAST的同源性搜索和来自NCBI数据库的选定参考序列或用户定义的上传数据进行聚类来标注基因。 AGORA可以在真核生物的几乎所有线粒体和质体基因组中注释功能基因。在基因或反向重复区域内具有外显子 - 内含子结构的基因组的基因注释也是可用的。它提供了每个基因的起始和终止位置信息，与参考序列比较的BLAST结果以及OGDRAW可视化基因图。

Journal: Bioinformatics [IF=7.307] PMID: 29617954 PubDate: 2018-Mar-29 Authors: Jung J, Kim JI, J...
159. Characterization of two novel mycoviruses from Penicillium digitatum and the related fungicide resistance analysis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Pathogenic fungi including Penicillium digitatum and Penicillium italicum are the main destructive pathogens in the citrus industry, causing great losses during postharvest process. To our knowledge, only one mycovirus from P. digitatum has been reported, and the prevalence of such mycoviruses against citrus postharvest pathogenic fungi and their genotyping were still under investigation. In the present study, we showed that 39 of 152 Penicillium isolates from main citrus-growing areas in China were infected with various mycoviruses belonging to polymycoviruses, Narna-like viruses, and families Totiviridae, Partitivirdae and Chrysoviridae. The next generation sequencing (NGS) towards virus genome library and the following molecular analysis revealed two novel mycoviruses Penicillium digitatum polymycovirus 1 (PdPmV1) and Penicillium digitatum Narna-like virus 1 (PdNLV1), coexisting in P. digitatum strain HS-RH2. The fungicide-resistant P. digitatum strains HS-F6 and HS-E9 coinfected by PdPmV1 and PdNLV1 exhibited obvious reduction in triazole drug prochloraz resistance by mycelial growth analysis on both PDA plates and citrus fruit epidermis with given prochloraz concentration. This report at the first time characterized two novel mycoviruses from P. digitatum and revealed the mycovirus-induced reduction of fungicide resistance.

包括Penicillium digitatum和Penicillium italicum在内的病原真菌是柑橘产业的主要破坏性病原体，在采后过程中造成很大的损失。据我们所知，只有一种来自P. digitatum的真菌病毒已被报道，此类真菌病毒对柑橘采后病原真菌及其基因分型的发病率仍在调查中。在本研究中，我们发现来自中国主要柑橘生长地区的152株青霉分离株中有39株感染了多种属于多粘病毒，类Narna病毒以及Totiviridae，Partitivirdae和Chrysoviridae家族的真菌病毒。针对病毒基因组文库的下一代测序（NGS）和以下分子分析揭示了两种新型真菌病毒指状青霉多粘病毒1（PdPmV1）和指状青霉病毒Narna样病毒1（PdNLV1），共存于指状青霉菌菌株HS-RH2中。用PdPmV1和PdNLV1共同感染​​的抗真菌的P. digitatum菌株HS-F6和HS-E9通过菌丝生长分析显示在给定咪鲜胺浓度的PDA平板和柑橘果实表皮上三唑药物丙氯灵抗性显着降低。该报告首次描述了来自P. digitatum的两种新型真菌病毒，并揭示了真菌病毒引起的对杀真菌剂抗性的降低。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29615698 PubDate: 2018-Apr-03 Authors: Niu Y, Yuan Y, Ma... PMC5882929
160. Clinical and pathological characteristics of KEAP1- and NFE2L2- mutated non-small cell lung carcinoma (NSCLC).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

KEAP1 and NFE2L2 mutations are associated with impaired prognosis in many cancers and with squamous cell carcinoma formation in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). However, few is known about frequency, histology-dependence, molecular and clinical presentation as well as response to systemic treatment in NSCLC.

KEAP1和NFE2L2突变与许多癌症的预后受损以及非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）中的鳞状细胞癌形成相关。然而，关于频率，组织学依赖性，分子和临床表现以及对NSCLC系统治疗的反应知之甚少。

Journal: Clin. Cancer Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29615460 PubDate: 2018-Apr-03 Authors: Frank R, Scheffle...
161. CMS to Cover NGS Companion Diagnostics.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services recently announced that next-generation sequencing-based companion diagnostics will be covered for beneficiaries with advanced cancer. This announcement takes coverage decisions out of the hands of local contractors, providing more uniform access to such tests.

医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心最近宣布，为患有晚期癌症的受益人提供下一代基于测序的伴侣诊断。本公告将覆盖决策置于当地承包商手中，为此类测试提供更加统一的访问权限。

Journal: Cancer Discov [IF=20.011] PMID: 29615401 PubDate: 2018-May Authors:
162. Use of the Ion AmpliSeq Cancer Hotspot Panel in clinical molecular pathology laboratories for analysis of solid tumours: With emphasis on validation with relevant single molecular pathology tests and the Oncomine Focus Assay.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Targeted application of next-generation sequencing (NGS) technology allows detection of specific mutations that can provide treatment opportunities for cancer patients. We evaluated the applicability of the Ion AmpliSeq Cancer Hotspot Panel V2 (CHV2) using formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue of clinical specimens. Thirty-five FFPE tumour samples with known mutational status were collected from four different hospitals and sequenced with CHV2 using an Ion Chef System and Ion S5 XL system. Out of 35 cases, seven were sequenced with Oncomine focus Assay Panel for comparison. For the limit of detection test, we used an FFPE reference standard, a cell line that included an engineered 50% EGFR T790 M in an RKO cell line background. Coverage analysis results including number of mapped reads, on target percent, mean depth, and uniformity were not different according to hospitals. Sensitivity for mutation detection down to 3% was demonstrated. NGS results showed 100% concordance with the results from single molecular pathology tests Assay in 30 cases with 24 known positive mutations and 14 known negative mutations, and another NGS panel of the Oncomine focus in seven cases. The CHV2 NGS test for solid tumours using Ion chef system and S5 XL system in clinical molecular pathology laboratories for analysis of solid tumours could be routinely used and could replace some single molecular pathology tests after a stringent and thorough validation process.

新一代测序（NGS）技术的靶向应用可以检测出可为癌症患者提供治疗机会的特定突变。我们使用福尔马林固定的石蜡包埋（FFPE）临床标本组织评估了Ion AmpliSeq Cancer Hotspot Panel V2（CHV2）的适用性。从四家不同的医院收集了35个具有已知突变状态的FFPE肿瘤样品，并使用Ion Chef System和Ion S5 XL系统用CHV2测序。在35个病例中，7个用Oncomine重点检测小组进行测序以作比较。对于检测限的检测，我们使用了FFPE参考标准，这是一种在RKO细胞系背景中包含工程化的50％EGFR T790M的细胞系。根据医院的覆盖率分析结果，包括映射读数的数量，目标百分比，平均深度和均匀性没有差异。展示了低至3％的突变检测灵敏度。 NGS结果显示与30例24个已知阳性突变和14个已知阴性突变的单个分子病理学测试结果的100％一致性，以及另一个Oncomine聚焦7个NGS小组的结果。在临床分子病理学实验室中使用Ion chef系统和S5 XL系统进行固体肿瘤的CHV2 NGS检测可用于常规分析实体瘤，并可在经过严格和彻底的验证过程后替代某些单分子病理学检测。

Journal: Pathol. Res. Pract. [IF=.] PMID: 29615338 PubDate: 2018-Mar-29 Authors: Lee A, Lee SH, Ju...
163. Early Stage HER2-Positive Breast Cancers Not Achieving a pCR From Neoadjuvant Trastuzumab- or Pertuzumab-Based Regimens Have an Immunosuppressive Phenotype.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Stromal tumor-infiltrating lymphocytes (TILs) might predict pathologic complete response (pCR) in patients with HER2-positive (HER2+) breast cancer treated with trastuzumab (H). Docetaxel (T), carboplatin (C), H, and pertuzumab (P) have immune-modulating effects. Pre- and post-treatment immune biomarkers in cancers treated with neoadjuvant TCH with or without P are lacking. In this study we quantified baseline and changes in TILs, cluster of differentiation (CD) 4+, CD8+, FoxP3+, and PD-L1+ cells using immunohistochemistry (IHC) and quantified productive T-cell receptor β (TCRβ) rearrangements and TCRβ clonality using next-generation sequencing (NGS) in 30 HER2+ breast cancer tissues treated with neoadjuvant H with or without P regimens.

基质细胞瘤浸润淋巴细胞（TILs）可能预测曲妥珠单抗（H）治疗的HER2阳性（HER2 +）乳腺癌患者的病理完全缓解（pCR）。多西他赛（T），卡铂（C），H和帕妥珠单抗（P）具有免疫调节作用。缺乏用新辅助TCH治疗或不治疗P的癌症治疗前和治疗后的免疫生物标志物。在本研究中，我们使用免疫组织化学（IHC）和量化的生产性T细胞受体β（TCRβ）重排和TCRβ克隆来量化TIL，分化簇（CD）4+，CD8 +，FoxP3 +和PD-L1 +细胞的基线和变化新一代测序（NGS）在用新辅助治疗H或不用P方案治疗的30例HER2 +乳腺癌组织中的表达。

Journal: Clin. Breast Cancer [IF=.] PMID: 29615305 PubDate: 2018-Feb-24 Authors: Force J, Howie LJ...
164. Phylogenomics and barcoding of Panax: toward the identification of ginseng species.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The economic value of ginseng in the global medicinal plant trade is estimated to be in excess of US$2.1 billion. At the same time, the evolutionary placement of ginseng (Panax ginseng) and the complex evolutionary history of the genus is poorly understood despite several molecular phylogenetic studies. In this study, we use a full plastome phylogenomic framework to resolve relationships in Panax and to identify molecular markers for species discrimination.

据估计，全球药用植物贸易中人参的经济价值超过21亿美元。同时，尽管进行了几项分子系统发育研究，人参（Panax ginseng）的进化放置和该属的复杂进化史仍不甚了解。在这项研究中，我们使用完整的plastome phylogenomic框架来解决人参中的关系，并确定物种鉴别的分子标记。
