165. Discovery of novel transcripts of the human tissue kallikrein (KLK1) and kallikrein-related peptidase 2 (KLK2) in human cancer cells, exploiting Next-Generation Sequencing technology.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Tissue kallikrein, kallikrein-related peptidases (KLKs), and plasma kallikrein form the largest group of serine proteases in the human genome, sharing many structural and functional properties. Several KLK transcripts have been found aberrantly expressed in numerous human malignancies, confirming their prognostic or/and diagnostic values. However, the process of alternative splicing can now be studied in-depth due to the development of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS). In the present study, we used NGS to discover novel transcripts of the KLK1 and KLK2 genes, after nested touchdown PCR. Bioinformatics analysis and PCR experiments revealed a total of eleven novel KLK transcripts (two KLK1 and nine KLK2 transcripts). In addition, the expression profiles of each novel transcript were investigated with nested PCR experiments using variant-specific primers. Since KLKs are implicated in human malignancies, qualifying as potential biomarkers, the quantification of the presented novel transcripts in human samples may have clinical applications in different types of cancer.

组织激肽释放酶，激肽释放酶相关肽酶（KLKs）和血浆激肽释放酶是人类基因组中最大的一组丝氨酸蛋白酶，具有许多结构和功能特性。已经发现几种KLK转录物在许多人类恶性肿瘤中异常表达，证实了它们的预后或/和诊断价值。然而，由于下一代测序（NGS）的发展，现在可以深入研究选择性剪接的过程。在本研究中，我们使用NGS发现嵌套接触式PCR后KLK1和KLK2基因的新转录物。生物信息学分析和PCR实验共揭示了十一种新型KLK转录物（两种KLK1和九种KLK2转录物）。此外，使用变体特异性引物，使用巢式PCR实验研究每种新转录物的表达谱。由于KLK与人类恶性肿瘤相关，因此有资格成为潜在的生物标志物，所提供的人类样本中新转录物的定量可能在不同类型的癌症中具有临床应用。

Journal: Genomics [IF=2.801] PMID: 29614347 PubDate: 2018-Mar-31 Authors: Adamopoulos PG, K...
166. Equine-like G3 rotavirus strains as predominant strains among children in Indonesia in 2015-2016.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Rotavirus A (RVA) is a major cause of acute gastroenteritis in humans and animals worldwide. As a result of the segmented nature of the rotavirus genome, genetic reassortment commonly occurs. This study aims to clarify the genetic characteristics of RVAs circulating in Indonesia. From June 2015 through August 2016, stool samples were collected from 134 children aged <5 years (71 male and 63 female) with acute gastroenteritis who were inpatients at a private hospital in Surabaya, Indonesia. All stool samples were screened for RVA antigen using immunochromatography. Forty-two samples (31.3%, 42/134) were RVA antigen-positive. All RVA positive samples tested showed the unusual combinations of G3P[8] (n = 36) and G3P[6] (n = 3) with a short RNA pattern by G/P typing and polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (PAGE). Whole genome analysis by next-generation sequencing (NGS) was performed for 11 strains to determine the RVA genotypes. Eleven rotavirus strains were found to carry a DS-like genetic backbone; nine strains showed a G3-P[8]-I2-R2-C2-M2-A2-N2-T2-E2-H2 genome constellation, which was recently reported in Australia, Hungary, Spain and Brazil; as well, two strains showed a G3-P[6]-I2-R2-C2-M2-A2-N2-T2-E2-H2 genome constellation. The phylogenetic tree based on the VP7 gene showed that all 11 strains were classified as equine-like G3, which is genetically distinct and different in origin from typical human G3 strains. The phylogenetic tree based on the NSP4 gene showed that six strains were classified as bovine-like strain and the remaining five were classified as human strain. In conclusion, we identified the strains which are intergenogroup reassortants containing an equine-like G3 VP7, a P[8])/P[6] VP4, with a DS-1-like genetic backbone. These findings suggest that equine-like G3P[8] and P[6] RVA strains have been circulating in the Indonesian population for at least 1 year and probably longer, indicating a diversity of RVAs in this area.

轮状病毒A（RVA）是全球人类和动物急性胃肠炎的主要原因。由于轮状病毒基因组的分段性质，通常会发生遗传重配。本研究旨在阐明印度尼西亚流行的RVAs的遗传特征。从2015年6月至2016年8月，从印度尼西亚泗水一家私人医院住院的<134岁<5岁儿童（71男性和63女性）患有急性胃肠炎的儿童收集粪便样本。使用免疫色谱法筛选所有粪便样品的RVA抗原。 42份样本（31.3％，42/134）为RVA抗原阳性。所有RVA阳性样本通过G / P分型和聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳（PAGE）显示G3P [8]（n = 36）和G3P [6]（n = 3）具有短RNA模式的不寻常组合。对11个菌株进行通过下一代测序（NGS）进行的全基因组分析以确定RVA基因型。发现11个轮状病毒株携带DS样遗传主链;最近在澳大利亚，匈牙利，西班牙和巴西报道了9个菌株显示G3-P [8] -I2-R2-C2-M2-A2-N2-T2-E2-H2基因组星座。以及两个菌株显示出G3-P [6] -I2-R2-C2-M2-A2-N2-T2-E2-H2基因组星座。基于VP7基因的系统发育树表明，所有11个菌株均被归类为马类G3，其来源于典型的人类G3菌株，其遗传性明显不同。基于NSP4基因的系统发育树显示6个菌株被分类为牛样菌株，其余5个被分类为人类菌株。总之，我们确定了含有类似G3 VP7，P [8]）/ P [6] VP4的基因间重组株与具有DS-1样遗传骨架的菌株。这些研究结果表明马类G3P [8]和P [6] RVA菌株在印度尼西亚人群中至少流行了1年，可能更长，表明该区域有多种RVAs。

Journal: Infect. Genet. Evol. [IF=.] PMID: 29614325 PubDate: 2018-Mar-31 Authors: Utsumi T, Wahyuni...
167. Determining Genotypic Drug Resistance by Ion Semiconductor Sequencing With the Ion AmpliSeq™ TB Panel in Multidrug-Resistant Mycobacterium tuberculosis Isolates.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

We examined the feasibility of a full-length gene analysis for the drug resistance-related genes inhA, katG, rpoB, pncA, rpsL, embB, eis, and gyrA using ion semiconductor next-generation sequencing (NGS) and compared the results with those obtained from conventional phenotypic drug susceptibility testing (DST) in multidrug-resistant Mycobacterium tuberculosis (MDR-TB) isolates.

我们使用离子半导体下一代测序（NGS）研究了耐药相关基因inhA，katG，rpoB，pncA，rpsL，embB，eis和gyrA的全长基因分析的可行性，并将结果与​​那些从耐多药结核分枝杆菌（MDR-TB）分离株的常规表型药敏试验（DST）获得。

Journal: Ann Lab Med [IF=2.174] PMID: 29611381 PubDate: 2018-Jul Authors: Park J, Shin SY, ... PMC5895860
168. Principles of Genetic Counseling in the Era of Next-Generation Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Traditional genetic counseling has focused on the target gene and its natural progress with respect to disease risk. Next-generation sequencing (NGS) can produce information on several genetic variants simultaneously, with different functions and consequences for each. Accordingly, determining the status of the patient or consultant and interpreting sequencing results from many genes can largely increase the complexity of genetic counseling. Moreover, the current environment of big data that can be readily shared via the internet and a ubiquitous network provides many different avenues for which a consultant must handle the traditional principle of genetic counseling in different ways. Thus, further consideration and rethinking of genetic counseling principles are necessary in the era of NGS. In this review, we discuss several aspects of genetic counseling that one can encounter when faced with NGS data.

传统的遗传咨询专注于目标基因及其在疾病风险方面的自然发展。新一代测序（NGS）可以同时产生关于几种遗传变异的信息，对每种变异都有不同的功能和结果。因此，确定患者或顾问的状态并解释来自许多基因的测序结果可以大大增加遗传咨询的复杂性。而且，目前可通过互联网和无处不在的网络共享的大数据环境提供了许多不同的途径，顾问必须以不同的方式处理传统的遗传咨询原则。因此，在NGS时代，进一步考虑和重新思考遗传咨询原则是必要的。在这篇综述中，我们讨论了面对NGS数据时可能遇到的遗传咨询的几个方面。

Journal: Ann Lab Med [IF=2.174] PMID: 29611378 PubDate: 2018-Jul Authors: Yang M, Kim JW PMC5895857
169. Clinically actionable mutation profiles in patients with cancer identified by whole-genome sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) efforts have established catalogs of mutations relevant to cancer development. However, the clinical utility of this information remains largely unexplored. Here, we present the results of the first eight patients recruited into a clinical whole-genome sequencing (WGS) program in the United Kingdom. We performed PCR-free WGS of fresh frozen tumors and germline DNA at 75× and 30×, respectively, using the HiSeq2500 HTv4. Subtracted tumor VCFs and paired germlines were subjected to comprehensive analysis of coding and noncoding regions, integration of germline with somatically acquired variants, and global mutation signatures and pathway analyses. Results were classified into tiers and presented to a multidisciplinary tumor board. WGS results helped to clarify an uncertain histopathological diagnosis in one case, led to informed or supported prognosis in two cases, leading to de-escalation of therapy in one, and indicated potential treatments in all eight. Overall 26 different tier 1 potentially clinically actionable findings were identified using WGS compared with six SNVs/indels using routine targeted NGS. These initial results demonstrate the potential of WGS to inform future diagnosis, prognosis, and treatment choice in cancer and justify the systematic evaluation of the clinical utility of WGS in larger cohorts of patients with cancer.

新一代测序（NGS）努力已经建立了与癌症发展相关的突变目录。然而，这一信息的临床实用性仍然在很大程度上尚未探索。在这里，我们介绍了在英国招募到临床全基因组测序（WGS）项目的前八名患者的结果。我们使用HiSeq2500 HTv4分别以75×和30×进行新鲜冷冻肿瘤和生殖细胞DNA的无PCR WGS。减数肿瘤VCF和配对生殖系受到编码和非编码区域的综合分析，种系与体细胞获得变体的整合，以及全局突变特征和通路分析。结果被分为多个等级并呈现给多学科肿瘤委员会。 WGS的结果有助于澄清一例病例不确定的组织病理学诊断，导致两例患者获知或支持预后，导致治疗逐步升级，并指出所有八例中的潜在治疗。使用WGS比较了使用常规靶向NGS的6个SNV / indels总共26个不同的1级潜在临床可行性研究结果。这些初步结果证明了WGS可能为癌症的未来诊断，预后和治疗选择提供信息，并证明WGS在更大的癌症患者队列中的临床实用性的系统性评估是合理的。

Journal: Cold Spring Harb Mol Case Stud [IF=.] PMID: 29610388 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Schuh A, Dreau H,... PMC5880257
170. Optimal Fault Detection and Diagnosis in Transcriptional Circuits Using Next-Generation Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

We propose a methodology for model-based fault detection and diagnosis for stochastic Boolean dynamical systems indirectly observed through a single time series of transcriptomic measurements using Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data. The fault detection consists of an innovations filter followed by a fault certification step, and requires no knowledge about the possible system faults. The innovations filter uses the optimal Boolean state estimator, called the Boolean Kalman Filter (BKF). In the presence of knowledge about the possible system faults, we propose an additional step of fault diagnosis based on a multiple model adaptive estimation (MMAE) method consisting of a bank of BKFs running in parallel. Performance is assessed by means of false detection and misdiagnosis rates, as well as average times until correct detection and diagnosis. The efficacy of the proposed methodology is demonstrated via numerical experiments using a p53-MDM2 negative feedback loop Boolean network with stuck-at faults that model molecular events commonly found in cancer.

我们提出了一种基于模型的故障检测和诊断方法，用于通过使用下一代测序（NGS）数据的单个时间序列转录组测量间接观察的随机布尔动力系统。故障检测由创新过滤器和故障认证步骤组成，并且不需要关于可能的系统故障的知识。创新滤波器使用布尔状态最优估计器，称为布尔卡尔曼滤波器（BKF）。在存在关于可能的系统故障的知识的情况下，我们基于由并行运行的BKF库组成的多模型自适应估计（MMAE）方法提出额外的故障诊断步骤。通过错误检测和误诊率以及平均时间来评估表现，直到正确的检测和诊断。所提出的方法的功效通过使用p53-MDM2负反馈环路布尔网络的数值实验来证明，该网络具有模拟癌症中常见的分子事件的卡住故障。

Journal: IEEE/ACM Trans Comput Biol Bioinform [IF=.] PMID: 29610100 PubDate: 2018 Mar-Apr Authors: Bahadorinejad A, ...
171. Next generation sequencing assisted in establishing the diagnosis and treatment for a Chinese patient with breast and lung multiple primary malignancies.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

A case of primary lung cancer was reported, which was misdiagnosed as breast cancer metastasis to the lung based on pathology in combination with a history of breast cancer.

报道了一例原发性肺癌，根据病理结合乳腺癌病史将其误诊为乳腺癌肺转移。

Journal: J Thorac Oncol [IF=6.595] PMID: 29608968 PubDate: 2018-Mar-30 Authors: Song C, Gao Z, Zo...
172. Integrated massively parallel sequencing of 15 autosomal STRs and Amelogenin using a simplified library preparation approach.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Massively parallel sequencing (MPS) technologies, also termed as next-generation sequencing (NGS), are becoming increasingly popular in study of short tandem repeats (STR). However, current library preparation methods are usually based on ligation or two-round PCR that requires more steps, making it time-consuming (about 2 days), laborious and expensive. In this study, a 16-plex STR typing system was designed with fusion primer strategy based on the Ion Torrent S5 XL platform which could effectively resolve the above challenges for forensic DNA database-type samples (bloodstains, saliva stains, etc.). The efficiency of this system was tested in 253 Han Chinese participants. The libraries were prepared without DNA isolation and adapter ligation, and the whole process only required approximately 5 h. The proportion of thoroughly genotyped samples in which all the 16 loci were successfully genotyped was 86% (220/256). Of the samples, 99.7% showed 100% concordance between NGS-based STR typing and capillary electrophoresis (CE)-based STR typing. The inconsistency might have been caused by off-ladder alleles and mutations in primer binding sites. Overall, this panel enabled the large-scale genotyping of the DNA samples with controlled quality and quantity because it is a simple, operation-friendly process flow that saves labor, time and costs.

大规模并行测序（MPS）技术也被称为新一代测序（NGS），在研究短串联重复序列（STR）方面越来越受欢迎。然而，目前的文库制备方法通常基于连接或双轮PCR，这需要更多的步骤，使其耗时（约2天），费力且昂贵。本研究采用基于Ion Torrent S5 XL平台的融合引物策略设计了一种16重STR分型系统，可有效解决法医DNA数据库样本（血迹，唾液污渍等）面临的上述挑战。该系统的效率在253名汉族参与者中进行了测试。这些文库是在没有DNA分离和接头连接的情况下制备的，整个过程只需要约5小时。全部16个基因座成功基因分型的完全基因分型样品的比例为86％（220/256）。在样本中，99.7％显示基于NGS的STR分型与基于毛细管电泳（CE）的STR分型之间的100％一致性。不一致可能是由于梯子外等位基因和引物结合位点的突变造成的。总体而言，该专家组能够对受控质量和数量的DNA样品进行大规模基因分型，因为它是一种简单，操作友好的工艺流程，可节省人力，时间和成本。

Journal: Electrophoresis [IF=2.744] PMID: 29608791 PubDate: 2018-Apr-02 Authors: Xue J, Wu R, Pan ...
173. Exploring the Feasibility and Utility of Exome-scale Tumour Sequencing in a Clinical Setting.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Technology has progressed from single gene panel to large-scale genomic sequencing. This is raising expectations from clinicians and patients alike. The utility and performance of this technology in a clinical setting needs to be evaluated.

技术从单基因组板块发展到大规模基因组测序。这提高了临床医生和患者的期望。这种技术在临床上的实用性和性能需要进行评估。

Journal: Intern Med J [IF=1.902] PMID: 29607586 PubDate: 2018-Apr-01 Authors: Lee B, Tran B, Hs...
174. Clinical implication of MEN1 mutation in surgically resected thymic carcinoid patients.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Thymic carcinoid is a rare but very aggressive neuroendocrine tumour derived from the neuroendocrine system. Here we report a male patient with thymic atypical carcinoid. Though thymic carcinoid is relatively common, the gene sequencing profile was performed and the gene sequencing result indicated germline multiple endocrine neoplasia type 1 (MEN1) mutation and two somatic mutations on MEN1 gene and no copy number variation or fusion events were detected. It is well-known that the mutation of MEN1 is the typical manifestation of MEN1 syndrome, which is an autosome dominant disease that includes varying combinations of more than 20 endocrine and non-endocrine tumors. In the English literature, 7 cases of solitary thymic carcinoid harboring somatic variants in MEN1 are reported in the absence of other organs involvement as MEN1 syndrome presents. We summarized the clinical features and prognosis of this rare thymic tumor.

胸腺类癌是由神经内分泌系统衍生的罕见但非常侵略性的神经内分泌肿瘤。在这里，我们报告一名男性患者胸腺非典型类癌。虽然胸腺类癌相对较常见，但进行基因测序分析，基因测序结果显示MEN1基因生殖系多发性内分泌肿瘤1型（MEN1）突变和两个体细胞突变，未检测到拷贝数变异或融合事件。众所周知，MEN1突变是MEN1综合征的典型表现，MEN1综合征是一种常染色体显性疾病，包括20多种内分泌和非内分泌肿瘤的不同组合。在英国文献中，MEN1综合征中没有其他器官受累的报道，在MEN1中有7例携带体细胞变异的孤立性胸腺类癌。我们总结了这种罕见的胸腺肿瘤的临床特征和预后。

Journal: J Thorac Dis [IF=2.365] PMID: 29607201 PubDate: 2018-Feb Authors: Li X, Li M, Shi T... PMC5864637
175. Sogatella furcifera hepe-like virus: First member of a novel Hepeviridae clade identified in an insect.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

A novel virus was identified in the white-backed planthopper (Sogatella furcifera, Hemiptera: Delphacidae) and tentatively named Sogatella furcifera hepe-like virus (SfHeV). Its genome is a linear, single-stranded monopartite RNA, 7,312 nucleotides (nt) long with a 66-nt 5' UTR, 54-nt 3' UTR, and 28-nt polyA, showing typical genomic features of viruses in the family Hepeviridae, but highly divergent from known members in the family, with amino acid sequence identities of only 18.9-23% (ORF1), 13.1-18.8% (ORF2) and 1.9-11% (ORF3). Phylogenetic analysis revealed that SfHeV was closer to cutthroat trout virus (CTV), but did not cluster with any members of the family. SfHeV is the first hepe-like virus identified in a hemipteran insect and was detected in all developmental stages suggesting the presence of some level of vertical transmission. On the basis of these data, we propose that SfHeV represents a novel clade in the family Hepeviridae and tentatively name the genus Insecthepevirus.

在白背飞虱（Sogatella furcifera，半翅目：Delphacidae）中鉴定出新型病毒，并初步命名为Sogatella furcifera类疱疹病毒（SfHeV）。它的基因组是一条线性单链单组RNA，长度为7,312核苷酸（nt），含66nt nt 5'UTR，54 nt 3'UTR和28 nt polyA，显示了病毒在Hepeviridae家族中的典型基因组特征，但与家族中已知成员高度不同，氨基酸序列同一性仅为18.9-23％（ORF1），13.1-18.8％（ORF2）和1.9-11％（ORF3）。系统发育分析显示SfHeV更接近cutthroat鳟鱼病毒（CTV），但没有与任何家庭成员聚类。 SfHeV是第一个在半翅目昆虫中鉴定出的类疱疹病毒，在所有发育阶段都检测到，表明存在一定程度的垂直传播。在这些数据的基础上，我们提出SfHeV代表了一个在Hepeviridae家族中的新进化枝，并暂定名为昆虫类病毒。

Journal: Virus Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29605729 PubDate: 2018-May-02 Authors: Wu N, Zhang P, Li...
176. Long Terminal Repeat CRISPR-CAR-Coupled "Universal" T Cells Mediate Potent Anti-leukemic Effects.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Gene editing can be used to overcome allo-recognition, which otherwise limits allogeneic T cell therapies. Initial proof-of-concept applications have included generation of such "universal" T cells expressing chimeric antigen receptors (CARs) against CD19 target antigens combined with transient expression of DNA-targeting nucleases to disrupt the T cell receptor alpha constant chain (TRAC). Although relatively efficient, transgene expression and editing effects were unlinked, yields variable, and resulting T cell populations heterogeneous, complicating dosing strategies. We describe a self-inactivating lentiviral "terminal" vector platform coupling CAR expression with CRISPR/Cas9 effects through incorporation of an sgRNA element into the ΔU3 3' long terminal repeat (LTR). Following reverse transcription and duplication of the hybrid ΔU3-sgRNA, delivery of Cas9 mRNA resulted in targeted TRAC locus cleavage and allowed the enrichment of highly homogeneous (>96%) CAR+ (>99%) TCR- populations by automated magnetic separation. Molecular analyses, including NGS, WGS, and Digenome-seq, verified on-target specificity with no evidence of predicted off-target events. Robust anti-leukemic effects were demonstrated in humanized immunodeficient mice and were sustained longer than by conventional CAR+TCR+ T cells. Terminal-TRAC (TT) CAR T cells offer the possibility of a pre-manufactured, non-HLA-matched CAR cell therapy and will be evaluated in phase 1 trials against B cell malignancies shortly.

基因编辑可用于克服异体识别，否则会限制同种异体T细胞治疗。初步的概念验证应用包括产生表达针对CD19靶抗原的嵌合抗原受体（CAR）的此类“通用”T细胞以及破坏T细胞受体α恒定链（TRAC）的DNA-靶向核酸酶的瞬时表达。尽管相对有效，但转基因表达和编辑效应不连锁，产生可变性，并且导致T细胞群体异质性，使给药策略复杂化。我们描述了通过将sgRNA元件并入ΔU33'长末端重复序列（LTR）中，将CAR表达与CRISPR / Cas9效应偶联的自灭活慢病毒“末端”载体平台。在杂交ΔU3-sgRNA的逆转录和复制之后，递送Cas9 mRNA导致靶向的TRAC基因座切割并且通过自动磁分离允许高度均一（> 96％）CAR +（> 99％）TCR-群体的富集。包括NGS，WGS和Digenome-seq在内的分子分析验证了靶特异性，没有预测脱靶事件的证据。在人源化免疫缺陷小鼠中证明了强大的抗白血病作用，并且比传统CAR + TCR + T细胞持续更长时间。终端-TRAC（TT）CAR T细胞提供了预先制造的非HLA匹配的CAR细胞治疗的可能性，并将在短期内针对B细胞恶性肿瘤进行的1期临床试验中进行评估。

Journal: Mol. Ther. [IF=.] PMID: 29605708 PubDate: 2018-May-02 Authors: Georgiadis C, Pre...
177. Next generation sequencing for preimplantation genetic screening improves pregnancy outcomes compared with array comparative genomic hybridization in single thawed euploid embryo transfer cycles.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

To evaluate whether the use of next generation sequencing (NGS) for preimplantation genetic screening (PGS) in single thawed euploid embryo transfer (STEET) cycles improves pregnancy outcomes compared with array comparative genomic hybridization (aCGH).

为了评估与阵列比较基因组杂交（aCGH）相比，在单一解冻整倍体胚胎移植（STEET）周期中使用下一代测序（NGS）进行植入前基因筛选（PGS）是否改善妊娠结局。

Journal: Fertil. Steril. [IF=.] PMID: 29605407 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Friedenthal J, Ma...
178. Emberger syndrome: A rare association with hearing loss.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Emberger Syndrome (ES) is a rare genetic disorder characterized by lymphedema and myelodysplasia. It is also associated with hearing loss. The genetic mutations associated with ES are not part of the comprehensive 80 gene next generation sequencing (NGS) panel. As a result, the otolaryngologist should maintain an index of suspicion for ES in any child with SNHL who presents repeatedly with recurrent infections, lymphedema and/or cutaneous warts. This paper describes the clinical evolution and management of two children who were followed up for hearing loss and eventually were diagnosed with ES.

Emberger综合征（ES）是以淋巴水肿和骨髓发育不良为特征的罕见遗传疾病。它也与听力损失有关。与ES相关的基因突变不是全面的80基因下一代测序（NGS）小组的一部分。因此，耳鼻喉科医师应该对任何反复出现感染，淋巴水肿和/或皮肤疣的SNHL儿童保持一个怀疑ES的指标。本文介绍了随访听力丧失并最终被诊断为ES的两名儿童的临床演变和管理。

Journal: Int. J. Pediatr. Otorhinolaryngol. [IF=.] PMID: 29605372 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Zawawi F, Sokolov...
179. A novel missense mutation in GIPC3 causes sensorineural hearing loss in an Iranian family revealed by targeted next-generation sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Recent studies have confirmed the utility of targeted next-generation sequencing (NGS), providing a remarkable opportunity to find variants in known disease genes, especially in genetically heterogeneous disorders such as hearing loss (HL).

最近的研究证实了靶向下一代测序（NGS）的实用性，为发现已知疾病基因的变异体，特别是遗传异质性疾病如听力丧失（HL）提供了显着的机会。

Journal: Int. J. Pediatr. Otorhinolaryngol. [IF=.] PMID: 29605370 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Asgharzade S, Tab...
180. Utility of whole exome sequencing in the diagnosis of Usher syndrome: Report of novel compound heterozygous MYO7A mutations.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next generation sequencing (NGS), such as targeted panel sequencing, whole-exome sequencing and whole-genome sequencing has led to an exponential increase of elucidated genetic causes in both rare diseases, and common but heterogeneous disorders. NGS is applied in both research and clinical settings, and the clinical exome sequencing (CES), which provides not only the sequence variation data but also clinical interpretation, aids in reaching a final conclusion with regards to a genetic diagnosis. Usher syndrome is a group of disorders, characterized by bilateral sensorineural hearing loss, with or without vestibular dysfunction and retinitis pigmentosa. The index patient, a 2-year-old child was initially diagnosed with nonsyndromic hearing impairment. Homozygosity mapping followed by CES was utilized as a diagnostic tool to identify the genetic basis of his hearing loss. A paternally inherited novel insertion, c.198_199insA (p.Val67Serfs*73) and a maternally inherited novel deletion, c.1219_1226del (p.Phe407Aspfs*33) in gene MYO7A were found in compound heterozygous state in the index patient. The result expands the mutational spectrum of MYO7A. In addition it helped in early diagnosis of the syndrome, for planning and adjustments for the patient, and as well as for future family planning. This study highlights the clinical effectiveness of CES for Usher syndrome diagnosis in a child presented with congenital hearing loss.

新一代测序（NGS），如有针对性的小组测序，全外显子组测序和全基因组测序已导致两种罕见疾病中明确的遗传原因以及常见但异质性疾病的指数增加。 NGS适用于研究和临床环境，临床外显子组测序（CES）不仅提供序列变异数据，而且提供临床解释，有助于就基因诊断达成最终结论。 Usher综合征是一组以两侧感觉神经性听力丧失，伴或不伴前庭功能障碍和色素性视网膜炎为特征的疾病。索引患者，一名2岁儿童最初被诊断为非综合征性听力障碍。使用CES之后的纯合映射作为诊断工具来鉴定他的听力丧失的遗传基础。在基因MYO7A中发现一个父本遗传的新插入片段c.198_199insA（p.Val67Serfs * 73）和一个母本遗传的新的缺失片段c.1219_1226del（p.Phe407Aspfs * 33），该片段在复合杂合子状态中被发现。结果扩展了MYO7A的突变谱。此外，它有助于早期诊断综合征，为患者进行规划和调整，以及为未来的计划生育做出贡献。本研究强调了CES对先天性听力丧失小儿Usher综合征诊断的临床有效性。

Journal: Int. J. Pediatr. Otorhinolaryngol. [IF=.] PMID: 29605349 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Ramzan K, Al-Owai...
181. Radiotherapy-Sensitized Tumor Photothermal Ablation Using γ-Polyglutamic Acid Nanogels Loaded with Polypyrrole.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Development of versatile nanoscale platforms for cancer diagnosis and therapy is of great importance for applications in translational medicine. In this work, we present the use of γ-polyglutamic acid (γ-PGA) nanogels (NGs) to load polypyrrole (PPy) for thermal/photoacoustic (PA) imaging and radiotherapy (RT)-sensitized tumor photothermal therapy (PTT). First, a double emulsion approach was used to prepare the cystamine dihydrochloride (Cys)-cross-linked γ-PGA NGs. Next, the cross-linked NGs served as a reactor to be filled with pyrrole monomers that were subjected to in situ oxidation polymerization in the existence of Fe(III) ions. The formed uniform PPy-loaded NGs having an average diameter of 38.9 ± 8.6 nm exhibited good water-dispersibility and colloid stability. The prominent near-infrared (NIR) absorbance feature due to the loaded PPy endowed the NGs with contrast enhancement in PA imaging. The hybrid NGs possessed excellent photothermal conversion efficiency (64.7%) and stability against laser irradiation, and could be adopted for PA imaging and PTT of cancerous cells and tumor xenografts. Importantly, we also explored the cooperative PTT and X-ray radiation-mediated RT for enhanced tumor therapy. We show that PTT of tumors can be more significantly sensitized by RT using the sequence of laser irradiation followed by X-ray radiation as compared to using the reverse sequence. Our study suggests a promising theranostic platform of hybrid NGs that may be potentially utilized for PA imaging and combination therapy of different types of tumors.

用于癌症诊断和治疗的多功能纳米级平台的开发对于转化医学中的应用非常重要。在这项工作中，我们提出使用γ-聚谷氨酸（γ-PGA）纳米凝胶（NGs）加载聚吡咯（PPy）进行热/光声（PA）成像和放疗（RT） - 敏化肿瘤光热疗法（PTT）。首先，使用双重乳液方法来制备胱胺二盐酸盐（Cys） - 交联的γ-PGA NGs。接下来，交联的NG用作填充吡咯单体的反应器，所述吡咯单体在存在Fe（III）离子的情况下进行原位氧化聚合。平均直径为38.9±8.6nm的均匀形成PPy的NGs表现出良好的水分散性和胶体稳定性。由于加载PPy，突出的近红外（NIR）吸收特征赋予NG在PA成像中对比度增强。杂合NGs具有优良的光热转换效率（64.7％）和对激光照射的稳定性，可用于癌细胞和肿瘤异种移植物的PA成像和PTT。重要的是，我们还探索了用于增强肿瘤治疗的合作PTT和X射线辐射介导的RT。我们表明，与使用相反序列相比，使用激光照射然后是X射线照射的序列，可以通过RT对肿瘤的PTT进行更显着的敏化。我们的研究表明一种有希望的混合NGs的分析平台，其可能用于PA成像和不同类型的肿瘤的组合治疗。

Journal: Biomacromolecules [IF=5.246] PMID: 29601720 PubDate: 2018-Apr-06 Authors: Zhou Y, Hu Y, Sun...
182. USP8 Mutations in Pituitary Cushing Adenomas-Targeted Analysis by Next-Generation Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Gain-of-function somatic mutations in the ubiquitin specific protease 8 (USP8) gene have recently been reported as a cause of pituitary adenomas in Cushing disease. Molecular diagnostic testing of tumor tissue may aid in the diagnosis of specimens obtained through therapeutic transsphenoidal surgery; however, for small tumors, availability of fresh tissue is limited, and contamination with normal tissue is frequent. We performed molecular testing of DNA isolated from single formalin-fixed and paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections of 42 pituitary adenomas from patients with Cushing disease (27 female patients and 15 male patients; mean age at surgery, 42.5 years; mean tumor size, 12.2 mm). By Sanger sequencing, we identified previously reported USP8 missense mutations in six tumors. Targeted next-generation sequencing (NGS) revealed known or previously undescribed missense mutations in three additional tumors (two with two different mutations each), with mutant allele frequencies as low as 3%. Of the nine tumors with USP8 mutations (mutation frequency, 21.4%), seven were from female patients (mutation frequency, 25.9%), and two were from male patients (mutation frequency, 13.3%). Mutant tumors were on average 11.4 mm in size, and patients with mutations were on average 43.9 years of age. The overall USP8 mutation frequency in our cohort was lower than in previously described cohorts, and we did not observe USP8 deletions that were frequent in other cohorts. We demonstrate that testing for USP8 variants can be performed from small amounts of FFPE tissue. NGS showed higher sensitivity for USP8 mutation detection than did Sanger sequencing. Assessment for USP8 mutations may complement histopathological diagnosis.

最近已报道泛素特异性蛋白酶8（USP8）基因中的功能增益体细胞突变是库欣病中垂体腺瘤的原因。肿瘤组织的分子诊断检测可能有助于通过治疗性蝶窦手术获得的标本的诊断;然而，对于小肿瘤，新鲜组织的可用性是有限的，并且正常组织的污染频繁。我们对来自库欣病患者的42个垂体腺瘤的单个福尔马林固定和石蜡包埋（FFPE）组织切片分离的DNA进行了分子检测（27名女性患者和15名男性患者;平均手术年龄42.5岁;平均肿瘤大小，12.2毫米）。通过Sanger测序，我们确定了先前报道的6个肿瘤中的USP8错义突变。靶向的新一代测序（NGS）揭示了三个额外肿瘤中的已知或先前未描述的错义突变（两个各有两个不同的突变），突变等位基因频率低至3％。 USP8基因突变9例（突变频率21.4％）中，女性患者7例（突变频率25.9％），男性患者2例（突变频率13.3％）。突变肿瘤的平均大小为11.4mm，突变患者的平均年龄为43.9岁。 USP8突变频率在我们的队列中低于先前描述的队列，并且我们没有观察到在其他队列中频繁出现的USP8缺失。我们证明可以从少量的FFPE组织进行USP8变体的测试。与Sanger测序相比，NGS对USP8突变检测的敏感性更高。对USP8突变的评估可以补充组织病理学诊断。

Journal: J Endocr Soc [IF=.] PMID: 29600293 PubDate: 2018-Mar-01 Authors: Ballmann C, Thiel... PMC5838826
183. Molecular dissection of engraftment in a xenograft model of myelodysplastic syndromes.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Myelodysplastic syndromes (MDS) are oligoclonal disorders of the hematopoietic stem cells (HSC). Recurrent gene mutations are involved in the MDS physiopathology along with the medullar microenvironment. To better study the heterogeneity of MDS, it is necessary to create patient derived xenograft (PDX). We have reproduced a PDX model by xenografting HSC (CD34+) and mesenchymal stromal cells (MSC) in NOD/SCID/IL2rγ-/- mice with primary samples from one RAEB2, two RAEB1 and one RARS patients harboring karyotype abnormalities and gene mutations. The average human chimerisms ranged from 59.7% to 0.0175% for the 4 patients. Secondary grafts (G2) were only performed for mice derived from the RAEB2 patient and the average human chimerism was 53.33%. G1 mice 1 and 2, and their derived G2 mice showed less than 20% of medullar blasts whereas mouse 3 and the resulting G2 mice transformed to AML. Clonal architecture was dissected in the different hematopoietic progenitors (HP) harvested from G1 and G2 mice. By direct Sanger sequencing, we found the 4 initial mutations in each HP subpopulation and those mutations had the same variant allele frequency in the CD34+ CD38- HSC from G1 and G2 mice by next generation sequencing (NGS). Targeted NGS analysis done in HSC of mouse 3 did not show any additional driver gene mutations explaining the transformation to AML. To conclude, we have generated a PDX mouse model that perfectly reproduces the MDS founder clone which is stable over time, allowing us to consider this system as a powerful tool to test therapeutic approaches.

骨髓增生异常综合征（MDS）是造血干细胞（HSC）的寡克隆疾病。复发性基因突变与髓质微环境一起参与MDS病理生理学。为了更好地研究MDS的异质性，有必要创建患者衍生的异种移植物（PDX）。从一个RAEB2，二RAEB1和一个RARS患者窝藏核型异常和基因突变小鼠初级样品 - / - ，我们通过在NOD / SCID /IL2rγ异种移植HSC（CD34 +）和间充质基质细胞（MSC）再现的PDX模型。 4名患者的平均人嵌合体范围从59.7％至0.0175％。次要移植物（G2）仅对来自RAEB2患者的小鼠进行，并且平均人嵌合体为53.33％。 G1小鼠1和2及其衍生的G2小鼠显示小于20％的髓质原始细胞，而小鼠3和所得的G2小鼠转化为AML。在从G1和G2小鼠收获的不同造血祖细胞（HP）中解剖克隆结构。通过直接Sanger测序，我们发现每个HP亚群中有4个起始突变，并且这些突变通过下一代测序（NGS）在来自G1和G2小鼠的CD34 + CD38-HSC中具有相同的变异等位基因频率。在小鼠3的HSC中进行的靶向NGS分析没有显示解释向AML转化的任何额外驱动基因突变。总之，我们已经生成了一个PDX鼠标模型，可以完美再现MDS创始人克隆，这种克隆随着时间的推移是稳定的，这使我们可以将此系统视为测试治疗方法的强大工具。

Journal: Oncotarget [IF=5.168] PMID: 29599920 PubDate: 2018-Mar-13 Authors: Meunier M, Dussia... PMC5871091
184. Genome-wide analysis of replication timing by next-generation sequencing with E/L Repli-seq.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

This protocol is an extension to: Nat. Protoc. 6, 870-895 (2014); doi:10.1038/nprot.2011.328; published online 02 June 2011Cycling cells duplicate their DNA content during S phase, following a defined program called replication timing (RT). Early- and late-replicating regions differ in terms of mutation rates, transcriptional activity, chromatin marks and subnuclear position. Moreover, RT is regulated during development and is altered in diseases. Here, we describe E/L Repli-seq, an extension of our Repli-chip protocol. E/L Repli-seq is a rapid, robust and relatively inexpensive protocol for analyzing RT by next-generation sequencing (NGS), allowing genome-wide assessment of how cellular processes are linked to RT. Briefly, cells are pulse-labeled with BrdU, and early and late S-phase fractions are sorted by flow cytometry. Labeled nascent DNA is immunoprecipitated from both fractions and sequenced. Data processing leads to a single bedGraph file containing the ratio of nascent DNA from early versus late S-phase fractions. The results are comparable to those of Repli-chip, with the additional benefits of genome-wide sequence information and an increased dynamic range. We also provide computational pipelines for downstream analyses, for parsing phased genomes using single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) to analyze RT allelic asynchrony, and for direct comparison to Repli-chip data. This protocol can be performed in up to 3 d before sequencing, and requires basic cellular and molecular biology skills, as well as a basic understanding of Unix and R.

该协议是对以下内容的扩展：Nat。 Protoc。 6，870-895（2014）; DOI：10.1038 / nprot.2011.328;在线发表于2011年6月02日在S期，循环细胞复制其DNA含量，遵循一个称为复制时间（RT）的定义程序。早期和晚期复制区域在突变率，转录活性，染色质标记和亚核位置方面不同。此外，RT在发育过程中受到调节，并在疾病中发生改变。在这里，我们描述了E / L Repli-seq，它是我们Repli芯片协议的扩展。 E / L Repli-seq是一种快速，稳健且相对廉价的用于通过下一代测序（NGS）分析RT的协议，允许全基因组评估细胞过程如何与RT相关联。简而言之，用BrdU脉冲标记细胞，并通过流式细胞术分选早期和晚期S期部分。从两个部分免疫沉淀标记的新生DNA并测序。数据处理导致一个bedGraph文件包含早期和晚期S期组分的新生DNA比例。结果与Repli-chip的结果相当，具有全基因组序列信息和增加的动态范围的额外好处。我们还提供用于下游分析的计算流水线，用于使用单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）分析定相基因组以分析RT等位基因异步性，并且直接与Repli-chip数据进行比较。这个协议可以在测序前3天内完成，需要基本的细胞和分子生物学技能，以及对Unix和R的基本了解。

Journal: Nat Protoc [IF=10.032] PMID: 29599440 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Marchal C, Sasaki...
185. Clinical utility of cell-free DNA for the detection of ALK fusions and genomic mechanisms of ALK inhibitor resistance in non-small cell lung cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) whose tumors harbor anaplastic lymphoma kinase ALK gene fusions benefit from treatment with ALK inhibitors (ALKi). Analysis of cell-free circulating tumor DNA (cfDNA) may provide a non-invasive way to identify ALK fusions and actionable resistance mechanisms without biopsy.

患有晚期非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）的患有间变性淋巴瘤激酶ALK基因融合的肿瘤受益于ALK抑制剂（ALKi）的治疗。无细胞循环肿瘤DNA（cfDNA）分析可能提供了一种无创方法来鉴定ALK融合和无需活检的可行性耐药机制。

Journal: Clin. Cancer Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29599410 PubDate: 2018-Mar-29 Authors: McCoach CE, Blake...
186. Machine-learned analysis of the association of next-generation sequencing based human TRPV1 and TRPA1 genotypes with the sensitivity to heat stimuli and topically applied capsaicin.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Heat pain and its modulation by capsaicin varies among subjects in experimental and clinical settings. A plausible cause is a genetic component, of which TRPV1 ion channels, by their response to both heat and capsaicin, are primary candidates. However, TRPA1 channels can heterodimerize with TRPV1 channels and carry genetic variants reported to modulate heat pain sensitivity. To address the role of these candidate genes in capsaicin induced hypersensitization to heat, pain thresholds acquired before and after topical application of capsaicin and TRPA1/TRPV1 exomic sequences derived by next-generation sequencing were assessed in n = 75 healthy volunteers and the genetic information comprised 278 loci. Gaussian mixture modeling indicated two phenotype groups with high or low capsaicin-induced hypersensitization to heat. Unsupervised machine learning implemented as swarm-based clustering hinted at differences in the genetic pattern between these phenotype groups. Several methods of supervised machine learning implemented as random forests, adaptive boosting, k-nearest neighbors, naïve Bayes, support vector machines, and for comparison, binary logistic regression predicted the phenotype group association consistently better when based on the observed genotypes than when using a random permutation of the exomic sequences. Of note, TRPA1 variants were more important for correct phenotype group association than TRPV1 variants. This indicates a role of the TRPA1 and TRPV1 NGS based genetic pattern in the modulation of the individual response to heat related pain phenotypes. When considering earlier evidence that topical capsaicin can induce neuropathy-like quantitative sensory testing patterns in healthy subjects, implications for future analgesic treatments with TRP inhibitors arise.This is an open-access article distributed under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial-No Derivatives License 4.0 (CCBY-NC-ND) , where it is permissible to download and share the work provided it is properly cited. The work cannot be changed in any way or used commercially without permission from the journal.

在实验和临床环境中，辣椒素引起的热痛和其调节作用各不相同。一个可能的原因是遗传因素，其中TRPV1离子通过它们对热和辣椒素的反应而成为主要候选物。然而，TRPA1通道可以与TRPV1通道异源二聚化并携带报道的调节热痛敏感性的遗传变体。为了解决这些候选基因在辣椒素诱导的对热敏感性中的作用，在n = 75名健康志愿者中评估了局部应用辣椒素和TRPA1 / TRPV1外显子序列之前和之后获得的疼痛阈值，所述辣椒素和TRPA1 / TRPV1外显子序列通过下一代测序得到， 278个基因座。高斯混合模型表明两个表型组高辣椒素或低辣椒诱导hypersensitization加热。作为基于群集的聚类实施的无监督机器学习暗示了这些表型群体之间遗传模式的差异。监督机器学习的几种方法被实施为随机森林，自适应增强，k-最近邻居，朴素贝叶斯，支持向量机，并且为了比较，二元逻辑回归预测当基于观察到的基因型时表型群组关联一致地好于当使用外部序列的随机置换。值得注意的是，与TRPV1变体相比，TRPA1变体对于正确的表型组关联更重要。这表明基于TRPA1和TRPV1 NGS的遗传模式在调节对热相关疼痛表型的个体反应中的作用。当考虑早期的证据表明辣椒素可以诱导健康受试者的类神经病样定量感觉测试模式时，对未来使用TRP抑制剂的镇痛治疗产生影响。这是一篇开放存取的文章，根据Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial- No Derivatives License 4.0（CCBY-NC-ND），允许下载和共享作品，只要它被正确引用。未经许可，本书不得以任何方式改变或在商业上使用。

Journal: Pain [IF=5.445] PMID: 29596157 PubDate: 2018-Mar-27 Authors: Kringel D, Geissl...
187. Next-generation sequencing provides an added value in determining drug resistance and viral tropism in Cameroonian HIV-1 vertically infected children.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

With limited and low-genetic barrier drugs used for the prevention of mother-to-child transmission (PMTCT) of HIV in sub-Saharan Africa, vertically transmitted HIV-1 drug-resistance (HIVDR) is concerning and might prompt optimal pediatric strategies.The aim of this study was to ascertain HIVDR and viral-tropism in majority and minority populations among Cameroonian vertically infected children.A comparative analysis among 18 HIV-infected children (7 from PMTCT-exposed mothers and 11 from mothers without PMTCT-exposure) was performed. HIVDR and HIV-1 co-receptor usage was evaluated by analyzing sequences obtained by both Sanger sequencing and ultra-deep 454-pyrosequencing (UDPS), set at 1% threshold.Overall, median (interquartile range) age, viremia, and CD4 count were 6 (4-10) years, 5.5 (4.9-6.0) log10 copies/mL, and 526 (282-645) cells/mm, respectively. All children had wild-type viruses through both Sanger sequencing and UDPS, except for 1 PMTCT-exposed infant harboring minority K103N (8.31%), born to a mother exposed to AZT+3TC+NVP. X4-tropic viruses were found in 5 of 15 (33.3%) children (including 2 cases detected only by UDPS). Rate of X4-tropic viruses was 0% (0/6) below 5 years (also as minority species), and became relatively high above 5 years (55.6% [5/9], P = .040. X4-tropic viruses were higher with CD4 ≤15% (4/9 [44.4%]) versus CD4 >15% (1/6 [16.7%], P = .580); similarly for CD4 ≤200 (3/4 [75%]) versus CD4 >200 (2/11 [18.2%] cells/mm, P = .077.NGS has the ability of excluding NRTI- and NNRTI-mutations as minority species in all but 1 children, thus supporting the safe use of these drug-classes in those without such mutations, henceforth sparing ritonavir-boosted protease inhibitors or integrase inhibitors for the few remaining cases. In children under five years, X4-tropic variants would be rare, suggesting vertical-transmission with CCR5-tropic viruses and possible maraviroc usage at younger ages.

用撒哈拉以南非洲地区预防艾滋病毒母婴传播（PMTCT）的有限和低基因屏障药物，垂直传播的HIV-1抗药性（HIVDR）与此有关，并可能促成最佳的儿科策略。本研究的目的是确定喀麦隆垂直感染儿童中大多数人和少数民族人群的HIVDR和病毒嗜性。对18名艾滋病毒感染儿童（其中7名来自母婴传播暴露的母亲和11名来自无母婴传播暴露的母亲）进行了比较分析，结果显示，执行。通过分析由Sanger测序和超深454焦磷酸测序（UDPS）获得的序列来评估HIVDR和HIV-1共受体使用，设定为1％阈值。总体而言，中位数（四分位数间距）年龄，病毒血症和CD4计数分别为6（4-10），5.5（4.9-6.0）log 10拷贝/ mL和526（282-645）个细胞/ mm。通过Sanger测序和UDPS测试，所有儿童都有野生型病毒，除了1名暴露于AZT + 3TC + NVP的母亲所生的带有少数K103N（8.31％）的PMTCT暴露婴儿外。 15名儿童中有5名（33.3％）发现X4热带病毒（其中2人仅通过UDPS检测）。 X4热带病毒率在5年以下（也是少数种）为0％（0/6），5年以上相对较高（55.6％[5/9]，P = 0.040; X4热带病毒为与CD4> 15％（1/6 [16.7％]，P = 0.580）相比，CD4≤15％（4/9 [44.4％]）更高;与CD4≤200（3/4 [75％]）相比， CD4> 200（2/11 [18.2％]细胞/ mm，P = 0.077.NGS具有排除NRTI和NNRTI突变作为少数物种在所有儿童中的作用，因此支持这些药物 - 在没有这种突变的那些患者中，这些患者从未使用过利托那韦加强蛋白酶抑制剂或整合酶抑制剂，对于少数患者，5岁以下的儿童中，X4嗜性变异体罕见，提示CCR5热带病毒的垂直传播和可能的马拉韦罗夫病毒使用在较年轻的时候。

Journal: Medicine (Baltimore) [IF=.] PMID: 29595649 PubDate: 2018-Mar Authors: Fokam J, Bellocch... PMC5895385
188. Next-Generation Sequencing of Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Mixed-Genotype Infections in Anti-HCV-Negative Blood Donors.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The infection with more than one hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype especially in subjects with a high risk of multiple HCV exposures has been demonstrated. The role of HCV mixed-genotype infection in viral persistence and treatment effect is not fully understood. The prevalence of such infection varies greatly depending on the technique used for genotype determination and studied population. Next-generation sequencing (NGS) which is suitable for extensive analysis of complex viral populations is a method of choice for studying mixed infections. The aim of the present study was to determine the prevalence of mixed-genotype HCV infections in the Polish seronegative, HCV-RNA-positive blood donors (n = 76). Two-step PCR was used for amplification of 5'-UTR of HCV. Using pyrosequencing altogether, 381,063 reads were obtained. The raw reads were trimmed and subjected to similarity analysis against the entire unfiltered NCBI nt database. Results obtained from NGS were compared with the standard genotyping. One (1.3%) mixed-genotype [3a, 2989 reads (94.8%); 1b, 164 reads (5.2%)] infection was found in a sample diagnosed as genotype 3a only by routine testing. Two samples were identified with different genotypes, compared to routine testing. In conclusion, NGS is a sensitive method for HCV genotyping. The prevalence of mixed-genotype HCV infections in blood donors is low.

已经证实了特别是在具有多次HCV暴露风险高的受试者中多于一种丙型肝炎病毒（HCV）基因型的感染。 HCV混合基因型感染在病毒持续性和治疗效果中的作用尚未完全了解。这种感染的发生率在很大程度上取决于用于基因型测定和研究人群的技术。适用于复杂病毒种群广泛分析的新一代测序（NGS）是研究混合感染的首选方法。本研究的目的是确定波兰血清阴性，HCV-RNA阳性献血者（n = 76）中混合基因型HCV感染的发病率。两步PCR用于扩增HCV的5'-UTR。全部使用焦磷酸测序，获得381,063个读数。将原始读数修剪并对整个未过滤的NCBI nt数据库进行相似性分析。将从NGS获得的结果与标准基因分型进行比较。一种（1.3％）混合基因型[3a，2989（94.8％）;仅在常规检测中诊断为基因型3a的样品中发现164个读数（5.2％）]感染。与常规测试相比，用不同的基因型鉴定了两个样品。总之，NGS是HCV基因分型的一种敏感方法。献血者中混合基因型HCV感染的发病率很低。

Journal: Adv. Exp. Med. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29594753 PubDate: 2018-Mar-29 Authors: Janiak M, Carabal...
189. Incidentalome in Neurogenetics: Pathogenic Variant of NSD1 in a Patient With Spinocerebellar Ataxia (SCA).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Background: Genetic studies of late-onset sporadic ataxias (>40 years of age) are not routinely indicated. For unresolved cases, next-generation sequencing (NGS) tools, such as whole-exome sequencing (WES), are available for a definitive diagnosis. Case presentation: Our patient is a woman with a usual facial phenotype and anthropometry, who developed ataxia at 45 years of age, with no relevant family history and an initial clinical approach that ruled out common aetiologies. WES was performed when the patient was 54 years old. The results identified the heterozygous pathogenic variant c.248delA (p.N83MfsX4) in the nuclear receptor-binding SET domain protein 1 (NSD1; MIM 606681) gene (related to Sotos syndrome), which was not associated with ataxia and is not related to the patient's phenotype. Sanger sequencing of NSD1 in two different laboratories confirmed the variant. Conclusions: NGS findings generally offer valuable information that can be used for clinical decision-making. However, an incidental finding that leads to defining new clinical and bioethical actions is also possible. Consequently, the biological importance of this type of genetic "incidentalome" must be determined.

背景：迟发型散发性共济失调（> 40岁）的遗传学研究并未常规指明。对于未解决的病例，新一代测序（NGS）工具（如全外显子组测序（WES））可用于确定诊断。病例介绍：我们的病人是一名具有常见面部表型和人体测量学的女性，他们在45岁时出现共济失调，没有相关的家族史和排除常见病因的初始临床方法。当患者54岁时进行WES。结果鉴定了核受体结合的SET结构域蛋白1（NSD1; MIM606681）基因（与Sotos综合征有关）中的杂合致病变体c.248delA（p.N83MfsX4），其与共济失调不相关并且与病人的表型。两个不同实验室的NSD1的Sanger测序证实了该变体。结论：NGS发现通常提供可用于临床决策的有价值的信息。然而，导致界定新的临床和生命伦理行为的偶然发现也是可能的。因此，必须确定这种遗传“附带体”的生物学重要性。

Journal: Front Genet [IF=3.789] PMID: 29593781 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Velasco H, Ramíre... PMC5861145
190. High-Throughput Sequencing Strategy for Microsatellite Genotyping Using Neotropical Fish as a Model.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Genetic diversity and population studies are essential for conservation and wildlife management programs. However, monitoring requires the analysis of multiple loci from many samples. These processes can be laborious and expensive. The choice of microsatellites and PCR calibration for genotyping are particularly daunting. Here we optimized a low-cost genotyping method using multiple microsatellite loci for simultaneous genotyping of up to 384 samples using next-generation sequencing (NGS). We designed primers with adapters to the combinatorial barcoding amplicon library and sequenced samples by MiSeq. Next, we adapted a bioinformatics pipeline for genotyping microsatellites based on read-length and sequence content. Using primer pairs for eight microsatellite loci from the fish Prochilodus costatus, we amplified, sequenced, and analyzed the DNA of 96, 288, or 384 individuals for allele detection. The most cost-effective methodology was a pseudo-multiplex reaction using a low-throughput kit of 1 M reads (Nano) for 384 DNA samples. We observed an average of 325 reads per individual per locus when genotyping eight loci. Assuming a minimum requirement of 10 reads per loci, two to four times more loci could be tested in each run, depending on the quality of the PCR reaction of each locus. In conclusion, we present a novel method for microsatellite genotyping using Illumina combinatorial barcoding that dispenses exhaustive PCR calibrations, since non-specific amplicons can be eliminated by bioinformatics analyses. This methodology rapidly provides genotyping data and is therefore a promising development for large-scale conservation-genetics studies.

遗传多样性和人口研究对保护和野生动物管理计划至关重要。但是，监测需要分析多个样本的多个位点。这些过程可能费力并且昂贵。用于基因分型的微卫星和PCR校准的选择尤其艰巨​​。在这里，我们利用多重微卫星基因座优化了低成本基因分型方法，使用新一代测序（NGS）对多达384个样品进行同时基因分型。我们设计了带有适配器的引物，用于组合条形扩增子文库和MiSeq的测序样品。接下来，我们根据阅读长度和序列内容改编了用于基因分型微卫星的生物信息学流水线。我们使用引物对来自鱼Prochilodus costatus的8个微卫星基因座，我们扩增，测序并分析了96,288或384个个体的DNA用于等位基因检测。最具成本效益的方法是使用1 M读数（Nano）的低通量试剂盒用于384个DNA样品的假多重反应。当对8个基因座进行基因分型时，我们观察到每个基因座平均每个基因座有325个读段。假设每个基因座最少需要10次读数，每次运行可以测试两到四倍多的基因座，这取决于每个基因座的PCR反应的质量。总之，我们提出了一种使用Illumina组合条形码进行微卫星基因分型的新方法，该方法省去了彻底的PCR校准，因为通过生物信息学分析可以消除非特异性扩增子。这种方法快速提供基因分型数据，因此是大规模保存遗传学研究的有希望的发展。

Journal: Front Genet [IF=3.789] PMID: 29593777 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Pimentel JSM, Car... PMC5855144
191. Identification and DNA annotation of a plasmid isolated from Chromobacterium violaceum.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Chromobacterium violaceum is a ß-proteobacterium found widely worldwide with important biotechnological properties and is associated to lethal sepsis in immune-depressed individuals. In this work, we report the discover, complete sequence and annotation of a plasmid detected in C. violaceum that has been unnoticed until now. We used DNA single-molecule analysis to confirm that the episome found was a circular molecule and then proceeded with NGS sequencing. After DNA annotation, we found that this extra-chromosomal DNA is probably a defective bacteriophage of approximately 44 kilobases, with 39 ORFs comprising, mostly hypothetical proteins. We also found DNA sequences that ensure proper plasmid replication and partitioning as well as a toxin addiction system. This report sheds light on the biology of this important species, helping us to understand the mechanisms by which C. violaceum endures to several harsh conditions. This discovery could also be a first step in the development of a DNA manipulation tool in this bacterium.

Chromobacterium v​​iolaceum是广泛存在于世界范围内具有重要生物技术特性的β-变形杆菌，与免疫抑制个体中的致死性败血症有关。在这项工作中，我们报告了迄今未被注意的C. violaceum中检测到的质粒的发现，完整序列和注释。我们使用DNA单分子分析来确认发现的附加物是环状分子，然后进行NGS测序。经过DNA注释，我们发现这种染色体外DNA可能是一种约44千碱基的有缺陷的噬菌体，其中39个ORF包含大部分假想蛋白。我们还发现了确保合适的质粒复制和分配以及毒素成瘾系统的DNA序列。本报告揭示了这一重要物种的生物学特征，帮助我们了解了紫色花橙忍受了几种苛刻条件的机制。这一发现也可能是在这种细菌中开发DNA操作工具的第一步。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29593241 PubDate: 2018-Mar-28 Authors: Lima DC, Nyberg L... PMC5871888
192. C3 glomerulopathy in cystic fibrosis: a case report.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

C3 glomerulonephritis is a rare glomerulopathy characterized at renal biopsy by C3 deposition, alone or with scanty immunoglobulins, as well as by an electron-dense material in mesangium, subendothelial and subepithelial space. An abnormal systemic activation of the alternative pathway of the complement cascade is responsible for the development of the disease if triggered by several possible environmental conditions. We report the first case in literature of a patient affected by cystic fibrosis and C3GN.

C3肾小球肾炎是一种罕见的肾小球病，其特征在于通过C3沉积，单独或少量免疫球蛋白以及系膜，内皮下和上皮下空间中的电子致密物质进行肾活组织检查。如果由几种可能的环境条件触发，则补体级联的旁路途径的异常全身激活负责疾病的发展。我们报告了第一例患有囊性纤维化和C3GN患者的文献。

Journal: BMC Nephrol [IF=2.289] PMID: 29592796 PubDate: 2018-Mar-28 Authors: Santoro D, Siliga... PMC5875003
193. Identification of Three Novel Frameshift Mutations in the PKD1 Gene in Iranian Families with Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease Using Efficient Targeted Next-Generation Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD) is one of the most common inherited cystic kidney diseases caused by mutations in two large multi-exon genes, PKD1 and PKD2. High allelic heterogeneity and duplication of PKD1 exons 1-32 as six pseudo genes on chromosome 16 complicate molecular analysis of this disease.

常染色体显性多囊肾病（ADPKD）是由两个大型多外显子基因PKD1和PKD2突变引起的最常见的遗传性囊性肾病之一。 PKD1外显子1-32的高度等位基因异质性和重复作为16号染色体上的六个假基因使得该疾病的分子分析复杂化。

194. Gene panel analysis for nonsyndromic cryptogenic neonatal/infantile epileptic encephalopathy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Epileptic encephalopathy (EE) is a heterogeneous condition associated with deteriorations of cognitive, sensory and/or motor functions as a consequence of epileptic activity. The phenomenon is the most common and severe in infancy and early childhood. Genetic-based diagnosis in EE patients is challenging owing to genetic and phenotypic heterogeneity of numerous monogenic disorders and the fact that thousands of genes are involved in neurodevelopment. Therefore, high-throughput next-generation sequencing (NGS) was used to investigate the genetic causes of non-syndromic cryptogenic neonatal/infantile EE (NIEE).

癫痫性脑病（EE）是由于癫痫活动而与认知，感觉和/或运动功能恶化相关的异质性病症。这种现象在婴儿期和幼儿期最为常见和严重。由于许多单基因疾病的遗传和表型异质性以及数以千计的基因参与神经发育的事实，所以EE患者基于遗传的诊断具有挑战性。因此，使用高通量下一代测序（NGS）来研究非综合征型隐源性新生儿/婴儿EE（NIEE）的遗传原因。

195. HLA and proteasome expression body map.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The presentation of HLA peptide complexes to T cells is a highly regulated and tissue specific process involving multiple transcriptionally controlled cellular components. The extensive polymorphism of HLA genes and the complex composition of the proteasome make it difficult to map their expression profiles across tissues.

将HLA肽复合物呈递给T细胞是涉及多种转录控制的细胞组分的高度调节和组织特异性过程。 HLA基因的广泛多态性和蛋白酶体的复杂组成使其难以跨组织表达它们的表达谱。

196. 5'/ 3' imbalance strategy to detect ALK fusion genes in circulating tumor RNA from patients with non-small cell lung cancer.

Journal: J. Exp. Clin. Cancer Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29587818 PubDate: 2018-Mar-27 Authors: Tong Y, Zhao Z, L... PMC5870746
197. NGS Analysis of Human Embryo Culture Media Reveals miRNAs of Extra Embryonic Origin.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Our objective in this work was to isolate, identify, and compare micro-RNAs (miRNAs) found in spent culture media of euploid and aneuploid in vitro fertilization (IVF) embryos. Seventy-two embryos from 62 patients were collected, and their spent media were retained. A total of 108 spent conditioned media samples were analyzed (n = 36 day 3 euploid embryos, n = 36 day 3 aneuploid embryos, and n = 36 matched control media). Fifty hed-control media embryos were analyzed using next-generation sequencing (NGS) technology. We detected 53 known human miRNAs present in the spent conditioned media of euploid and aneuploid IVF embryos. miR-181b-5p and miR-191-5p were found the most represented. We validated our results by quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR), but no significant results were obtained between the groups. In conclusion, we obtained the list of miRNAs present in the spent conditioned media from euploid and aneuploid IVF embryos, but our data suggest that these miRNAs could have a nonembryonic origin.

我们的目标是分离，鉴定和比较在整倍体和非整倍体体外受精（IVF）胚胎的废培养基中发现的微RNA（miRNA）。收集62名患者的72个胚胎，并保留其用过的培养基。分析总共108个用过的条件培养基样品（n = 36天3倍整倍体胚胎，n = 36天3个非整倍体胚胎，并且n = 36个匹配的对照培养基）。使用新一代测序（NGS）技术分析50个对照介质胚胎。我们在整倍体和非整倍体IVF胚胎的废调理培养基中检测到53种已知的人类miRNA。发现miR-181b-5p和miR-191-5p的代表最多。我们通过定量聚合酶链式反应（qPCR）验证了我们的结果，但是没有获得显着的结果。总之，我们从整倍体和非整倍体IVF胚胎中获得了存在于废调理培养基中的miRNA列表，但是我们的数据表明这些miRNA可能具有非胚胎来源。

Journal: Reprod Sci [IF=2.443] PMID: 29587610 PubDate: 2018-Jan-01 Authors: Sánchez-Ribas I, ...
198. MDM2-p53 Interactions in Human Hepatocellular Carcinoma: What Is the Role of Nutlins and New Therapeutic Options?
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Human hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) is the fifth most common cancer and is associated with poor prognosis worldwide. The molecular mechanisms underlying the pathogenesis of HCC have been an area of continuing interest, and recent studies using next generation sequencing (NGS) have revealed much regarding previously unsettled issues. Molecular studies using HCC samples have been mainly targeted with the aim to identify the fundamental mechanisms contributing to HCC and identify more effective treatments. In response to cellular stresses (e.g., DNA damage or oncogenes), activated p53 elicits appropriate responses that aim at DNA repair, genetic stability, cell cycle arrest, and the deletion of DNA-damaged cells. On the other hand, the murine double minute 2 (MDM2) oncogene protein is an important cellular antagonist of p53. MDM2 negatively regulates p53 activity through the induction of p53 protein degradation. However, current research has shown that the mechanisms underlying MDM2-p53 interactions are more complex than previously thought. Microarray data have added new insight into the transcription changes in HCC. Recently, Nutlin-3 has shown potency against p53-MDM2 binding and the enhancement of p53 stabilization as well as an increment of p53 cellular accumulation with potential therapeutic effects. This review outlines the molecular mechanisms involved in the p53-MDM2 pathways, the biological factors influencing these pathways, and their roles in the pathogenesis of HCC. It also discusses the action of Nutlin-3 treatment in inducing growth arrest in HCC and elaborates on future directions in research in this area. More research on the biology of p53-MDM2 interactions may offer a better understanding of these mechanisms and discover new biomarkers, sensitive prognostic indicators as well as new therapeutic interventions in HCC.

人类肝细胞癌（HCC）是第五常见的癌症，并且与全球预后不良有关。 HCC发病机制的分子机制一直是人们持续关注的领域，近期使用下一代测序（NGS）的研究已经揭示了许多关于以前未解决的问题。使用HCC样品的分子研究主要是为了确定导致HCC的基本机制并确定更有效的治疗。响应于细胞应激（例如DNA损伤或致癌基因），激活的p53引发以DNA修复，遗传稳定性，细胞周期停滞和DNA受损细胞缺失为目标的适当应答。另一方面，鼠双分钟2（MDM2）癌基因蛋白是p53的重要细胞拮抗剂。 MDM2通过诱导p53蛋白降解负调节p53活性。然而，目前的研究表明MDM2-p53相互作用的机制比以前想象的更复杂。微阵列数据增加了对HCC转录变化的新见解。最近，Nutlin-3已显示出对p53-MDM2结合的效力和p53稳定性的增强以及具有潜在治疗效果的p53细胞积累的增加。本综述概述了p53-MDM2通路中涉及的分子机制，影响这些通路的生物学因素及其在HCC发病机制中的作用。它还讨论了Nutlin-3治疗诱导HCC生长停滞的作用，并阐述了该领域未来的研究方向。对p53-MDM2相互作用的生物学的更多研究可能提供对这些机制的更好理解，并发现新的生物标志物，敏感的预后指标以及HCC中的新的治疗干预措施。

Journal: J Clin Med [IF=.] PMID: 29584707 PubDate: 2018-Mar-27 Authors: Azer SA PMC5920438
199. Two novel totiviruses in the white-backed planthopper, Sogatella furcifera.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

There is little information about commensal viruses in the white-backed planthopper, Sogatella furcifera, although it is an important agricultural insect. Here, two novel double-stranded RNA viruses related to the viruses in the family Totiviridae were identified using next-generation sequencing and tentatively named Sogatella furcifera totivirus 1 and 2 (SfTV1 and SfTV2). Their complete genomes consist of 6310 and 6303 nt, respectively, showing typical genomic features with viruses in the family Totiviridae. Identity, phylogenetic and conserved sequence analyses showed that SfTV1, SfTV2 and three other insect viruses may form a proposed novel genus of the family Totiviridae. Vertical transmission of the two viruses was highly efficient, and they were detected in all insect tissues and developmental stages, with the highest titres in the adult and in the haemolymph and reproductive organs. To our knowledge, this is the first report of viruses in the family Totiviridae found in a hemipteran insect.

关于白背飞虱Sogatella furcifera中共生病毒的信息很少，尽管它是一种重要的农业昆虫。在这里，使用新一代测序并暂时命名为Sogatella furcifera totivirus 1和2（SfTV1和SfTV2）鉴定了与Totiviridae科病毒相关的两种新型双链RNA病毒。他们的完整基因组分别由6310和6303核苷酸组成，显示了典型的基因组特征以及病毒在Totiviridae中的病毒。同源性，系统发育性和保守性序列分析表明，SfTV1，SfTV2和其他三种昆虫病毒可能形成一个新的Totiviridae科属。这两种病毒的垂直传播非常有效，并且在所有昆虫组织和发育阶段都能检测到，它们在成人以及血淋巴和生殖器官中的滴度最高。据我们所知，这是第一次发现在半翅目昆虫中发现的Totiviridae病毒的报道。

Journal: J. Gen. Virol. [IF=.] PMID: 29580322 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Zhang P, Liu W, C...
200. Liquid biopsy of bile for the molecular diagnosis of gallbladder cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Tissue sampling of gallbladder cancer (GBCa) is challenging because of the anatomy of the gallbladder. The aim of this study is to investigate the possibility of diagnosing GBCa patients by performing a liquid biopsy of bile in addition to current diagnostic methods.

由于胆囊的解剖结构，胆囊癌组织取样（GBCa）具有挑战性。这项研究的目的是调查除目前的诊断方法之外，通过进行胆汁液体活检来诊断GBCa患者的可能性。

Journal: Cancer Biol. Ther. [IF=.] PMID: 29580156 PubDate: 2018-Mar-26 Authors: Kinugasa H, Nouso...
201. Transition-Metal-Free Decarboxylative Propargylic Substitution/Cyclization with either Azolium Enolates or Acyl Anions.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Presented herein is an unprecedented transition-metal-free propargylic substitution reaction with either azolium enolates or acyl anions, which are generated from aldehydes under N-heterocyclic carbene catalysis. This new catalytic activation operates on readily available cyclic propargylic carbamates through decarboxylation, and generates reactive allene intermediates that can undergo divergent cyclization pathways to deliver skeletally diverse polycyclic compounds with high levels of efficiency and excellent enantioselectivities.

本文呈现的是在N-杂环卡宾催化下由醛衍生的烯醇鎓烯醇盐或酰基阴离子的前所未有的无过渡金属炔丙基取代反应。这种新的催化活化通过脱羧作用于容易得到的环状炔丙基氨基甲酸酯上，并且产生可以经历不同环化途径的活性丙二烯中间体，以提供具有高水平效率和优异的对映选择性的骨架不同的多环化合物。

Journal: Angew. Chem. Int. Ed. Engl. [IF=.] PMID: 29577534 PubDate: 2018-Mar-25 Authors: Lu S, Ong JY, Poh...
202. An optimized FAIRE procedure for low cell numbers in yeast.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

We report an optimised low-input FAIRE-seq (Formaldehyde-Assisted Isolation of Regulatory Elements-sequencing) procedure to assay chromatin accessibility from limited amounts of yeast cells. We demonstrate that the method performs well on as little as 4 mg cells scraped directly from a few colonies. Sensitivity, specificity and reproducibility of the scaled-down method are comparable to that of regular, higher input amounts, and allows the use of 100-fold fewer cells than existing procedures. The method enables epigenetic analysis of chromatin structure without the need for cell multiplication of exponentially growing cells in liquid culture, thus opening the possibility to study colony cell subpopulations, or those that can be isolated directly from environmental samples.

我们报告了优化的低输入FAIRE-seq（调节元件测序的甲醛辅助分离）程序以测定来自有限量酵母细胞的染色质可接近性。我们证明该方法在少量直接从几个菌落中刮取的4毫克细胞上表现良好。按比例缩小的方法的灵敏度，特异性和再现性与常规的较高输入量相当，并且允许使用比现有程序少100倍的细胞。该方法能够进行表观遗传学分析染色质结构，而不需要液体培养中指数生长细胞的细胞增殖，因此开辟了研究菌落细胞亚群的可能性，或者可以直接从环境样品中分离的那些。

Journal: Yeast [IF=1.990] PMID: 29577419 PubDate: 2018-Mar-25 Authors: Segorbe D, Wilkin...
203. Enhancing the accuracy of next-generation sequencing for detecting rare and subclonal mutations.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Mutations, the fuel of evolution, are first manifested as rare DNA changes within a population of cells. Although next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies have revolutionized the study of genomic variation between species and individual organisms, most have limited ability to accurately detect and quantify rare variants among the different genome copies in heterogeneous mixtures of cells or molecules. We describe the technical challenges in characterizing subclonal variants using conventional NGS protocols and the recent development of error correction strategies, both computational and experimental, including consensus sequencing of single DNA molecules. We also highlight major applications for low-frequency mutation detection in science and medicine, describe emerging methodologies and provide our vision for the future of DNA sequencing.

突变，进化的燃料，首先表现为细胞群体内罕见的DNA变化。尽管下一代测序（NGS）技术已经彻底改变了物种和个体生物体之间基因组变异的研究，但大多数能力有限，无法准确检测和量化不同基因组拷贝中异种细胞或分子混合物中的罕见变异。我们描述了使用常规NGS方案表征亚克隆变体的技术挑战以及计算和实验的错误纠正策略的最新发展，包括单个DNA分子的共有序列。我们还重点介绍了科学和医学中低频突变检测的主要应用，描述新兴方法并提供了DNA测序未来的展望。

Journal: Nat. Rev. Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29576615 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Salk JJ, Schmitt ...
204. Molecular Screening of Small Biopsy Samples Using Next-Generation Sequencing in Korean Patients with Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer: Korean Lung Cancer Consortium (KLCC-13-01).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) is a common type of cancer with typically poor prognosis. As individual cancers exhibit unique mutation patterns, identifying and characterizing gene mutations in NSCLC might help predict patient outcomes and guide treatment. The aim of this study was to evaluate the clinical adequacy of molecular testing using next-generation sequencing (NGS) for small biopsy samples and characterize the mutational landscape of Korean patients with advanced NSCLC.

非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）是一种常见的预后不良的癌症类型。由于个体癌症表现出独特的突变模式，鉴别和表征NSCLC中的基因突变可能有助于预测患者结果并指导治疗。本研究的目的是评估使用新一代测序（NGS）进行小活检标本的分子检测的临床适宜性，并描述韩国晚期NSCLC患者的突变情况。
