205. Simultaneous detection of ABL1 mutation and IKZF1 deletion in Philadelphia chromosome-positive acute lymphoblastic leukemia using a customized target enrichment system panel.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Recent clinical outcomes of pediatric Philadelphia chromosome-positive acute lymphoblastic leukemia (Ph+ALL) vastly improved owing to tyrosine kinase inhibitor (TKI). However, the genetic status would be different in each case with ABL1 gene mutation or copy number variants (CNVs) such as IKZF1 deletion. In particular, the TKI resistant clone with ABL1 kinase mutation remains problematic. The comprehensive assessment of genetic status including mutation, insertion and deletion (indel) and CNVs is necessary.

由于酪氨酸激酶抑制剂（TKI），儿科费城染色体阳性急性淋巴细胞白血病（Ph + ALL）的近期临床结果大大改善。然而，在ABL1基因突变或拷贝数变异（CNV）如IKZF1缺失的情况下，遗传状态将不同。特别是，具有ABL1激酶突变的TKI抗性克隆仍然存在问题。遗传状态的综合评估包括突变，插入和删除（indel）和CNV是必要的。

Journal: Int J Lab Hematol [IF=2.030] PMID: 29575541 PubDate: 2018-Mar-25 Authors: Aoe M, Ishida H, ...
206. Repair of DNA damage caused by cytosine deamination in mitochondrial DNA of forensic case samples.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

DNA sequence damage from cytosine deamination is well documented in degraded samples, such as those from ancient and forensic contexts. This study examined the effect of a DNA repair treatment on mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) from aged and degraded skeletal samples. DNA extracts from 21 non-probative, degraded skeletal samples (aged 50-70 years) were utilized for the analysis. A portion of each sample extract was subjected to DNA repair using a commercial repair kit, the New England BioLabs' NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Kit (Ipswich, MA). MtDNA was enriched using PCR and targeted capture in a side-by-side experiment of untreated and repaired DNA. Sequencing was performed using both traditional (Sanger-type; STS) and next-generation sequencing (NGS) methods Although cytosine deamination was evident in the mtDNA sequence data, the observed level of damaged bases varied by sequencing method as well as by enrichment type. The STS PCR amplicon data did not show evidence of cytosine deamination that could be distinguished from background signal in either the untreated or repaired sample set. However, the same PCR amplicons showed 850 C → T/G → A substitutions consistent with cytosine deamination with variant frequencies (VFs) of up to 25% when sequenced using NGS methods The occurrence of base misincorporation due to cytosine deamination was reduced by 98% (to 10) in the NGS amplicon data after repair. The NGS capture data indicated low levels (1-2%) of cytosine deamination in mtDNA fragments that was effectively mitigated by DNA repair. The observed difference in the level of cytosine deamination between the PCR and capture enrichment methods can be attributed to the greater propensity for stochastic effects from the PCR enrichment technique employed (e.g., low template input, increased PCR cycles). Altogether these results indicate that DNA repair may be required when sequencing PCR-amplified DNA from degraded forensic case samples with NGS methods.

来自胞嘧啶脱氨基的DNA序列损伤在降解样品中有很好的记载，例如来自古代和法医环境的样品。本研究检测了DNA修复治疗对来自老化和退化骨骼样品的线粒体DNA（mtDNA）的影响。使用来自21个未证实的降解骨骼样品（50-70岁）的DNA提取物进行分析。使用商业修复试剂盒New England BioLabs的NEBNext FFPE DNA修复试剂盒（Ipswich，MA）对每份样品提取物的一部分进行DNA修复。使用PCR富集MtDNA并在未经处理和修复的DNA的并行实验中靶向捕获。使用传统（Sanger型; STS）和下一代测序（NGS）方法进行测序尽管胞嘧啶脱氨基在mtDNA序列数据中很明显，但观察到的受损碱基水平因测序方法和富集类型而异。 STS PCR扩增子数据没有显示在未处理或修复的样品组中可以与背景信号区分的胞嘧啶脱氨基的证据。然而，使用NGS方法进行测序时，相同的PCR扩增子显示850 C→T / G→A取代与胞嘧啶脱氨基一致，变异频率（VF）高达25％。由于胞嘧啶脱氨基引起碱基错误掺入的发生减少了98％ （至10）修复后的NGS扩增子数据。 NGS捕获数据表明，mtDNA片段中胞嘧啶脱氨基的水平较低（1-2％），DNA修复有效缓解了这种情况。观察到的PCR和捕获富集方法之间胞嘧啶脱氨基水平的差异可归因于来自所采用的PCR富集技术的随机效应的更大倾向（例如，低模板输入，增加的PCR循环）。总之，这些结果表明，当使用NGS方法对来自降解法医病例样品的PCR扩增DNA进行测序时，可能需要DNA修复。

Journal: Forensic Sci Int Genet [IF=.] PMID: 29573606 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Gorden EM, Sturk-...
207. Liquid biopsy by NGS: differential presence of exons (DPE) in cell-free DNA reveals different patterns in metastatic and nonmetastatic colorectal cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) has been proposed as a suitable tool for liquid biopsy in colorectal cancer (CRC), although most studies to date have focused almost exclusively on sequencing of panels of potential clinically actionable genes. We evaluated the clinical value of whole-exome sequencing (WES) of cell-free DNA (cfDNA) circulating in plasma, with the goal of identifying differential clinical profiles in patients with CRC. To this end, we applied an original concept, "differential presence of exons" (DPE). We determined differences in levels of 379 exons in plasma cfDNA and used DPE analysis to cluster and classify patients with disseminated and localized disease. The resultant bioinformatics analysis pipeline allowed us to design a predictive DPE algorithm in a small subset of patients that could not be initially classified based on the selection criteria. This DPE suggests that these nucleic acids could be actively released by both tumor and nontumor cells as a means of intercellular communication and might thus play a role in the process of malignant transformation. DPE is a new technique for the study of plasma cfDNA by WES that might have predictive and prognostic value in patients with CRC.

新一代测序（NGS）已被提出作为结肠直肠癌（CRC）中液体活检的合适工具，尽管迄今为止大多数研究几乎都专注于潜在临床可行基因的测序。我们评估了在血浆中循环的无细胞DNA（cfDNA）的全外显子组测序（WES）的临床价值，目的是鉴定CRC患者中的不同临床表现。为此，我们应用了一个原创的概念，“外显子的差异化存在”（DPE）。我们测定了血浆cfDNA中379个外显子的水平差异，并使用DPE分析来聚类和分类播散性和局限性疾病患者。由此产生的生物信息学分析流程使我们能够在一小部分患者中设计预测性DPE算法，这些患者无法根据选择标准进行初始分类。该DPE表明这些核酸可以作为细胞间通讯的手段而被肿瘤细胞和非肿瘤细胞主动释放，因此可能在恶变过程中起作用。 DPE是WES研究血浆cfDNA的新技术，可能对CRC患者具有预测价值和预后价值。

Journal: Cancer Med [IF=3.362] PMID: 29573240 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Olmedillas-López ...
208. Single, short in-del, and copy number variations detection in monogenic dyslipidemia using a next-generation sequencing strategy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Optimal molecular diagnosis of primary dyslipidemia is challenging to confirm the diagnosis, test and identify at risk relatives. The aim of this study was to test the application of a single targeted next-generation sequencing (NGS) panel for hypercholesterolemia, hypocholesterolemia, and hypertriglyceridemia molecular diagnosis. NGS workflow based on a custom AmpliSeq panel was designed for sequencing the most prevalent dyslipidemia-causing genes (ANGPTL3, APOA5, APOC2, APOB, GPIHBP1, LDLR, LMF1, LPL, PCSK9) on the Ion PGM Sequencer. One hundred and forty patients without molecular diagnosis were studied. In silico analyses were performed using the NextGENe software and homemade tools for detection of copy number variations (CNV). All mutations were confirmed using appropriate tools. Eighty seven variations and 4 CNV were identified, allowing a molecular diagnosis for 40/116 hypercholesterolemic patients, 5/13 hypocholesterolemic patients, and 2/11, hypertriglyceridemic patients respectively. This workflow allowed the detection of CNV contrary to our previous strategy. Some variations were found in previously unexplored regions providing an added value for genotype-phenotype correlation and familial screening. In conclusion, this new NGS process is an effective mutation detection method and allows better understanding of phenotype. Consequently this assay meets the medical need for individualized diagnosis of dyslipidemia.

原发性血脂异常的最佳分子诊断对确认危险亲属的诊断，检测和鉴定具有挑战性。本研究的目的是测试单一靶向下一代测序（NGS）小组在高胆固醇血症，低胆固醇血症和高甘油三酯血症分子诊断中的应用。基于定制AmpliSeq小组的NGS工作流程设计用于对Ion PGM测序仪上最常见的血脂异常引起的基因（ANGPTL3，APOA5，APOC2，APOB，GPIHBP1，LDLR，LMF1，LPL，PCSK9）进行测序。研究了140位无分子诊断的患者。在计算机分析中使用NextGENe软件和自制工具检测拷贝数变异（CNV）。所有突变均使用合适的工具进行确认鉴定出87种变异和4种CNV，分别诊断40/116例高胆固醇血症患者，5/13例低胆固醇血症患者和2/11例高甘油三酯血症患者。这个工作流程允许CNV的检测违背我们以前的策略。在以前未开发的区域发现了一些变异，为基因型 - 表型相关性和家族筛查提供了附加价值。总之，这种新的NGS过程是一种有效的突变检测方法，可以更好地理解表型。因此该测定法满足了对血脂异常个体化诊断的医学需求。

Journal: Clin. Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29572815 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Marmontel O, Char...
209. Methodology challenges in studying human gut microbiota - effects of collection, storage, DNA extraction and next generation sequencing technologies.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The information on microbiota composition in the human gastrointestinal tract predominantly originates from the analyses of human faeces by application of next generation sequencing (NGS). However, the detected composition of the faecal bacterial community can be affected by various factors including experimental design and procedures. This study evaluated the performance of different protocols for collection and storage of faecal samples (native and OMNIgene.GUT system) and bacterial DNA extraction (MP Biomedicals, QIAGEN and MO BIO kits), using two NGS platforms for 16S rRNA gene sequencing (Ilumina MiSeq and Ion Torrent PGM). OMNIgene.GUT proved as a reliable and convenient system for collection and storage of faecal samples although favouring Sutterella genus. MP provided superior DNA yield and quality, MO BIO depleted Gram positive organisms while using QIAGEN with OMNIgene.GUT resulted in greatest variability compared to other two kits. MiSeq and IT platforms in their supplier recommended setups provided comparable reproducibility of donor faecal microbiota. The differences included higher diversity observed with MiSeq and increased capacity of MiSeq to detect Akkermansia muciniphila, [Odoribacteraceae], Erysipelotrichaceae and Ruminococcaceae (primarily Faecalibacterium prausnitzii). The results of our study could assist the investigators using NGS technologies to make informed decisions on appropriate tools for their experimental pipelines.

关于人类胃肠道微生物群成分的信息主要来源于应用下一代测序（NGS）分析人类粪便。然而，检测到的粪便细菌群落组成可能受各种因素影响，包括实验设计和程序。本研究使用两个用于16S rRNA基因测序的NGS平台（Ilumina MiSeq）评估了用于收集和储存粪便样品（天然和OMNIgene.GUT系统）和细菌DNA提取（MP Biomedicals，QIAGEN和MO BIO试剂盒）的不同方案的性能和Ion Torrent PGM）。 OMNIgene.GUT被证明是一个可靠和便利的系统，用于收集和储存粪便样品，虽然有利于Sutterella属。 MP提供了优异的DNA产量和质量，MO BIO消耗革兰氏阳性生物体，而使用QIAGEN和OMNIgene.GUT产生与其他两种试剂盒相比最大的变异性。 MiSeq和IT平台在其供应商推荐的设置中提供了可比的重现性供体粪便微生物群。这些差异包括MiSeq观察到的更高的多样性和MiSeq检测Akkermansia muciniphila，[Odoribacteraceae]，Erysipelotrichaceae和Ruminococcaceae（主要是Faecalibacterium prausnitzii）的能力增加。我们研究的结果可以帮助调查人员使用NGS技术为他们的实验管道合适的工具做出明智的决定。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29572539 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Panek M, Čipčić P... PMC5865204
210. A new hybrid approach for MHC genotyping: high-throughput NGS and long read MinION nanopore sequencing, with application to the non-model vertebrate Alpine chamois (Rupicapra rupicapra).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The major histocompatibility complex (MHC) acts as an interface between the immune system and infectious diseases. Accurate characterization and genotyping of the extremely variable MHC loci are challenging especially without a reference sequence. We designed a combination of long-range PCR, Illumina short-reads, and Oxford Nanopore MinION long-reads approaches to capture the genetic variation of the MHC II DRB locus in an Italian population of the Alpine chamois (Rupicapra rupicapra). We utilized long-range PCR to generate a 9 Kb fragment of the DRB locus. Amplicons from six different individuals were fragmented, tagged, and simultaneously sequenced with Illumina MiSeq. One of these amplicons was sequenced with the MinION device, which produced long reads covering the entire amplified fragment. A pipeline that combines short and long reads resolved several short tandem repeats and homopolymers and produced a de novo reference, which was then used to map and genotype the short reads from all individuals. The assembled DRB locus showed a high level of polymorphism and the presence of a recombination breakpoint. Our results suggest that an amplicon-based NGS approach coupled with single-molecule MinION nanopore sequencing can efficiently achieve both the assembly and the genotyping of complex genomic regions in multiple individuals in the absence of a reference sequence.

主要组织相容性复合体（MHC）充当免疫系统和传染病之间的界面。特别是在没有参考序列的情况下，对极其多变的MHC基因座进行准确的表征和基因分型具有挑战性。我们设计了长距离PCR，Illumina短读数和Oxford Nanopore MinION长读方法，以捕获意大利阿尔卑斯山羚羊（Rupicapra rupicapra）群体中MHC II DRB基因座的遗传变异。我们利用长程PCR产生DRB基因座的一个9Kb片段。来自6个不同个体的扩增子被片段化，标记，并同时用Illumina MiSeq进行测序。其中一个扩增子用MinION设备进行测序，产生覆盖整个扩增片段的长片段。一个结合短和长阅读的管道解决了几个短串联重复序列和均聚物，并产生了一个从头参考，然后用它来对来自所有个体的短读数进行映射和基因分型。组装的DRB基因座显示出高水平的多态性并存在重组断点。我们的研究结果表明，基于扩增子的NGS方法与单分子MinION纳米孔测序相结合，可以有效地在缺少参考序列的情况下实现多个个体中复杂基因组区域的基因组分型和基因分型。

Journal: Heredity (Edinb) [IF=.] PMID: 29572469 PubDate: 2018-Mar-24 Authors: Fuselli S, Baptis...
211. Assessing airborne fungal communities by high-throughput sequencing using passive traps.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Techniques based on the high-throughput sequencing (HTS) of environmental DNA have provided a new way of studying fungal diversity. However, these techniques suffer from a number of methodological biases which may appear at any of the steps involved in a metabarcoding study. Air is one of the most important environments where fungi can be found because it is the primary medium of dispersal for many species. Looking ahead to future developments, it was decided to test 20 protocols including different passive spore traps, spore recovery procedures, DNA extraction kits and barcode loci. HTS was performed with the Illumina MiSeq platform targeting two sub loci of the fungal internal transcribed spacer. Multivariate analysis and generalized linear models showed that the type of passive spore trap, the spore recovery procedure and the barcode all impact the description of fungal communities in terms of richness and diversity when assessed by HTS metabarcoding. In contrast, DNA extraction kits did not significantly impact these results. Although passive traps may be used to describe airborne fungal communities, a study using specific real-time PCR and a mock community showed that these kinds of trap are affected by environmental conditions that may induce losses of biological material, impacting diversity and community composition results.Importance The advent of high throughput sequencing (HTS) methods such as those offered by next-generation sequencing (NGS) techniques has opened a new era in the study of fungal diversity in different environmental substrates. In this study we show that the assessment of the diversity of airborne fungal communities can reliably be achieved by the use of simple and robust passive spore traps. However, comparison of sample processing protocols showed that several methodological biases may impact results of fungal diversity when assessed by metabarcoding. Our data suggest that identifying these biases is of paramount importance to enable a correct identification and relative quantification of community members.

基于环境DNA的高通量测序（HTS）的技术为研究真菌多样性提供了新的途径。然而，这些技术遭受了一些方法上的偏见，这些偏见可能出现在metabarcoding研究的任何步骤中。空气是真菌可以被发现的最重要的环境之一，因为它是许多物种分散的主要媒介。展望未来的发展，决定测试20种方案，包括不同的被动孢子陷阱，孢子恢复程序，DNA提取试剂盒和条形码基因座。用Illumina MiSeq平台针对真菌内转录间隔区的两个亚位点进行HTS。多变量分析和广义线性模型表明，被HTS metabarcoding评估时，被动孢子捕捉器的类型，孢子恢复程序和条形码在丰富度和多样性方面均影响真菌群落的描述。相反，DNA提取试剂盒并没有显着影响这些结果。虽然被动圈闭可能被用来描述空气真菌群落，但是一项使用特定实时PCR和模拟群落的研究表明，这些圈套受环境条件的影响，可能会导致生物材料的损失，从而影响多样性和群落组成结果。重要性高通量测序（HTS）方法（如新一代测序（NGS）技术提供的方法）的出现为研究不同环境底物的真菌多样性打开了一个新时代。在这项研究中，我们表明，通过使用简单而强大的被动孢子陷阱，可以可靠地实现对空气真菌群落多样性的评估。然而，样品处理方案的比较表明，在用元条形码评估时，若干方法学偏差可能影响真菌多样性的结果。我们的数据表明，识别这些偏见对于社区成员的正确识别和相对量化至关重要。

Journal: Appl. Environ. Microbiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29572213 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Aguayo J, Fourrie...
212. Clinicopathological characteristics of POLE mutation in patients with non-small-cell lung cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Mutations in polymerase ε (POLE), a DNA polymerase involved in DNA replication and repair, have been investigated in endometrial cancers and response to programmed cell death protein 1 (PD-1)/PD-1 ligand (PD-L1) immunotherapy. However, the frequency of POLE gene mutation in patients with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) has not been reported.

已经在子宫内膜癌和对程序性细胞死亡蛋白1（PD-1）/ PD-1配体（PD-L1）免疫疗法的反应中研究了聚合酶ε（POLE）（一种参与DNA复制和修复的DNA聚合酶）中的突变。然而，非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者POLE基因突变的频率尚未见报道。

Journal: Lung Cancer [IF=4.294] PMID: 29572003 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Song Z, Cheng G, ...
213. Identification of a novel KIF13A-RET fusion in lung adenocarcinoma by next-generation sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

RET fusions have been reported in 1-2% of lung adenocarcinomas, and represent an actionable target. Patients whose tumors possess RET fusion are associated with clinical benefit from the treatment with multi-kinase inhibitors such as cabozantinib and vandetanib. Further molecular screening for RET fusions is warranted. Novel KIF13A-RET fusion containing an intact RET kinase domain involving exons 1-18 of KIF13A and exons 12-20 of RET was identified in a lung cancer specimen from an 74-year-old Asian never smoker by next-generation sequencing (NGS) during clinical care. The patient was negative for EGFR, ALK, ROS1 and other putative driver alterations. Fusion analysis is consistent with other described RET fusions and is predicted to result in aberrant constitutive activation caused by dimerization and sensitivity to RET-directed therapies. We describe a novel RET-fusion with molecular characteristics consistent with RET-driven non-small cell lung cancer. Our case expands the spectrum of RET fusion partners and supports broad molecular profiling in non-small cell lung cancer optimizing patient therapeutic options. The new RET fusion has immediate clinical implications for cancer patients.

据报道，1-2％的肺腺癌中有RET融合，并且是可行的靶点。其肿瘤具有RET融合的患者与用多激酶抑制剂如卡洛替尼和凡德他尼治疗的临床益处相关。有必要进一步分子筛选RET融合。通过下一代测序（NGS）从74岁的亚洲人永不吸烟的肺癌样本中鉴定出含有完整的RET激酶结构域的新型KIF13A-RET融合蛋白，该结构涉及KIF13A的外显子1-18和RET的外显子12-20，在临床护理期间。患者对EGFR，ALK，ROS1和其他假定的驱动改变是阴性的。融合分析与其他描述的RET融合是一致的，并且预测导致由RET聚合和对RET定向治疗的敏感性引起的异常组成型活化。我们描述了一种新型RET融合蛋白，其分子特征与RET驱动的非小细胞肺癌一致。我们的案例扩展了RET融合伴侣的范围，并支持在非小细胞肺癌中优化患者治疗选择的广泛分子谱分析。新的RET融合对癌症患者具有直接的临床意义。

Journal: Lung Cancer [IF=4.294] PMID: 29571998 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Zhang X, Li Y, Li...
214. Response to crizotinib in advanced ALK-rearranged non-small cell lung cancers with different ALK-fusion variants.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK) rearrangements are present in approximately 5% of non-small-cell lung cancers (NSCLCs). NSCLCs with ALK-rearrangement can be effectively treated with crizotinib. However, magnitude and duration of responses are found to be heterogeneous. This study explored the clinical efficacy of crizotinib in different ALK variants.

约5％的非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）中存在间变性淋巴瘤激酶（ALK）重排。用克唑替尼可有效治疗ALK重排的NSCLCs。然而，反应的程度和持续时间是多种多样的。本研究探讨了克唑替尼在不同ALK变体中的临床疗效。

215. Acquired EGFR L718V mutation mediates resistance to osimertinib in non-small cell lung cancer but retains sensitivity to afatinib.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) tyrosine kinase inhibitors (TKIs) are promising targeted therapies for EGFR-mutated non-small-cell lung cancer (NSCLC) patients. However, acquired resistance inevitably develops. Comprehensive and dynamic companion genomic diagnosis can gain insights into underlying resistance mechanisms, thereby help oncologists and patients to make informed decision on the potential benefit of the treatment.

表皮生长因子受体（EGFR）酪氨酸激酶抑制剂（TKIs）是EGFR突变的非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者的有希望的靶向治疗。然而，获得性抵抗不可避免地会发展。全面和动态的伴侣基因组诊断可以深入了解潜在的耐药机制，从而帮助肿瘤学家和患者对治疗的潜在益处作出明智的决定。

216. Comprehensive analysis of cancers of unknown primary for the biomarkers of response to immune checkpoint blockade therapy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Cancer of unknown primary (CUP) accounts for approximately 3% of all malignancies. Avoiding immune destruction is a major cancer characteristic and therapies aimed at immune checkpoint blockade are in use for several specific cancer types. A comprehensive survey of predictive biomarkers to immune checkpoint blockade in CUP were explored in this study.

未知原发癌（CUP）约占所有恶性肿瘤的3％。避免免疫破坏是一种主要的癌症特征，针对免疫检查点阻断的疗法正在用于几种特定的癌症类型。本研究探讨了预防性生物标志物对银屑病免疫检查点阻滞的全面调查。

217. Novel putative drivers revealed by targeted exome sequencing of advanced solid tumors.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next generation sequencing (NGS) is becoming increasingly integrated into oncological practice and clinical research. NGS methods have also provided evidence for clonal evolution of cancers during disease progression and treatment. The number of variants associated with response to specific therapeutic agents keeps increasing. However, the identification of novel driver mutations as opposed to passenger (phenotypically silent or clinically irrelevant) mutations remains a major challenge. We conducted targeted exome sequencing of advanced solid tumors from 44 pre-treated patients with solid tumors including breast, colorectal and lung carcinomas, neuroendocrine tumors, sarcomas and others. We catalogued established driver mutations and putative new drivers as predicted by two distinct algorithms. The established drivers we detected were consistent with published observations. However, we also detected a significant number of mutations with driver potential never described before in each tumor type we studied. These putative drivers belong to key cell fate regulatory networks, including potentially druggable pathways. Should our observations be confirmed, they would support the hypothesis that new driver mutations are selected by treatment in clinically aggressive tumors, and indicate a need for longitudinal genomic testing of solid tumors to inform second line cancer treatment.

新一代测序（NGS）正日益融入肿瘤学实践和临床研究。 NGS方法也为疾病进展和治疗过程中癌症的克隆演变提供了证据。与对特定治疗剂的反应相关的变体的数量不断增加。然而，与乘客（表型沉默或临床无关的）突变相对的新型驱动突变的鉴定仍然是主要挑战。我们对来自44例接受过实体瘤治疗的患者（包括乳腺癌，结肠直肠癌和肺癌，神经内分泌肿瘤，肉瘤等）的高级实体瘤进行了靶向外显子组测序。按照两种不同的算法预测，我们编制了既定的驱动程序突变和假定的新驱动程序。我们检测到的既定驱动程序与发表的观察结果一致然而，我们还发现了在我们研究的每种肿瘤类型中前面没有描述过的具有驱动潜能的大量突变。这些推定的驱动因素属于关键的细胞命运监管网络，包括潜在的可药用途径。如果我们的观察结果得到证实，他们将支持这样的假设，即通过临床侵袭性肿瘤的治疗选择新的驱动突变，并且表明需要对实体瘤进行纵向基因组测试以通知二线癌症治疗。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29570743 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Pannuti A, Filipo... PMC5865730
218. A Whole Germline BRCA2 Gene Deletion: How to Learn from CNV In Silico Analysis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

BRCA1/2 screening in Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Syndrome (HBOC) is an essential step for effective patients' management. Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) can rapidly provide high throughput and reliable information about the qualitative and quantitative status of tumor-associated genes. Straightforwardly, bioinformatics methods play a key role in molecular diagnostics pipelines. BRCA1/2 genes were evaluated with our NGS workflow, coupled with Multiplex Amplicon Quantification (MAQ) and Multiplex Ligation-dependent Probe Amplification (MLPA) assays. Variant calling was performed on Amplicon Suite, while Copy Number Variant (CNV) prediction by in house and commercial CNV tools, before confirmatory MAQ/MLPA testing. The germline profile of BRCA genes revealed a unique HBOC pattern. Although variant calling analysis pinpointed heterozygote and homozygote polymorphisms on BRCA1 and BRCA2, respectively, the CNV predicted by our script suggested two conflicting interpretations: BRCA1 duplication and/or BRCA2 deletion. Our commercial software reported a BRCA1 duplication, in contrast with variant calling results. Finally, the MAQ/MLPA assays assessed a whole BRCA2 copy loss. In silico CNV analysis is a time and cost-saving procedure to powerfully identify possible Large Rearrangements using robust and efficient NGS pipelines. Our layout shows as bioinformatics algorithms alone cannot completely and correctly identify whole BRCA1/2 deletions/duplications. In particular, the complete deletion of an entire gene, like in our case, cannot be solved without alternative strategies as MLPA/MAQ. These findings support the crucial role of bioinformatics in deciphering pitfalls within NGS data analysis.

BRCA1 / 2筛查遗传性乳腺癌和卵巢综合征（HBOC）是有效治疗患者的必要步骤。新一代测序（NGS）可以快速提供关于肿瘤相关基因的定性和定量状态的高通量和可靠信息。简而言之，生物信息学方法在分子诊断流水线中发挥关键作用。用我们的NGS工作流程评估BRCA1 / 2基因，并结合多重扩增子定量（MAQ）和多重连接依赖性探针扩增（MLPA）分析。在确认MAQ / MLPA测试之前，在Amplicon Suite上进行变体调用，同时使用内部和商业CNV工具进行拷贝数变异（CNV）预测。 BRCA基因的种系特征揭示了独特的HBOC模式。虽然变异调用分析针对BRCA1和BRCA2上的杂合子和纯合子多态性，我们的脚本预测的CNV提示两个相互矛盾的解释：BRCA1重复和/或BRCA2缺失。我们的商业软件报告了BRCA1重复，与变体调用结果相比较。最后，MAQ / MLPA分析评估了整个BRCA2拷贝丢失。计算机模拟CNV分析是一个节省时间和成本的过程，可以使用强大而高效的NGS管道强有力地识别可能的大型重排。我们的布局显示单独的生物信息学算法不能完全和正确地识别整个BRCA1 / 2缺失/重复。特别是，如果没有MLPA / MAQ等替代策略，就不能解决整个基因的完全缺失，就像我们的情况一样。这些发现支持生物信息学在解析NGS数据分析中的缺陷方面的重要作用。

Journal: Int J Mol Sci [IF=3.226] PMID: 29570666 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Scaglione GL, Con...
219. Rhizosphere Microbiome Modulators: Contributions of Nitrogen Fixing Bacteria towards Sustainable Agriculture.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Rhizosphere microbiome which has been shown to enhance plant growth and yield are modulated or influenced by a few environmental factors such as soil type, plant cultivar, climate change and anthropogenic activities. In particular, anthropogenic activity, such as the use of nitrogen-based chemical fertilizers, is associated with environmental destruction and this calls for a more ecofriendly strategy to increase nitrogen levels in agricultural land. This feat is attainable by harnessing nitrogen-fixing endophytic and free-living rhizobacteria. Rhizobium, Pseudomonas, Azospirillum and Bacillus, have been found to have positive impacts on crops by enhancing both above and belowground biomass and could therefore play positive roles in achieving sustainable agriculture outcomes. Thus, it is necessary to study this rhizosphere microbiome with more sophisticated culture-independent techniques such as next generation sequencing (NGS) with the prospect of discovering novel bacteria with plant growth promoting traits. This review is therefore aimed at discussing factors that can modulate rhizosphere microbiome with focus on the contributions of nitrogen fixing bacteria towards sustainable agricultural development and the techniques that can be used for their study.

已显示增强植物生长和产量的根际微生物组受到少数环境因素如土壤类型，植物栽培品种，气候变化和人类活动的调节或影响。特别是人为活动，如使用氮基化肥，与环境破坏有关，这就要求采取更加环保的策略来增加农地的氮含量。这项壮举是通过利用固氮内生菌和自由活的根瘤菌来实现的。根瘤菌，假单胞菌属，固氮螺菌属和芽孢杆菌属已被发现通过提高地上和地下生物量对作物产生积极影响，因此可以在实现可持续农业成果方面发挥积极作用。因此，有必要用更复杂的不依赖于培养的技术（如下一代测序（NGS））研究这种根际微生物群，以期发现具有植物生长促进特性的新细菌。因此，这篇综述旨在讨论调节根际微生物组的因素，重点讨论固氮细菌对可持续农业发展的贡献以及可用于他们研究的技术。

Journal: Int J Environ Res Public Health [IF=.] PMID: 29570619 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Igiehon NO, Babal...
220. Detection of Significant Copy Number Variations From Multiple Samples in Next-Generation Sequencing Data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Analyzing copy number variations (CNVs) from next-generation sequencing (NGS) data has become a common approach to detect disease susceptibility genes. The main challenge is how to utilize the NGS data with limited coverage depth to detect significant CNVs. Here, we introduce a new statistical method, the derivative of correlation coefficient (DCC), to detect significant CNVs that recurrently occur in multiple samples using read depth signals. We use a sliding window to calculate a correlation coefficient for each genome bin, and compute corresponding derivatives by fitting curves to the correlation coefficient. Then, the detection of significant CNVs was transformed into a problem of detecting significant derivatives reflecting genome breakpoints that can be solved using statistical hypothesis testing. We tested and compared the performance of DCC against several peer methods using a large number of simulation data sets, and validated DCC using several real sequencing data sets derived from the European Genome-Phenome archive, DNA Data Bank of Japan, and the 1000 Genomes Project. Experimental results suggest that DCC is an effective approach for identifying CNVs, outperforming peer methods in the terms of detection power and accuracy. DCC can be used to detect significant or recurrent CNVs in various NGS data sets, thus providing useful information to study genomic mutations and find disease susceptibility genes.

分析来自新一代测序（NGS）数据的拷贝数变异（CNV）已成为检测疾病易感基因的常用方法。主要挑战是如何利用覆盖深度有限的NGS数据来检测重要的CNV。在这里，我们引入一种新的统计方法，即相关系数（DCC）的导数，以检测使用读取深度信号在多个样本中反复发生的显着CNV。我们使用滑动窗口计算每个基因组bin的相关系数，并通过拟合相关系数曲线来计算相应的导数。然后，将显着CNV的检测转化成检测显着衍生物的问题，所述衍生物反映可使用统计假设检验来解决的基因组断点。我们使用大量模拟数据集对DCC的性能进行了测试并与几种同类方法进行了比较，并使用来自欧洲Genome-Phenome存档，日本DNA数据库和1000基因组计划的几个真实测序数据集验证了DCC 。实验结果表明，DCC是识别CNV的有效方法，其在检测能力和准确度方面优于对等方法。 DCC可用于检测各种NGS数据集中的显着或复发CNV，从而为研究基因组突变和发现疾病易感基因提供有用的信息。

Journal: IEEE Trans Nanobioscience [IF=.] PMID: 29570071 PubDate: 2018-Mar Authors: Yuan X, Zhang J, ...
221. Quantitative T-cell repertoire analysis of peripheral blood mononuclear cells from lung cancer patients following long-term cancer peptide vaccination.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Therapeutic cancer peptide vaccination is an immunotherapy designed to elicit cytotoxic T-lymphocyte (CTL) responses in patients. A number of therapeutic vaccination trials have been performed, nevertheless there are only a few reports that have analyzed the T-cell receptors (TCRs) expressed on tumor antigen-specific CTLs. Here, we use next-generation sequencing (NGS) to analyze TCRs of vaccine-induced CTL clones and the TCR repertoire of bulk T cells in peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from two lung cancer patients over the course of long-term vaccine therapy. In both patients, vaccination with two epitope peptides derived from cancer/testis antigens (upregulated lung cancer 10 (URLC10) and cell division associated 1 (CDCA1)) induced specific CTLs expressing various TCRs. All URLC10-specific CTL clones tested showed Ca2+ influx, IFN-γ production, and cytotoxicity when co-cultured with URLC10-pulsed tumor cells. Moreover, in CTL clones that were not stained with the URLC10/MHC-multimer, the CD3 ζ chain was not phosphorylated. NGS of the TCR repertoire of bulk PBMCs demonstrated that the frequency of vaccine peptide-specific CTL clones was near the minimum detectable threshold level. These results demonstrate that vaccination induces antigen-specific CTLs expressing various TCRs at different time points in cancer patients, and that some CTL clones are maintained in PBMCs during long-term treatment, including some with TCRs that do not bind peptide/MHC-multimer.

治疗性癌症肽疫苗接种是旨在引发患者中的细胞毒性T淋巴细胞（CTL）应答的免疫疗法。已经进行了许多治疗性疫苗接种试验，但是仅有少数报道分析了在肿瘤抗原特异性CTL上表达的T细胞受体（TCR）。在这里，我们使用新一代测序（NGS）来分析疫苗诱导的CTL克隆的TCR和在两种肺癌患者的长期疫苗疗法过程中的外周血单核细胞（PBMC）中的大量T细胞的TCR库。在两例患者中，用来源于癌症/睾丸抗原的两种表位肽（上调的肺癌10（URLC10）和细胞分裂相关的1（CDCA1））的疫苗接种诱导表达各种TCR的特异性CTL。与URLC10脉冲的肿瘤细胞共培养时，所有测试的URLC10特异性CTL克隆显示出Ca2 +内流，IFN-γ产生和细胞毒性。此外，在未用URLC10 / MHC多聚体染色的CTL克隆中，CD3ζ链不被磷酸化。大量PBMC的TCR库的NGS证明疫苗肽特异性CTL克隆的频率接近最小可检测阈值水平。这些结果表明接种疫苗诱导在癌症患者的不同时间点表达各种TCR的抗原特异性CTL，并且一些CTL克隆在长期治疗期间保持在PBMC中，包括一些TCR不结合肽/ MHC多聚体。

Journal: Cancer Immunol. Immunother. [IF=.] PMID: 29568993 PubDate: 2018-Mar-22 Authors: Takeda K, Kitaura...
222. Ten steps to get started in Genome Assembly and Annotation.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

As a part of the ELIXIR-EXCELERATE efforts in capacity building, we present here 10 steps to facilitate researchers getting started in genome assembly and genome annotation. The guidelines given are broadly applicable, intended to be stable over time, and cover all aspects from start to finish of a general assembly and annotation project. Intrinsic properties of genomes are discussed, as is the importance of using high quality DNA. Different sequencing technologies and generally applicable workflows for genome assembly are also detailed. We cover structural and functional annotation and encourage readers to also annotate transposable elements, something that is often omitted from annotation workflows. The importance of data management is stressed, and we give advice on where to submit data and how to make your results Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable (FAIR).

作为ELIXIR-EXCELERATE在能力建设方面努力的一部分，我们在这里介绍10个步骤，以促进研究人员开始基因组组装和基因组注释。所给出的指导方针是广泛适用的，旨在保持一段时间的稳定性，涵盖从大会和注释项目开始到结束的所有方面。讨论基因组的内在特性，以及使用高质量DNA的重要性。还详细介绍了不同的测序技术和通用的基因组组装工作流程。我们涵盖结构和功能注释，并鼓励读者也对转座元素进行注释，这些注释工作流程通常会忽略这些元素。强调数据管理的重要性，并就如何提交数据以及如何使结果可查找，可访问，可互操作和可重复使用（FAIR）提供建议。

Journal: F1000Res [IF=.] PMID: 29568489 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Dominguez Del Ang... PMC5850084
223. Performance evaluation method for read mapping tool in clinical panel sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

In addition to the rapid advancement in Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) technology, clinical panel sequencing is being used increasingly in clinical studies and tests. However, tools that are used in NGS data analysis have not been comparatively evaluated in performance for panel sequencing. This study aimed to evaluate the tools used in the alignment process, the first procedure in bioinformatics analysis, by comparing tools that have been widely used with ones that have been introduced recently. With the accumulated panel sequencing data, detected variant lists were cataloged and inserted into simulated reads produced from the reference genome (h19). The amount of unmapped reads and misaligned reads, mapping quality distribution, and runtime were measured as standards for comparison. As the most widely used tools, Bowtie2 and BWA-MEM each showed explicit performance with AUC of 0.9984 and 0.9970 respectively. Kart, maintaining superior runtime and less number of misaligned read, also similarly possessed high level of AUC (0.9723). Such selection and optimization method of tools appropriate for panel sequencing can be utilized for fields requiring error minimization, such as clinical application and liquid biopsy studies.

除了新一代测序（NGS）技术的快速发展之外，临床小组测序正在越来越多地用于临床研究和测试。然而，用于NGS数据分析的工具在面板测序的性能方面还没有得到相对的评估。本研究旨在通过比较已广泛使用的工具和最近推出的工具，评估对齐过程中使用的工具，这是生物信息学分析的第一步。利用累积的面板测序数据，检测到的变体列表被编目并插入到参考基因组（h19）产生的模拟读数中。测量未映射读取和未对齐读取的数量，映射质量分布和运行时间作为比较标准。作为使用最广泛的工具，Bowtie2和BWA-MEM各自显示出明显的性能，AUC分别为0.9984和0.9970。卡丁车保持卓越的运行时间和较少的错位读取数量，同样具有较高的AUC水平（0.9723）。适用于面板测序的工具的这种选择和优化方法可用于需要误差最小化的领域，例如临床应用和液体活检研究。

Journal: Genes Genomics [IF=.] PMID: 29568413 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Lee H, Lee KW, Le... PMC5846869
224. The single-nucleotide polymorphisms in CHD5 affect the prognosis of patients with hepatocellular carcinoma.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Previous studies showed that the low expressions of chromodomain-helicase-DNA-binding protein 5 (CHD5) were intensively associated with deteriorative biologic and clinical characteristics as well as outcomes in many tumors. The aim of this study is to determine whether CHD5 single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) contribute to the prognosis of hepatocellular carcima (HCC). The SNPs were selected according to their linkage disequilibrium (LD) in the targeted next-generation sequencing (NGS) and then genotyped with TaqMan probers. We revealed a rare haplotype AG in CHD5 (SNPs: rs12564469-rs9434711) was markedly associated with HCC prognosis. The univariate and multivariate regression analyses revealed the patients with worse overall survival time were those with tumor metastasis and haplotype AG, as well as cirrhosis, poor differentiation and IV-TNM stage. Based on the available public databases, we discovered the significant association between haplotype AG and CHD5 mRNA expressions only existed in Chinese. These data proposed that the potentially genetic haplotype might functionally contribute to HCC prognosis and CHD5 mRNA expressions.

以前的研究表明chromodomain-helicase-DNA-binding protein 5（CHD5）的低表达与许多肿瘤的恶化生物和临床特征以及结果密切相关。本研究的目的是确定CHD5单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）是否有助于肝细胞癌（HCC）的预后。根据目标下一代测序（NGS）中的连锁不平衡（LD）选择SNP，然后用TaqMan探针进行基因分型。我们揭示了CHD5中罕见的单体型AG（SNPs：rs12564469-rs9434711）与HCC预后显着相关。单因素和多因素回归分析显示总生存时间较短的患者为肿瘤转移和单体型AG，以及肝硬化，分化差和IV-TNM分期。基于现有的公共数据库，我们发现单倍型AG与CHD5 mRNA表达之间的显着相关性仅存在于汉语中。这些数据提出，潜在的遗传单倍型可能在功能上有助于HCC预后和CHD5 mRNA表达。

Journal: Oncotarget [IF=5.168] PMID: 29568352 PubDate: 2018-Mar-02 Authors: Zhu X, Kong Q, Xi... PMC5862573
225. A complete, homozygous CRX deletion causing nullizygosity is a new genetic mechanism for Leber congenital amaurosis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

CRX is a transcription factor required for activating the expression of many photoreceptor-neuron genes. CRX may be mutated in three forms of human blindness; Leber congenital amaurosis (LCA), cone-rod degeneration (CRD) and retinitis pigmentosa (RP). The pathogenic mechanism in most cases is likely dominant negative, with gain of function. We report a novel, complete homozygous CRX deletion in LCA. We identified a Lebanese family with 3 affected LCA cases. The proband was sequenced by NGS. Quantitative PCR, array comparative genomic hybridization, and long range PCR were performed. Full eye examinations, OCT and photography were performed. We identified a homozygous 56,000 bp deletion of CRX, which co-segregates and is heterozygous in four parents, who report normal vision. The blind children with LCA manifest severe retinal degeneration, a phenotype typical for CRX and LCA. We hypothesized that a single copy of CRX (haplo-insufficiency) in the causes mild abnormal foveal development, but not LCA. Two parents had significant inner and outer foveal and photoreceptor abnormalities. This is the first reported case of a homozygous, complete CRX deletion. Nullizygosity of CRX thus causes LCA while haplo-insufficiency of CRX causes abnormal foveal development, but not LCA. Our data suggest a new disease mechanism for CRX.

CRX是激活许多光感受器 - 神经元基因表达所需的转录因子。 CRX可能以三种人类失明形式发生突变;莱伯先天性黑蒙（LCA），锥形杆变性（CRD）和视网膜色素变性（RP）。大多数病例的致病机制可能占主导地位，功能获益。我们报告了LCA中新的完全纯合CRX缺失。我们确定了一个黎巴嫩家庭，其中有3个受影响的LCA病例。先证者被NGS测序。进行定量PCR，阵列比较基因组杂交和长距离PCR。进行全面的眼科检查，OCT和摄影。我们确定了CRX的纯合56,000bp缺失，其在共报道并且在报告正常视力的四位父母中是杂合的。患有LCA的盲童表现出严重的视网膜变性，这是CRX和LCA典型的表型。我们假设CRX（单倍体不全）的单个副本导致轻度异常中心凹发育，但不是LCA。两名父母有显着的内部和外部中心凹和感光异常。这是首例报道的纯合CRX完全缺失病例。 CRX的无效合成因此导致LCA，而CRX的单倍体不足导致异常中心凹发育，但不是LCA。我们的数据表明CRX有一种新的疾病机制。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29568065 PubDate: 2018-Mar-22 Authors: Ibrahim MT, Alarc... PMC5864841
226. False positive plasma genotyping due to clonal hematopoiesis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Plasma cell-free DNA (cfDNA) genotyping is increasingly used in cancer care, but assay accuracy is debated. Because most cfDNA is derived from peripheral blood cells (PBC), we hypothesized that nonmalignant mutations harbored by hematopoietic cells (clonal hematopoiesis, CH) could be a cause of false positive plasma genotyping.  Experimental Design: We identified patients with advanced NSCLC with KRAS, JAK2, or TP53 mutations identified in cfDNA. With consent, PBC DNA was tested using droplet digital PCR (ddPCR) or next-generation sequencing (NGS) to test for CH-derived mutations.  Results: We first studied plasma ddPCR results from 58 EGFR-mutant NSCLC patients. Two had KRAS G12X detected in cfDNA and both were present in PBC, including one where the KRAS mutation was detected serially for 20 months. We then studied 143 plasma NGS results from 122 NSCLC patients, and identified 5 JAK2 V617F mutations derived from PBC. Additionally, 108 TP53 mutations were detected in cfDNA; for 33 of the TP53 mutations, PBC and tumor NGS were available for comparison, and 5 were present in PBC but absent in tumor, consistent with CH.

无细胞浆细胞DNA（cfDNA）基因分型越来越多地用于癌症治疗，但检测的准确性还存在争议。由于大多数cfDNA来自外周血细胞（PBC），我们假设造血细胞（克隆造血细胞，CH）含有的非恶性突变可能是假阳性血浆基因分型的原因。实验设计：我们鉴定了患有晚期NSCLC的患者，其具有在cfDNA中鉴定的KRAS，JAK2或TP53突变。经同意，使用液滴数字PCR（ddPCR）或下一代测序（NGS）测试PBC DNA以测试CH-衍生的突变。结果：我们首先研究了来自58个EGFR突变NSCLC患者的血浆ddPCR结果。两个在c​​fDNA中检测到KRAS G12X，两者均存在于PBC中，包括其中连续20个月检测到KRAS突变的一个。然后，我们研究了来自122名NSCLC患者的143种血浆NGS结果，并​​确定了5种来源于PBC的JAK2 V617F突变。另外，在cfDNA中检测到108个TP53突变;对于TP53突变中的33个，PBC和肿瘤NGS可用于比较，并且5个存在于PBC中但在肿瘤中不存在，与CH一致。

Journal: Clin. Cancer Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29567812 PubDate: 2018-Mar-22 Authors: Hu Y, Ulrich B, S...
227. The characteristics of ctDNA reveal the high complexity in matching the corresponding tumor tissues.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) is an efficient and sensitive method to detect mutations from ctDNA. Many features and clinical conditions could significantly affect the concordance between ctDNA and corresponding tumor tissues. Our goal was to systematically investigate the critical factors contributing to different concordance between ctDNA and corresponding tumor tissues.

新一代测序（NGS）是检测ctDNA突变的有效方法。许多特征和临床条件可以显着影响ctDNA和相应肿瘤组织之间的一致性。我们的目标是系统调查ctDNA与相应肿瘤组织不同一致性的关键因素。

Journal: BMC Cancer [IF=3.288] PMID: 29566644 PubDate: 2018-Mar-23 Authors: Yang N, Li Y, Liu... PMC5865353
228. Next-generation sequencing analysis of a cluster of hepatitis C virus infections in a haematology and oncology center.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Molecular characterization of early hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection remains rare. Ten out of 78 patients of a hematology/oncology center were found to be HCV RNA positive two to four months after hospitalization. Only two of the ten patients were anti-HCV positive. HCV hypervariable region 1 (HVR1) was amplified in seven patients (including one anti-HCV positive) and analyzed by next generation sequencing (NGS). Genetic variants were reconstructed by Shorah and an empirically established 0.5% variant frequency cut-off was implemented. These sequences were compared by phylogenetic and diversity analyses. Ten unrelated blood donors with newly acquired HCV infection detected at the time of donation (HCV RNA positive and anti-HCV negative) served as controls. One to seven HVR1 variants were found in each patient. Sequences intermixed phylogenetically with no evidence of clustering in individual patients. These sequences were more similar to each other (similarity 95.4% to 100.0%) than to those of controls (similarity 64.8% to 82.6%). An identical predominant variant was present in four patients, whereas other closely related variants dominated in the remaining three patients. In five patients the HCV population was limited to a single variant or one predominant variant and minor variants of less than 10% frequency. In conclusion, NGS analysis of a cluster of HCV infections acquired in the hospital setting revealed the presence of low diversity, very closely related variants in all patients, suggesting an early-stage infection with the same virus. NGS combined with phylogenetic analysis and classical epidemiological analysis could help in tracking of HCV outbreaks.

早期丙型肝炎病毒（HCV）感染的分子特征仍然很少见。在血液学/肿瘤中心的78例患者中，有10例在住院后两到四个月内发现HCV RNA阳性。十名患者中只有两名患者抗-HCV阳性。在7位患者（包括一个抗-HCV阳性）中扩增HCV高变区1（HVR1）并通过下一代测序（NGS）进行分析。遗传变异由Shorah重建，并实施了经验建立的0.5％变异频率截止值。这些序列通过系统发育和多样性分析进行比较。在捐献时检测到10个与HCV新感染感染无关的献血者（HCV RNA阳性和抗HCV阴性）作为对照。在每个患者中发现1至7个HVR1变体。序列混杂在系统发育中，没有证据表明个体患者聚集。这些序列彼此更相似（相似性95.4％至100.0％）比对照者（相似性64.8％至82.6％）更相似。 4名患者中存在相同的主要变体，而其余3名患者中以其他密切相关的变体为主。在五名患者中，HCV群体限于单个变体或一个主要变体和少于10％频率的次要变体。总之，在医院环境中获得的一组HCV感染的NGS分析显示所有患者中存在低多样性，非常密切相关的变体，表明与相同病毒的早期感染。 NGS与系统发育分析和经典流行病学分析相结合有助于追踪HCV暴发。

Journal: PLoS ONE [IF=2.806] PMID: 29566084 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Caraballo Cortes ... PMC5864040
229. JAK2 V617F mutation in plasma cell-free DNA preceding clinically overt myelofibrosis: Implications for early diagnosis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

A 52 year-old man with Erdheim-Chester Disease (ECD) (a non-Lanherhans polyostotic sclerosing histiocytosis) had next-generation sequencing (NGS) performed as part of his diagnostic workup. In addition to the tissue BRAF V600E mutation that is found in over 50% of ECD cases, he was also found to have a JAK2 V617F alteration in cell-free circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) (liquid biopsy). The latter was thought to be an "incidental" finding, perhaps due to clonal hematopoiesis (though this usually occurs in older individuals), as his blood counts were normal and he had no splenomegaly. Approximately 13 months after the ctDNA test showing JAK2 V617F, he developed anemia, thrombocytopenia, and splenomegaly. Marrow biopsy then showed megakaryocytic atypia and markedly increased marrow fibrosis, consistent with WHO grade 2 of 3 myelofibrosis. Therefore, the patient was determined to have ECD with a typical BRAF V600E mutation, as well as primary myelofibrosis, with the latter diagnosis manifesting clinically over one year after the JAK2 V617F was first detected in ctDNA. He recently was started on the JAK2 inhibitor ruxolitinib. This case demonstrates that genomic alterations detected by liquid biopsy for evaluation of specific malignancies already present may serve as an early harbinger of hematological disease.

Erdheim-Chester病（ECD）（一种非Lanherhans多形性硬化性组织细胞增多症）的52岁男性在其诊断检查中进行了下一代测序（NGS）。除了在超过50％的ECD病例中发现的组织BRAF V600E突变之外，他还发现在无细胞循环肿瘤DNA（ctDNA）（液体活组织检查）中具有JAK2 V617F改变。后者被认为是“偶然的”发现，可能是由于克隆性造血作用（尽管这通常发生在年长的个体中），因为他的血细胞计数正常并且没有脾肿大。在ctDNA检测显示JAK2 V617F约13个月后，他发生贫血，血小板减少和脾肿大。骨髓活检显示巨核细胞异型性明显增加，骨髓纤维化增多，符合WHO 2级骨髓纤维化3级。因此，患者被确定患有典型的BRAF V600E突变的ECD以及原发性骨髓纤维化，后者在ctDNA中首次检测到JAK2 V617F后临床表现临床超过一年。他最近开始使用JAK2抑制剂ruxolitinib。本案例表明，液体活检检测到的基因组改变可用于评估已存在的特定恶性肿瘤，可能是血液疾病的早期预兆。

Journal: Cancer Biol. Ther. [IF=.] PMID: 29565699 PubDate: 2018-Mar-22 Authors: Choi MY, Kato S, ...
230. Heterogeneity of Circulating Tumor Cells in Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy of Breast Cancer.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The biological properties of circulating tumor cells (CTCs), and their dynamics during neoadjuvant chemotherapy are important, both for disease progression prediction and therapeutic target determination, with the aim of preventing disease progression. The aim of our study was to estimate of different CTC subsets in breast cancer during the NACT (neoadjuvant chemotherapy). The prospective study includes 27 patients with invasive breast cancer, T2-4N0-3M0, aged 32 to 60 years. Venous heparinized blood samples, taken before and after biopsy, after each courses of chemotherapy (on days 3-7), and before surgical intervention, served as the material for this study. Different subsets of circulating tumor cells were determined on the basis of the expression of EpCAM, CD45, CD44, CD24, and N-Cadherin using flow cytometry. As the result of this study, it has been observed that significant changes in the quantity of the different subsets of circulating tumor cells in patients' blood were observed after carrying out the 3rd course of NACT. NACT causes significant changes in the quantity of six CTC subsets, with various combinations of stemness and epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT) properties.

循环肿瘤细胞（CTC）的生物学特性及其在新辅助化疗过程中的动态变化对疾病进展预测和治疗靶点确定都很重要，目的在于预防疾病进展。我们研究的目的是评估NACT（新辅助化疗）期间乳腺癌中不同的CTC亚型。前瞻性研究包括27例浸润性乳腺癌患者T2-4N0-3M0，年龄32-60岁。活检前后，每次化疗后（第3-7天）以及手术干预前采集静脉肝素化血液样本作为本研究的材料。使用流式细胞术根据EpCAM，CD45，CD44，CD24和N-钙粘蛋白的表达来确定循环肿瘤细胞的不同子集。作为这项研究的结果，已经观察到在进行NACT的第三个疗程后，观察到患者血液中循环肿瘤细胞的不同亚组的数量的显着变化。 NACT引起六种CTC亚群数量的显着变化，具有干性和上皮 - 间充质转变（EMT）性质的各种组合。

Journal: Molecules [IF=2.861] PMID: 29565320 PubDate: 2018-Mar-22 Authors: Kaigorodova EV, S...
231. Looking for Broken TAD Boundaries and Changes on DNA Interactions: Clinical Guide to 3D Chromatin Change Analysis in Complex Chromosomal Rearrangements and Chromothripsis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Apparition of next-generation sequencing (NGS) was a breakthrough on knowledge of genome structure. Bioinformatic tools are a key point to analyze this huge amount of data from NGS and characterize the three-dimensional organization of chromosomes. This chapter describes usage of different browsers to explore publicly available online data and to search for possible 3D chromatin changes involved during complex chromosomal rearrangements as chromothripsis. Their pathogenic impact on clinical phenotype and gene misexpression can also be evaluated with annotated databases.

下一代测序（NGS）的发现是基因组结构知识的一个突破。生物信息学工具是分析来自NGS的大量数据并表征染色体的三维组织的关键。本章介绍不同浏览器的用法，以探索公开可用的在线数据，并搜索染色体重排期间可能发生的3D染色质变化。它们对临床表型和基因表达的致病影响也可以用注释数据库进行评估。

Journal: Methods Mol. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29564835 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Yauy K, Gatinois ...
232. RNA-Seq Analysis to Detect Abnormal Fusion Transcripts Linked to Chromothripsis.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

RNA-Seq approach enables the detection and characterization of fusion or chimeric transcript associated to complex genome rearrangement. Until now, these events are classically identified at DNA level.Here we describe a complete procedure including a novel way of analyzing reads that combines genomic locations and local coverage to directly infer chimeric junctions with a high sensitivity and specificity, allowing identification of different classes of chimeric RNA events. We also recommend the best practices for the bioinformatics analysis and describe the experimental process for RNA validation using real-time PCR and sequencing.

RNA-Seq方法能够检测和表征与复杂基因组重排相关的融合或嵌合转录物。到目前为止，这些事件是在DNA水平上经典鉴定的。在这里我们描述了一个完整的程序，包括一种分析读数的新方法，它将基因组位置和局部覆盖率结合起来，以高灵敏度和特异性直接推断嵌合结，从而可以鉴定嵌合RNA事件。我们还推荐生物信息学分析的最佳实践，并描述使用实时PCR和测序进行RNA验证的实验过程。

Journal: Methods Mol. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29564822 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Bougé AL, Rufflé ...
233. Gut Microbial Dysbiosis in Indian Children with Autism Spectrum Disorders.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Autism spectrum disorder (ASD) is a term associated with a group of neurodevelopmental disorders. The etiology of ASD is not yet completely understood; however, a disorder in the gut-brain axis is emerging as a prominent factor leading to autism. To identify the taxonomic composition and markers associated with ASD, we compared the fecal microbiota of 30 ASD children diagnosed using Childhood Autism Rating Scale (CARS) score, DSM-5 approved AIIMS-modified INCLEN Diagnostic Tool for Autism Spectrum Disorder (INDT-ASD), and Indian Scale for Assessment of Autism (ISAA) tool, with family-matched 24 healthy children from Indian population using next-generation sequencing (NGS) of 16S rRNA gene amplicon. Our study showed prominent dysbiosis in the gut microbiome of ASD children, with higher relative abundances of families Lactobacillaceae, Bifidobacteraceae, and Veillonellaceae, whereas the gut microbiome of healthy children was dominated by the family Prevotellaceae. Comparative meta-analysis with a publicly available dataset from the US population consisting of 20 ASD and 20 healthy control samples from children of similar age, revealed a significantly high abundance of genus Lactobacillus in ASD children from both the populations. The results reveal the microbial dysbiosis and an association of selected Lactobacillus species with the gut microbiome of ASD children.

自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）是与一组神经发育障碍相关的术语。 ASD的病因尚未完全了解;然而，肠 - 脑轴紊乱正在成为导致自闭症的突出因素。为了确定与ASD相关的分类学组成和标记，我们比较了使用儿童孤独症评定量表（CARS）评分，DSM-5批准的AIIMS修改的INCLEN自闭症谱系障碍诊断工具（INDT-ASD）的30名ASD儿童的粪便微生物群， ，以及印度自闭症评估量表（ISAA）工具，使用16S rRNA基因扩增子的新一代测序（NGS）与来自印度人群的24名健康家庭成员进行比较。我们的研究显示，ASD儿童的肠道微生物组中存在显着的生态失调，家族中乳酸杆菌科，双歧杆菌科和Veillonellaceae的相对丰度较高，而健康儿童的肠道微生物群则以Prevotellaceae科为主。对来自美国人群的20个ASD和20个来自相似年龄的儿童的健康对照样品的公开可用数据集进行的比较荟萃分析揭示了来自两个群体的ASD儿童中乳酸杆菌属的丰度非常高。结果揭示了微生物生态失调以及选定的乳酸杆菌属物种与ASD儿童的肠道微生物群的关联。

Journal: Microb. Ecol. [IF=.] PMID: 29564487 PubDate: 2018-Mar-21 Authors: Pulikkan J, Maji ...

  • Abstract_Chinese

Gallbladder carcinoma, uncommon in most of the world, is frequent in South East Asia. It presents in advanced stages with limited therapeutic options. We investigated targetable predictive and prognostic Markers in 268 cases including 233 primary site lesions and 35 metastatic gallbladder carcinoma.

235. Classification and Biomarker Genes Selection for Cancer Gene Expression Data Using Random Forest.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Microarray and next generation sequencing (NGS) data are the important sources to find helpful molecular patterns. Also, the great number of gene expression data increases the challenge of how to identify the biomarkers associated with cancer. The random forest (RF) is used to effectively analyze the problems of large-p and small-n. Therefore, RF can be used to select and rank the genes for the diagnosis and effective treatment of cancer.

微阵列和下一代测序（NGS）数据是寻找有用分子模式的重要来源。此外，大量基因表达数据增加了如何鉴定与癌症相关的生物标志物的挑战。随机森林（RF）用于有效分析大-p和小-n的问题。因此，RF可用于选择和排列用于癌症诊断和有效治疗的基因。

Journal: Iran J Pathol [IF=.] PMID: 29563929 PubDate: 2017-Fall Authors: Ram M, Najafi A, ... PMC5844678
236. Accelerating public sector rice breeding with high-density KASP markers derived from whole genome sequencing of indica rice.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Few public sector rice breeders have the capacity to use NGS-derived markers in their breeding programmes despite rapidly expanding repositories of rice genome sequence data. They rely on > 18,000 mapped microsatellites (SSRs) for marker-assisted selection (MAS) using gel analysis. Lack of knowledge about target SNP and InDel variant loci has hampered the uptake by many breeders of Kompetitive allele-specific PCR (KASP), a proprietary technology of LGC genomics that can distinguish alleles at variant loci. KASP is a cost-effective single-step genotyping technology, cheaper than SSRs and more flexible than genotyping by sequencing (GBS) or array-based genotyping when used in selection programmes. Before this study, there were 2015 rice KASP marker loci in the public domain, mainly identified by array-based screening, leaving large proportions of the rice genome with no KASP coverage. Here we have addressed the urgent need for a wide choice of appropriate rice KASP assays and demonstrated that NGS can detect many more KASP to give full genome coverage. Through re-sequencing of nine indica rice breeding lines or released varieties, this study has identified 2.5 million variant sites. Stringent filtering of variants generated 1.3 million potential KASP assay designs, including 92,500 potential functional markers. This strategy delivers a 650-fold increase in potential selectable KASP markers at a density of 3.1 per 1 kb in the indica crosses analysed and 377,178 polymorphic KASP design sites on average per cross. This knowledge is available to breeders and has been utilised to improve the efficiency of public sector breeding in Nepal, enabling identification of polymorphic KASP at any region or quantitative trait loci in relevant crosses. Validation of 39 new KASP was carried out by genotyping progeny from a range of crosses to show that they detected segregating alleles. The new KASP have replaced SSRs to aid trait selection during marker-assisted backcrossing in these crosses, where target traits include rice blast and BLB resistance loci. Furthermore, we provide the software for plant breeders to generate KASP designs from their own datasets.

尽管水稻基因组序列数据库迅速扩大，但很少有公共部门的育种者有能力在其育种计划中使用源自NGS的标记。他们利用凝胶分析依靠> 18,000个微卫星标记（SSR）进行标记辅助选择（MAS）。缺乏关于目标SNP和InDel变异基因座的知识妨碍了许多育种者对Kompetitive等位基因特异性PCR（KASP）的吸收，KASP是LGC基因组学的专有技术，可以区分变异基因座上的等位基因。 KASP是一种具有成本效益的单步基因分型技术，比SSR便宜，比用于选择程序的基因分型（GBS）或基于阵列的基因分型更灵活。在本研究之前，2015年公共领域有大米KASP标记位点，主要通过基于阵列的筛选鉴定，留下大部分水稻基因组，没有KASP覆盖。在这里，我们解决了迫切需要广泛选择适当的大米KASP检测方法，并证明NGS可以检测更多的KASP以提供全基因组覆盖。通过重新测序9个籼稻育种品系或释放品种，本研究确定了250万个变异位点。对变体进行严格过滤可产生130万个可能的KASP测定设计，其中包括92,500个潜在的功能标记。该策略在分析的籼稻杂交种中以每1kb 3.1的密度和平均每个杂交种377,178个多态KASP设计位点的密度增加了650倍的可选择的KASP标记物。这些知识可为育种者提供，并已用于提高尼泊尔公共部门育种的效率，从而能够鉴定任何区域的多态KASP或相关杂交的数量性状基因座。通过对来自一系列杂交的后代进行基因分型来验证39新的KASP以显示它们检测到分离等位基因。新的KASP取代了SSRs以帮助在这些杂交中进行标记辅助回交期间的特征选择，其中目标性状包括稻瘟病和BLB抗性基因座。此外，我们还为植物育种者提供软件，用它们自己的数据集生成KASP设计。

Journal: Mol. Breed. [IF=.] PMID: 29563850 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Steele KA, Quinto... PMC5842261
237. Next-Generation Sequencing for Characterizing Drug Resistant Mycobacterium tuberculosis Genes from Clinical Isolates in the Ukraine.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The Ukraine ranks among the top twenty countries with the highest number of multi-drug resistant (MDR), and extensively drug resistant (XDR) Mycobacterium tuberculosis (MTB) cases in the world. However, little is known of the genetic diversity, i.e., resistance signatures in clinical isolates from this region. We analyzed seven of most prevalent MDR/XDR antibiotic resistance conferring genes from clinical isolates (N = 75) collected from geographically diverse Ukrainian oblasts and its southern Crimean peninsula. Genomic analysis revealed 6 (8 %) were sensitive, 3 (4 %) were resistant to at least one antibiotic, 40 (53 %) were MDR, and 26 (35 %) were XDR. The majority of isolates (81 %) were of the Beijing-like lineage. This is the first study to use NGS of clinical isolates from the Ukraine to characterize mutations in genes conferring MTB drug resistance. Several isolates harbored drug resistance signatures that have not been observed in other high burden TB countries. Most notably, the absence of inhA gene promoter mutations, a diversity of mutation types in the rpoB determining region, and detection of heteroresistance provide a broader understanding of MDR/XDR from this area of the world.

乌克兰位居全球前20位耐多药（MDR）和广泛耐药（XDR）结核分枝杆菌（MTB）病例数最高的国家之列。然而，关于遗传多样性的知之甚少，即来自该地区的临床分离株的抗性标记。我们分析了来自地理上多样的乌克兰州及其南部克里米亚半岛的临床分离株（N = 75）中7种最流行的MDR / XDR抗生素抗性赋予基因。基因组分析显示6例（8％）敏感，3例（4％）对至少一种抗生素耐药，40例（53％）为耐多药，26例（35％）为XDR。大部分分离株（81％）属于北京人的血统。这是第一个使用来自乌克兰的临床分离株的NGS来鉴定赋予MTB耐药性的基因突变的研究。几个分离株具有在其他高负担结核病国家尚未观察到的耐药特征。最值得注意的是，inhA基因启动子突变的缺失，rpoB决定区的多样性突变类型以及异源性的检测提供了来自世界这个地区的MDR / XDR的更广泛的理解。

Journal: J. Clin. Microbiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29563202 PubDate: 2018-Mar-21 Authors: Daum LT, Konstant...
238. Reproducibility and repeatability of six high-throughput 16S rDNA sequencing protocols for microbiota profiling.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Culture-independent molecular techniques and advances in next generation sequencing (NGS) technologies make large-scale epidemiological studies on microbiota feasible. A challenge using NGS is to obtain high reproducibility and repeatability, which is mostly attained through robust amplification. We aimed to assess the reproducibility of saliva microbiota by comparing triplicate samples. The microbiota was produced with simplified in-house 16S amplicon assays taking advantage of large number of barcodes. The assays included primers with Truseq (TS-tailed) or Nextera (NX-tailed) adapters and either with dual index or dual index plus a 6-nt internal index. All amplification protocols produced consistent microbial profiles for the same samples. Although, in our study, reproducibility was highest for the TS-tailed method. Five replicates of a single sample, prepared with the TS-tailed 1-step protocol without internal index sequenced on the HiSeq platform provided high alpha-diversity and low standard deviation (mean Shannon and Inverse Simpson diversity was 3.19 ± 0.097 and 13.56 ± 1.634 respectively). Large-scale profiling of microbiota can consistently be produced by all 16S amplicon assays. The TS-tailed-1S dual index protocol is preferred since it provides repeatable profiles on the HiSeq platform and are less labour intensive.

独立于文化的分子技术和下一代测序（NGS）技术的进步使得大规模的微生物群流行病学研究成为可能。使用NGS的挑战是获得高重现性和可重复性，这主要是通过稳健放大来实现的。我们旨在通过比较一式三份样品来评估唾液微生物群的再现性。利用大量条形码利用简化的内部16S扩增子分析生成微生物群。测定包括带有Truseq（TS尾）或Nextera（NX尾）衔接头的引物，以及具有双索引或双索引加上6-nt内部索引的引物。所有的扩增方案对同一样品产生一致的微生物谱。尽管在我们的研究中，TS尾加法的再现性最高。用HiSeq平台上没有内部索引序列的TS尾加1步方案制备的单个样品的5个重复样品提供了高α多样性和低标准差（平均Shannon和逆Simpson多样性分别为3.19±0.097和13.56±1.634 ）。所有16S扩增子检测均可持续产生大规模的微生物群谱分析。 TS-tailed-1S双索引协议是首选，因为它在HiSeq平台上提供可重复的配置文件，并且劳动力密集度较低。

Journal: J. Microbiol. Methods [IF=.] PMID: 29563060 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Raju SC, Lagström...
239. Effective osimertinib treatment in a patient with discordant T790 M mutation detection between liquid biopsy and tissue biopsy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

We report the successful treatment of the patient with osimertinib 80 mg/day following disease progression and a discordance in the detection of a mechanism of resistance epithelial growth factor receptor (EGFR) T790 M between liquid biopsy and tissue biopsy methods.
