Journal: BMC Cancer [IF=3.288] PMID: 29562902 PubDate: 2018-Mar-21 Authors: Mambetsariev I, V... PMC5863467
240. UDiTaS™, a genome editing detection method for indels and genome rearrangements.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Understanding the diversity of repair outcomes after introducing a genomic cut is essential for realizing the therapeutic potential of genomic editing technologies. Targeted PCR amplification combined with Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) or enzymatic digestion, while broadly used in the genome editing field, has critical limitations for detecting and quantifying structural variants such as large deletions (greater than approximately 100 base pairs), inversions, and translocations.

在引入基因组切割后了解修复结果的多样性对于实现基因组编辑技术的治疗潜力至关重要。目标PCR扩增与下一代测序（NGS）或酶促消化相结合，虽然广泛用于基因组编辑领域，但对于检测和定量结构变体（例如大的缺失（大于约100个碱基对），倒位和易位。

Journal: BMC Genomics [IF=3.729] PMID: 29562890 PubDate: 2018-03-21 Authors: Giannoukos G, Ciu... PMC5861650
241. [Spectrum of somatic mutations and their prognostic significance in adult patients with B cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia].
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Objective: To investigate the spectrum of gene mutations in adult patients with B-acute lymphoblastic leukemia (B-ALL), and to analyze the influences of different gene mutations on prognosis. Methods: DNA samples from 113 adult B-ALL patients who administered from June 2009 to September 2015 were collected. Target-specific next generation sequencing (NGS) approach was used to analyze the mutations of 112 genes (focused on the specific mutational hotspots) and all putative mutations were compared against multiple databases to calculate the frequency spectrum. The impact of gene mutation on the patients' overall survival (OS) and recurrence free survival (RFS) was analyzed by the putative mutations through Kaplan-Meier, and Cox regression methods. Results: Of the 113 patients, 103 (92.0%) harbored at least one mutation and 29 (25.6%) harbored more than 3 genes mutation. The five most frequently mutated genes in B-ALL are SF1, FAT1, MPL, PTPN11 and NRAS. Gene mutations are different between Ph+ B-ALL and Ph- B-ALL patients. Ph- B-ALL patients with JAK-STAT signal pathway related gene mutation, such as JAK1/JAK2 mutation showed a poor prognosis compared to the patients without mutation (OS: P=0.011, 0.001; RFS: P=0.014,<0.001). Patients with PTPN11 mutation showed better survival than those without mutation, but the difference was not statistically significant (P value > 0.05). Besides, in Ph+ B-ALL patients whose epigenetic modifications related signaling pathway genes were affected, they had a worse prognosis (OS: P=0.038; RFS: P=0.047). Conclusion: Gene mutations are common in adult ALL patients, a variety of signaling pathways are involved. The frequency and spectrum are varied in different types of B-ALL. JAK family gene mutation usually indicates poor prognosis. The co-occurrence of somatic mutations in adult B-ALL patients indicate the genetic complex and instability of adult B-ALL patients.

目的：探讨成人急性B淋巴细胞白血病（B-ALL）患者基因突变谱，分析不同基因突变对预后的影响。方法：收集2009年6月至2015年9月施行的113名成人B-ALL患者的DNA样本。使用靶特异性下一代测序（NGS）方法分析112个基因的突变（集中在特定的突变热点），并将所有推定的突变与多个数据库进行比较以计算频谱。基因突变对患者总生存（OS）和无复发生存（RFS）的影响通过Kaplan-Meier和Cox回归方法通过推定的突变进行分析。结果：113例患者中，103例（92.0％）存在至少一处突变，29例（25.6％）存在3处以上基因突变。 B-ALL中五个最频繁突变的基因是SF1，FAT1，MPL，PTPN11和NRAS。 Ph + B-ALL和Ph-B-ALL患者之间的基因突变不同。具有JAK-STAT信号通路相关基因突变例如JAK1 / JAK2突变的Ph-B-ALL患者预后较差（OS：P = 0.011,0.001; RFS：P = 0.014，<0.001） 。 PTPN11突变患者的生存率优于无突变者，但差异无统计学意义（P值> 0.05）。此外，Ph + B-ALL患者的表观遗传修饰相关信号通路基因受到影响，其预后较差（OS：P = 0.038; RFS：P = 0.047）。结论：基因突变在成人ALL患者中很常见，涉及多种信号通路。频率和频谱在不同类型的B-ALL中有所不同。 JAK家族基因突变通常表明预后不良。成人B-ALL患者体细胞突变的同时发生表明成人B-ALL患者的遗传复杂性和不稳定性。

Journal: Zhonghua Xue Ye Xue Za Zhi [IF=.] PMID: 29562441 PubDate: 2018-Feb-14 Authors: Feng J, Gong XY, ...
242. Use of the Ion PGM and the GeneReader NGS Systems in Daily Routine Practice for Advanced Lung Adenocarcinoma Patients: A Practical Point of View Reporting a Comparative Study and Assessment of 90 Patients.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Background: With the integration of various targeted therapies into the clinical management of patients with advanced lung adenocarcinoma, next-generation sequencing (NGS) has become the technology of choice and has led to an increase in simultaneously interrogated genes. However, the broader adoption of NGS for routine clinical practice is still hampered by sophisticated workflows, complex bioinformatics analysis and medical interpretation. Therefore, the performance of the novel QIAGEN GeneReader NGS system was compared to an in-house ISO-15189 certified Ion PGM NGS platform. Methods: Clinical samples from 90 patients (60 Retrospectively and 30 Prospectively) with lung adenocarcinoma were sequenced with both systems. Mutations were analyzed and EGFR, KRAS, BRAF, NRAS, ALK, PIK3CA and ERBB2 genes were compared and sampling time and suitability for clinical testing were assessed. Results: Both sequencing systems showed perfect concordance for the overlapping genes. Correlation of allele frequency was r² = 0.93 for the retrospective patients and r² = 0.81 for the prospective patients. Hands-on time and total run time were shorter using the PGM system, while the GeneReader platform provided good traceability and up-to-date interpretation of the results. Conclusion: We demonstrated the suitability of the GeneReader NGS system in routine practice in a clinical pathology laboratory setting.

背景：随着各种靶向治疗与晚期肺腺癌患者的临床管理相结合，新一代测序（NGS）已成为首选技术，并导致同时询问基因的增加。然而，日常临床实践中更广泛地采用NGS仍然受到复杂的工作流程，复杂的生物信息学分析和医学解释的阻碍。因此，新型QIAGEN GeneReader NGS系统的性能与内部通过ISO-15189认证的Ion PGM NGS平台进行了比较。方法：采用两种系统对90例患者（60例回顾性和30例前瞻性）肺腺癌患者的临床样本进行测序。分析突变，并比较EGFR，KRAS，BRAF，NRAS，ALK，PIK3CA和ERBB2基因，并评估采样时间和临床测试的适用性。结果：两种测序系统都显示出重叠基因的完美一致性。回顾性患者的等位基因频率相关性r2 = 0.93，未来患者相关性r2 = 0.81。使用PGM系统的实验时间和总运行时间更短，而GeneReader平台提供了良好的可追溯性和最新的结果解释。结论：我们证明了GeneReader NGS系统在临床病理学实验室环境中的常规实践中的适用性。

Journal: Cancers (Basel) [IF=.] PMID: 29561830 PubDate: 2018-Mar-21 Authors: Heeke S, Hofman V...
243. Genetic cardiomyopathies.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

To describe recent advancements in cardiovascular genetics made possible by leveraging next-generation sequencing (NGS), and to provide a framework for practical applications of genetic testing for hypertrophic (HCM), dilated (DCM), and arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathies (ARVC).

通过利用新一代测序（NGS）描述近期心血管遗传学进展，并为肥厚型（HCM），扩张型（DCM）和致心律失常性右心室心肌病（ARVC）基因检测的实际应用提供框架。

Journal: Curr. Opin. Cardiol. [IF=.] PMID: 29561320 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Wilcox JE, Hershb...
244. Detection of circulating tumor DNA in patients with osteosarcoma.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Identification and quantification of somatic alterations in plasma-derived, circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) is gaining traction as a non-invasive and cost effective method of disease monitoring in cancer patients, particularly to evaluate response to treatment and monitor for disease recurrence. To our knowledge, genetic analysis of ctDNA in osteosarcoma has not yet been studied. To determine whether somatic alterations can be detected in ctDNA and perhaps applied to patient management in this disease, we collected germline, tumor, and serial plasma samples from pediatric, adolescent, and young adult patients with osteosarcoma and used targeted Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) to identify somatic single nucleotide variants (SNV), insertions and deletions (INDELS), and structural variants (SV) in 7 genes commonly mutated in osteosarcoma. We demonstrate that patient-specific somatic alterations identified through comparison of tumor-germline pairs can be detected and quantified in cell-free DNA of osteosarcoma patients.

在血浆来源的循环肿瘤DNA（ctDNA）中体细胞改变的鉴定和定量作为癌症患者的非侵入性和成本有效的疾病监测方法，特别是评估对治疗的反应和监测疾病复发，正在得到越来越多的关注。据我们所知，骨肉瘤中ctDNA的遗传分析尚未研究。为了确定是否可以在ctDNA中检测到体细胞改变，并且可能应用于本病的患者管理，我们收集了来自儿科，青少年和年轻成人骨肉瘤患者的生殖系统，肿瘤和系列血浆样本，并使用有针对性的新一代测序（NGS）以鉴定在骨肉瘤中通常发生突变的7个基因中的体细胞单核苷酸变体（SNV），插入和缺失（INDELS）和结构变体（SV）。我们证明，通过比较肿瘤生殖细胞对鉴定的患者特异性体细胞改变可以在骨肉瘤患者的无细胞DNA中检测和定量。

Journal: Oncotarget [IF=5.168] PMID: 29560102 PubDate: 2018-Feb-27 Authors: Barris DM, Weiner... PMC5849166
245. Anaplastic lymphoma kinase mutation (ALK F1174C) in small cell carcinoma of the prostate and molecular response to alectinib.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Small cell carcinoma of the prostate (SCCP) is an aggressive disease that can arise de novo or by transdifferentiation from prostate adenocarcinoma. Alterations in anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK) gene are involved in neuroblastoma, lung cancer, and other malignancies but its role in SCCP has not been documented. We describe a patient with refractory de novo SCCP with ALK F1174C activating mutation who obtained clinical benefit from treatment with ALK inhibitor.

前列腺小细胞癌（SCCP）是一种侵袭性疾病，可从头发或从前列腺腺癌转分化产生。间变性淋巴瘤激酶（ALK）基因的改变参与神经母细胞瘤，肺癌和其他恶性肿瘤，但其在SCCP中的作用尚未见报道。我们描述了一位患有ALK F1174C激活突变的难治性新发SCCP患者，其通过ALK抑制剂治疗获得了临床益处。

Journal: Clin. Cancer Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29559559 PubDate: 2018-Mar-20 Authors: Carneiro BA, Pama...
246. Overhydrated stomatocytosis associated with a complex RHAG genotype including a novel de novo mutation.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Overhydrated stomatocytosis is a rare autosomal dominant disorder known to cause variably severe haemolytic anaemia due to heterozygous mutations in the RHAG gene. We report a 26-year-old man with recurring jaundice, splenohepatomegaly and mild chronic haemolytic anaemia with significant stomatocytosis. Extensive haemolytic work-up including flow cytometry for eosin-5'-maleimide and CD47 expression levels was carried out. Targeted resequencing revealed two probably causative heterozygous mutations in RHAG (Leu336Ser and Ile149Met) and one heterozygous mutation in ANK1 (Glu1046Lys). RHAG involvement was confirmed by decreased RhAG macrocomplex component indicated by the reduced CD47 expression on erythrocytes. In silico analysis concordantly flagged RHAG:Leu336Ser and ANK1:Glu1046Lys as likely deleterious mutation, whereas RHAG:Ile149Met was reported as likely neutral by PROVEAN. Family screening by Sanger sequencing revealed RHAG:Leu336Ser in a mother and ANK1:Glu1046Lys in a father who were both asymptomatic, excluding them as causative dominant events, thus establishing RHAG:Ile149Met, novel de novo mutation as probably causative. This case illustrates the importance of family screening in interpreting next-generation sequencing (NGS) data, as in silico analysis alone can be misleading. Erudite generation of diagnostic possibilities based on a thorough baseline clinical and laboratory work-up remains as important as ever, even as NGS brings about a paradigm shift in the diagnostic work-up of rare haemolytic anaemias.

水合型口腔细胞增多症是一种罕见的常染色体显性疾病，由于RHAG基因中的杂合突变而引起不同程度的严重溶血性贫血。我们报告一名26岁男性反复发作性黄疸，脾脏肿大和轻度慢性溶血性贫血伴显着口腔细胞增多症。进行广泛的溶血处理，包括用于伊红-5'-马来酰亚胺和CD47表达水平的流式细胞术。靶向重测序揭示了RHAG（Leu336Ser和Ile149Met）中两个可能的致病杂合突变和ANK1（Glu1046Lys）中的一个杂合突变。 RHAG受累通过红细胞上减少的CD47表达指示的减少的RhAG大复合物组分来证实。在计算机分析中，一致标记RHAG：Leu336Ser和ANK1：Glu1046Lys为可能的有害突变，而据报告PROVEAN可能中性RHAG：Ile149Met。通过Sanger测序进行的家庭筛查揭示了母亲中的RHAG：Leu336Ser和父亲中的ANK1：Glu1046Lys，两者都是无症状的，排除它们作为致病性显性事件，由此建立RHAG：Ile149Met，可能是致病的新型新生突变。这个案例说明了家庭筛查在解释下一代测序（NGS）数据中的重要性，因为单纯的计算机分析可能会产生误导。即使NGS在罕见的溶血性贫血的诊断工作中引起了范式转变，基于彻底的基线临床和实验室检查的诊断可能性仍然与以往一样重要。

Journal: J. Clin. Pathol. [IF=.] PMID: 29559519 PubDate: 2018-Mar-20 Authors: Jamwal M, Aggarwa...
247. Studying microbial functionality within the gut ecosystem by systems biology.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Humans are not autonomous entities. We are all living in a complex environment, interacting not only with our peers, but as true holobionts; we are also very much in interaction with our coexisting microbial ecosystems living on and especially within us, in the intestine. Intestinal microorganisms, often collectively referred to as intestinal microbiota, contribute significantly to our daily energy uptake by breaking down complex carbohydrates into simple sugars, which are fermented to short-chain fatty acids and subsequently absorbed by human cells. They also have an impact on our immune system, by suppressing or enhancing the growth of malevolent and beneficial microbes. Our lifestyle can have a large influence on this ecosystem. What and how much we consume can tip the ecological balance in the intestine. A "western diet" containing mainly processed food will have a different effect on our health than a balanced diet fortified with pre- and probiotics. In recent years, new technologies have emerged, which made a more detailed understanding of microbial communities and ecosystems feasible. This includes progress in the sequencing of PCR-amplified phylogenetic marker genes as well as the collective microbial metagenome and metatranscriptome, allowing us to determine with an increasing level of detail, which microbial species are in the microbiota, understand what these microorganisms do and how they respond to changes in lifestyle and diet. These new technologies also include the use of synthetic and in vitro systems, which allow us to study the impact of substrates and addition of specific microbes to microbial communities at a high level of detail, and enable us to gather quantitative data for modelling purposes. Here, we will review the current state of microbiome research, summarizing the computational methodologies in this area and highlighting possible outcomes for personalized nutrition and medicine.

人类不是自主实体。我们都生活在一个复杂的环境中，不仅与同龄人互动，而且与真正的同伴交往;我们也与我们共存的微生物生态系统相互作用，这些微生物生态系统生活在肠道内，尤其是在我们内部。肠道微生物（通常统称为肠道微生物群）通过将复杂的碳水化合物分解成单糖，将其发酵成短链脂肪酸并随后被人类细胞吸收，对我们的日常能量摄取作出显着贡献。它们也通过抑制或促进恶性微生物和有益微生物的生长而影响我们的免疫系统。我们的生活方式会对这个生态系统产生巨大影响。我们消耗多少和多少可以降低肠道的生态平衡。以加工食品为主的“西方饮食”对于我们的健康有着不同的影响，而不是强化了预先和益生菌的均衡饮食。近年来，出现了新技术，使得微生物群落和生态系统更为详细的了解成为可能。这包括PCR扩增系统发育标记基因测序的进展，以及集体微生物宏基因组和metatranscriptome，使我们能够确定细菌的不断增加的水平，哪些微生物物种在微生物群中，了解这些微生物的作用以及它们是如何应对生活方式和饮食的变化。这些新技术还包括使用合成和体外系统，这些系统使我们能够高度详细地研究底物的影响和微生物群落中特定微生物的添加，并使我们能够为建模目的收集定量数据。在这里，我们将回顾微生物组研究的当前状况，总结这一领域的计算方法并强调个性化营养和医学的可能结果。

Journal: Genes Nutr [IF=2.797] PMID: 29556373 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Hornung B, Martin... PMC5840735
248. High-density genetic map construction and comparative genome analysis in asparagus bean.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Genetic maps are a prerequisite for quantitative trait locus (QTL) analysis, marker-assisted selection (MAS), fine gene mapping, and assembly of genome sequences. So far, several asparagus bean linkage maps have been established using various kinds of molecular markers. However, these maps were all constructed by gel- or array-based markers. No maps based on sequencing method have been reported. In this study, an NGS-based strategy, SLAF-seq, was applied to create a high-density genetic map for asparagus bean. Through SLAF library construction and Illumina sequencing of two parents and 100 F2 individuals, a total of 55,437 polymorphic SLAF markers were developed and mined for SNP markers. The map consisted of 5,225 SNP markers in 11 LGs, spanning a total distance of 1,850.81 cM, with an average distance between markers of 0.35 cM. Comparative genome analysis with four other legume species, soybean, common bean, mung bean and adzuki bean showed that asparagus bean is genetically more related to adzuki bean. The results will provide a foundation for future genomic research, such as QTL fine mapping, comparative mapping in pulses, and offer support for assembling asparagus bean genome sequence.

遗传图谱是数量性状基因座（QTL）分析，标记辅助选择（MAS），精细基因定位和基因组序列组装的先决条件。到目前为止，已经使用各种分子标记建立了几个芦笋豆链接图。然而，这些地图全部是由基于凝胶或阵列的标记构建的。没有报道基于测序方法的地图。在这项研究中，基于NGS的策略SLAF-seq被应用于创建芦笋豆的高密度遗传图谱。通过SLAF文库构建和两个亲本和100个F2个体的Illumina测序，共开发了55,437个多态性SLAF标记并开采了SNP标记。该图由11个LGs中的5,225个SNP标记组成，跨越总距离1,850.81cM，标记之间的平均距离为0.35cM。与其他四种豆科植物，大豆，普通豆，绿豆和小豆的比较基因组分析显示，芦笋豆与小豆的基因关系更为密切。这些结果将为未来的基因组研究提供基础，如QTL精细定位，脉冲比较测绘，并为组装芦笋豆基因组序列提供支持。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29555986 PubDate: 2018-Mar-19 Authors: Huang H, Tan H, X... PMC5859152
249. Clinical and genetic characteristics of 251 consecutive patients with macular and cone/cone-rod dystrophy.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Macular and cone/cone-rod dystrophies (MD/CCRD) demonstrate a broad genetic and phenotypic heterogeneity, with retinal alterations solely or predominantly involving the central retina. Targeted next-generation sequencing (NGS) is an efficient diagnostic tool for identifying mutations in patient with retinitis pigmentosa, which shows similar genetic heterogeneity. To detect the genetic causes of disease in patients with MD/CCRD, we implemented a two-tier procedure consisting of Sanger sequencing and targeted NGS including genes associated with clinically overlapping conditions. Disease-causing mutations were identified in 74% of 251 consecutive MD/CCRD patients (33% of the variants were novel). Mutations in ABCA4, PRPH2 and BEST1 accounted for 57% of disease cases. Further mutations were identified in CDHR1, GUCY2D, PROM1, CRX, GUCA1A, CERKL, MT-TL1, KIF11, RP1L1, MERTK, RDH5, CDH3, C1QTNF5, CRB1, JAG1, DRAM2, POC1B, NPHP1 and RPGR. We provide detailed illustrations of rare phenotypes, including autofluorescence and optical coherence tomography imaging. Targeted NGS also identified six potential novel genotype-phenotype correlations for FAM161A, INPP5E, MERTK, FBLN5, SEMA4A and IMPDH1. Clinical reassessment of genetically unsolved patients revealed subgroups with similar retinal phenotype, indicating a common molecular disease cause in each subgroup.

黄斑和锥形/锥形杆营养不良（MD / CCRD）表现出广泛的遗传和表型异质性，其中视网膜改变完全或主要涉及中央视网膜。有针对性的下一代测序（NGS）是识别患有视网膜色素变性的患者突变的有效诊断工具，其显示出相似的遗传异质性。为了检测MD / CCRD患者的疾病遗传原因，我们实施了一个由桑格测序和靶向NGS组成的双层方案，包括与临床重叠病症相关的基因。在连续251例MD / CCRD患者中有74％发现了致病突变（33％的变异体是新型的）。 ABCA4，PRPH2和BEST1突变占疾病病例的57％。在CDHR1，GUCY2D，PROM1，CRX，GUCA1A，CERKL，MT-TL1，KIF11，RP1L1，MERTK，RDH5，CDH3，C1QTNF5，CRB1，JAG1，DRAM2，POC1B，NPHP1和RPGR中鉴定出进一步的突变。我们提供了罕见表型的详细说明，包括自发荧光和光学相干断层扫描成像。靶向的NGS还鉴定了FAM161A，INPP5E，MERTK，FBLN5，SEMA4A和IMPDH1的六种潜在的新型基因型 - 表型相关性。临床重新评估遗传性未解决的患者显示具有相似视网膜表型的亚组，表明每个亚组中共同的分子病原因。

Journal: Sci Rep [IF=4.259] PMID: 29555955 PubDate: 2018-Mar-19 Authors: Birtel J, Eisenbe... PMC5859282
250. Approach to pancytopenia: Diagnostic algorithm for clinical hematologists.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Pancytopenia is a relatively common phenomenon encountered in clinical practice. The evaluation of a patient with pancytopenia requires a comprehensive approach and identifying the underlying cause can be challenging given the wide range of etiologies including drugs, autoimmune conditions, malignancies, infections, hemophagocytosis, and inheritable conditions. Recent advances in molecular hematology which include genomic profiling and next-generation sequencing have helped gain major insights into various hematological conditions and can guide diagnosing specific diseases in a shorter time at lower costs. However the approach to manage patients with pancytopenia in the current era of genomics is not well defined in the literature and is widely variable in practice. Herein, we conducted a systematic review to help devise an algorithm and management approach for pancytopenia, which serves as a general consultative approach.

全血细胞减少症是在临床实践中遇到的相对普遍的现象。对全血细胞减少症患者的评估需要一种全面的方法，鉴于各种病因包括药物，自身免疫病症，恶性肿瘤，感染，噬血细胞增多症和遗传病，鉴定其根本原因可能具有挑战性。包括基因组谱分析和新一代测序在内的分子血液学研究的最新进展有助于深入了解各种血液学情况，并可以在较短时间内以较低成本指导诊断特定疾病。然而，在目前的基因组学时代，治疗全血细胞减少症的方法在文献中没有很好的定义，并且在实践中广泛地变化。在此，我们进行了系统评价，以帮助制定全血细胞减少症的算法和管理方法，作为一般咨询方法。

Journal: Blood Rev. [IF=.] PMID: 29555368 PubDate: 2018-Mar-05 Authors: Gnanaraj J, Parne...
251. [Multiple lung carcinoma: Primary or intrapulmonary metastasis?]
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Multiple lung carcinomas are 5 to 11,5% of lung carcinomas. The distinction between primary lung carcinomas from carcinomas with intrapulmonary metastasis is essential for optimal patient management. The histopathological analysis is very useful but it has to be completed by genotypic assessment using molecular biology (NGS). Molecular biology can also identify genetic alterations with therapeutic implications. We present the case of a patient with a history of surgery for multiple lung carcinomas diagnosed from 2013 to 2017.

多发性肺癌占肺癌的5〜11.5％。原发性肺癌与肺内转移之间的区别对于最佳的患者管理至关重要。组织病理学分析非常有用，但必须通过使用分子生物学（NGS）进行基因型评估来完成。分子生物学也可以鉴定具有治疗意义的遗传改变。我们介绍2013年至2017年诊断的多发肺癌手术史患者的病例。

Journal: Ann Pathol [IF=0.615] PMID: 29555057 PubDate: 2018-Mar-16 Authors: Ravella L, Barrit...
252. Microbiome Profiles of Commercial Broilers Through Evisceration and Immersion Chilling During Poultry Slaughter and the Identification of Potential Indicator Microorganisms.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Commercial poultry abattoirs were evaluated to determine the efficacy of the multi-hurdle antimicrobial strategy employed to reduce the microbial load present on incoming broilers from the farm. As next generation sequencing (NGS) has been recently employed to characterize the poultry production system, this study utilized 16S High throughput sequencing (HTS) and quantitative plating data to profile the microbiota of chicken carcasses and determine the efficacy of the multi-hurdle antimicrobial system. Aerobic plate count (APC) and Enterobacteriaceae (EB) microbial counts were quantified from whole bird carcass rinsates (WBCR). The remaining rinsates underwent microbiome analysis using 16S rRNA gene fragments on an Illumina MiSeq and were analyzed by Quantitative Insights into Microbial Ecology (QIIME). The key stages of processing were determined to be at rehang, pre-chill, and post-chill as per the Salmonella Reduction Regulation (75 Fed. Reg. 27288-27294). The APC microbial data from rehang, pre-chill, and post-chill were mean log 4.63 CFU/mL, 3.21 CFU/mL, and 0.89 CFU/mL and EB counts were mean log 2.99 CFU/mL, 1.95 CFU/mL, and 0.35 CFU/mL. NGS of WBCR identified 222 Operational Taxonomic Units' (OTU's) of which only 23 OTU's or 10% of the population was recovered post-chill. Microbiome data suggested a high relative abundance of Pseudomonas at post-chill. Additionally, Pseudomonas, Enterobacteriaceae, and Weeksellaceae Chryseobacterium have been identified as potential indicator organisms having been isolated from all processing abattoirs and sampling locations. This study provides insight into the microbiota of commercial broilers during poultry processing.

对商业家禽屠宰场进行评估，以确定用于减少来自农场的进入肉鸡的微生物负荷的多跨栏抗菌策略的功效。由于下一代测序（NGS）最近被用于表征家禽生产系统，本研究利用16S高通量测序（HTS）和定量电镀数据来描绘鸡尸体的微生物群并确定多重跨栏抗微生物系统。从全禽尸体淋巴液（WBCR）定量厌氧平板计数（APC）和肠杆菌科（EB）微生物计数。剩余的漂洗液在Illumina MiSeq上使用16S rRNA基因片段进行微生物组分析，并通过Quantitative Insights分析入微生物生态学（QIIME）进行分析。根据沙门氏菌减量法规（75 Fed。Reg。27288-27294），处理的关键阶段被确定为处理，预冷和后冷处理。 rehang，pre-chill和post-chill的APC微生物数据是平均log 4.63 CFU / mL，3.21 CFU / mL和0.89 CFU / mL，EB计数是平均log 2.99 CFU / mL，1.95 CFU / mL和0.35 CFU / mL。 WBCR的NGS确定了222个业务分类单元（OTU），其中只有23个OTU或10％的人口在寒冷后回收。微生物数据显示冷杉后期假单胞菌的相对丰度较高。此外，假单胞菌，肠杆菌科和水丝虫科已被鉴定为已从所有加工屠宰场和采样位置分离出的潜在指示生物体。这项研究提供了对家禽加工过程中商业肉鸡微生物群的了解。

Journal: Front Microbiol [IF=4.076] PMID: 29552001 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Handley JA, Park ... PMC5841210
253. Messenger RNA biomarker signatures for forensic body fluid identification revealed by targeted RNA sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The recovery of a DNA profile from the perpetrator or victim in criminal investigations can provide valuable 'source level' information for investigators. However, a DNA profile does not reveal the circumstances by which biological material was transferred. Some contextual information can be obtained by a determination of the tissue or fluid source of origin of the biological material as it is potentially indicative of some behavioral activity on behalf of the individual that resulted in its transfer from the body. Here, we sought to improve upon established RNA based methods for body fluid identification by developing a targeted multiplexed next generation mRNA sequencing assay comprising a panel of approximately equal sized gene amplicons. The multiplexed biomarker panel includes several highly specific gene targets with the necessary specificity to definitively identify most forensically relevant biological fluids and tissues (blood, semen, saliva, vaginal secretions, menstrual blood and skin). In developing the biomarker panel we evaluated 66 gene targets, with a progressive iteration of testing target combinations that exhibited optimal sensitivity and specificity using a training set of forensically relevant body fluid samples. The current assay comprises 33 targets: 6 blood, 6 semen, 6 saliva, 4 vaginal secretions, 5 menstrual blood and 6 skin markers. We demonstrate the sensitivity and specificity of the assay and the ability to identify body fluids in single source and admixed stains. A 16 sample blind test was carried out by one lab with samples provided by the other participating lab. The blinded lab correctly identified the body fluids present in 15 of the samples with the major component identified in the 16th. Various classification methods are being investigated to permit inference of the body fluid/tissue in dried physiological stains. These include the percentage of reads in a sample that are due to each of the 6 tissues/body fluids tested and inter-sample differential gene expression revealed by agglomerative hierarchical clustering.

犯罪调查中从罪犯或受害者身上恢复DNA概况可为调查人员提供有价值的“来源级别”信息。然而，DNA档案没有揭示生物材料转移的情况。一些背景信息可以通过确定生物材料的组织或流体来源来获得，因为它可能代表个体导致其从身体转移的一些行为活动。在这里，我们试图通过开发靶向多路复用的下一代mRNA测序测定来改进建立的基于RNA的体液鉴定方法，所述测定包括一组大小基本相同的基因扩增子。多路复用生物标志物组包括几个高度特异性的基因靶，具有确定识别大多数法医相关生物体液和组织（血液，精液，唾液，阴道分泌物，经血和皮肤）的必要特异性。在开发生物标志物专家组时，我们评估了66个基因靶点，并使用训练集的法医相关体液样品对测试靶点组合进行渐进式迭代，结果表现出最佳灵敏度和特异性。目前的测定包括33个目标：6血，6精液，6唾液，4阴道分泌物，5经血和6皮肤标记。我们证明了该检测方法的灵敏度和特异性以及在单一来源和混合污渍中识别体液的能力。由一个实验室对另一参与实验室提供的样品进行16次样品盲测。盲法实验室正确识别出15个样品中存在的体液，其中主要成分在16日鉴定。正在研究各种分类方法以允许干燥生理污渍中的体液/组织的推断。这些包括样本中读数的百分比，这些百分比是由于所测试的6种组织/体液中的每一种造成的，并且样本间差异基因表达通过凝聚等级聚类显示。

Journal: Forensic Sci Int Genet [IF=.] PMID: 29549744 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Hanson E, Ingold ...
254. Development and evaluation of a culture-free microbiota profiling platform (MYcrobiota) for clinical diagnostics.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Microbiota profiling has the potential to greatly impact on routine clinical diagnostics by detecting DNA derived from live, fastidious, and dead bacterial cells present within clinical samples. Such results could potentially be used to benefit patients by influencing antibiotic prescribing practices or to generate new classical-based diagnostic methods, e.g., culture or PCR. However, technical flaws in 16S rRNA gene next-generation sequencing (NGS) protocols, together with the requirement for access to bioinformatics, currently hinder the introduction of microbiota analysis into clinical diagnostics. Here, we report on the development and evaluation of an "end-to-end" microbiota profiling platform (MYcrobiota), which combines our previously validated micelle PCR/NGS (micPCR/NGS) methodology with an easy-to-use, dedicated bioinformatics pipeline. The newly designed bioinformatics pipeline processes micPCR/NGS data automatically and summarizes the results in interactive, but simple web reports. In order to explore the utility of MYcrobiota in clinical diagnostics, 47 clinical samples (40 "damaged skin" samples and 7 synovial fluids) were investigated using routine bacterial culture as comparator. MYcrobiota confirmed the presence of bacterial DNA in 37/37 culture-positive samples and detected bacterial taxa in 2/10 culture-negative samples. Moreover, 36/38 potentially relevant aerobic bacterial taxa and 3/3 mixtures of anaerobic bacteria were identified using culture and MYcrobiota, with the sensitivity and specificity being 95%. Interestingly, the majority of the 448 bacterial taxa identified using MYcrobiota were not identified using culture, which could potentially have an impact on clinical decision-making. Taken together, the development of MYcrobiota is a promising step towards the introduction of microbiota analysis into clinical diagnostic laboratories.

通过检测临床样品中存在的活的，苛刻的和死亡的细菌细胞的DNA，微生物群谱分析有可能大大影响常规临床诊断。通过影响抗生素处方实践或产生新的基于经典的诊断方法，例如培养或PCR，这些结果可能有助于患者受益。然而，16S rRNA基因新一代测序（NGS）方案中的技术缺陷以及获取生物信息学的要求目前阻碍了微生物群分析进入临床诊断。在这里，我们报告了“端对端”微生物群谱分析平台（MYcrobiota）的开发和评估，该平台结合了我们以前验证的胶束PCR / NGS（micPCR / NGS）方法和易于使用的专用生物信息学管道。新设计的生物信息学流程自动处理micPCR / NGS数据，并在交互式但简单的网络报告中总结结果。为了探索MYcrobiota在临床诊断中的应用，使用常规细菌培养物作为比较物研究了47个临床样品（40个“损伤的皮肤”样品和7个滑液）。 MYcrobiota证实37/37培养阳性样品中存在细菌DNA，并在2/10培养阴性样品中检测到细菌分类群。此外，36/38潜在相关好氧细菌分类群和3/3混合厌氧菌被确定使用文化和MYcrobiota，与敏感性和特异性为95％。有趣的是，使用MYcrobiota鉴定的448种细菌类群中，大部分未使用培养物进行鉴定，这可能会对临床决策产生影响。综合起来看，MYcrobiota的发展是将微生物群分析引入临床诊断实验室的有希望的一步。

Journal: Eur. J. Clin. Microbiol. Infect. Dis. [IF=.] PMID: 29549470 PubDate: 2018-Mar-16 Authors: Boers SA, Hiltema...

  • Abstract_Chinese

.

256. Evaluation of preimplantation genetic testing for chromosomal structural rearrangement by a commonly used next generation sequencing workflow.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

To evaluate the applicability of a commonly used next generation sequencing workflow in detecting unbalanced meiotic segregation products for reciprocal translocation and inversion carriers.

评估常用下一代测序工作流程在检测互补易位和倒位载体的不平衡减数分裂产物方面的适用性。

Journal: Eur. J. Obstet. Gynecol. Reprod. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29547808 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Chow JFC, Yeung W...
257. Hydrothermal Synthesis of a New Kind of N-Doped Graphene Gel-like Hybrid As an Enhanced ORR Electrocatalyst.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

In this work, g-C3N4@GO gel-like hybrid is obtained by assembling intentionally exfoliated g-C3N4 sheets on graphene oxide (GO) sheets under a hydrothermal condition. A specific N-doping process is first designed by heating the g-C3N4@GO interlaced hybrid in vacuum to form nitrogen-doped graphene nanosheets (NGS) with high level of pyridinic-N (56.0%) and edge-rich defect structure. The prepared NGS exhibited a great electrocatalysis for oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) in terms of the activity, durability, methanol tolerance, and the reaction kinetics. And the excellent electrocatalytic performance stems from the effective N-doped sites that the nitrogen atom is successfully doped at the defective edges of graphene, and the annealing temperature can play significant role of the doping pattern and location of N. The research provides a new insight into the enhancement of electrocatalysis for ORR based on nonmetal carbons by using the novel N-doping method.

在这项工作中，通过在水热条件下将有意剥离的g-C3N4片材装配在氧化石墨烯（GO）片材上获得g-C3N4 @ GO凝胶状杂化体。首先，通过在真空中加热g-C3N4 @ GO交错杂化物以形成具有高含量吡啶-N（56.0％）和富含边缘缺陷结构的氮掺杂石墨烯纳米片（NGS），来设计特定的N掺杂工艺。制备的NGS在活性，耐久性，甲醇耐受性和反应动力学方面表现出很好的氧还原反应（ORR）电催化作用。其优异的电催化性能源于氮原子在石墨烯缺陷边缘成功掺杂的有效氮掺杂位点，退火温度对N的掺杂方式和位置起着重要作用。本研究提供了新的见解通过使用新的N掺杂方法来增强基于非金属碳的ORR的电催化。

Journal: ACS Appl Mater Interfaces [IF=.] PMID: 29547254 PubDate: 2018-Apr-04 Authors: Xiang Q, Liu Y, Z...
258. Significant photoluminescence enhancement in WS2 monolayers through Na2S treatment.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Tungsten disulfide monolayers have attracted extensive attention in nanoelectronics and optoelectronics applications due to their remarkable electronic and optical properties. High-quality WS2 monolayers with a scalable size and uniform thickness can be synthesized by a chemical vapor deposition method (CVD). However, they commonly contain intrinsic structural defects and different populations of charge carriers, which are responsible for different contributions of excitons, trions, and biexcitons to their photoluminescence (PL) emission. Here, we adopt sodium sulphide (Na2S) solution to chemically treat CVD-grown WS2 monolayers by a simple immersing method. The results show that WS2 monolayers have a significantly enhanced PL emission by a factor of 25-fold and an obvious red-shift of the PL wavelength, resulting from the different excitonic states induced by effective n-type doping after Na2S treatment. This work provides a simple but promising chemical doping route to significantly improve the optical properties of WS2 monolayers and paves the way for the realization of practical WS2 monolayer based optoelectronic applications.

由于其显着的电子和光学特性，二硫化钨单层在纳米电子学和光电子学应用中引起了广泛关注。可通过化学气相沉积法（CVD）合成具有可缩放尺寸和均匀厚度的高质量WS2单层。然而，它们通常包含固有的结构缺陷和不同种类的电荷载体，它们负责激子，三价和双光子对其光致发光（PL）发射的不同贡献。在这里，我们采用硫化钠（Na2S）溶液，通过简单的浸泡法化学处理CVD生长的WS2单层。结果显示WS2单层具有显着增强的PL发射25倍以及PL波长的明显红移，这是由Na2S处理后由有效n型掺杂引起的不同激子态引起的。这项工作提供了一种简单但有前途的化学掺杂方法，可显着改善WS2单分子层的光学性质，并为实现基于WS2单层的光电子应用铺平道路。

Journal: Nanoscale [IF=7.367] PMID: 29546899 PubDate: 2018-Mar-29 Authors: Yao H, Liu L, Wan...
259. Molecular defects in BRAF wild-type ameloblastomas and craniopharyngiomas-differences in mutation profiles in epithelial-derived oropharyngeal neoplasms.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The aim of this study was to evaluate the mutation profile of BRAF wild-type craniopharyngiomas and ameloblastomas. Pre-screening by immunohistochemistry and pyrosequencing for identifying BRAF wild-type tumors was performed on archived specimens of ameloblastic tumors (n = 20) and craniopharyngiomas (n = 62). Subsequently, 19 BRAF wild-type tumors (nine ameloblastic tumors and ten craniopharyngiomas) were analyzed further using next-generation sequencing (NGS) targeting hot spot mutations of 22 cancer-related genes. Thereby, we found craniopharyngiomas mainly CTNNB1 mutated (8/10), including two FGFR3/CTNNB1-double mutated tumors. Ameloblastic tumors were often FGFR2 mutated (4/9; including one FGFR2/TP53/PTEN-triple mutated case) and rarely CTNNB1/TP53-double mutated (1/9) and KRAS-mutated (1/9). In the remaining samples, no mutation could be detected in the 22 genes under investigation. In conclusion, mutation profiles of BRAF wild-type craniopharyngiomas and ameloblastomas share mutations of FGFR genes and have additional mutations with potential for targeted therapy.

本研究的目的是评估BRAF野生型颅咽管瘤和成釉细胞瘤的突变特征。在成釉细胞瘤（n = 20）和颅咽管瘤（n = 62）的标本上进行免疫组织化学和焦磷酸测序以鉴定BRAF野生型肿瘤。随后，使用针对22个癌症相关基因的热点突变的新一代测序（NGS）进一步分析了19个BRAF野生型肿瘤（9个成釉细胞瘤和10个颅咽管瘤）。因此，我们发现颅咽管瘤主要CTNNB1突变（8/10），包括两个FGFR3 / CTNNB1双重突变的肿瘤。成釉细胞瘤常常是FGFR2突变（4/9;包括一个FGFR2 / TP53 / PTEN三重突变的病例）并且很少CTNNB1 / TP53-双突变（1/9）和KRAS突变（1/9）。在剩下的样本中，在所调查的22个基因中未检测到突变。总之，BRAF野生型颅咽管瘤和成釉细胞瘤的突变谱共享FGFR基因的突变，并具有可能用于靶向治疗的额外突变。

Journal: Virchows Arch. [IF=.] PMID: 29546640 PubDate: 2018-Mar-15 Authors: Bartels S, Adisa ...
260. DNA template sequence control of bacterial RNA polymerase escape from the promoter.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Promoter escape involves breaking of the favourable contacts between RNA polymerase (RNAP) and the promoter to allow transition to an elongation complex. The sequence of DNA template that is transcribed during promoter escape (ITS; Initially Transcribed Sequence) can affect promoter escape by mechanisms that are not yet fully understood. We employed a highly parallel strategy utilizing Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) to collect data on escape properties of thousands of ITS variants. We show that ITS controls promoter escape through a combination of position-dependent effects (most prominently, sequence-directed RNAP pausing), and position-independent effects derived from sequence encoded physical properties of the template (for example, RNA/DNA duplex stability). ITS often functions as an independent unit affecting escape in the same manner regardless of the promoter from which transcription initiates. However, in some cases, a strong dependence of ITS effects on promoter context was observed suggesting that promoters may have 'allosteric' abilities to modulate ITS effects. Large effects of ITS on promoter output and the observed interplay between promoter sequence and ITS effects suggests that the definition of bacterial promoter should include ITS sequence.

启动子逃逸包括破坏RNA聚合酶（RNAP）和启动子之间的有利接触，以允许过渡到延伸复合物。在启动子逃逸期间转录的DNA模板序列（ITS;最初转录序列）可以通过尚未完全理解的机制影响启动子逃逸。我们采用了高度并行的策略，利用下一代测序（NGS）来收集数千个ITS变体的逃逸特性数据。我们显示ITS控制启动子通过位置依赖效应（最显着的是，序列指导的RNAP暂停）以及源自模板的序列编码物理性质（例如RNA / DNA双链体稳定性）的位置无关效应的组合逃脱， 。无论转录起始的启动子如何，ITS通常都以相同的方式作为影响逃逸的独立单位发挥功能。然而，在某些情况下，观察到ITS对启动子背景的强烈依赖性表明启动子可能具有调节ITS效应的“变构”能力。 ITS对启动子输出的大量影响以及观察到的启动子序列与ITS效应之间的相互作用表明细菌启动子的定义应包括ITS序列。

Journal: Nucleic Acids Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29546317 PubDate: 2018-Mar-13 Authors: Heyduk E, Heyduk T
261. Next-Generation Sequencing Approaches in Genome-Wide Discovery of Single Nucleotide Polymorphism Markers Associated with Pungency and Disease Resistance in Pepper.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Pepper is an economically important horticultural plant that has been widely used for its pungency and spicy taste in worldwide cuisines. Therefore, the domestication of pepper has been carried out since antiquity. Owing to meet the growing demand for pepper with high quality, organoleptic property, nutraceutical contents, and disease tolerance, genomics assisted breeding techniques can be incorporated to develop novel pepper varieties with desired traits. The application of next-generation sequencing (NGS) approaches has reformed the plant breeding technology especially in the area of molecular marker assisted breeding. The availability of genomic information aids in the deeper understanding of several molecular mechanisms behind the vital physiological processes. In addition, the NGS methods facilitate the genome-wide discovery of DNA based markers linked to key genes involved in important biological phenomenon. Among the molecular markers, single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) indulges various benefits in comparison with other existing DNA based markers. The present review concentrates on the impact of NGS approaches in the discovery of useful SNP markers associated with pungency and disease resistance in pepper. The information provided in the current endeavor can be utilized for the betterment of pepper breeding in future.

胡椒是一种经济上重要的园艺植物，在世界各地的美食中被广泛用于刺激性和辛辣味。因此，自古以来就进行了辣椒的驯化。由于满足了辣椒对高品质，感官特性，营养成分含量和疾病耐受性日益增长的需求，可以引入基因组辅助育种技术来开发具有所需特性的新型辣椒品种。新一代测序（NGS）方法的应用改变了植物育种技术，特别是在分子标记辅助育种领域。基因组信息的可用性有助于深入理解重要生理过程背后的几种分子机制。另外，NGS方法促进了与涉及重要生物学现象的关键基因相关的基于DNA的标记物的全基因组发现。在这些分子标记中，与其他现有的基于DNA的标记相比，单核苷酸多态性（SNP）具有各种益处。本综述集中于NGS方法在发现与辣椒辣味和抗病性相关的有用SNP标记方面的影响。目前努力提供的信息可用于未来改善辣椒育种。

Journal: Biomed Res Int [IF=2.476] PMID: 29546063 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Manivannan A, Kim... PMC5818978
262. Cost-effectiveness of KRAS, EGFR and ALK testing for decision making in advanced nonsmall cell lung carcinoma: the French IFCT-PREDICT.amm study.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

ALK rearrangement and EGFR/KRAS mutations constitute the primary biomarkers tested to provide targeted or nontargeted therapies in advanced nonsmall cell lung cancer (NSCLC) patients. Our objective was to assess the cost-effectiveness of biomarker testing for NSCLC.Between 2013 and 2014, 843 treatment-naive patients were prospectively recruited at 19 French hospitals into a longitudinal observational cohort study. Two testing strategies were compared, i.e. with "at least one biomarker status known" and "at least KRAS status known", in addition to "no biomarker testing" as the reference strategy. The Kaplan-Meier approach was employed to assess restricted mean survival time. Direct medical costs incurred by hospitals were estimated with regard to treatment, inpatient care and biomarker testing.Compared with "no biomarker testing", the "at least one biomarker status known" strategy yielded an incremental cost-effectiveness ratio of EUR13 230 per life-year saved, which decreased to EUR7444 per life-year saved with the "at least KRAS status known" testing strategy. In sensitivity analyses, biomarker testing strategies were less costly and more effective in 41% of iterations.In summary, molecular testing prior to treatment initiation proves to be cost-effective in advanced NSCLC management and may assist decision makers in defining conditions for further implementation of these innovations in general practice.

ALK重排和EGFR / KRAS突变构成了主要的生物标志物，用于在晚期非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者中提供靶向或非靶向治疗。我们的目标是评估非小细胞肺癌生物标志物检测的成本效益。2013年至2014年，共有843名未接受治疗的患者在法国19所医院进行前瞻性招募，进行纵向观察队列研究。除了“无生物标志物测试”作为参考策略之外，还比较了两种测试策略，即“已知至少一种生物标志物状态”和“至少KRAS状态已知”。采用Kaplan-Meier方法评估受限的平均生存时间。根据治疗，住院治疗和生物标志物检测评估医院的直接医疗费用。与“无生物标志物检测”相比，“至少有一种生物标志物状态已知”策略产生的增量成本效益比为13 230欧元/节省了一年，随着“至少已知KRAS状态”测试策略的节省，每生命年减少到7444欧元。在敏感性分析中，生物标志物检测策略在41％的迭代中成本较低并且更有效。总之，开始治疗之前的分子检测证明在晚期NSCLC管理中具有成本效益，并且可以帮助决策者确定进一步实施这些创新在一般实践中。

Journal: Eur. Respir. J. [IF=.] PMID: 29545318 PubDate: 2018-Mar Authors: Loubière S, Dreze...
263. Comparison of whole-genome bisulfite sequencing library preparation strategies identifies sources of biases affecting DNA methylation data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Whole-genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) is becoming an increasingly accessible technique, used widely for both fundamental and disease-oriented research. Library preparation methods benefit from a variety of available kits, polymerases and bisulfite conversion protocols. Although some steps in the procedure, such as PCR amplification, are known to introduce biases, a systematic evaluation of biases in WGBS strategies is missing.

全基因组亚硫酸氢盐测序（WGBS）正在成为一种越来越容易获得的技术，广泛用于基础和疾病研究。文库制备方法受益于各种可用的试剂盒，聚合酶和亚硫酸氢盐转化方案。尽管该过程中的某些步骤（如PCR扩增）已知会引入偏倚，但缺少对WGBS策略偏倚的系统评估。

Journal: Genome Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29544553 PubDate: 2018-Mar-15 Authors: Olova N, Krueger ... PMC5856372
264. From somatic variants towards precision oncology: Evidence-driven reporting of treatment options in molecular tumor boards.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

A comprehensive understanding of cancer has been furthered with technological improvements and decreasing costs of next-generation sequencing (NGS). However, the complexity of interpreting genomic data is hindering the implementation of high-throughput technologies in the clinical context: increasing evidence on gene-drug interactions complicates the task of assigning clinical significance to genomic variants.

随着技术改进和降低下一代测序（NGS）的成本，对癌症的全面了解得到进一步加强。然而，解释基因组数据的复杂性阻碍了临床背景下高通量技术的实施：越来越多的基因 - 药物相互作用证据使得将基因组变异的临床意义赋予的任务变得复杂化。

Journal: Genome Med [IF=7.071] PMID: 29544535 PubDate: 2018-Mar-15 Authors: Perera-Bel J, Hut... PMC5856211
265. Frequency of hereditary neuropathy with liability to pressure palsies (HNPP) due to 17p11.2 deletion in a Korean newborn population.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Hereditary neuropathy with liability to pressure palsies (HNPP) is an autosomal dominant disorder mainly due to a deletion of chromosome 17p11.2 including PMP22 (PMP22 Del HNPP). The prevalence of HNPP is estimated to be 0.84 to 16 per 100,000, but could be underestimated because of the mild symptoms of HNPP. In this study, we estimated the prevalence of PMP22 Del HNPP in a Korean newborn population who underwent next-generation sequencing (NGS)-based copy number variation (CNV) analysis. Of the 11,885 newborns tested by NGS-based CNV analysis, 17p11.2 deletions were found in seven samples. The prevalence of PMP22 Del HNPP was estimated to be 58.9 per 100,000 (95% confidence interval (CI), 25.8-116.5) or 1 in 1698 (95% CI, 1/909-1/5000). Our data suggest that PMP22 Del HNPP might not be uncommon at least in the Korean population.

有压力麻痹（HNPP）的遗传性神经病是一种常染色体显性疾病，主要是由于包括PMP22（PMP22 Del HNPP）在内的染色体17p11.2缺失。 HNPP的患病率估计为每10万人0.84至16人，但由于HNPP症状轻微可能被低估。在这项研究中，我们估计了韩国新生儿人群中接受基于新一代测序（NGS）的拷贝数变异（CNV）分析的PMP22 Del HNPP的患病率。在通过基于NGS的CNV分析测试的11,885名新生儿中，在七个样品中发现17p11.2缺失。据估计，PMP22 Del HNPP的患病率为每10万人中有58.9（95％置信区间（CI），25.8-116.5）或1698中1人（95％CI，1 / 909-1 / 5000）。我们的数据表明，PMP22 Del HNPP可能并不罕见，至少在韩国人群中是罕见的。

Journal: Orphanet J Rare Dis [IF=3.507] PMID: 29544507 PubDate: 2018-Mar-15 Authors: Park JE, Noh SJ, ... PMC5856277
266. Tagmentation on Microbeads: Restore Long-Range DNA Sequence Information Using Next Generation Sequencing with Library Prepared by Surface-Immobilized Transposomes.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The next generation sequencing (NGS) technologies have been rapidly evolved and applied to various research fields, but they often suffer from losing long-range information due to short library size and read length. Here, we develop a simple, cost-efficient, and versatile NGS library preparation method, called tagmentation on microbeads (TOM). This method is capable of recovering long-range information through tagmentation mediated by microbead-immobilized transposomes. Using transposomes with DNA barcodes to identically label adjacent sequences during tagmentation, we can restore inter-read connection of each fragment from original DNA molecule by fragment-barcode linkage after sequencing. In our proof-of-principle experiment, more than 4.5% of the reads are linked with their adjacent reads, and the longest linkage is over 1112 bp. We demonstrate TOM with eight barcodes, but the number of barcodes can be scaled up by an ultrahigh complexity construction. We also show this method has low amplification bias and effectively fits the applications to identify copy number variations.

新一代测序（NGS）技术已经迅速发展并应用于各种研究领域，但由于库的大小和阅读时间长，它们经常会因丢失远距离信息而遭受损失。在这里，我们开发了一种简单，经济高效的多功能NGS文库制备方法，称为微珠标记（TOM）。该方法能够通过微珠固定化转座体介导的标记来恢复远距离信息。使用具有DNA条形码的转座体在标签化期间相同地标记相邻序列，我们可以在测序后通过片段 - 条形码连接恢复来自原始DNA分子的每个片段的读取间连接。在我们的原理验证实验中，超过4.5％的读数与其相邻读数连锁，最长的连锁超过1112bp。我们用八个条形码演示TOM，但是条形码的数量可以通过超高复杂度结构来扩大。我们还展示了这种方法具有低放大偏差，并且有效地适合应用程序以识别拷贝数变化。

Journal: ACS Appl Mater Interfaces [IF=.] PMID: 29543431 PubDate: 2018-Apr-11 Authors: Chen H, Yao J, Fu...
267. Response of the intestinal mucosal barrier of carp (Cyprinus carpio) to a bacterial challenge by Aeromonas hydrophila intubation after feeding with β-1,3/1,6-glucan.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The effect of dietary β-glucan on the bacterial community in the gut of common carp (Cyprinus carpio) was examined after oral application of Aeromonas hydrophila. Carp received either feed supplemented with 1% MacroGard® , a β-1,3/1,6-glucan, or a β-glucan-free diet. Fourteen days after feeding, half of the carp from each group were intubated with 109 colony-forming units (CFU) of a pathogenic strain of A. hydrophila. Gut samples were taken 12 hr to 7 days after application and analysed using microbiological and molecular biological techniques (NGS, RT-PCR-DGGE). The reaction of the mucosa and the microbiota to an A. hydrophila intubation differed in carp fed with β-glucan compared to carp from the control group. In β-glucan fed carp, the total bacterial amount was lower but the number of bacterial species was higher. Bacterial composition was different for carp from both treatment groups. The number of mucin filled goblet cells was reduced in carp fed the β-glucan diet. Mucus was obviously released from the goblet cells and was probably washed out of the gut together with high numbers of bacteria. This might be protective against pathogenic bacteria and, therefore, feeding with β-glucan may provide protection against infections of the gut in carp.

在口服应用嗜水气单胞菌后，研究了膳食β-葡聚糖对鲤鱼（Cyprinus carpio）肠道细菌群落的影响。鲤鱼接受补充1％MacroGard®，β-1,3 / 1,6-葡聚糖或不含β-葡聚糖的饮食的饲料。饲喂14天后，每组鲤鱼的一半用109菌落形成单位（CFU）的嗜水气单胞菌致病菌株插管。应用后12小时至7天取出肠样品，并使用微生物学和分子生物学技术（NGS，RT-PCR-DGGE）进行分析。与来自对照组的鲤鱼相比，在用β-葡聚糖喂养的鲤鱼中，粘膜和微生物群对嗜水气单胞菌气管插管的反应不同。在β-葡聚糖喂养的鲤鱼中，细菌总量较低，但细菌种类较多。来自两个处理组的鲤鱼​​的细菌组成不同。喂食β-葡聚糖饮食的鲤鱼中粘蛋白填充的杯状细胞数量减少。粘液明显从杯状细胞中释放出来，很可能与大量细菌一起从肠道中被冲出。这可能对致病细菌有保护作用，因此，用β-葡聚糖喂养可以防止鲤鱼肠道感染。

Journal: J. Fish Dis. [IF=.] PMID: 29542825 PubDate: 2018-Mar-15 Authors: Jung-Schroers V, ...
268. Quantifying tumor-infiltrating immune cells from transcriptomics data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

By exerting pro- and anti-tumorigenic actions, tumor-infiltrating immune cells can profoundly influence tumor progression, as well as the success of anti-cancer therapies. Therefore, the quantification of tumor-infiltrating immune cells holds the promise to unveil the multi-faceted role of the immune system in human cancers and its involvement in tumor escape mechanisms and response to therapy. Tumor-infiltrating immune cells can be quantified from RNA sequencing data of human tumors using bioinformatics approaches. In this review, we describe state-of-the-art computational methods for the quantification of immune cells from transcriptomics data and discuss the open challenges that must be addressed to accurately quantify immune infiltrates from RNA sequencing data of human bulk tumors.

通过发挥促癌和抗肿瘤发生作用，肿瘤浸润免疫细胞可以深刻地影响肿瘤进展，以及抗癌治疗的成功。因此，肿瘤浸润性免疫细胞的量化有望揭示免疫系统在人类癌症中的多方面作用及其参与肿瘤逃逸机制和对治疗的反应。可以使用生物信息学方法从肿瘤的RNA测序数据定量肿瘤浸润免疫细胞。在这篇综述中，我们描述了用于从转录组学数据中量化免疫细胞的最先进的计算方法，并且讨论了必须解决的开放式挑战，以精确定量来自人体肿瘤的RNA测序数据的免疫渗透。

Journal: Cancer Immunol. Immunother. [IF=.] PMID: 29541787 PubDate: 2018-Mar-14 Authors: Finotello F, Traj...
269. Targeted sequencing reveals distinct pathogenic variants in Chinese patients with lung adenocarcinoma brain metastases.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Lung cancer is the most common type of malignancy to metastasize to the brain, with the median survival time of patients being 6-11 months. In the present study, the aim was to compare the actionable gene mutation profiles of primary lung adenocarcinoma (LC) samples and LC brain metastasis (LCBM) samples through targeted sequencing. Next generation sequencing (NGS) of 13 formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded LC samples and 15 LCBM samples was performed using a customized OncoAim™ cancer panel and OncoAim™ RNA fusion panel on the MiSeq platform. The OncoAim™ cancer panel pipeline and OncoAim™ RNA fusion panel pipeline were used for bioinformatic analysis. Together, 43 variants were observed in 7 genes from the 28 cancer samples. The mutated genes of LCBM were tumor protein (TP)53, epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR), catenin β1, phosphatidylinositol-4,5-bisphosphate 3-kinase catalytic subunit α, mothers against decapentaplegic homolog 4, Kirsten rat sarcoma viral oncogene homolog (KRAS) and proto-oncogene B-Raf, which were exhibited in 10/15 (66.7%), 6/15 (40.0%), 3/15 (20.0%), 2/15 (13.3%), 2/15 (13.3%), 1/15 (6.7%) and 1/15 (6.7%) of samples, respectively. The mutated genes of LC were TP53, EGFR and KRAS, which were exhibited in 11/13 (84.6%), 5/13 (38.5%) and 2/13 (18.2%) of samples, respectively. echinoderm microtubule associated protein like 4-anaplastic lymphoma kinase rearrangements were present in 1 LCBM sample. For 2 LC samples and 1 LCBM sample, no genetic alterations were observed. The NGS data also revealed a novel 4-codon deletion of TP53 (p.V166_H169del) and a novel TP53 splice site mutation (7577157-63del TACTCAG). Further potentially actionable mutations were detected in LCBM, indicating a high degree of genetic heterogeneity between the LC and LCBM samples that were analyzed. The present study demonstrated that NGS provides an improved approach for the discovery of potentially actionable mutations and the understanding of the mechanisms underlying tumor progression and evolution.

肺癌是转移至大脑的最常见的恶性肿瘤类型，患者的中位生存时间为6-11个月。在本研究中，目的是通过靶向测序比较原发性肺腺癌（LC）样品和LC脑转移（LCBM）样品的可行性基因突变概况。在MiSeq平台上使用定制的OncoAim TM癌症组和OncoAim TM RNA融合组进行定量分析（13例福尔马林固定，石蜡包埋的LC样品和15个LCBM样品）。使用OncoAim™癌症组管道和OncoAim™RNA融合板管道进行生物信息学分析。在来自28个癌症样品的7个基因中观察到43种变体。 LCBM的突变基因是肿瘤蛋白（TP）53，表皮生长因子受体（EGFR），连环蛋白β1，磷脂酰肌醇-4,5-二磷酸3-激酶催化亚单位α，抗十倍子配体同系物4的母体，Kirsten大鼠肉瘤病毒致癌基因同系物（66.7％），6/15（40.0％），3/15（20.0％），2/15（13.3％），2/15 （13.3％），1/15（6.7％）和1/15（6.7％）。 LC突变基因分别为TP53，EGFR和KRAS，分别在11/13（84.6％），5/13（38.5％）和2/13（18.2％）样品中显示。棘皮动物微管相关蛋白如4-间变性淋巴瘤激酶重排存在于1个LCBM样品中。对于2个LC样品和1个LCBM样品，没有观察到基因改变。 NGS数据还揭示了TP53（p.V166_H169del）和新的TP53剪接位点突变（7577157-63del TACTCAG）的新密码子4-密码子缺失。在LCBM中检测到进一步潜在的可行动突变，表明LC和LCBM样品之间的高度遗传异质性被分析。目前的研究表明，NGS提供了一种改进的方法，用于发现潜在的可行动突变和对肿瘤进展和进化基础机制的理解。

Journal: Oncol Lett [IF=1.390] PMID: 29541220 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Ma Y, Chen K, Yan... PMC5835849
270. Successful preimplantation genetic diagnosis by targeted next-generation sequencing on an ion torrent personal genome machine platform.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Hearing loss may place a heavy burden on the patient and patient's family. Given the high incidence of hearing loss among newborns and the huge cost of treatment and care (including cochlear implantation), prenatal diagnosis is strongly recommended. Termination of the fetus may be considered as an extreme outcome to the discovery of a potential deaf fetus, and therefore preimplantation genetic diagnosis has become an important option for avoiding the birth of affected children without facing the risk of abortion following prenatal diagnosis. In one case, a couple had a 7-year-old daughter affected by non-syndromic sensorineural hearing loss. The affected fetus carried a causative compound heterozygous mutation c.919-2 A>G (IVS7-2 A>G) and c.1707+5 G>A (IVS15+5 G>A) of the solute carrier family 26 member 4 gene inherited from maternal and paternal sides, respectively. The present study applied multiple displacement amplification for whole genome amplification of biopsied trophectoderm cells and next-generation sequencing (NGS)-based single nucleotide polymorphism haplotyping on an Ion Torrent Personal Genome Machine. One unaffected embryo was transferred in a frozen-thawed embryo transfer cycle and the patient was impregnated. To conclude, to the best of our knowledge, this may be the first report of NGS-based preimplantation genetic diagnosis (PGD) for non-syndromic hearing loss caused by a compound heterozygous mutation using an Ion Torrent Personal Genome Machine. NGS provides unprecedented high-throughput, highly parallel and base-pair resolution data for genetic analysis. The method meets the requirements of medium-sized diagnostics laboratories. With decreased costs compared with previous techniques (such as Sanger sequencing), this technique may have potential widespread clinical application in PGD of other types of monogenic disease.

听力损失可能给病人和病人的家庭带来沉重的负担。鉴于新生儿听力损失的高发生率以及治疗和护理（包括人工耳蜗植入）的巨大费用，强烈建议进行产前诊断。终止胎儿可能被认为是发现潜在的聋胎儿的极端后果，因此植入前基因诊断已成为避免受影响儿童出生而不面临产前诊断后流产风险的重要选择。在一个案例中，一对夫妇有一个7岁的女儿受非综合征型感音神经性听力损失的影响。受影响的胎儿携带溶质运载体家族26成员4的致病复合杂合突变c.919-2A> G（IVS7-2A> G）和c.1707 + 5G> A（IVS15 + 5G> A）基因分别从母系和父系遗传。本研究应用多重置换扩增技术对活检的滋养外胚层细胞进行全基因组扩增，并在Ion Torrent Personal Genome Machine上应用基于新一代测序（NGS）的单核苷酸多态性单倍型分型。一个未受影响的胚胎在冷冻 - 解冻的胚胎转移周期中转移并且患者被浸渍。总而言之，据我们所知，这可能是使用Ion Torrent个人基因组机器人针对由复杂杂合突变引起的非综合征性听力损失的基于NGS的植入前基因诊断（PGD）的首次报告。 NGS为遗传分析提供前所未有的高通量，高度并行和碱基对解析数据。该方法符合中型诊断实验室的要求。与以前的技术（如Sanger测序）相比，通过降低成本，该技术可能在其他类型的单基因疾病的PGD中具有潜在的广泛临床应用。

Journal: Oncol Lett [IF=1.390] PMID: 29541197 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Hao Y, Chen D, Zh... PMC5835955
271. Nimbus: A design-driven analyses suite for amplicon based NGS data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

PCR-based DNA enrichment followed by massively parallel sequencing is a straightforward and cost effective method to sequence genes up to high depth. The full potential of amplicon based sequencing assays is currently not achieved as analysis methods do not take into account the source amplicons of the detected variants. Tracking the source amplicons has the potential to identify systematic biases, enhance variant calling and improve the designs of future assays.

基于PCR的DNA富集，然后进行大规模平行测序，是一种将基因排序到高深度的直接且经济有效的方法。由于分析方法未考虑检测到的变体的来源扩增子，目前尚未实现基于扩增子的测序分析的全部潜力。追踪源扩增子有可能识别系统性偏见，增强变异调用并改进未来化验的设计。

Journal: Bioinformatics [IF=7.307] PMID: 29538618 PubDate: 2018-Mar-10 Authors: Brouwer RWW, van ...

  • Abstract_Chinese
