274. Bioinformatics Analysis for Cell-Free Tumor DNA Sequencing Data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

As a major biomarker of liquid biopsy, cell-free tumor DNA (ctDNA), which can be extracted from blood, urine, or other circulating liquids, is able to provide comprehensive genetic information of tumor and better overcome the tumor heterogeneity problem comparing to tissue biopsy. Developed in recent years, next-generation sequencing (NGS) is a widely used technology for analyzing ctDNA. Although the technologies of processing ctDNA samples are mature, the task to detect low mutated allele frequency (MAF) variations from noisy sequencing data remains challenging. In this chapter, the authors will first explain the difficulties of analyzing ctDNA sequencing data, review related technologies, and then present some novel bioinformatics methods for analyzing ctDNA NGS data in better ways.

作为液体活检的主要生物标记物，可以从血液，尿液或其他循环液体中提取的无细胞肿瘤DNA（ctDNA）能够提供肿瘤的全面遗传信息，并且与组织相比可以更好地克服肿瘤异质性问题活检。新一代测序（NGS）是近年来发展起来的一种广泛用于分析ctDNA的技术。虽然处理ctDNA样本的技术已经成熟，但从噪声测序数据中检测低突变等位基因频率（MAF）变异的任务仍然具有挑战性。在本章中，作者将首先解释分析ctDNA测序数据的困难，回顾相关技术，然后提出一些新的生物信息学方法，以更好的方式分析ctDNA NGS数据。

Journal: Methods Mol. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29536438 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Chen S, Liu M, Zh...
275. Capture Hybridization of Long-Range DNA Fragments for High-Throughput Sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Capture hybridization coupled with high-throughput sequencing (HTS) has become one of the most popular approaches to address some scientific problems not only for fundamental evolution but also for ecology and human disease in recent years. However, the technical problem of limited probe capture ability affects its widespread application. Here, we propose to capture hybridize long-range DNA fragments for HTS (termed LR-LCH). We provide a case of three amphibian samples to examine LR-LCH with 2 kb libraries and comparison of standard capture hybridization with 480 bp libraries. Capture sensitivity increased from an average 13.57% of standard capture hybridization to an average 19.80% of LR-LCH; capture efficiency also increased from an average 72.56% of standard capture hybridization to an average 97.71% of LR-LCH. These indicate that longer fragments in the library generally contain both relatively variable regions and relatively conservative regions. The divergent parts of target DNA are enriched along with conservative parts of DNA sequence that effectively captured during hybridization. We present a protocol that allows users to overcome the low capture sensitivity problem for high divergent regions.

捕获杂交与高通量测序（HTS）相结合，近年来已成为解决一些科学问题的最受欢迎的方法之一，这些方法不仅适用于基础进化，而且适用于生态学和人类疾病。然而，探针捕获能力有限的技术问题影响了其广泛的应用。在这里，我们建议捕获杂交HTS的长程DNA片段（称为LR-LCH）。我们提供了一个三个两栖动物样本的案例来检验LR-LCH的2 kb文库和标准捕获杂交与480 bp文库的比较。捕获灵敏度从标准捕获杂交的平均13.57％增加到LR-LCH的平均19.80％;捕获效率也从标准捕获杂交的平均72.56％增加到LR-LCH的平均97.71％。这些表明文库中较长的片段通常包含相对可变的区域和相对保守的区域。目标DNA的不同部分与杂交期间有效捕获的DNA序列的保守部分一起富集。我们提出了一个协议，允许用户克服高发散区域的低捕获灵敏度问题。

Journal: Methods Mol. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29536436 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Chen X, Ni G, He ...
276. Transcriptome Sequencing: RNA-Seq.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

RNA sequencing (RNA-seq) can not only be used to identify the expression of common or rare transcripts but also in the identification of other abnormal events, such as alternative splicing, novel transcripts, and fusion genes. In principle, RNA-seq can be carried out by almost all of the next-generation sequencing (NGS) platforms, but the libraries of different platforms are not exactly the same; each platform has its own kit to meet the special requirements of the instrument design.

RNA测序（RNA-seq）不仅可用于鉴定常见或罕见转录物的表达，而且还可用于鉴定其他异常事件，如选择性剪接，新转录物和融合基因。原则上，RNA-seq可以通过几乎所有的下一代测序（NGS）平台进行，但不同平台的库不完全相同;每个平台都有自己的套件以满足仪器设计的特殊要求。

Journal: Methods Mol. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29536435 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Zhang H, He L, Cai L
277. Circular RNAs and exosomes in cancer: a mysterious connection.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Circular RNAs (CircRNAs) are a type of non-coding RNAs (NcRNAs) with a closed annular structure. Until next-generation sequencing (NGS) is developed, the misunderstanding of circRNAs 'splicing error' has changed, and the mysterious veil of circRNAs has been revealed. NGS provides an approach to investigate circRNAs. Many scholars point out that circRNAs may play an important role in many diseases, especially cancer. At the same time, exosomes, as a kind of extracellular vesicles loaded with many contents, are a hotspot in recent years. They can act as 'messengers' between cells, especially in cancer. Lately, it is interesting circRNAs are enriched and stable in exosomes, also called exo-circRNAs, and there have been several articles on circRNAs associated with exosomes. In this review, we summarize the characteristics of circRNAs, especially its main functions. Then, we briefly introduce exosomes and their function in cancer. Finally, the known relation between circRNAs and exosomes is discussed. With further researches, exo-circRNAs may be a novel pathway for cancer diagnosis and targeted therapy.

环状RNA（CircRNA）是一种非编码RNA（NcRNA），具有封闭的环状结构。在开发新一代测序（NGS）之前，对于circRNAs的拼接错误的误解发生了变化，揭示了circRNA的神秘面纱。 NGS提供了一种研究circRNA的方法。许多学者指出，circRNA可能在许多疾病中发挥重要作用，尤其是癌症。同时，外泌体作为一种含有大量内含物的细胞外囊泡，近年来成为热点。它们可以充当细胞之间的“信使”，特别是在癌症中。最近，令人感兴趣的是，circRNA在外来体中富集且稳定，也称为exo-circRNAs，并且已经有数篇关于与外来体相关的circRNA的文章。在这篇综述中，我们总结了circRNA的特性，特别是其主要功能。然后，我们简要介绍外来体及其在癌症中的功能。最后，讨论了circRNA与外来体之间的已知关系。随着研究的深入，exo-circRNA可能成为癌症诊断和靶向治疗的新途径。

Journal: Clin Transl Oncol [IF=2.353] PMID: 29536331 PubDate: 2018-Mar-13 Authors: Hou J, Jiang W, Z...
278. Identification and characterization of a novel adenomatous polyposis coli mutation in adult pancreatoblastoma.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

During next generation sequencing (NGS) analysis, many missense mutations were found in a well-known oncogene, many of which were variant of uncertain significance mutations. We recently treated an adult patient with pancreatoblastoma by chemotherapy. Using an NGS cancer panel, we found a previously unreported missense mutation in the 1835 codon of the adenomatous polyposis coli (APC) gene. We also found a heterogeneous mutation in the 1835 codon of the APC gene in the patient's germline by Sanger sequencing. Although this patient did not have a history of familial adenomatous polyposis, functional analysis suggested the R1835G mutant APC showed attenuated repression of Wnt/β-catenin signaling activity. This is the first report showing a novel APC missense mutation involved in the onset of adult pancreatoblastoma.

在下一代测序（NGS）分析中，许多错义突变在众所周知的致癌基因中发现，其中许多是不确定的显着突变的变体。我们最近通过化疗治疗了一例成人胰腺母细胞瘤患者。使用NGS癌症小组，我们在腺瘤性息肉病菌（APC）基因的1835密码子中发现了以前未报道的错义突变。我们还通过Sanger测序发现患者种系中APC基因1835密码子的异质性突变。尽管该患者没有家族性腺瘤性息肉病史，但功能分析表明R1835G突变型APC显示对Wnt /β-连环蛋白信号传导活性的减弱抑制。这是第一份报告，显示了与成人胰腺母细胞瘤发病有关的新型APC错义突变。

Journal: Oncotarget [IF=5.168] PMID: 29535845 PubDate: 2018-Feb-13 Authors: Yamaguchi S, Fuji... PMC5828192
279. Detection of somatic mutations in cell-free DNA in plasma and correlation with overall survival in patients with solid tumors.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

A suitable clinical-grade platform is required for detection of somatic mutations with high sensitivity in cell-free DNA (cfDNA) of patients with solid tumors. In this study, we evaluated in parallel ultra-deep NGS with MassARRAY and allele-specific droplet digital PCR (ddPCR) for cfDNA genotyping and correlated cfDNA yield and mutation status with overall survival (OS) of patients. We assessed plasma samples from 46 patients with various advanced metastatic solid tumors and known mutations by deep sequencing using an Ampliseq cancer hotspot panel V2 on Ion Proton. A subset of these samples with DNA availability was tested by ddPCR and UltraSEEK MassARRAY for mutation detection in 5 genes (IDH1, PIK3CA, KRAS, BRAF, and NRAS). Sixty one of 104 expected tissue mutations and 6 additional mutations not present in the tissue were detected in cfDNA. ddPCR and MassARRAY showed 83% and 77% concordance with NGS for mutation detection with 100% and 79% sensitivity, respectively. The median OS of patients with lower cfDNA yield (74 vs 50 months; P < 0.03) and cfDNA negative for mutations (74.2 vs 53 months; p < 0.04) was significantly longer than in patients with higher cfDNA yield and positive for mutations. A limit-of-detection of 0.1% was demonstrated for ddPCR and MassARRAY platforms using a serially diluted positive cfDNA sample. The MassARRAY and ddPCR systems enable fast and cost-effective genotyping for a targeted set of mutations and can be used for single gene testing to guide response to chemotherapy or for orthogonal validation of NGS results.

在实体瘤患者的无细胞DNA（cfDNA）中以高灵敏度检测体细胞突变需要合适的临床级平台。在这项研究中，我们用MassARRAY和等位基因特异性液滴数字PCR（ddPCR）平行超深NGS评估了cfDNA基因分型，并将cfDNA产量和突变状态与患者的总生存期（OS）相关联。我们使用Ion Proton上的Ampliseq癌症热点面板V2，通过深度测序评估了来自46名患有各种晚期转移性实体瘤和已知突变的患者的血浆样品。通过ddPCR和UltraSEEK MassARRAY检测这5个基因（IDH1，PIK3CA，KRAS，BRAF和NRAS）突变检测的DNA样本的子集。在cfDNA中检测到组织中未发现104个预期组织突变和6个额外突变中的60个。 ddPCR和MassARRAY分别显示与NGS的83％和77％的一致性，用于突变检测，分别具有100％和79％的敏感性。具有较低cfDNA产量（74比50个月; P <0.03）和cfDNA阴性（74.2比53个月; p <0.04）的患者的中位OS显着长于具有较高cfDNA产量和突变阳性的患者。使用系列稀释的阳性cfDNA样品，ddPCR和MassARRAY平台的检测极限为0.1％。 MassARRAY和ddPCR系统能够对一组有针对性的突变进行快速，经济的基因分型，并可用于单基因检测以指导对化疗的反应或NGS结果的正交验证。

Journal: Oncotarget [IF=5.168] PMID: 29535804 PubDate: 2018-Feb-13 Authors: Mehrotra M, Singh... PMC5828199
280. Comparison of Burrows-Wheeler Transform-Based Mapping Algorithms Used in High-Throughput Whole-Genome Sequencing: Application to Illumina Data for Livestock Genomes.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Ongoing developments and cost decreases in next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies have led to an increase in their application, which has greatly enhanced the fields of genetics and genomics. Mapping sequence reads onto a reference genome is a fundamental step in the analysis of NGS data. Efficient alignment of the reads onto the reference genome with high accuracy is very important because it determines the global quality of downstream analyses. In this study, we evaluate the performance of three Burrows-Wheeler transform-based mappers, BWA, Bowtie2, and HISAT2, in the context of paired-end Illumina whole-genome sequencing of livestock, using simulated sequence data sets with varying sequence read lengths, insert sizes, and levels of genomic coverage, as well as five real data sets. The mappers were evaluated based on two criteria, computational resource/time requirements and robustness of mapping. Our results show that BWA and Bowtie2 tend to be more robust than HISAT2, while HISAT2 was significantly faster and used less memory than both BWA and Bowtie2. We conclude that there is not a single mapper that is ideal in all scenarios but rather the choice of alignment tool should be driven by the application and sequencing technology.

新一代测序（NGS）技术的持续发展和成本降低导致其应用的增加，这大大增强了遗传学和基因组学的领域。将序列读取映射到参考基因组是分析NGS数据的基本步骤。以高准确度将读数有效地与参考基因组进行比对非常重要，因为它决定了下游分析的全局质量。在这项研究中，我们使用具有不同序列阅读长度的模拟序列数据集，评估了三种基于Burrows-Wheeler变换的图谱，BWA，Bowtie2和HISAT2在家畜双末端Illumina全基因组测序中的表现，插入大小，基因组覆盖度以及五个真实数据集。根据两个标准评估映射器，计算资源/时间要求和映射的鲁棒性。我们的结果显示BWA和Bowtie2比HISAT2更加稳健，而HISAT2比BWA和Bowtie2快得多，使用的内存也更少。我们得出结论：没有一种映射器在所有情况下都是理想的，但是对齐工具的选择应该由应用程序和排序技术来驱动。

Journal: Front Genet [IF=3.789] PMID: 29535759 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Keel BN, Snelling WM PMC5834436
281. Rapid screening test of most frequent BRCA1/BRCA2 pathogenic variants in the NGS era.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

The average risk of breast cancer in general Slovak population of women is 4-5% and the risk of ovarian cancer is 2%. Probability of breast/ovarian cancer development is higher in individuals carrying a causative germline DNA variant in BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene responsible for hereditary breast/ovarian cancer (HBOC). Although a major proportion of inherited breast/ovarian cancers are due to the mentioned causal mutations, a number of new genes have emerged. Here we describe a rapid, multiplex and comprehensive approach for the detection of pathogenic variants in BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes which most frequently occur in Slovak HBOC population. Analysis comprises the combination of mutation specific methods. Fluorescent PCR amplification followed by fragment analysis for detection of insertions/deletions in exon 11 of BRCA1 gene. Second method is SNaPshot analysis for detection of the most frequent missense and ins/del variants in exons 2, 5, 13, 20 of BRCA1 and exons 11, 23 and 25 of BRCA2 gene. Altogether, we have analyzed 687 samples, 86 (12.5%) in group 1, which fulfilled indication criteria based on the positive family/personal history. Group 2 involved 601 (87.5%) cases, who did not meet the indication criteria and only the screening test was recommended. Using the combined approach, we have identified 47 mutated samples (6.8%), 40 in group 1 (46.5%) and 7 in group 2 (1.1%). However, the presented screening test would not provide complex results of BRCA1/2 gene analysis, it offers testing accessible to a broader spectrum of individuals under the threshold of indication for whole gene analysis. This approach may provide valuable information even in the NGS analysis era.

普通斯洛伐克女性患乳腺癌的平均风险为4-5％，卵巢癌风险为2％。 BRCA1或BRCA2基因负责遗传性乳腺癌/卵巢癌（HBOC）的个体携带致病性生殖细胞DNA变异的个体患乳腺癌/卵巢癌的可能性更高。虽然遗传性乳腺癌/卵巢癌的主要部分是由于所提到的因果突变，但仍有许多新基因出现。在这里我们描述了一种快速，多重和全面的方法来检测斯洛伐克HBOC人群中最常发生的BRCA1和BRCA2基因的致病变异。分析包括突变特异性方法的组合。荧光PCR扩增，然后进行片段分析以检测BRCA1基因外显子11中的插入/缺失。第二种方法是SNaPshot分析，用于检测BRCA1外显子2,5,13,​​20和BRCA2基因外显子11,23和25中最常见的错义和ins / del变体。总的来说，我们分析了687个样本，第1组有86个（12.5％），这些样本满足了基于积极的家庭/个人历史的适应症标准。第2组涉及601例（87.5％），不符合适应症标准，仅推荐筛查试验。使用组合方法，我们确定了47个突变样本（6.8％），第1组40个（46.5％）和第2组7个（1.1％）。然而，所提供的筛查测试不会提供BRCA1 / 2基因分析的复杂结果，它提供了在整个基因分析的指示阈值下可供更广泛的个体使用的测试。即使在NGS分析时代，这种方法也可能提供有价值的信息。

Journal: Neoplasma [IF=1.871] PMID: 29534594 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Zidekova D, Waczu...
282. Expanding the Utilization of Formalin-Fixed, Paraffin-Embedded Archives: Feasibility of miR-Seq for Disease Exploration and Biomarker Development from Biopsies with Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Novel predictive tools for clear cell renal cell carcinoma (ccRCC) are urgently needed. MicroRNAs (miRNAs) have been increasingly investigated for their predictive value, and formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded biopsy archives may potentially be a valuable source of miRNA sequencing material, as they remain an underused resource. Core biopsies of both cancerous and adjacent normal tissues were obtained from patients (n = 12) undergoing nephrectomy. After small RNA-seq, several analyses were performed, including classifier evaluation, obesity-related inquiries, survival analysis using publicly available datasets, comparisons to the current literature and ingenuity pathway analyses. In a comparison of tumour vs. normal, 182 miRNAs were found with significant differential expression; miR-155 was of particular interest as it classified all ccRCC samples correctly and correlated well with tumour size (R² = 0.83); miR-155 also predicted poor survival with hazard ratios of 2.58 and 1.81 in two different TCGA (The Cancer Genome Atlas) datasets in a univariate model. However, in a multivariate Cox regression analysis including age, sex, cancer stage and histological grade, miR-155 was not a statistically significant survival predictor. In conclusion, formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded biopsy tissues are a viable source of miRNA-sequencing material. Our results further support a role for miR-155 as a promising cancer classifier and potentially as a therapeutic target in ccRCC that merits further investigation.

迫切需要用于透明细胞肾细胞癌（ccRCC）的新型预测工具。 MicroRNAs（miRNA）的预测价值越来越多，福尔马林固定石蜡包埋活检档案可能成为miRNA测序材料的宝贵来源，因为它们仍然是一种未被充分利用的资源。癌性和邻近正常组织的核心活组织检查取自经历肾切除术的患者（n = 12）。在进行小RNA-seq之后，进行了一些分析，包括分类器评估，与肥胖有关的询问，使用公开可用数据集的生存分析，与当前文献和独创性途径分析的比较。在肿瘤与正常的比较中，发现182个miRNA具有显着的差异表达;由于miR-155正确地将所有ccRCC样品分类并且与肿瘤大小（R 2 = 0.83）良好相关，因此miR-155是特别感兴趣的;在一个单变量模型中，miR-155也预测了两种不同TCGA（癌症基因组图谱）数据集中存活率差的危险比为2.58和1.81。然而，在包括年龄，性别，癌症分期和组织学分级的多变量Cox回归分析中，miR-155不是统计学显着的生存预测因子。总之，福尔马林固定的石蜡包埋的活检组织是miRNA测序材料的可行来源。我们的研究结果进一步支持了miR-155作为一种有前景的癌症分类器的作用，并有可能成为ccRCC的治疗靶点，值得进一步研究。

Journal: Int J Mol Sci [IF=3.226] PMID: 29534467 PubDate: 2018-Mar-10 Authors: Strauss P, Marti ... PMC5877664
283. NGSphy: phylogenomic simulation of next-generation sequencing data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Advances in sequencing technologies have made it feasible to obtain massive datasets for phylogenomic inference, often consisting of large numbers of loci from multiple species and individuals. The phylogenomic analysis of next-generation sequencing (NGS) data requires a complex computational pipeline where multiple technical and methodological decisions are necessary that can influence the final tree obtained, like those related to coverage, assembly, mapping, variant calling and/or phasing.

测序技术的进步使得获得用于系统发生基因推断的大量数据集成为可能，其通常由来自多个物种和个体的大量位点组成。新一代测序（NGS）数据的系统发育分析需要一个复杂的计算流程，其中需要多个技术和方法决策，可以影响最终获得的树，如覆盖，组装，映射，变异调用和/或定相等。

Journal: Bioinformatics [IF=7.307] PMID: 29534152 PubDate: 2018-Mar-09 Authors: Escalona M, Rocha...
284. Does smoking alter the mutation profile of human papillomavirus-driven head and neck cancers?
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Human papillomavirus (HPV)-driven oropharyngeal cancer (OPC) patients are characterised by a better prognosis than their HPV-negative counterparts. However, this significant survival advantage is not homogeneous and among HPV-positive patients those with a smoking history have a significantly increased risk of oncologic failure. The reason why tobacco consumption impacts negatively the prognosis is still elusive. Tobacco might induce additional genetic alterations leading to a more aggressive phenotype. The purpose of this study was to characterise the mutational profile of HPV-positive OPCs by smoking status. We hypothesise a higher frequency of mutations affecting smokers.

人乳头瘤病毒（HPV）驱动的口咽癌（OPC）患者的特征在于其HPV阴性对应物的预后更好。然而，这种显着的生存优势并不均匀，在吸烟史的HPV阳性患者中，肿瘤失败的风险显着增加。烟草消费之所以对预后产生负面影响仍然难以捉摸。烟草可能诱发额外的基因改变，导致更具攻击性的表型。本研究的目的是通过吸烟状态来描述HPV阳性OPCs的突变特征。我们假设影响吸烟者的突变频率较高。

Journal: Eur. J. Cancer [IF=.] PMID: 29533868 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Mirghani H, Lacro...
285. PlasmidTron: assembling the cause of phenotypes and genotypes from NGS data.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Increasingly rich metadata are now being linked to samples that have been whole-genome sequenced. However, much of this information is ignored. This is because linking this metadata to genes, or regions of the genome, usually relies on knowing the gene sequence(s) responsible for the particular trait being measured and looking for its presence or absence in that genome. Examples of this would be the spread of antimicrobial resistance genes carried on mobile genetic elements (MGEs). However, although it is possible to routinely identify the resistance gene, identifying the unknown MGE upon which it is carried can be much more difficult if the starting point is short-read whole-genome sequence data. The reason for this is that MGEs are often full of repeats and so assemble poorly, leading to fragmented consensus sequences. Since mobile DNA, which can carry many clinically and ecologically important genes, has a different evolutionary history from the host, its distribution across the host population will, by definition, be independent of the host phylogeny. It is possible to use this phenomenon in a genome-wide association study to identify both the genes associated with the specific trait and also the DNA linked to that gene, for example the flanking sequence of the plasmid vector on which it is encoded, which follows the same patterns of distribution as the marker gene/sequence itself. We present PlasmidTron, which utilizes the phenotypic data normally available in bacterial population studies, such as antibiograms, virulence factors, or geographical information, to identify traits that are likely to be present on DNA that can randomly reassort across defined bacterial populations. It is also possible to use this methodology to associate unknown genes/sequences (e.g. plasmid backbones) with a specific molecular signature or marker (e.g. resistance gene presence or absence) using PlasmidTron. PlasmidTron uses a k-mer-based approach to identify reads associated with a phylogenetically unlinked phenotype. These reads are then assembled de novo to produce contigs in a fast and scalable-to-large manner. PlasmidTron is written in Python 3 and is available under the open source licence GNU GPL3 from https://github.com/sanger-pathogens/plasmidtron.

目前正在将越来越丰富的元数据与全基因组测序的样本联系起来。但是，大部分信息都被忽略。这是因为将这些元数据连接到基因或基因组区域通常依赖于了解负责测量特定性状的基因序列并寻找它在该基因组中的存在或缺失。例如，移动遗传因子（MGEs）携带的抗生素耐药基因的传播。然而，尽管可以常规鉴定抗性基因，但如果起始点是短读全基因组序列数据，鉴定其携带的未知MGE可能会困难得多。这是因为MGEs经常充满重复序列，因此组装不良，导致片段化的共有序列。由于可携带许多临床和生态学重要基因的移动DNA具有与宿主不同的进化历史，因此其在整个宿主群体中的分布将根据定义独立于宿主系统发育。在全基因组关联研究中使用这种现象是可能的，以鉴定与特定性状相关的基因以及与该基因连接的DNA，例如其所编码的质粒载体的侧翼序列，该序列如下与标记基因/序列本身相同的分布模式。我们提供PlasmidTron，它利用细菌群体研究中通常可用的表型数据，如抗生素，毒力因子或地理信息，来确定可能存在于DNA上的特征，这些特征可以随机重排在所定义的细菌种群中。也可以使用该方法使用PlasmidTron将未知基因/序列（例如质粒骨架）与特定分子标签或标记（例如抗性基因存在或不存在）相关联。 PlasmidTron使用基于k-mer的方法来鉴定与系统发育不相关表型相关的读段。然后将这些读段重新组装，以快速和可扩展的方式产生重叠群。 PlasmidTron是用Python 3编写的，可从https://github.com/sanger-pathogens/plasmidtron获得开源许可证GNU GPL3。

Journal: Microb Genom [IF=.] PMID: 29533742 PubDate: 2018-Mar-12 Authors: Page AJ, Wailan A... PMC5885016
286. Pitfalls in molecular diagnosis of Friedreich ataxia.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Freidreich ataxia (FRDA) is the most common hereditary ataxia, nearly 98% of patients harbouring homozygous GAA expansions in intron 1 of the FXN gene (NM_000144.4). The remaining patients are compound heterozygous for an expansion and a point mutation or an exonic deletion. Molecular screening for FXN expansion is therefore focused on (GAA)n expansion analysis, commonly performed by triplet repeat primed PCR (PT-PCR). We report on an initial pitfall in the molecular characterization of a 15 year-old girl with Freidreich ataxia (FRDA) who carried a rare deletion in intron 1 of the FXN gene. Due to this deletion TP-PCR failed to amplify the GAA expansion. This exceptional configuration induced misinterpretation of the molecular defect in this patient, who was first reported as having no FXN expansion. NGS analysis of a panel of 212 genes involved in nuclear mitochondrial disorders further revealed an intragenic deletion encompassing exons 4-5 of the FXN gene. Modified TP-PCR analysis confirmed the presence of a classical (GAA)n expansion located in trans. This case points out the possible pitfalls in molecular diagnosis of FRDA in affected patients and their relatives: detection of the FXN expansion may be impaired by several non-pathological or pathological variants around the FXN (GAA)n repeat. We propose a new molecular strategy to accurately detect expansion by TP-PCR in FRDA patients.

Freidreich共济失调（FRDA）是最常见的遗传性共济失调，接近98％的患者携带FXN基因内含子1的纯合GAA扩增（NM_000144.4）。其余患者是扩展和点突变或外显子缺失的复合杂合子。因此，FXN扩增的分子筛选集中于（GAA）n扩增分析，通常通过三重重复引物PCR（PT-PCR）进行。我们报告了弗里德赖希共济失调（FRDA）15岁女孩在FXN基因内含子1中罕见缺失的分子特征的初步缺陷。由于这种缺失，TP-PCR未能扩增GAA扩增。这种特殊的配置引起了该患者分子缺陷的错误解读，该患者首次被报道没有FXN扩充。涉及核线粒体疾病的212个基因的NGS分析进一步揭示了包含FXN基因的外显子4-5的基因内缺失。改进的TP-PCR分析证实存在位于反式的经典（GAA）n扩增。该病例指出了受影响患者及其亲属的FRDA分子诊断可能存在的缺陷：检测FXN扩增可能受到FXN（GAA）n重复周围几种非病理或病理变异的影响。我们提出了一种新的分子策略，以准确检测FRDA患者TP-PCR扩增。

Journal: Eur J Med Genet [IF=2.137] PMID: 29530802 PubDate: 2018-Mar-09 Authors: Barcia G, Rachid ...
287. RARA and RARG Gene Downregulation Associated with EZH2 Mutation in Acute Promyelocytic-Like Morphology Leukemia.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Most Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia (APL) patients express PML-RARA fusion; in rare cases RARA is rearranged with partner genes other than PML. To date, only two patients presenting features similar to APL showing the RARG gene rearrangement have been described. We report an Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML) patient with morphology resembling APL without involvement of the RARA gene. Molecular and Fluorescent In Situ Hybridization (FISH) analyses excluded PML-RARA fusion and variant rearrangements involving RARA and RARG loci. Targeted Next Generation Sequencing showed EZH2-D185H mutation. As this mutation involved the region of interaction with DNA methyltransferases, we speculate an epigenetic alteration of genes involved in the APL-like phenotype. Expression analysis by droplet digital Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) revealed downregulation of the RARA and RARG genes. We hypothesize a novel mechanism of EZH2 function alteration, which may be responsible for an AML with APL-like phenotype featuring dysregulation of the RARA and RARG genes.

大多数急性早幼粒细胞白血病（APL）患者表达PML-RARA融合蛋白;在极少数情况下，RARA与PML以外的伴侣基因重排。迄今为止，仅描述了两名呈现与APL相似的特征以显示RARG基因重排的患者。我们报告急性髓细胞性白血病（AML）患者的形态类似于APL而不涉及RARA基因。分子和荧光原位杂交（FISH）分析排除了涉及RARA和RARG基因座的PML-RARA融合和变异重排。靶向的下一代测序显示EZH2-D185H突变。由于该突变涉及与DNA甲基转移酶相互作用的区域，我们推测参与APL样表型的基因的表观遗传改变。通过液滴数字聚合酶链式反应（PCR）进行的表达分析揭示了RARA和RARG基因的下调。我们推测EZH2功能改变的一种新机制，其可能负责具有APL样表型的AML，其特征是RARA和RARG基因失调。

Journal: Hum. Pathol. [IF=.] PMID: 29530751 PubDate: 2018-Mar-09 Authors: Coccaro N, Zagari...
288. High-throughput construction of multiple cas9 gene variants via assembly of high-depth tiled and sequence-verified oligonucleotides.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Selective retrieval of sequence-verified oligonucleotides (oligos) from next-generation sequencing (NGS) flow cells, termed megacloning, promises accurate and reliable gene synthesis. However, gene assembly requires a complete collection of overlapping sense and nonsense oligos, and megacloning does not typically guarantee the complete production of sequence-verified oligos. Therefore, missing oligos must be provided via repetitive rounds of megacloning, which introduces a bottleneck for scaled-up efforts at gene assembly. Here, we introduce the concept of high-depth tiled oligo design to successfully utilize megacloned oligos for gene synthesis. Using acquired oligos from a single round of the megacloning process, we assembled 72 of 81 target Cas9-coding gene variants. We further validated 62 of these cas9 constructs, and deposited the plasmids to Addgene for subsequent functional characterization by the scientific community. This study demonstrates the utility of using sequence-verified oligos for DNA assembly and provides a practical and reliable optimized method for high-throughput gene synthesis.

从下一代测序（NGS）流式细胞中选择性检索经序列验证的寡核苷酸（寡核苷酸），称为megacloning，保证准确和可靠的基因合成。然而，基因组装需要完整的重叠有义和无义寡核苷酸的收集，并且巨增殖通常不保证经序列验证的寡核苷酸的完整生产。因此，缺失的寡核苷酸必须通过重复轮次巨核细胞化来提供，这为基因组装上扩大的努力带来了瓶颈。在这里，我们介绍高深度平铺寡核苷酸设计的概念，以成功利用megacloned寡核苷酸进行基因合成。使用获得的寡核苷酸从一轮megacloning过程中，我们组装了81个目标Cas9编码基因变异中的72个。我们进一步验证了这些cas9构建体中的62个，并将质粒保存到Addgene以供科学界随后进行功能鉴定。该研究证实了使用经序列验证的寡核苷酸用于DNA装配的实用性，并提供了用于高通量基因合成的实用且可靠的优化方法。

Journal: Nucleic Acids Res. [IF=.] PMID: 29529247 PubDate: 2018-Feb-26 Authors: Cho N, Seo HN, Ry...
289. Convergent Evolution of Slick Coat in Cattle through Truncation Mutations in the Prolactin Receptor.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Evolutionary adaptations are occasionally convergent solutions to the same problem. A mutation contributing to a heat tolerance adaptation in Senepol cattle, a New World breed of mostly European descent, results in the distinct phenotype known as slick, where an animal has shorter hair and lower follicle density across its coat than wild type animals. The causal variant, located in the 11th exon of prolactin receptor, produces a frameshift that results in a truncated protein. However, this mutation does not explain all cases of slick coats found in criollo breeds. Here, we obtained genome sequences from slick cattle of a geographically distinct criollo breed, namely Limonero, whose ancestors were originally brought to the Americas by the Spanish. These data were used to identify new causal alleles in the 11th exon of the prolactin receptor, two of which also encode shortened proteins that remove a highly conserved tyrosine residue. These new mutations explained almost 90% of investigated cases of animals that had slick coats, but which also did not carry the Senepol slick allele. These results demonstrate convergent evolution at the molecular level in a trait important to the adaptation of an animal to its environment.

进化的适应性偶尔是对同一问题的融合解决方案。 Senepol牛（一种主要是欧洲血统的新世界品种）的耐热适应性突变导致了独特的表型，称为光滑性，其中动物的毛发比其野生型动物具有更短的毛发和更低的毛囊密度。位于泌乳素受体第11外显子的致病变异体产生移码，导致截短的蛋白质。然而，这种突变并不能解释在criollo品种中发现的所有光滑外套的情况。在这里，我们从一个地理上不同的criollo品种，即Limonero，其祖先最初由西班牙人带到美洲，获得了光滑的牛的基因组序列。这些数据被用于鉴定催乳素受体第11外显子中的新因果等位基因，其中两个也编码移除高度保守的酪氨酸残基的缩短蛋白质。这些新的突变解释了近90％的调查动物皮肤滑动，但也没有携带塞内波尔浮华等位基因。这些结果表明在分子水平上趋同进化对于动物对其环境适应性的重要性。

Journal: Front Genet [IF=3.789] PMID: 29527221 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Porto-Neto LR, Bi... PMC5829098
290. Whole Genome Sequence Analysis of CTX-M-15 Producing Klebsiella Isolates Allowed Dissecting a Polyclonal Outbreak Scenario.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Extended-spectrum β-lactamase (ESBL) producing Klebsiella pneumoniae pose an important threat of infection with increased morbidity and mortality, especially for immunocompromised patients. Here, we use the rise of multidrug-resistant K. pneumoniae in a German neurorehabilitation center from April 2015 to April 2016 to dissect the benefit of whole genome sequencing (WGS) for outbreak analyses. In total, 53 isolates were obtained from 52 patients and examined using WGS. Two independent analysis strategies (reference-based and -free) revealed the same distinct clusters of two CTX-M-15 producing K. pneumoniae clones (ST15, n = 31; ST405, n = 7) and one CTX-M-15 producing Klebsiella quasipneumoniae strain (ST414, n = 8). Additionally, we determined sequence variations associated with antimicrobial resistance phenotypes in single isolates expressing carbapenem and colistin resistance, respectively. For rapid detection of the major K. pneumoniae outbreak clone (ST15), a selective triplex PCR was deduced from WGS data of the major outbreak strain and K. pneumoniae genome data deposited in central databases. Moreover, we introduce two novel open-source applications supporting reference genome selection (refRank; https://gitlab.com/s.fuchs/refRank) and alignment-based SNP-filtering (SNPfilter; https://gitlab.com/s.fuchs/snpfilter) in NGS analyses.

产超广谱β-内酰胺酶（ESBL）的肺炎克雷伯菌构成感染的重要威胁，发病率和死亡率增加，尤其是免疫功能低下的患者。在此，我们利用2015年4月至2016年4月在德国神经康复中心的多重耐药肺炎克雷伯杆菌的上升来剖析全基因组测序（WGS）在爆发分析中的益处。总共从52名患者中获得53个分离物，并使用WGS进行检查。两个独立的分析策略（基于参考和无）显示两个CTX-M-15产生的肺炎克雷伯菌克隆（ST15，n = 31; ST405，n = 7）和一个CTX-M-15产生的相同的不同簇克氏杆菌肺炎克雷伯氏菌菌株（ST414，n = 8）。另外，我们确定了分别表达碳青霉烯和粘菌素抗性的单一分离株中与抗微生物剂抗性表型相关的序列变异。为了快速检测主要的肺炎克雷伯氏菌暴发克隆（ST15），从主要暴发菌株的WGS数据和中央数据库中存储的肺炎克雷伯氏菌基因组数据推导出选择性三重PCR。此外，我们还介绍了两种支持参考基因组选择（refRank; https://gitlab.com/s.fuchs/refRank）和基于比对的SNP过滤（SNPfilter; https://gitlab.com/s）的开源应用.fuchs / snpfilter）进行NGS分析。

Journal: Front Microbiol [IF=4.076] PMID: 29527200 PubDate: 2018 Authors: Becker L, Fuchs S... PMC5829066
291. Circular RNA expression profiles in placental villi from women with gestational diabetes mellitus.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Circular RNAs (circRNAs) have recently been shown to exert their effects on multiple pathological processes by acting as microRNA (miRNA) sponges. However, the roles of circRNAs in gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) are largely unknown. This study aimed to identify the circRNAs involved in GDM and predict their potential biological functions. We first performed next-generation sequencing (NGS) to generate unbiased placental villi circRNA expression profiles of GDM and normal controls. In total, 48,270 circRNAs from the placental villi of the two groups were sequenced. Of these, 227 circRNAs were significantly up-regulated and 255 circRNAs were significantly down-regulated. Gene Ontology (GO) and Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes (KEGG) biological pathway analyses demonstrated that glycometabolism and lipometabolism processes, which are important in GDM development, were significantly enriched. Further analysis showed that most of the circRNAs harbored miRNA binding sites, and some were associated with GDM. These results showed that circRNAs are aberrantly expressed in the placental villi of GDM patients and play potential roles in the development of GDM.

最近证明环状RNA（circRNA）通过作为microRNA（miRNA）海绵发挥其对多种病理过程的作用。然而，circRNA在妊娠期糖尿病（GDM）中的作用在很大程度上是未知的。本研究旨在确定参与GDM的circRNA并预测其潜在的生物学功能。我们首先进行下一代测序（NGS），以产生GDM和正常对照的无偏的胎盘绒毛circRNA表达谱。总共对来自两组胎盘绒毛的48,270个circRNA进行测序。其中，227个circRNAs显着上调，255个circRNAs显着下调。基因本体论（GO）和京都基因与基因组百科全书（KEGG）生物学途径分析表明，GDM发育中重要的糖代谢和脂肪代谢过程显着增强。进一步分析表明，大多数circRNAs包含miRNA结合位点，有些与GDM相关。这些结果表明，circRNA在GDM患者的胎盘绒毛中异常表达，并在GDM的发展中起潜在作用。

Journal: Biochem. Biophys. Res. Commun. [IF=.] PMID: 29526755 PubDate: 2018-04-15 Authors: Yan L, Feng J, Ch...
292. Identification of novel mutations in FFPE lung adenocarcinomas using DEPArray sorting technology and next-generation sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissues are utilized as the standard diagnostic method in pathology laboratories. However, admixture of unwanted tissues and shortage of normal samples, which can be used to detect somatic mutation, are considered critical factors to accurately diagnose cancer. To explore these challenges, we sorted the pure tumor cells from 22 FFPE lung adenocarcinoma tissues via Di-Electro-Phoretic Array (DEPArray) technology, a new cell sorting technology, and analyzed the variants with next-generation sequencing (NGS) for the most accurate analysis. The allele frequencies of the all gene mutations were improved by 1.2 times in cells sorted via DEPArray (tumor suppressor genes, 1.3-10.1 times; oncogenes, 1.3-2.6 times). We identified 16 novel mutations using the sequencing from sorted cells via DEPArray technology, compared to detecting 4 novel mutation by the sequencing from unsorted cells. Using this analysis, we also revealed that five genes (TP53, EGFR, PTEN, RB1, KRAS, and CTNNB1) were somatically mutated in multiple homogeneous lung adenocarcinomas. Together, we sorted pure tumor cells from 22 FFPE lung adenocarcinomas by DEPArray technology and identified 16 novel somatic mutations. We also established the precise genomic landscape for more accurate diagnosis in 22 lung adenocarcinomas with mutations detected in pure tumor cells. The results obtained in this study could offer new avenues for the treatment and the diagnosis of squamous cell lung cancers.

福尔马林固定石蜡包埋（FFPE）组织被用作病理学实验室的标准诊断方法。然而，可以用来检测体细胞突变的不需要的组织的混合和正常样本的短缺被认为是准确诊断癌症的关键因素。为了探索这些挑战，我们通过一种新的细胞分选技术 - 二电泳 - 阵列（DEPArray）技术对来自22个FFPE肺腺癌组织的纯肿瘤细胞进行了分类，并且使用新一代测序（NGS）准确的分析。在通过DEPArray（肿瘤抑制基因，1.3-10.1倍;癌基因，1.3-2.6倍）分选的细胞中，所有基因突变的等位基因频率提高1.2倍。我们通过DEPArray技术使用来自分选细胞的测序鉴定了16个新突变，与通过未分选细胞测序检测到4个新突变相比。使用这种分析，我们还揭示了五种基因（TP53，EGFR，PTEN，RB1，KRAS和CTNNB1）在多个均质肺腺癌中发生体细胞突变。总之，我们通过DEPArray技术对来自22个FFPE肺腺癌的纯肿瘤细胞进行了分类，并确定了16个新的体细胞突变。我们还建立了精确的基因组景观，以更准确地诊断22个肺腺癌，在纯肿瘤细胞中检测到突变。在这项研究中获得的结果可能为鳞癌的治疗和诊断提供新的途径。

Journal: J. Appl. Genet. [IF=.] PMID: 29525983 PubDate: 2018-Mar-10 Authors: Lee JW, Shin JY, ...
293. Use of the LUS in sequence allele designations to facilitate probabilistic genotyping of NGS-based STR typing results.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Some of the expected advantages of next generation sequencing (NGS) for short tandem repeat (STR) typing include enhanced mixture detection and genotype resolution via sequence variation among non-homologous alleles of the same length. However, at the same time that NGS methods for forensic DNA typing have advanced in recent years, many caseworking laboratories have implemented or are transitioning to probabilistic genotyping to assist the interpretation of complex autosomal STR typing results. Current probabilistic software programs are designed for length-based data, and were not intended to accommodate sequence strings as the product input. Yet to leverage the benefits of NGS for enhanced genotyping and mixture deconvolution, the sequence variation among same-length products must be utilized in some form. Here, we propose use of the longest uninterrupted stretch (LUS) in allele designations as a simple method to represent sequence variation within the STR repeat regions and facilitate - in the nearterm - probabilistic interpretation of NGS-based typing results. An examination of published population data indicated that a reference LUS region is straightforward to define for most autosomal STR loci, and that using repeat unit plus LUS length as the allele designator can represent greater than 80% of the alleles detected by sequencing. A proof of concept study performed using a freely available probabilistic software demonstrated that the LUS length can be used in allele designations when a program does not require alleles to be integers, and that utilizing sequence information improves interpretation of both single-source and mixed contributor STR typing results as compared to using repeat unit information alone. The LUS concept for allele designation maintains the repeat-based allele nomenclature that will permit backward compatibility to extant STR databases, and the LUS lengths themselves will be concordant regardless of the NGS assay or analysis tools employed. Further, these biologically based, easy-to-derive designations uphold clear relationships between parent alleles and their stutter products, enabling analysis in fully continuous probabilistic programs that model stutter while avoiding the algorithmic complexities that come with string based searches. Though using repeat unit plus LUS length as the allele designator does not capture variation that occurs outside of the core repeat regions, this straightforward approach would permit the large majority of known STR sequence variation to be used for mixture deconvolution and, in turn, result in more informative mixture statistics in the near term. Ultimately, the method could bridge the gap from current length-based probabilistic systems to facilitate broader adoption of NGS by forensic DNA testing laboratories.

用于短串联重复（STR）分型的下一代测序（NGS）的一些预期优势包括通过相同长度的非同源等位基因之间的序列变异增强混合物检测和基因型解析。然而，与近年来NGS法医DNA分型方法相比，近年来，许多个案实验室已经实施或正在向概率基因分型过渡，以协助解释复杂的常染色体STR分型结果。当前的概率性软件程序是针对基于长度的数据而设计的，并且不打算容纳作为产品输入的序列字符串。然而，为了利用NGS的优势来增强基因分型和混合物解卷积，必须以某种形式利用相同长度产物之间的序列差异。在这里，我们建议在等位基因名称中使用最长的不间断延伸（LUS）作为一种简单的方法来表示STR重复区域内的序列变异，并促进 - 在近亲 - 基于NGS的分型结果的概率解释。对公布的人口数据的检查表明，参考LUS区域可以直接定义大多数常染色体STR基因座，并且使用重复单位加LUS长度作为等位基因标志可表示超过80％的通过测序检测到的等位基因。使用免费提供的概率软件进行的概念证明研究表明，当程序不要求等位基因为整数时，LUS长度可以用于等位基因的命名，并且利用序列信息可以提高对单一来源和混合来源STR的解释键入结果与单独使用重复单元信息进行比较。 LUS等位基因的概念保留了基于重复的等位基因命名法，可以向后兼容现存的STR数据库，而且无论采用哪种NGS检测或分析工具，LUS长度本身都将保持一致。此外，这些基于生物学的，易于推导的名称保持了父母等位基因与其口吃产品之间的明确关系，从而能够在完全连续的概率程序中进行分析，这些程序模拟口吃，同时避免了基于字符串的搜索带来的算法复杂性。尽管使用重复单位加LUS长度作为等位基因标识符不能捕获在核心重复区域之外发生的变异，但这种直接的方法将允许大部分已知的STR序列变异用于混合物去卷积，并且反过来导致近期内更多信息量的混合统计数据。最终，该方法可以弥补目前基于长度的概率系统的差距，促进法医DNA检测实验室更广泛地采用NGS。

Journal: Forensic Sci Int Genet [IF=.] PMID: 29525576 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Just RS, Irwin JA
294. High resolution global chromosomal aberrations from spontaneous miscarriages revealed by low coverage whole genome sequencing.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Chromosome aberrations are generally considered as one of the most substantial causative factors contributing to spontaneous miscarriages. Cytogenetic analyses like G-banded karyotype and chromosomal microarray analyses are often performed to further investigate the chromosome status of a miscarried fetus.

染色体畸变通常被认为是导致自发流产的最重要的致病因素之一。细胞遗传学分析，如G带染色体核型和染色体微阵列分析通常用于进一步调查流产胎儿的染色体状态。

Journal: Eur. J. Obstet. Gynecol. Reprod. Biol. [IF=.] PMID: 29525519 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Qi H, Xuan ZL, Du...
295. Twenty years of molecular analyses in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis: genetic landscape of Italian patients.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) is a neurodegenerative disease with a heterogeneous genetic background. Because mutation analysis by Sanger sequencing is costly and time-consuming, in recent years, next-generation sequencing (NGS) techniques have become of much interest. This study analyses the results of 20 years of molecular analyses in ALS patients in our laboratory using traditional methods and NGS. Almost 300 ALS patients underwent genetic analysis with Sanger sequencing of 7 genes or with an NGS panel of 23 genes. The C9orf72 expansion was tested by fragment size analysis. Sanger sequencing revealed mutations in 23.8% of familial and 3.8% of sporadic cases, whereas NGS detected potentially pathogenic variants in 45.5% of familial and 5.4% of sporadic cases and variants of unknown significance in 30.3% of patients. In 11.8% of patients, potentially causative mutations were found in 2 or more ALS genes. Compared to traditional methods, NGS is more effective in revealing possibly causal variants, but counseling patients becomes more complicated due to frequent variants of unknown significance and potentially oligogenic cases.

肌萎缩性侧索硬化（ALS）是一种具有异质遗传背景的神经退行性疾病。由于Sanger测序的突变分析成本高且耗时，近年来，新一代测序（NGS）技术引起了越来越多的关注。本研究分析了我们实验室使用传统方法和NGS在ALS患者中进行20年分子分析的结果。几乎300名ALS患者接受了7个基因的Sanger测序或者23个基因的NGS小组进行遗传分析。通过片段大小分析测试C9orf72扩增。 Sanger测序显示23.8％的家族性和3.8％的散发性病例突变，而NGS检测到45.5％的家族性和5.4％的散发性病例和30.3％的患者未知意义变异的潜在致病性变异。在11.8％的患者中，在2个或更多ALS基因中发现潜在致病突变。与传统方法相比，NGS在揭示可能的因果变异方面更有效，但由于频繁变异的未知意义和潜在的寡发性病例，咨询患者变得更加复杂。

Journal: Neurobiol. Aging [IF=.] PMID: 29525178 PubDate: 2018-Jun Authors: Lamp M, Origone P...
296. Characterization of H9N2 avian influenza viruses from the Middle East demonstrates heterogeneity at amino acid position 226 in the hemagglutinin and potential for transmission to mammals.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies are a valuable tool to monitor changes in viral genomes and determine the genetic heterogeneity of viruses. In this study, NGS was applied to clinical poultry samples from Jordan to detect eleven H9N2 low pathogenic avian influenza viruses (LPAIV). All of the viruses tested belonged to Middle East A genetic group of G1 lineage. Deep sequencing demonstrated a high degree of heterogeneity of glutamine and leucine residues at position 226 in the hemagglutinin (HA) gene, which increases specificity to either avian or mammalian-type receptors. Moreover, additional amino acid changes in PB1, PA, M1, M2, and NS1 were identified among the viruses tested. Compared to single gene amplification, application of NGS for surveillance and characterization of H9N2 LPAIV provides a complete genetic profile of emerging isolates and better understanding of the potential of zoonotic transmissions to mammals.

新一代测序（NGS）技术是监测病毒基因组变化并确定病毒遗传异质性的有用工具。在这项研究中，NGS被应用于来自约旦的临床家禽样本，以检测11种H9N2低致病性禽流感病毒（LPAIV）。所有测试的病毒都属于中东G1系遗传群。深度测序表明血凝素（HA）基因中第226位的谷氨酰胺和亮氨酸残基具有高度异质性，这增加了对禽类或哺乳动物类型受体的特异性。此外，在测试的病毒中鉴定出PB1，PA，M1，M2和NS1中的额外氨基酸变化。与单基因扩增相比，应用NGS监测和表征H9N2 LPAIV提供了新出现的分离株的完整遗传图谱，并更好地理解了动物传播对哺乳动物的传播潜力。

Journal: Virology [IF=3.353] PMID: 29524835 PubDate: 2018-05 Authors: Chrzastek K, Lee ...
297. Target capture enrichment of nuclear SNP markers for massively parallel sequencing of degraded and mixed samples.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

DNA from biological forensic samples can be highly fragmented and present in limited quantity. When DNA is highly fragmented, conventional PCR based Short Tandem Repeat (STR) analysis may fail as primer binding sites may not be present on a single template molecule. Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms (SNPs) can serve as an alternative type of genetic marker for analysis of degraded samples because the targeted variation is a single base. However, conventional PCR based SNP analysis methods still require intact primer binding sites for target amplification. Recently, probe capture methods for targeted enrichment have shown success in recovering degraded DNA as well as DNA from ancient bone samples using next-generation sequencing (NGS) technologies. The goal of this study was to design and test a probe capture assay targeting forensically relevant nuclear SNP markers for clonal and massively parallel sequencing (MPS) of degraded and limited DNA samples as well as mixtures. A set of 411 polymorphic markers totaling 451 nuclear SNPs (375 SNPs and 36 microhaplotype markers) was selected for the custom probe capture panel. The SNP markers were selected for a broad range of forensic applications including human individual identification, kinship, and lineage analysis as well as for mixture analysis. Performance of the custom SNP probe capture NGS assay was characterized by analyzing read depth and heterozygote allele balance across 15 samples at 25 ng input DNA. Performance thresholds were established based on read depth ≥500X and heterozygote allele balance within ±10% deviation from 50:50, which was observed for 426 out of 451 SNPs. These 426 SNPs were analyzed in size selected samples (at ≤75 bp, ≤100 bp, ≤150 bp, ≤200 bp, and ≤250 bp) as well as mock degraded samples fragmented to an average of 150 bp. Samples selected for ≤75 bp exhibited 99-100% reportable SNPs across varied DNA amounts and as low as 0.5 ng. Mock degraded samples at 1 ng and 10 ng exhibited >90% reportable SNPs. Finally, two-person male-male mixtures were tested at 10 ng in contributor varying ratios. Overall, 85-100% of alleles unique to the minor contributor were observed at all mixture ratios. Results from these studies using the SNP probe capture NGS system demonstrates proof of concept for application to forensically relevant degraded and mixed DNA samples.

来自生物法医样品的DNA可能高度分散并且数量有限。当DNA高度片段化时，基于常规PCR的短串联重复（STR）分析可能失败，因为引物结合位点可能不存在于单个模板分子上。单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）可以作为分析降解样品的替代类型的遗传标记，因为目标变异是单个碱基。然而，基于常规PCR的SNP分析方法仍然需要用于靶扩增的完整引物结合位点。最近，用于靶向富集的探针捕获方法已经显示使用新一代测序（NGS）技术恢复降解的DNA以及来自古代骨样品的DNA的成功。本研究的目标是设计和测试靶向法医相关核SNP标记的探针捕获测定，用于克隆和大规模并行测序（MPS）降解和限制性DNA样品以及混合物。选择总共451个核SNP（375个SNP和36个微型标记）的一组411个多态性标记用于定制探针捕获面板。 SNP标记物被选择用于广泛的法医应用，包括人类个体识别，亲属关系和谱系分析以及混合物分析。定制SNP探针捕获NGS测定的性能通过分析15ng样品在25ng输入DNA处的读取深度和杂合子等位基因平衡来表征。性能阈值基于读取深度≥500X并且杂合体等位基因平衡在距离50:50±10％偏差内，这在451个SNP中的426个中观察到。对这些426个SNPs进行了大小选择样品（≤75bp，≤100bp，≤150bp，≤200bp和≤250bp）以及模拟降解样品碎片化至平均150bp的分析。选择≤75bp的样本在不同的DNA量下呈现99-100％可报告的SNP，低至0.5ng。在1ng和10ng模拟降解样品显示> 90％可报告的SNP。最后，两人男性 - 男性混合物在10ng的贡献者不同比率下进行测试。总体而言，在所有混合比率下观察到85-100％的次要贡献者独特的等位基因。使用SNP探针捕获NGS系统的这些研究结果证明了应用于法医相关降解和混合DNA样品的概念证据。

Journal: Forensic Sci Int Genet [IF=.] PMID: 29524767 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Bose N, Carlberg ...
298. Novel homozygous GBA2 mutation in a patient with complicated spastic paraplegia.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Hereditary spastic paraplegias (HSPs) are a heterogeneous group of neurological disorders characterized primarily by a pyramidal syndrome with lower limb spasticity, which can manifest as pure HSP or associated with a number of neurological or non-neurological signs (i.e., complicated HSPs). The clinical variability of HSPs is associated with a wide genetic heterogeneity, with more than eighty causative genes known. Recently, next generation sequencing (NGS) has allowed increasing genetic definition in such a heterogeneous group of disorders. We report on a 56- year-old man affected by sporadic complicated HSP consisting of a pyramidal syndrome, cerebellar ataxia, congenital cataract, pes cavus, axonal sensory-motor peripheral neuropathy and cognitive decline. Brain MRI showed cerebellar atrophy and thin corpus callosum. By NGS we found a novel homozygous biallelic c.452-1G > C mutation in the b-glucosidase 2 gene (GBA2), known to be causative for autosomal recessive hereditary spastic paraplegia type 46 (SPG46). The rarity of this inherited form besides reporting on a novel mutation, expands the genetic and clinical spectrum of SPG46 related HSP.

遗传性痉挛性截瘫（HSPs）是一组异质性的神经系统疾病，主要表现为锥体综合征伴有下肢痉挛，可表现为纯粹的HSP或与一些神经或非神经系统体征（即复杂的HSP）相关。 HSPs的临床变异性与广泛的遗传异质性有关，已知有超过八十个致病基因。最近，下一代测序（NGS）已经允许在这样一组异质性疾病中增加遗传定义。我们报告一名56岁男性患者，由散发性复杂HSP组成，包括锥体综合征，小脑性共济失调，先天性白内障，pus cavus，轴突感觉运动周围神经病变和认知功能下降。脑MRI显示小脑萎缩，胼thin体薄。通过NGS，我们在β-葡糖苷酶2基因（GBA2）中发现了一种新型的纯合biallelic c.452-1G> C突变，该突变被认为是造成常染色体隐性遗传性痉挛性截瘫46型（SPG46）的原因。除了报道新突变之外，这种遗传形式的稀有性扩大了SPG46相关HSP的遗传和临床谱。

Journal: Clin Neurol Neurosurg [IF=.] PMID: 29524657 PubDate: 2018-May Authors: Coarelli G, Roman...
299. Primary and acquired EGFR T790M-mutant NSCLC patients identified by routine mutation testing show different characteristics but may both respond to osimertinib treatment.
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Primary EGFR T790M mutation is occasionally identified by routine mutation testing in tyrosine kinase inhibitor (TKI)-naive patients with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). We herein aimed to compare the characteristics of primary and acquired T790M mutations in NSCLC patients, and their response to osimertinib. Using amplification refractory mutation system (ARMS) detection, primary T790M was identified in 0.5% (46/8723) of TKI-naive patients, whereas acquired T790M was detected in 49.7% (71/143) of TKI-relapsed patients. T790M always coexisted with a sensitizing EGFR mutation. Primary T790M more commonly coexisted with L858R, whereas acquired T790M was more likely to coexist with exon 19 deletions. Moreover, next-generation sequencing (NGS) showed that concomitant sensitizing EGFR and primary T790M mutant allele frequencies (MAFs) were highly concordant, but acquired T790M MAFs were significantly lower than the sensitizing EGFR MAFs. Sixteen acquired T790M-mutant patients received osimertinib. The median progression-free survival (PFS) was 8.1 months. Four primary T790M-mutant patients received osimertinib and the median PFS was 8.0 months. Together, our study demonstrates that primary and acquired T790M-mutant patients show distinct differences in some clinical and molecular characteristics, but may both respond to osimertinib treatment.

原发性EGFR T790M突变有时可通过酪氨酸激酶抑制剂（TKI）介导的非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者的常规突变检测来鉴定。我们在此旨在比较原发性和获得性T790M突变在NSCLC患者中的特征及其对osimertinib的反应。使用扩增难治突变系统（ARMS）检测，初次T790M在0.5％（46/8723）TKI初治患者中鉴定，而在TKI复发患者中检测到收获T790M的49.7％（71/143）。 T790M总是与敏化性EGFR突变共存。初级T790M更常见于L858R共存，而获得性T790M更可能与外显子19缺失共存。此外，新一代测序（NGS）显示伴随致敏EGFR和初级T790M突变等位基因频率（MAF）高度一致，但获得性T790M MAF明显低于敏化EGFR MAF。收购的16例T790M突变患者接受osimertinib。中位无进展生存期（PFS）为8.1个月。四名原发性T790M突变患者接受osimertinib治疗，中位PFS为8.0个月。总之，我们的研究表明原发性和获得性T790M突变患者在某些临床和分子特征方面表现出明显差异，但可能都对osimertinib治疗有反应。

Journal: Cancer Lett. [IF=.] PMID: 29524556 PubDate: 2018-Jun-01 Authors: Li W, Qiu T, Guo ...
300. Messages from the second International Conference on Clinical Metagenomics (ICCMg2).
  • Abstract
  • Abstract_Chinese

Clinical metagenomics (CMg) refers to as the application of metagenomic sequencing of clinical samples in order to recover clinically-relevant information. Due to the increasing access to next-generation sequencing (NGS) facilities, CMg is a gast-growing field. In this context, we held the second International Conference on Clinical Metagenomics (ICCMg2) in Geneva in October 2017. During the two days of the conference, several aspects of CMg were addressed, which we propose to summarize in the present manuscript. Besides, we also discuss the evolution of CMg from the last conference held in 2016. In brief, many technical issues related to CMg are expected to be successfully addressed in the coming years. Conversely, assessing the clinical value of CMg, implementing a quality process, storage of data and the ethics of CMg are emerging challenges.

临床宏基因组学（CMg）指为了恢复临床相关信息而应用临床样本的宏基因组测序。由于越来越多地使用下一代测序（NGS）设备，CMg是一个快速发展的领域。在此背景下，我们于2017年10月在日内瓦举行了第二届国际临床宏基因组学大会（ICCMg2）。在会议的两天期间，讨论了CMg的几个方面，我们建议在本手稿中对其进行总结。此外，我们还讨论了2016年举行的上次会议的CMg演变。简言之，与CMg有关的许多技术问题预计将在未来几年成功解决。相反，评估CMg的临床价值，实施质量过程，数据存储和CMg的道德操守是新出现的挑战。

Journal: Microbes Infect. [IF=.] PMID: 29524500 PubDate: 2018-Apr Authors: Ruppé E, Schrenzel J
